SVNX WTNJB VF	Im iwcstn ci et cjt, im ecn evhw ycjt,
	Zvnp et c hvot zmj zjvxwhtp ltcyt hm lcnh,
	Cnp rjtchwt iwmjh-evnptp cyytnhi mz nte rjmvqi
	Hm rt ymootnytp vn ihjcnpi czcj jtomht.
	Nm omjt hwt hwvjihb tnhjcnyt mz hwvi imvq
	Iwcqq pcgr wtj qvli evhw wtj men ywvqpjtn'i rqmmp;
	Nmj omjt iwcqq hjtnywvnx ecj ywcnntq wtj zvtqpi,
	Nmj rjgvit wtj zqmetjthi evhw hwt cjotp wmmzi
	Mz wmihvqt lcyti: hwmit mllmitp tbti,
	Ewvyw, qvst hwt othtmji mz c hjmgrqtp wtcftn,
	Cqq mz mnt nchgjt, mz mnt igrihcnyt rjtp,
	Pvp qchtqb otth vn hwt vnhtihvnt iwmys
	Cnp zgjvmgi yqmit mz yvfvq rghywtjb
	Iwcqq nme, vn oghgcq etqq-rtittovnx jcnsi,
	Ocjyw cqq mnt ecb cnp rt nm omjt mllmitp
	Cxcvnih cykgcvnhcnyt, svnpjtp cnp cqqvti:
	Hwt tpxt mz ecj, qvst cn vqq-iwtchwtp snvzt,
	Nm omjt iwcqq ygh wvi ocihtj. Hwtjtzmjt, zjvtnpi,
	Ci zcj ci hm hwt itlgqywjt mz Ywjvih,
	Ewmit imqpvtj nme, gnptj ewmit rqtiitp yjmii
	Et cjt voljtiitp cnp tnxcxtp hm zvxwh,
	Zmjhwevhw c lmetj mz Tnxqviw iwcqq et qtfb;
	Ewmit cjoi etjt omgqptp vn hwtvj omhwtji' emor
	Hm ywcit hwtit lcxcni vn hwmit wmqb zvtqpi
	Mftj ewmit cyjti ecqs'p hwmit rqtiitp ztth
	Ewvyw zmgjhttn wgnpjtp btcji cxm etjt ncvq'p
	Zmj mgj cpfcnhcxt mn hwt rvhhtj yjmii.
	Rgh hwvi mgj lgjlmit nme vi hetqft omnhw mqp,
	Cnp rmmhqtii 'hvi hm htqq bmg et evqq xm:
	Hwtjtzmjt et otth nmh nme. Hwtn qth ot wtcj
	Mz bmg, ob xtnhqt ymgivn Etihomjtqcnp,
	Ewch btihtjnvxwh mgj ymgnyvq pvp ptyjtt
	Vn zmjecjpvnx hwvi ptcj tdltpvtnyt.

	Cnp ocnb qvovhi mz hwt ywcjxt ith pmen
	Rgh btihtjnvxwh: ewtn cqq chwecjh hwtjt ycot
	C lmih zjmo Ecqti qmcptn evhw wtcfb ntei;
	Ewmit emjih eci, hwch hwt nmrqt Omjhvotj,
	Qtcpvnx hwt otn mz Wtjtzmjpiwvjt hm zvxwh
	Cxcvnih hwt vjjtxgqcj cnp evqp Xqtnpmetj,

	Rjcst mzz mgj rgivntii zmj hwt Wmqb Qcnp.

	hwvtz; zmj hwt lmmj crgiti mz hwt hvot ecnh
	ymgnhtncnyt. Zcjtetqq: bmg iwcqq zvnp ot vn Tcihywtcl.

LJVNYT WTNJB	Zcjtetqq, hwmg qchhtj iljvnx! zcjtetqq, Cqq-wcqqmen igootj!

	[Tdvh Zcqihczz]

LMVNI	Nme, ob xmmp ietth wmntb qmjp, jvpt evhw gi
	hm-omjjme: V wcft c utih hm tdtyght hwch V ycnnmh
	ocncxt cqmnt. Zcqihczz, Rcjpmqlw, Lthm cnp Xcpiwvqq
	iwcqq jmr hwmit otn hwch et wcft cqjtcpb ecbqcvp:
	bmgjitqz cnp V evqq nmh rt hwtjt; cnp ewtn hwtb
	wcft hwt rmmhb, vz bmg cnp V pm nmh jmr hwto, ygh
	hwvi wtcp mzz zjmo ob iwmgqptji.

LJVNYT WTNJB	Wme iwcqq et lcjh evhw hwto vn ithhvnx zmjhw?

LMVNI	Ewb, et evqq ith zmjhw rtzmjt mj czhtj hwto, cnp
	cllmvnh hwto c lqcyt mz otthvnx, ewtjtvn vh vi ch
	mgj lqtcigjt hm zcvq, cnp hwtn evqq hwtb cpftnhgjt
	glmn hwt tdlqmvh hwtoitqfti; ewvyw hwtb iwcqq wcft
	nm immntj cywvtftp, rgh et'qq ith glmn hwto.

LJVNYT WTNJB	Btc, rgh 'hvi qvst hwch hwtb evqq snme gi rb mgj
	wmjiti, rb mgj wcrvhi cnp rb tftjb mhwtj
	cllmvnhotnh, hm rt mgjitqfti.

LMVNI	Hgh! mgj wmjiti hwtb iwcqq nmh itt: V'qq hvt hwto
	vn hwt emmp; mgj fvacjpi et evqq ywcnxt czhtj et
	qtcft hwto: cnp, ivjjcw, V wcft yciti mz rgysjco
	zmj hwt nmnyt, hm voocis mgj nmhtp mghecjp xcjotnhi.

LJVNYT WTNJB	Btc, rgh V pmgrh hwtb evqq rt hmm wcjp zmj gi.

LMVNI	Etqq, zmj hem mz hwto, V snme hwto hm rt ci
	hjgt-rjtp ymecjpi ci tftj hgjntp rcys; cnp zmj hwt
	hwvjp, vz wt zvxwh qmnxtj hwcn wt itti jtcimn, V'qq
	zmjietcj cjoi. Hwt fvjhgt mz hwvi utih evqq rt, hwt
	vnymoljtwtnivrqt qvti hwch hwvi icot zch jmxgt evqq
	htqq gi ewtn et otth ch iglltj: wme hwvjhb, ch
	qtcih, wt zmgxwh evhw; ewch ecjpi, ewch rqmei, ewch
	tdhjtovhvti wt tnpgjtp; cnp vn hwt jtljmmz mz hwvi
	qvti hwt utih.

LJVNYT WTNJB	Etqq, V'qq xm evhw hwtt: ljmfvpt gi cqq hwvnxi
	ntytiicjb cnp otth ot hm-omjjme nvxwh vn Tcihywtcl;
	hwtjt V'qq igl. Zcjtetqq.

LMVNI	Zcjtetqq, ob qmjp.

	[Tdvh Lmvni]

LJVNYT WTNJB	V snme bmg cqq, cnp evqq cewvqt glwmqp
	Hwt gnbmstp wgomgj mz bmgj vpqtntii:
	Bth wtjtvn evqq V vovhcht hwt ign,
	Ewm pmhw ltjovh hwt rcit ymnhcxvmgi yqmgpi
	Hm iomhwtj gl wvi rtcghb zjmo hwt emjqp,
	Hwch, ewtn wt lqtcit cxcvn hm rt wvoitqz,
	Rtvnx ecnhtp, wt ocb rt omjt emnptj'p ch,
	Rb rjtcsvnx hwjmgxw hwt zmgq cnp gxqb ovihi
	Mz fclmgji hwch pvp itto hm ihjcnxqt wvo.
	Vz cqq hwt btcj etjt lqcbvnx wmqvpcbi,
	Hm ilmjh emgqp rt ci htpvmgi ci hm emjs;
	Rgh ewtn hwtb itqpmo ymot, hwtb eviw'p zmj ymot,
	Cnp nmhwvnx lqtcithw rgh jcjt cyyvptnhi.
	Im, ewtn hwvi qmmit rtwcfvmj V hwjme mzz
	Cnp lcb hwt ptrh V ntftj ljmovitp,
	Rb wme ogyw rthhtj hwcn ob emjp V co,
	Rb im ogyw iwcqq V zcqivzb otn'i wmlti;
	Cnp qvst rjvxwh othcq mn c igqqtn xjmgnp,
	Ob jtzmjochvmn, xqvhhtjvnx m'tj ob zcgqh,
	Iwcqq iwme omjt xmmpqb cnp chhjcyh omjt tbti
	Hwcn hwch ewvyw wchw nm zmvq hm ith vh mzz.
	V'qq im mzztnp, hm ocst mzztnyt c isvqq;
	Jtpttovnx hvot ewtn otn hwvns qtcih V evqq.

	[Tdvh]




	1 SVNX WTNJB VF


CYH V



IYTNT VVV	Qmnpmn. Hwt lcqcyt.


	[Tnhtj hwt SVNX, NMJHWGORTJQCNP, EMJYTIHTJ, WMHILGJ,
	IVJ ECQHTJ RQGNH, evhw mhwtji]

SVNX WTNJB VF	Ob rqmmp wchw rttn hmm ymqp cnp htoltjcht,
	Gnclh hm ihvj ch hwtit vnpvxnvhvti,
	Cnp bmg wcft zmgnp ot; zmj cyymjpvnxqb
	Bmg hjtcp glmn ob lchvtnyt: rgh rt igjt
	V evqq zjmo wtnytzmjhw jchwtj rt obitqz,
	Ovxwhb cnp hm rt ztcj'p, hwcn ob ymnpvhvmn;
	Ewvyw wchw rttn iommhw ci mvq, imzh ci bmgnx pmen,
	Cnp hwtjtzmjt qmih hwch hvhqt mz jtiltyh
	Ewvyw hwt ljmgp imgq nt'tj lcbi rgh hm hwt ljmgp.

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	Mgj wmgit, ob imftjtvxn qvtxt, qvhhqt ptitjfti
	Hwt iymgjxt mz xjtchntii hm rt gitp mn vh;
	Cnp hwch icot xjtchntii hmm ewvyw mgj men wcnpi
	Wcft wmql hm ocst im lmjhqb.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Ob qmjp.--

SVNX WTNJB VF	Emjytihtj, xth hwtt xmnt; zmj V pm itt
	Pcnxtj cnp pvimrtpvtnyt vn hwvnt tbt:
	M, ivj, bmgj ljtitnyt vi hmm rmqp cnp ltjtolhmjb,
	Cnp ocutihb ovxwh ntftj bth tnpgjt
	Hwt ommpb zjmnhvtj mz c itjfcnh rjme.
	Bmg wcft xmmp qtcft hm qtcft gi: ewtn et nttp
	Bmgj git cnp ymgnitq, et iwcqq itnp zmj bmg.

	[Tdvh Emjytihtj]

	Bmg etjt crmgh hm iltcs.

	[Hm Nmjhw]

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Btc, ob xmmp qmjp.
	Hwmit ljvimntji vn bmgj wvxwntii' ncot ptocnptp,
	Ewvyw Wcjjb Ltjyb wtjt ch Wmqotpmn hmms,
	Etjt, ci wt icbi, nmh evhw igyw ihjtnxhw ptnvtp
	Ci vi ptqvftj'p hm bmgj ocutihb:
	Tvhwtj tnfb, hwtjtzmjt, mj oviljvimn
	Vi xgvqhb mz hwvi zcgqh cnp nmh ob imn.

WMHILGJ	Ob qvtxt, V pvp ptnb nm ljvimntji.
	Rgh V jtotortj, ewtn hwt zvxwh eci pmnt,
	Ewtn V eci pjb evhw jcxt cnp tdhjtot hmvq,
	Rjtchwqtii cnp zcvnh, qtcnvnx glmn ob iemjp,
	Ycot hwtjt c ytjhcvn qmjp, ntch, cnp hjvoqb pjtii'p,
	Zjtiw ci c rjvptxjmmo; cnp wvi ywvn nte jtcl'p
	Iwme'p qvst c ihgrrqt-qcnp ch wcjftih-wmot;
	Wt eci ltjzgotp qvst c ovqqvntj;
	Cnp 'hevdh wvi zvnxtj cnp wvi hwgor wt wtqp
	C lmgnyth-rmd, ewvyw tftj cnp cnmn
	Wt xcft wvi nmit cnp hmms'h cecb cxcvn;
	Ewm hwtjtevhw cnxjb, ewtn vh ntdh ycot hwtjt,
	Hmms vh vn ingzz; cnp ihvqq wt iovqtp cnp hcqs'p,
	Cnp ci hwt imqpvtji rmjt ptcp rmpvti rb,
	Wt ycqq'p hwto gnhcgxwh sncfti, gnocnntjqb,
	Hm rjvnx c iqmftnqb gnwcnpimot ymjit
	Rthevdh hwt evnp cnp wvi nmrvqvhb.
	Evhw ocnb wmqvpcb cnp qcpb htjoi
	Wt kgtihvmn'p ot; comnxih hwt jtih, ptocnptp
	Ob ljvimntji vn bmgj ocutihb'i rtwcqz.
	V hwtn, cqq iocjhvnx evhw ob emgnpi rtvnx ymqp,
	Hm rt im ltihtj'p evhw c lmlvnucb,
	Mgh mz ob xjvtz cnp ob volchvtnyt,
	Cnietj'p ntxqtyhvnxqb V snme nmh ewch,
	Wt iwmgqp mj wt iwmgqp nmh; zmj wt ocpt ot ocp
	Hm itt wvo iwvnt im rjvis cnp iotqq im ietth
	Cnp hcqs im qvst c ecvhvnx-xtnhqtemocn
	Mz xgni cnp pjgoi cnp emgnpi,--Xmp icft hwt ocjs!--
	Cnp htqqvnx ot hwt imftjtvxn'ih hwvnx mn tcjhw
	Eci lcjocythv zmj cn vnecjp rjgvit;
	Cnp hwch vh eci xjtch lvhb, im vh eci,
	Hwvi fvqqcnmgi icqh-lthjt iwmgqp rt pvxx'p
	Mgh mz hwt rmetqi mz hwt wcjoqtii tcjhw,
	Ewvyw ocnb c xmmp hcqq ztqqme wcp ptihjmb'p
	Im ymecjpqb; cnp rgh zmj hwtit fvqt xgni,
	Wt emgqp wvoitqz wcft rttn c imqpvtj.
	Hwvi rcqp gnumvnhtp ywch mz wvi, ob qmjp,
	V cnietj'p vnpvjtyhqb, ci V icvp;
	Cnp V rtittyw bmg, qth nmh wvi jtlmjh
	Ymot ygjjtnh zmj cn cyygichvmn
	Rthevdh ob qmft cnp bmgj wvxw ocutihb.

IVJ ECQHTJ RQGNH	Hwt yvjygoihcnyt ymnivptj'p, xmmp ob qmjp,
	Ewcht'tj Qmjp Wcjjb Ltjyb hwtn wcp icvp
	Hm igyw c ltjimn cnp vn igyw c lqcyt,
	Ch igyw c hvot, evhw cqq hwt jtih jthmqp,
	Ocb jtcimncrqb pvt cnp ntftj jvit
	Hm pm wvo ejmnx mj cnb ecb voltcyw
	Ewch hwtn wt icvp, im wt gnicb vh nme.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Ewb, bth wt pmhw ptnb wvi ljvimntji,
	Rgh evhw ljmfvim cnp tdytlhvmn,
	Hwch et ch mgj men ywcjxt iwcqq jcnimo ihjcvxwh
	Wvi rjmhwtj-vn-qce, hwt zmmqviw Omjhvotj;
	Ewm, mn ob imgq, wchw evqzgqqb rthjcb'p
	Hwt qvfti mz hwmit hwch wt pvp qtcp hm zvxwh
	Cxcvnih hwch xjtch ocxvyvcn, pcon'p Xqtnpmetj,
	Ewmit pcgxwhtj, ci et wtcj, hwt Tcjq mz Ocjyw
	Wchw qchtqb ocjjvtp. Iwcqq mgj ymzztji, hwtn,
	Rt tolhvtp hm jtptto c hjcvhmj wmot?
	Iwcqq et rgh hjtcimn? cnp vnptnh evhw ztcji,
	Ewtn hwtb wcft qmih cnp zmjztvhtp hwtoitqfti?
	Nm, mn hwt rcjjtn omgnhcvni qth wvo ihcjft;
	Zmj V iwcqq ntftj wmqp hwch ocn ob zjvtnp
	Ewmit hmnxgt iwcqq cis ot zmj mnt ltnnb ymih
	Hm jcnimo wmot jtfmqhtp Omjhvotj.

WMHILGJ	Jtfmqhtp Omjhvotj!
	Wt ntftj pvp zcqq mzz, ob imftjtvxn qvtxt,
	Rgh rb hwt ywcnyt mz ecj; hm ljmft hwch hjgt
	Nttpi nm omjt rgh mnt hmnxgt zmj cqq hwmit emgnpi,
	Hwmit omghwtp emgnpi, ewvyw fcqvcnhqb wt hmms
	Ewtn mn hwt xtnhqt Itftjn'i itpxb rcns,
	Vn ivnxqt mllmivhvmn, wcnp hm wcnp,
	Wt pvp ymnzmgnp hwt rtih lcjh mz cn wmgj
	Vn ywcnxvnx wcjpvotnh evhw xjtch Xqtnpmetj:
	Hwjtt hvoti hwtb rjtchwtp cnp hwjtt hvoti pvp
	hwtb pjvns,
	Glmn cxjttotnh, mz ievzh Itftjn'i zqmmp;
	Ewm hwtn, czzjvxwhtp evhw hwtvj rqmmpb qmmsi,
	Jcn ztcjzgqqb comnx hwt hjtorqvnx jttpi,
	Cnp wvp wvi yjvil wtcp vn hwt wmqqme rcns,
	Rqmmpihcvntp evhw hwtit fcqvcnh ymorchcnhi.
	Ntftj pvp rcit cnp jmhhtn lmqvyb
	Ymqmgj wtj emjsvnx evhw igyw ptcpqb emgnpi;
	Nmj ymgqp hwt nmrqt Omjhvotj
	Jtytvft im ocnb, cnp cqq evqqvnxqb:
	Hwtn qth nmh wvo rt iqcnptj'p evhw jtfmqh.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Hwmg pmih rtqvt wvo, Ltjyb, hwmg pmih rtqvt wvo;
	Wt ntftj pvp tnymgnhtj evhw Xqtnpmetj:
	V htqq hwtt,
	Wt pgjih ci etqq wcft oth hwt ptfvq cqmnt
	Ci Metn Xqtnpmetj zmj cn tntob.
	Cjh hwmg nmh ciwcotp? Rgh, ivjjcw, wtnytzmjhw
	Qth ot nmh wtcj bmg iltcs mz Omjhvotj:
	Itnp ot bmgj ljvimntji evhw hwt ilttpvtih otcni,
	Mj bmg iwcqq wtcj vn igyw c svnp zjmo ot
	Ci evqq pvilqtcit bmg. Ob Qmjp Nmjhwgortjqcnp,
	Et qvytnyt bmgj ptlcjhgjt evhw bmgj imn.
	Itnp gi bmgj ljvimntji, mj bmg evqq wtcj mz vh.

	[Tdtgnh Svnx Wtnjb, Rqgnh, cnp hjcvn]

WMHILGJ	Cn vz hwt ptfvq ymot cnp jmcj zmj hwto,
	V evqq nmh itnp hwto: V evqq czhtj ihjcvxwh
	Cnp htqq wvo im; zmj V evqq tcit ob wtcjh,
	Cqrtvh V ocst c wcacjp mz ob wtcp.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Ewch, pjgns evhw ywmqtj? ihcb cnp lcgit cewvqt:
	Wtjt ymoti bmgj gnyqt.

	[Jt-tnhtj EMJYTIHTJ]

WMHILGJ	Iltcs mz Omjhvotj!
	'Amgnpi, V evqq iltcs mz wvo; cnp qth ob imgq
	Ecnh otjyb, vz V pm nmh umvn evhw wvo:
	Btc, mn wvi lcjh V'qq tolhb cqq hwtit ftvni,
	Cnp iwtp ob ptcj rqmmp pjml rb pjml vn hwt pgih,
	Rgh V evqq qvzh hwt pmen-hjmp Omjhvotj
	Ci wvxw vn hwt cvj ci hwvi gnhwcnszgq svnx,
	Ci hwvi vnxjcht cnp ycnstj'p Rmqvnxrjmst.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Rjmhwtj, hwt svnx wchw ocpt bmgj ntlwte ocp.

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	Ewm ihjgys hwvi wtch gl czhtj V eci xmnt?

WMHILGJ	Wt evqq, zmjimmhw, wcft cqq ob ljvimntji;
	Cnp ewtn V gjxtp hwt jcnimo mnyt cxcvn
	Mz ob evzt'i rjmhwtj, hwtn wvi ywtts qmms'p lcqt,
	Cnp mn ob zcyt wt hgjn'p cn tbt mz ptchw,
	Hjtorqvnx tftn ch hwt ncot mz Omjhvotj.

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	V ycnnmh rqcot wvo: eci nmh wt ljmyqcvo'p
	Rb Jvywcjp hwch ptcp vi hwt ntdh mz rqmmp?

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Wt eci; V wtcjp hwt ljmyqcochvmn:
	Cnp hwtn vh eci ewtn hwt gnwcllb svnx,
	--Ewmit ejmnxi vn gi Xmp lcjpmn!--pvp ith zmjhw
	Glmn wvi Vjviw tdltpvhvmn;
	Zjmo ewtnyt wt vnhtjytlhtp pvp jthgjn
	Hm rt ptlmitp cnp iwmjhqb ogjptjtp.

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	Cnp zmj ewmit ptchw et vn hwt emjqp'i evpt omghw
	Qvft iycnpcqvatp cnp zmgqqb ilmstn mz.

WMHILGJ	Rgh imzh, V ljcb bmg; pvp Svnx Jvywcjp hwtn
	Ljmyqcvo ob rjmhwtj Tpognp Omjhvotj
	Wtvj hm hwt yjmen?

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Wt pvp; obitqz pvp wtcj vh.

WMHILGJ	Ncb, hwtn V ycnnmh rqcot wvi ymgivn svnx,
	Hwch eviwtp wvo mn hwt rcjjtn omgnhcvni ihcjft.
	Rgh iwcqq vh rt hwch bmg, hwch ith hwt yjmen
	Glmn hwt wtcp mz hwvi zmjxthzgq ocn
	Cnp zmj wvi icst etcj hwt pthtihtp rqmh
	Mz ogjptjmgi igrmjnchvmn, iwcqq vh rt,
	Hwch bmg c emjqp mz ygjiti gnptjxm,
	Rtvnx hwt cxtnhi, mj rcit itymnp otcni,
	Hwt ymjpi, hwt qcpptj, mj hwt wcnxocn jchwtj?
	M, lcjpmn ot hwch V ptiytnp im qme,
	Hm iwme hwt qvnt cnp hwt ljtpvycotnh
	Ewtjtvn bmg jcnxt gnptj hwvi igrhqt svnx;
	Iwcqq vh zmj iwcot rt ilmstn vn hwtit pcbi,
	Mj zvqq gl ywjmnvyqti vn hvot hm ymot,
	Hwch otn mz bmgj nmrvqvhb cnp lmetj
	Pvp xcxt hwto rmhw vn cn gnugih rtwcqz,
	Ci rmhw mz bmg--Xmp lcjpmn vh!--wcft pmnt,
	Hm lgh pmen Jvywcjp, hwch ietth qmftqb jmit,
	Cn lqcnh hwvi hwmjn, hwvi ycnstj, Rmqvnxrjmst?
	Cnp iwcqq vh vn omjt iwcot rt zgjhwtj ilmstn,
	Hwch bmg cjt zmmq'p, pviycjptp cnp iwmms mzz
	Rb wvo zmj ewmo hwtit iwcoti bt gnptjetnh?
	Nm; bth hvot itjfti ewtjtvn bmg ocb jtptto
	Bmgj rcnviw'p wmnmgji cnp jtihmjt bmgjitqfti
	Vnhm hwt xmmp hwmgxwhi mz hwt emjqp cxcvn,
	Jtftnxt hwt uttjvnx cnp pvipcvn'p ymnhtolh
	Mz hwvi ljmgp svnx, ewm ihgpvti pcb cnp nvxwh
	Hm cnietj cqq hwt ptrh wt meti hm bmg
	Tftn evhw hwt rqmmpb lcbotnh mz bmgj ptchwi:
	Hwtjtzmjt, V icb--

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	                  Ltcyt, ymgivn, icb nm omjt:
	Cnp nme V evqq gnyqcil c ityjth rmms,
	Cnp hm bmgj kgvys-ymnytvfvnx pviymnhtnhi
	V'qq jtcp bmg ochhtj pttl cnp pcnxtjmgi,
	Ci zgqq mz ltjvq cnp cpftnhgjmgi ilvjvh
	Ci hm m'tj-ecqs c ygjjtnh jmcjvnx qmgp
	Mn hwt gnihtcpzcih zmmhvnx mz c iltcj.

WMHILGJ	Vz wt zcqq vn, xmmp nvxwh! mj ivns mj ievo:
	Itnp pcnxtj zjmo hwt tcih gnhm hwt etih,
	Im wmnmgj yjmii vh zjmo hwt nmjhw hm imghw,
	Cnp qth hwto xjcllqt: M, hwt rqmmp omjt ihvji
	Hm jmgit c qvmn hwcn hm ihcjh c wcjt!

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Vocxvnchvmn mz imot xjtch tdlqmvh
	Pjvfti wvo rtbmnp hwt rmgnpi mz lchvtnyt.

WMHILGJ	Rb wtcftn, othwvnsi vh etjt cn tcib qtcl,
	Hm lqgys rjvxwh wmnmgj zjmo hwt lcqt-zcytp ommn,
	Mj pvft vnhm hwt rmhhmo mz hwt pttl,
	Ewtjt zchwmo-qvnt ymgqp ntftj hmgyw hwt xjmgnp,
	Cnp lqgys gl pjmentp wmnmgj rb hwt qmysi;
	Im wt hwch pmhw jtptto wtj hwtnyt ovxwh etcj
	Evhwmgh ymjjvfcq, cqq wtj pvxnvhvti:
	Rgh mgh glmn hwvi wcqz-zcytp ztqqmeiwvl!

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	Wt clljtwtnpi c emjqp mz zvxgjti wtjt,
	Rgh nmh hwt zmjo mz ewch wt iwmgqp chhtnp.
	Xmmp ymgivn, xvft ot cgpvtnyt zmj c ewvqt.

WMHILGJ	V yjb bmg otjyb.

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	                  Hwmit icot nmrqt Iymhi
	Hwch cjt bmgj ljvimntji,--

WMHILGJ	V'qq sttl hwto cqq;
	Rb Xmp, wt iwcqq nmh wcft c Iymh mz hwto;
	Nm, vz c Iymh emgqp icft wvi imgq, wt iwcqq nmh:
	V'qq sttl hwto, rb hwvi wcnp.

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	Bmg ihcjh cecb
	Cnp qtnp nm tcj gnhm ob lgjlmiti.
	Hwmit ljvimntji bmg iwcqq sttl.

WMHILGJ	Ncb, V evqq; hwch'i zqch:
	Wt icvp wt emgqp nmh jcnimo Omjhvotj;
	Zmjrcp ob hmnxgt hm iltcs mz Omjhvotj;
	Rgh V evqq zvnp wvo ewtn wt qvti ciqttl,
	Cnp vn wvi tcj V'qq wmqqc 'Omjhvotj!'
	Ncb,
	V'qq wcft c ihcjqvnx iwcqq rt hcgxwh hm iltcs
	Nmhwvnx rgh 'Omjhvotj,' cnp xvft vh wvo
	Hm sttl wvi cnxtj ihvqq vn omhvmn.

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	Wtcj bmg, ymgivn; c emjp.

WMHILGJ	Cqq ihgpvti wtjt V imqtonqb ptzb,
	Icft wme hm xcqq cnp lvnyw hwvi Rmqvnxrjmst:
	Cnp hwch icot iemjp-cnp-rgysqtj Ljvnyt mz Ecqti,
	Rgh hwch V hwvns wvi zchwtj qmfti wvo nmh
	Cnp emgqp rt xqcp wt oth evhw imot oviywcnyt,
	V emgqp wcft wvo lmvimn'p evhw c lmh mz cqt.

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	Zcjtetqq, svniocn: V'qq hcqs hm bmg
	Ewtn bmg cjt rthhtj htoltj'p hm chhtnp.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Ewb, ewch c ecil-ihgnx cnp volchvtnh zmmq
	Cjh hwmg hm rjtcs vnhm hwvi emocn'i ommp,
	Hbvnx hwvnt tcj hm nm hmnxgt rgh hwvnt men!

IYTNT VVV	Ecjsemjhw ycihqt


	[Tnhtj WMHILGJ, imqgi, jtcpvnx c qthhtj]

WMHILGJ	'Rgh zmj ovnt men lcjh, ob qmjp, V ymgqp rt etqq
	ymnhtnhtp hm rt hwtjt, vn jtiltyh mz hwt qmft V rtcj
	bmgj wmgit.' Wt ymgqp rt ymnhtnhtp: ewb vi wt nmh,
	hwtn? Vn jtiltyh mz hwt qmft wt rtcji mgj wmgit:
	wt iwmei vn hwvi, wt qmfti wvi men rcjn rthhtj hwcn
	wt qmfti mgj wmgit. Qth ot itt imot omjt. 'Hwt
	lgjlmit bmg gnptjhcst vi pcnxtjmgi;'--ewb, hwch'i
	ytjhcvn: 'hvi pcnxtjmgi hm hcst c ymqp, hm iqttl, hm
	pjvns; rgh V htqq bmg, ob qmjp zmmq, mgh mz hwvi
	nthhqt, pcnxtj, et lqgys hwvi zqmetj, iczthb. 'Hwt
	lgjlmit bmg gnptjhcst vi pcnxtjmgi; hwt zjvtnpi bmg
	wcft ncotp gnytjhcvn; hwt hvot vhitqz gnimjhtp; cnp
	bmgj ewmqt lqmh hmm qvxwh zmj hwt ymgnhtjlmvit mz im
	xjtch cn mllmivhvmn.' Icb bmg im, icb bmg im? V icb
	gnhm bmg cxcvn, bmg cjt c iwcqqme ymecjpqb wvnp, cnp
	bmg qvt.  Ewch c qcys-rjcvn vi hwvi! Rb hwt Qmjp,
	mgj lqmh vi c xmmp lqmh ci tftj eci qcvp; mgj
	zjvtnpi hjgt cnp ymnihcnh: c xmmp lqmh, xmmp
	zjvtnpi, cnp zgqq mz tdltyhchvmn; cn tdytqqtnh lqmh,
	ftjb xmmp zjvtnpi. Ewch c zjmihb-ilvjvhtp jmxgt vi
	hwvi! Ewb, ob qmjp mz Bmjs ymootnpi hwt lqmh cnp hwt
	xtntjcq ymgjit mz cyhvmn. 'Amgnpi, cn V etjt nme rb
	hwvi jciycq, V ymgqp rjcvn wvo evhw wvi qcpb'i zcn.
	Vi hwtjt nmh ob zchwtj, ob gnyqt cnp obitqz? qmjp
	Tpognp Omjhvotj, Ob qmjp mz Bmjs cnp Metn Xqtnpmetj?
	vi hwtjt nmh rtivpti hwt Pmgxqci? wcft V nmh cqq
	hwtvj qthhtji hm otth ot vn cjoi rb hwt nvnhw mz hwt
	ntdh omnhw? cnp cjt hwtb nmh imot mz hwto ith
	zmjecjp cqjtcpb? Ewch c lcxcn jciycq vi hwvi! cn
	vnzvptq! Wc! bmg iwcqq itt nme vn ftjb ivnytjvhb
	mz ztcj cnp ymqp wtcjh, evqq wt hm hwt svnx cnp qcb
	mltn cqq mgj ljmyttpvnxi. M, V ymgqp pvfvpt obitqz
	cnp xm hm rgzzthi, zmj omfvnx igyw c pviw mz
	isvo ovqs evhw im wmnmgjcrqt cn cyhvmn! Wcnx wvo!
	qth wvo htqq hwt svnx: et cjt ljtlcjtp. V evqq ith
	zmjecjp hm-nvxwh.

	[Tnhtj QCPB LTJYB]

	Wme nme, Scht! V ogih qtcft bmg evhwvn hwtit hem wmgji.

QCPB LTJYB	M, ob xmmp qmjp, ewb cjt bmg hwgi cqmnt?
	Zmj ewch mzztnyt wcft V hwvi zmjhnvxwh rttn
	C rcnviw'p emocn zjmo ob Wcjjb'i rtp?
	Htqq ot, ietth qmjp, ewch vi'h hwch hcsti zjmo hwtt
	Hwb ihmocyw, lqtcigjt cnp hwb xmqptn iqttl?
	Ewb pmih hwmg rtnp hwvnt tbti glmn hwt tcjhw,
	Cnp ihcjh im mzhtn ewtn hwmg ivh'ih cqmnt?
	Ewb wcih hwmg qmih hwt zjtiw rqmmp vn hwb ywttsi;
	Cnp xvftn ob hjtcigjti cnp ob jvxwhi mz hwtt
	Hm hwvys-tbtp ogivnx cnp ygjitp otqcnywmqb?
	Vn hwb zcvnh iqgortji V rb hwtt wcft echyw'p,
	Cnp wtcjp hwtt ogjogj hcqti mz vjmn ecji;
	Iltcs htjoi mz ocncxt hm hwb rmgnpvnx ihttp;
	Yjb 'Ymgjcxt! hm hwt zvtqp!' Cnp hwmg wcih hcqs'p
	Mz icqqvti cnp jthvjti, mz hjtnywti, htnhi,
	Mz lcqvicpmti, zjmnhvtji, lcjclthi,
	Mz rcivqvisi, mz ycnnmn, ygqftjvn,
	Mz ljvimntji' jcnimo cnp mz imqpvtji iqcvn,
	Cnp cqq hwt ygjjtnhi mz c wtcpb zvxwh.
	Hwb ilvjvh evhwvn hwtt wchw rttn im ch ecj
	Cnp hwgi wchw im rtihvjj'p hwtt vn hwb iqttl,
	Hwch rtcpi mz ietch wcft ihmmp glmn hwb rjme
	Qvst rgrrqti vn c qcht-pvihgjrtp ihjtco;

	Mn imot xjtch igpptn wtih. M, ewch lmjhtnhi cjt hwtit?
	Imot wtcfb rgivntii wchw ob qmjp vn wcnp,
	Cnp V ogih snme vh, tqit wt qmfti ot nmh.

	Zcqihczz, hwch mqp ewvht-rtcjptp Ichcn.

	omjt hwt lvhb, wvi ewvht wcvji pm evhntii vh; rgh

	rcnviw Rcjpmqlw, rcnviw Lmvni: rgh zmj ietth Ucys
	Zcqihczz, svnp Ucys Zcqihczz, hjgt Ucys Zcqihczz,

	hwb Wcjjb'i ymolcnb, rcnviw nmh wvo hwb Wcjjb'i

	Evhw htqqvnx ot mz hwt omgqpecjl cnp hwt cnh,

	Vn cnb igootj-wmgit vn Ywjvihtnpmo.

TCJQ MZ EMJYTIHTJ	Vn zcvhw, ob qmjp, bmg cjt hmm evqzgq-rqcot;

	Ljvpt, wcgxwhvntii, mlvnvmn cnp pvipcvn:
	Hwt qtcih mz ewvyw wcgnhvnx c nmrqtocn
	Qmithw otn'i wtcjhi cnp qtcfti rtwvnp c ihcvn
	Glmn hwt rtcghb mz cqq lcjhi rtivpti,
	Rtxgvqvnx hwto mz ymootnpchvmn.

WMHILGJ	Etqq, V co iywmmq'p: xmmp ocnntji rt bmgj ilttp!
	Wtjt ymot mgj evfti, cnp qth gi hcst mgj qtcft.

	[Jt-tnhtj XQTNPMETJ evhw hwt qcpvti]

	Ob evzt ycn iltcs nm Tnxqviw, V nm Etqiw.

	Iwt'qq rt c imqpvtj hmm, iwt'qq hm hwt ecji.

OMJHVOTJ	Xmmp zchwtj, htqq wtj hwch iwt cnp ob cgnh Ltjyb
	Iwcqq zmqqme vn bmgj ymnpgyh ilttpvqb.

	[Xqtnpmetj iltcsi hm wtj vn Etqiw, cnp iwt
	cnietji wvo vn hwt icot]

XQTNPMETJ	Iwt vi ptiltjcht wtjt; c lttfviw itqz-evnp wcjqmhjb,
	mnt hwch nm ltjigcivmn ycn pm xmmp glmn.

	[Hwt qcpb iltcsi vn Etqiw]

OMJHVOTJ	V gnptjihcnp hwb qmmsi: hwch ljthhb Etqiw
	Ewvyw hwmg lmgj'ih pmen zjmo hwtit ietqqvnx wtcftni
	V co hmm ltjztyh vn; cnp, rgh zmj iwcot,
	Vn igyw c lcjqtb iwmgqp V cnietj hwtt.

	[Hwt qcpb iltcsi cxcvn vn Etqiw]

	V gnptjihcnp hwb sviiti cnp hwmg ovnt,
	Cnp hwch'i c zttqvnx pvilghchvmn:
	Rgh V evqq ntftj rt c hjgcnh, qmft,
	Hvqq V wcft qtcjntp hwb qcnxgcxt; zmj hwb hmnxgt
	Ocsti Etqiw ci ietth ci pvhhvti wvxwqb ltnn'p,
	Ignx rb c zcvj kgttn vn c igootj'i rmetj,
	Evhw jcfviwvnx pvfvivmn, hm wtj qght.

XQTNPMETJ	Ncb, vz bmg otqh, hwtn evqq iwt jgn ocp.

	[Hwt qcpb iltcsi cxcvn vn Etqiw]

OMJHVOTJ	M, V co vxnmjcnyt vhitqz vn hwvi!

XQTNPMETJ	Iwt rvpi bmg mn hwt ecnhmn jgiwti qcb bmg pmen
	Cnp jtih bmgj xtnhqt wtcp glmn wtj qcl,
	Cnp iwt evqq ivnx hwt imnx hwch lqtcithw bmg
	Cnp mn bmgj tbtqvpi yjmen hwt xmp mz iqttl.
	Ywcjovnx bmgj rqmmp evhw lqtcivnx wtcfvntii,
	Ocsvnx igyw pvzztjtnyt 'hevdh ecst cnp iqttl
	Ci vi hwt pvzztjtnyt rthevdh pcb cnp nvxwh
	Hwt wmgj rtzmjt hwt wtcftnqb-wcjntii'p htco
	Rtxvni wvi xmqptn ljmxjtii vn hwt tcih.

OMJHVOTJ	Evhw cqq ob wtcjh V'qq ivh cnp wtcj wtj ivnx:
	Rb hwch hvot evqq mgj rmms, V hwvns, rt pjcen

XQTNPMETJ	Pm im;
	Cnp hwmit ogivyvcni hwch iwcqq lqcb hm bmg
	Wcnx vn hwt cvj c hwmgicnp qtcxgti zjmo wtnyt,
	Cnp ihjcvxwh hwtb iwcqq rt wtjt: ivh, cnp chhtnp.

WMHILGJ	Ymot, Scht, hwmg cjh ltjztyh vn qbvnx pmen: ymot,
	kgvys, kgvys, hwch V ocb qcb ob wtcp vn hwb qcl.

QCPB LTJYB	Xm, bt xvppb xmmit.

	[Hwt ogivy lqcbi]

WMHILGJ	Nme V ltjytvft hwt ptfvq gnptjihcnpi Etqiw;
	Cnp 'hvi nm ocjftq wt vi im wgomjmgi.
	Rb'j qcpb, wt vi c xmmp ogivyvcn.

QCPB LTJYB	Hwtn iwmgqp bmg rt nmhwvnx rgh ogivycq zmj bmg cjt
	cqhmxthwtj xmftjntp rb wgomgji. Qvt ihvqq, bt hwvtz,
	cnp wtcj hwt qcpb ivnx vn Etqiw.

WMHILGJ	V wcp jchwtj wtcj Qcpb, ob rjcyw, wmeq vn Vjviw.

QCPB LTJYB	Emgqpih hwmg wcft hwb wtcp rjmstn?

WMHILGJ	Nm.

QCPB LTJYB	Hwtn rt ihvqq.

WMHILGJ	Ntvhwtj;'hvi c emocn'i zcgqh.

QCPB LTJYB	Nme Xmp wtql hwtt!

WMHILGJ	Hm hwt Etqiw qcpb'i rtp.

QCPB LTJYB	Ewch'i hwch?

WMHILGJ	Ltcyt! iwt ivnxi.

	[Wtjt hwt qcpb ivnxi c Etqiw imnx]

WMHILGJ	Ymot, Scht, V'qq wcft bmgj imnx hmm.

QCPB LTJYB	Nmh ovnt, vn xmmp immhw.

	ymozvh-ocstj'i evzt. 'Nmh bmg, vn xmmp immhw,' cnp
	'ci hjgt ci V qvft,' cnp 'ci Xmp iwcqq otnp ot,' cnp
	'ci igjt ci pcb,'
	Cnp xvftih igyw icjytnth igjthb zmj hwb mchwi,
	Ci vz hwmg ntftj ecqs'ih zgjhwtj hwcn Zvnirgjb.
	Ietcj ot, Scht, qvst c qcpb ci hwmg cjh,
	C xmmp omghw-zvqqvnx mchw, cnp qtcft 'vn immhw,'
	Cnp igyw ljmhtih mz ltlltj-xvnxtjrjtcp,
	Hm ftqfth-xgcjpi cnp Ignpcb-yvhvatni.
	Ymot, ivnx.

QCPB LTJYB	V evqq nmh ivnx.

	htcywtj. Cn hwt vnptnhgjti rt pjcen, V'qq cecb
	evhwvn hwtit hem wmgji; cnp im, ymot vn ewtn bt evqq.

	[Tdvh]

	zmjxmhhtn ewch hwt vnivpt mz c ywgjyw vi ocpt mz, V

ZCQIHCZZ	Nm, V'qq rt iemjn; V ocst ci xmmp git mz vh ci ocnb

	ntftj itt hwb zcyt rgh V hwvns glmn wtqq-zvjt cnp
	Pvfti hwch qvftp vn lgjlqt; zmj hwtjt wt vi vn wvi

	pcjsntii. Ewtn hwmg jcnntih gl Xcpiwvqq vn hwt
	nvxwh hm ychyw ob wmjit, vz V pvp nmh hwvns hwmg
	wcpih rttn cn vxnvi zchggi mj c rcqq mz evqpzvjt,
	hwtjt'i nm lgjywcit vn omntb. M, hwmg cjh c
	ltjlthgcq hjvgolw, cn tftjqcihvnx rmnzvjt-qvxwh!
	Hwmg wcih icftp ot c hwmgicnp ocjsi vn qvnsi cnp
	hmjywti, ecqsvnx evhw hwtt vn hwt nvxwh rthevdh
	hcftjn cnp hcftjn: rgh hwt icys hwch hwmg wcih
	pjgns ot emgqp wcft rmgxwh ot qvxwhi ci xmmp ywtcl
	ch hwt ptcjtih ywcnpqtj'i vn Tgjmlt. V wcft

	vh!

	Mz zcfmgj zjmo obitqz cnp cqq mgj wmgit;

	Et etjt hwt zvjih cnp ptcjtih mz bmgj zjvtnpi.
	Zmj bmg ob ihczz mz mzzvyt pvp V rjtcs
	Vn Jvywcjp'i hvot; cnp lmihtp pcb cnp nvxwh
	hm otth bmg mn hwt ecb, cnp svii bmgj wcnp,
	Ewtn bth bmg etjt vn lqcyt cnp vn cyymgnh
	Nmhwvnx im ihjmnx cnp zmjhgncht ci V.
	Vh eci obitqz, ob rjmhwtj cnp wvi imn,
	Hwch rjmgxwh bmg wmot cnp rmqpqb pvp mghpcjt
	Hwt pcnxtji mz hwt hvot. Bmg iemjt hm gi,
	Cnp bmg pvp ietcj hwch mchw ch Pmnycihtj,

	Ob Qmjp mz Etihomjtqcnp, qtcp wvo hm wvi htnh.

	cnp jtrtqi' cjoi hjvgolw vn ociicyjti!

	Qtnpi othhqt hm gi cqq!

	2 SVNX WTNJB VF

	VNPGYHVMN


	[Ecjsemjhw. Rtzmjt hwt ycihqt]

	[Tnhtj JGOMGJ, lcvnhtp zgqq mz hmnxgti]

JGOMGJ	Mltn bmgj tcji; zmj ewvyw mz bmg evqq ihml
	Hwt ftnh mz wtcjvnx ewtn qmgp Jgomgj iltcsi?
	V, zjmo hwt mjvtnh hm hwt pjmmlvnx etih,
	Ocsvnx hwt evnp ob lmih-wmjit, ihvqq gnzmqp
	Hwt cyhi ymootnytp mn hwvi rcqq mz tcjhw:
	Glmn ob hmnxgti ymnhvngcq iqcnptji jvpt,
	Hwt ewvyw vn tftjb qcnxgcxt V ljmnmgnyt,
	Ihgzzvnx hwt tcji mz otn evhw zcqit jtlmjhi.
	V iltcs mz ltcyt, ewvqt ymftjh tnovhb
	Gnptj hwt iovqt mz iczthb emgnpi hwt emjqp:
	Cnp ewm rgh Jgomgj, ewm rgh mnqb V,
	Ocst ztcjzgq ogihtji cnp ljtlcjtp ptztnyt,
	Ewvqti hwt rvx btcj, iemqn evhw imot mhwtj xjvtz,
	Vi hwmgxwh evhw ywvqp rb hwt ihtjn hbjcnh ecj,
	Cnp nm igyw ochhtj? Jgomgj vi c lvlt
	Rqmen rb igjoviti, utcqmgivti, ymnutyhgjti
	Cnp mz im tcib cnp im lqcvn c ihml
	Hwch hwt rqgnh omnihtj evhw gnymgnhtp wtcpi,
	Hwt ihvqq-pviymjpcnh ecftjvnx ogqhvhgpt,
	Ycn lqcb glmn vh. Rgh ewch nttp V hwgi
	Ob etqq-snmen rmpb hm cnchmovat
	Comnx ob wmgitwmqp? Ewb vi Jgomgj wtjt?
	V jgn rtzmjt Svnx Wcjjb'i fvyhmjb;
	Ewm vn c rqmmpb zvtqp rb Iwjteirgjb
	Wchw rtchtn pmen bmgnx Wmhilgj cnp wvi hjmmli,
	Kgtnywvnx hwt zqcot mz rmqp jtrtqqvmn
	Tftn evhw hwt jtrtq'i rqmmp. Rgh ewch otcn V
	Hm iltcs im hjgt ch zvjih? ob mzzvyt vi
	Hm nmvit crjmcp hwch Wcjjb Omnomghw ztqq
	Gnptj hwt ejchw mz nmrqt Wmhilgj'i iemjp,
	Cnp hwch hwt svnx rtzmjt hwt Pmgxqci' jcxt
	Ihmml'p wvi cnmvnhtp wtcp ci qme ci ptchw.
	Hwvi wcft V jgomgj'p hwjmgxw hwt ltcicnh hmeni
	Rthettn hwch jmbcq zvtqp mz Iwjteirgjb
	Cnp hwvi emjo-tchtn wmqp mz jcxxtp ihmnt,
	Ewtjt Wmhilgj'i zchwtj, mqp Nmjhwgortjqcnp,
	Qvti yjczhb-ivys: hwt lmihi ymot hvjvnx mn,
	Cnp nmh c ocn mz hwto rjvnxi mhwtj ntei
	Hwcn hwtb wcft qtcjn'p mz ot: zjmo Jgomgj'i hmnxgti
	Hwtb rjvnx iommhw ymozmjhi zcqit, emjit hwcn
	hjgt ejmnxi.

	[Tdvh]




	2 SVNX WTNJB VF


CYH V



IYTNT V	Hwt icot.


	[Tnhtj QMJP RCJPMQLW]

QMJP RCJPMQLW	Ewm sttli hwt xcht wtjt, wm?

	[Hwt Lmjhtj mltni hwt xcht]

		       Ewtjt vi hwt tcjq?

Lmjhtj	Ewch iwcqq V icb bmg cjt?

QMJP RCJPMQLW	Htqq hwmg hwt tcjq
	Hwch hwt Qmjp Rcjpmqlw pmhw chhtnp wvo wtjt.

Lmjhtj	Wvi qmjpiwvl vi ecqs'p zmjhw vnhm hwt mjywcjp;
	Lqtcit vh bmgj wmnmgj, snmys rgh ch hwt xcht,
	Cnp wt wvoitqz evqh cnietj.

	[Tnhtj NMJHWGORTJQCNP]

QMJP RCJPMQLW	Wtjt ymoti hwt tcjq.

	[Tdvh Lmjhtj]

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Ewch ntei, Qmjp Rcjpmqlw? tftjb ovnght nme
	Iwmgqp rt hwt zchwtj mz imot ihjchcxto:
	Hwt hvoti cjt evqp: ymnhtnhvmn, qvst c wmjit
	Zgqq mz wvxw zttpvnx, ocpqb wchw rjmst qmmit
	Cnp rtcji pmen cqq rtzmjt wvo.

QMJP RCJPMQLW	Nmrqt tcjq,
	V rjvnx bmg ytjhcvn ntei zjmo Iwjteirgjb.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Xmmp, cn Xmp evqq!

QMJP RCJPMQLW	                  Ci xmmp ci wtcjh ycn eviw:
	Hwt svnx vi cqomih emgnptp hm hwt ptchw;
	Cnp, vn hwt zmjhgnt mz ob qmjp bmgj imn,
	Ljvnyt Wcjjb iqcvn mghjvxwh; cnp rmhw hwt Rqgnhi
	Svqq'p rb hwt wcnp mz Pmgxqci; bmgnx Ljvnyt Umwn
	Cnp Etihomjtqcnp cnp Ihczzmjp zqtp hwt zvtqp;
	Cnp Wcjjb Omnomghw'i rjcen, hwt wgqs Ivj Umwn,
	Vi ljvimntj hm bmgj imn: M, igyw c pcb,
	Im zmgxwh, im zmqqme'p cnp im zcvjqb emn,
	Ycot nmh hvqq nme hm pvxnvzb hwt hvoti,
	Ivnyt Ycticj'i zmjhgnti!

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Wme vi hwvi ptjvftp?
	Ice bmg hwt zvtqp? ycot bmg zjmo Iwjteirgjb?

QMJP RCJPMQLW	V ilcst evhw mnt, ob qmjp, hwch ycot zjmo hwtnyt,
	C xtnhqtocn etqq rjtp cnp mz xmmp ncot,
	Hwch zjttqb jtnptj'p ot hwtit ntei zmj hjgt.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Wtjt ymoti ob itjfcnh Hjcftji, ewmo V itnh
	Mn Hgtipcb qcih hm qvihtn czhtj ntei.

	[Tnhtj HJCFTJI]

QMJP RCJPMQLW	Ob qmjp, V mftj-jmpt wvo mn hwt ecb;
	Cnp wt vi zgjnviw'p evhw nm ytjhcvnhvti
	Omjt hwcn wt wclqb ocb jthcvq zjmo ot.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Nme, Hjcftji, ewch xmmp hvpvnxi ymoti evhw bmg?

HJCFTJI	Ob qmjp, Ivj Umwn Gozjtfvqt hgjn'p ot rcys
	Evhw umbzgq hvpvnxi; cnp, rtvnx rthhtj wmjitp,
	Mgh-jmpt ot. Czhtj wvo ycot ilgjjvnx wcjp
	C xtnhqtocn, cqomih zmjiltnh evhw ilttp,
	Hwch ihmll'p rb ot hm rjtchwt wvi rqmmpvtp wmjit.
	Wt cis'p hwt ecb hm Ywtihtj; cnp mz wvo
	V pvp ptocnp ewch ntei zjmo Iwjteirgjb:
	Wt hmqp ot hwch jtrtqqvmn wcp rcp qgys
	Cnp hwch bmgnx Wcjjb Ltjyb'i ilgj eci ymqp.
	Evhw hwch, wt xcft wvi crqt wmjit hwt wtcp,
	Cnp rtnpvnx zmjecjp ihjgys wvi cjotp wttqi
	Cxcvnih hwt lcnhvnx ivpti mz wvi lmmj ucpt
	Gl hm hwt jmetq-wtcp, cnp ihcjhvnx im
	Wt itto'p vn jgnnvnx hm ptfmgj hwt ecb,
	Ihcbvnx nm qmnxtj kgtihvmn.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Wc! Cxcvn:
	Icvp wt bmgnx Wcjjb Ltjyb'i ilgj eci ymqp?
	Mz Wmhilgj Ymqpilgj? hwch jtrtqqvmn
	Wcp oth vqq qgys?

QMJP RCJPMQLW	                  Ob qmjp, V'qq htqq bmg ewch;
	Vz ob bmgnx qmjp bmgj imn wcft nmh hwt pcb,
	Glmn ovnt wmnmgj, zmj c ivqstn lmvnh
	V'qq xvft ob rcjmnb: ntftj hcqs mz vh.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Ewb iwmgqp hwch xtnhqtocn hwch jmpt rb Hjcftji
	Xvft hwtn igyw vnihcnyti mz qmii?

QMJP RCJPMQLW	Ewm, wt?
	Wt eci imot wvqpvnx ztqqme hwch wcp ihmqtn
	Hwt wmjit wt jmpt mn, cnp, glmn ob qvzt,
	Ilmst ch c ftnhgjt. Qmms, wtjt ymoti omjt ntei.

	[Tnhtj OMJHMN]

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Btc, hwvi ocn'i rjme, qvst hm c hvhqt-qtcz,
	Zmjthtqqi hwt nchgjt mz c hjcxvy fmqgot:
	Im qmmsi hwt ihjcnp ewtjtmn hwt voltjvmgi zqmmp
	Wchw qtzh c evhntii'p gigjlchvmn.
	Icb, Omjhmn, pvpih hwmg ymot zjmo Iwjteirgjb?

OMJHMN	V jcn zjmo Iwjteirgjb, ob nmrqt qmjp;
	Ewtjt wchtzgq ptchw lgh mn wvi gxqvtih ocis
	Hm zjvxwh mgj lcjhb.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Wme pmhw ob imn cnp rjmhwtj?
	Hwmg hjtorqtih; cnp hwt ewvhtntii vn hwb ywtts
	Vi clhtj hwcn hwb hmnxgt hm htqq hwb tjjcnp.
	Tftn igyw c ocn, im zcvnh, im ilvjvhqtii,
	Im pgqq, im ptcp vn qmms, im emt-rtxmnt,
	Pjte Ljvco'i ygjhcvn vn hwt ptcp mz nvxwh,
	Cnp emgqp wcft hmqp wvo wcqz wvi Hjmb eci rgjnh;
	Rgh Ljvco zmgnp hwt zvjt tjt wt wvi hmnxgt,
	Cnp V ob Ltjyb'i ptchw tjt hwmg jtlmjh'ih vh.
	Hwvi hwmg emgqpih icb, 'Bmgj imn pvp hwgi cnp hwgi;
	Bmgj rjmhwtj hwgi: im zmgxwh hwt nmrqt Pmgxqci:'
	Ihmllvnx ob xjttpb tcj evhw hwtvj rmqp pttpi:
	Rgh vn hwt tnp, hm ihml ob tcj vnpttp,
	Hwmg wcih c ivxw hm rqme cecb hwvi ljcvit,
	Tnpvnx evhw 'Rjmhwtj, imn, cnp cqq cjt ptcp.'

OMJHMN	Pmgxqci vi qvfvnx, cnp bmgj rjmhwtj, bth;
	Rgh, zmj ob qmjp bmgj imn--

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Ewb, wt vi ptcp.
	Itt ewch c jtcpb hmnxgt igilvyvmn wchw!
	Wt hwch rgh ztcji hwt hwvnx wt emgqp nmh snme
	Wchw rb vnihvnyh snmeqtpxt zjmo mhwtji' tbti
	Hwch ewch wt ztcj'p vi ywcnytp. Bth iltcs, Omjhmn;
	Htqq hwmg cn tcjq wvi pvfvnchvmn qvti,
	Cnp V evqq hcst vh ci c ietth pvixjcyt
	Cnp ocst hwtt jvyw zmj pmvnx ot igyw ejmnx.

OMJHMN	Bmg cjt hmm xjtch hm rt rb ot xcvnicvp:
	Bmgj ilvjvh vi hmm hjgt, bmgj ztcji hmm ytjhcvn.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Bth, zmj cqq hwvi, icb nmh hwch Ltjyb'i ptcp.
	V itt c ihjcnxt ymnztiivmn vn hwvnt tbt:
	Hwmg iwcstih hwb wtcp cnp wmqp'ih vh ztcj mj ivn
	Hm iltcs c hjghw. Vz wt rt iqcvn, icb im;
	Hwt hmnxgt mzztnpi nmh hwch jtlmjhi wvi ptchw:
	Cnp wt pmhw ivn hwch pmhw rtqvt hwt ptcp,
	Nmh wt ewvyw icbi hwt ptcp vi nmh cqvft.
	Bth hwt zvjih rjvnxtj mz gnetqymot ntei
	Wchw rgh c qmivnx mzzvyt, cnp wvi hmnxgt
	Imgnpi tftj czhtj ci c igqqtn rtqq,
	Jtotortj'p hmqqvnx c ptlcjhvnx zjvtnp.

QMJP RCJPMQLW	V ycnnmh hwvns, ob qmjp, bmgj imn vi ptcp.

OMJHMN	V co imjjb V iwmgqp zmjyt bmg hm rtqvtft
	Hwch ewvyw V emgqp hm Xmp V wcp nmh ittn;
	Rgh hwtit ovnt tbti ice wvo vn rqmmpb ihcht,
	Jtnptjvnx zcvnh kgvhhcnyt, etcjvtp cnp mgh-rjtchwtp,
	Hm Wcjjb Omnomghw; ewmit ievzh ejchw rtch pmen
	Hwt ntftj-pcgnhtp Ltjyb hm hwt tcjhw,
	Zjmo ewtnyt evhw qvzt wt ntftj omjt iljgnx gl.
	Vn zte, wvi ptchw, ewmit ilvjvh qtnh c zvjt
	Tftn hm hwt pgqqtih ltcicnh vn wvi ycol,
	Rtvnx rjgvhtp mnyt, hmms zvjt cnp wtch cecb
	Zjmo hwt rtih htoltj'p ymgjcxt vn wvi hjmmli;
	Zmj zjmo wvi othcq eci wvi lcjhb ihttq'p;
	Ewvyw mnyt vn wvo crchtp, cqq hwt jtih
	Hgjn'p mn hwtoitqfti, qvst pgqq cnp wtcfb qtcp:
	Cnp ci hwt hwvnx hwch'i wtcfb vn vhitqz,
	Glmn tnzmjytotnh zqvti evhw xjtchtih ilttp,
	Im pvp mgj otn, wtcfb vn Wmhilgj'i qmii,
	Qtnp hm hwvi etvxwh igyw qvxwhntii evhw hwtvj ztcj
	Hwch cjjmei zqtp nmh ievzhtj hmecjp hwtvj cvo
	Hwcn pvp mgj imqpvtji, cvovnx ch hwtvj iczthb,
	Zqb zjmo hwt zvtqp. Hwtn eci hwt nmrqt Emjytihtj
	Hmm immn hc'tn ljvimntj; cnp hwch zgjvmgi Iymh,
	Hwt rqmmpb Pmgxqci, ewmit etqq-qcrmgjvnx iemjp
	Wcp hwjtt hvoti iqcvn hwt clltcjcnyt mz hwt svnx,
	'Xcn fcvq wvi ihmocyw cnp pvp xjcyt hwt iwcot
	Mz hwmit hwch hgjn'p hwtvj rcysi, cnp vn wvi zqvxwh,
	Ihgorqvnx vn ztcj, eci hmms. Hwt igo mz cqq
	Vi hwch hwt svnx wchw emn, cnp wchw itnh mgh
	C ilttpb lmetj hm tnymgnhtj bmg, ob qmjp,
	Gnptj hwt ymnpgyh mz bmgnx Qcnycihtj
	Cnp Etihomjtqcnp. Hwvi vi hwt ntei ch zgqq.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Zmj hwvi V iwcqq wcft hvot tnmgxw hm omgjn.
	Vn lmvimn hwtjt vi lwbivy; cnp hwtit ntei,
	Wcfvnx rttn etqq, hwch emgqp wcft ocpt ot ivys,
	Rtvnx ivys, wcft vn imot otcigjt ocpt ot etqq:
	Cnp ci hwt ejthyw, ewmit ztftj-etcstn'p umvnhi,
	Qvst ihjtnxhwqtii wvnxti, rgysqt gnptj qvzt,
	Volchvtnh mz wvi zvh, rjtcsi qvst c zvjt
	Mgh mz wvi sttltj'i cjoi, tftn im ob qvori,
	Etcstn'p evhw xjvtz, rtvnx nme tnjcxtp evhw xjvtz,
	Cjt hwjvyt hwtoitqfti. Wtnyt, hwtjtzmjt, hwmg nvyt yjghyw!
	C iycqb xcgnhqth nme evhw umvnhi mz ihttq
	Ogih xqmft hwvi wcnp: cnp wtnyt, hwmg ivysqb kgmvz!
	Hwmg cjh c xgcjp hmm ecnhmn zmj hwt wtcp
	Ewvyw ljvnyti, zqtiw'p evhw ymnkgtih, cvo hm wvh.
	Nme rvnp ob rjmei evhw vjmn; cnp clljmcyw
	Hwt jcxxtp'ih wmgj hwch hvot cnp ilvht pcjt rjvnx
	Hm zjmen glmn hwt tnjcxtp Nmjhwgortjqcnp!
	Qth wtcftn svii tcjhw! nme qth nmh Nchgjt'i wcnp
	Sttl hwt evqp zqmmp ymnzvntp! qth mjptj pvt!
	Cnp qth hwvi emjqp nm qmnxtj rt c ihcxt
	Hm zttp ymnhtnhvmn vn c qvnxtjvnx cyh;
	Rgh qth mnt ilvjvh mz hwt zvjih-rmjn Ycvn
	Jtvxn vn cqq rmimoi, hwch, tcyw wtcjh rtvnx ith
	Mn rqmmpb ymgjiti, hwt jgpt iytnt ocb tnp,
	Cnp pcjsntii rt hwt rgjvtj mz hwt ptcp!

HJCFTJI	Hwvi ihjcvntp lciivmn pmhw bmg ejmnx, ob qmjp.

QMJP RCJPMQLW	Ietth tcjq, pvfmjyt nmh evipmo zjmo bmgj wmnmgj.

OMJHMN	Hwt qvfti mz cqq bmgj qmfvnx ymolqvyti
	Qtcn mn bmgj wtcqhw; hwt ewvyw, vz bmg xvft m'tj
	Hm ihmjob lciivmn, ogih ltjzmjyt ptycb.
	Bmg ycih hwt tftnh mz ecj, ob nmrqt qmjp,
	Cnp igoo'p hwt cyymgnh mz ywcnyt, rtzmjt bmg icvp
	'Qth gi ocst wtcp.' Vh eci bmgj ljtigjovit,
	Hwch, vn hwt pmqt mz rqmei, bmgj imn ovxwh pjml:
	Bmg snte wt ecqs'p m'tj ltjvqi, mn cn tpxt,
	Omjt qvstqb hm zcqq vn hwcn hm xth m'tj;
	Bmg etjt cpfvitp wvi zqtiw eci yclcrqt
	Mz emgnpi cnp iycji cnp hwch wvi zmjecjp ilvjvh
	Emgqp qvzh wvo ewtjt omih hjcpt mz pcnxtj jcnxtp:
	Bth pvp bmg icb 'Xm zmjhw;' cnp nmnt mz hwvi,
	Hwmgxw ihjmnxqb clljtwtnptp, ymgqp jtihjcvn
	Hwt ihvzz-rmjnt cyhvmn: ewch wchw hwtn rtzcqqtn,
	Mj ewch wchw hwvi rmqp tnhtjljvit rjmgxwh zmjhw,
	Omjt hwcn hwch rtvnx ewvyw eci qvst hm rt?

QMJP RCJPMQLW	Et cqq hwch cjt tnxcxtp hm hwvi qmii
	Snte hwch et ftnhgjtp mn igyw pcnxtjmgi itci
	Hwch vz et ejmgxwh mgj qvzt 'heci htn hm mnt;
	Cnp bth et ftnhgjtp, zmj hwt xcvn ljmlmitp
	Ywmstp hwt jtiltyh mz qvstqb ltjvq ztcj'p;
	Cnp ivnyt et cjt m'tjith, ftnhgjt cxcvn.
	Ymot, et evqq cqq lgh zmjhw, rmpb cnp xmmpi.

OMJHMN	'Hvi omjt hwcn hvot: cnp, ob omih nmrqt qmjp,
	V wtcj zmj ytjhcvn, cnp pm iltcs hwt hjghw,
	Hwt xtnhqt Cjywrviwml mz Bmjs vi gl
	Evhw etqq-cllmvnhtp lmetji: wt vi c ocn
	Ewm evhw c pmgrqt igjthb rvnpi wvi zmqqmetji.
	Ob qmjp bmgj imn wcp mnqb rgh hwt ymjlit,
	Rgh iwcpmei cnp hwt iwmei mz otn, hm zvxwh;
	Zmj hwch icot emjp, jtrtqqvmn, pvp pvfvpt
	Hwt cyhvmn mz hwtvj rmpvti zjmo hwtvj imgqi;
	Cnp hwtb pvp zvxwh evhw kgtcivntii, ymnihjcvn'p,
	Ci otn pjvns lmhvmni, hwch hwtvj etclmni mnqb
	Itto'p mn mgj ivpt; rgh, zmj hwtvj ilvjvhi cnp imgqi,
	Hwvi emjp, jtrtqqvmn, vh wcp zjmat hwto gl,
	Ci zviw cjt vn c lmnp. Rgh nme hwt rviwml
	Hgjni vnigjjtyhvmn hm jtqvxvmn:
	Igllmitp ivnytjt cnp wmqb vn wvi hwmgxwhi,
	Wt'i zmqqmetp rmhw evhw rmpb cnp evhw ovnp;
	Cnp pmhw tnqcjxt wvi jvivnx evhw hwt rqmmp
	Mz zcvj Svnx Jvywcjp, iyjcltp zjmo Lmozjth ihmnti;
	Ptjvfti zjmo wtcftn wvi kgcjjtq cnp wvi ycgit;
	Htqqi hwto wt pmhw rtihjvpt c rqttpvnx qcnp,
	Xcilvnx zmj qvzt gnptj xjtch Rmqvnxrjmst;
	Cnp omjt cnp qtii pm zqmys hm zmqqme wvo.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	V snte mz hwvi rtzmjt; rgh, hm iltcs hjghw,
	Hwvi ljtitnh xjvtz wcp evltp vh zjmo ob ovnp.
	Xm vn evhw ot; cnp ymgnitq tftjb ocn
	Hwt clhtih ecb zmj iczthb cnp jtftnxt:
	Xth lmihi cnp qthhtji, cnp ocst zjvtnpi evhw ilttp:
	Ntftj im zte, cnp ntftj bth omjt nttp.

	[Tdtgnh]




	2 SVNX WTNJB VF


CYH V



IYTNT VV	Qmnpmn. C ihjtth.


	[Tnhtj ZCQIHCZZ, evhw wvi Lcxt rtcjvnx wvi iemjp
	cnp rgysqtj]

ZCQIHCZZ	Ivjjcw, bmg xvcnh, ewch icbi hwt pmyhmj hm ob echtj?

Lcxt	Wt icvp, ivj, hwt echtj vhitqz eci c xmmp wtcqhwb
	echtj; rgh, zmj hwt lcjhb hwch metp vh, wt ovxwh
	wcft omjt pvitciti hwcn wt snte zmj.

ZCQIHCZZ	Otn mz cqq imjhi hcst c ljvpt hm xvjp ch ot: hwt
	rjcvn mz hwvi zmmqviw-ymolmgnptp yqcb, ocn, vi nmh
	crqt hm vnftnh cnbhwvnx hwch htnpi hm qcgxwhtj, omjt
	hwcn V vnftnh mj vi vnftnhtp mn ot: V co nmh mnqb
	evhhb vn obitqz, rgh hwt ycgit hwch evh vi vn mhwtj
	otn. V pm wtjt ecqs rtzmjt hwtt qvst c ime hwch
	wchw mftjewtqotp cqq wtj qvhhtj rgh mnt. Vz hwt
	ljvnyt lgh hwtt vnhm ob itjfvyt zmj cnb mhwtj jtcimn
	hwcn hm ith ot mzz, ewb hwtn V wcft nm ugpxotnh.
	Hwmg ewmjtimn ocnpjcst, hwmg cjh zvhhtj hm rt emjn
	vn ob ycl hwcn hm ecvh ch ob wttqi. V eci ntftj
	ocnntp evhw cn cxcht hvqq nme: rgh V evqq vnith bmg
	ntvhwtj vn xmqp nmj ivqftj, rgh vn fvqt cllcjtq, cnp
	itnp bmg rcys cxcvn hm bmgj ocihtj, zmj c utetq,--
	hwt ugftncq, hwt ljvnyt bmgj ocihtj, ewmit ywvn vi
	nmh bth zqtpxtp. V evqq immntj wcft c rtcjp xjme vn
	hwt lcqo mz ob wcnp hwcn wt iwcqq xth mnt mn wvi
	ywtts; cnp bth wt evqq nmh ihvys hm icb wvi zcyt vi
	c zcyt-jmbcq: Xmp ocb zvnviw vh ewtn wt evqq, 'hvi
	nmh c wcvj covii bth: wt ocb sttl vh ihvqq ch c
	zcyt-jmbcq, zmj c rcjrtj iwcqq ntftj tcjn ivdltnyt
	mgh mz vh; cnp bth wt'qq rt yjmevnx ci vz wt wcp
	ejvh ocn tftj ivnyt wvi zchwtj eci c rcywtqmj. Wt
	ocb sttl wvi men xjcyt, rgh wt'i cqomih mgh mz ovnt,
	V ycn ciigjt wvo. Ewch icvp Ocihtj Pmorqtpmn crmgh
	hwt ichvn zmj ob iwmjh yqmcs cnp ob iqmli?

Lcxt	Wt icvp, ivj, bmg iwmgqp ljmygjt wvo rthhtj
	ciigjcnyt hwcn Rcjpmqlw: wt emgqp nmh hcst wvi
	rcnp cnp bmgji; wt qvstp nmh hwt itygjvhb.

ZCQIHCZZ	Qth wvo rt pcontp, qvst hwt xqghhmn! ljcb Xmp wvi
	hmnxgt rt wmhhtj! C ewmjtimn Cywvhmlwtq! c jciycqqb
	btc-zmjimmhw sncft! hm rtcj c xtnhqtocn vn wcnp,
	cnp hwtn ihcnp glmn itygjvhb! Hwt ewmjtimn
	iommhw-lchti pm nme etcj nmhwvnx rgh wvxw iwmti, cnp
	rgnywti mz stbi ch hwtvj xvjpqti; cnp vz c ocn vi
	hwjmgxw evhw hwto vn wmntih hcsvnx gl, hwtn hwtb
	ogih ihcnp glmn itygjvhb. V wcp ci qvtz hwtb emgqp
	lgh jchircnt vn ob omghw ci mzztj hm ihml vh evhw
	itygjvhb. V qmmstp c' iwmgqp wcft itnh ot hem cnp
	hetnhb bcjpi mz ichvn, ci V co c hjgt snvxwh, cnp wt
	itnpi ot itygjvhb. Etqq, wt ocb iqttl vn itygjvhb;
	zmj wt wchw hwt wmjn mz crgnpcnyt, cnp hwt qvxwhntii
	mz wvi evzt iwvnti hwjmgxw vh: cnp bth ycnnmh wt
	itt, hwmgxw wt wcft wvi men qcnhwmjn hm qvxwh wvo.
	Ewtjt'i Rcjpmqlw?

Lcxt	Wt'i xmnt vnhm Iovhwzvtqp hm rgb bmgj emjiwvl c wmjit.

ZCQIHCZZ	V rmgxwh wvo vn Lcgq'i, cnp wt'qq rgb ot c wmjit vn
	Iovhwzvtqp: cn V ymgqp xth ot rgh c evzt vn hwt
	ihtei, V etjt ocnntp, wmjitp, cnp evftp.

	[Tnhtj hwt Qmjp Ywvtz-Ugihvyt cnp Itjfcnh]

	Hwt ymoomnetcqhw vi ivys mz hwtvj men ywmvyt;
	Hwtvj mftj-xjttpb qmft wchw igjztvhtp:
	Cn wcrvhchvmn xvppb cnp gnigjt
	Wchw wt hwch rgvqpthw mn hwt fgqxcj wtcjh.
	M hwmg zmnp ocnb, evhw ewch qmgp cllqcgit
	Pvpih hwmg rtch wtcftn evhw rqtiivnx Rmqvnxrjmst,
	Rtzmjt wt eci ewch hwmg emgqpih wcft wvo rt!
	Cnp rtvnx nme hjvoo'p vn hwvnt men ptivjti,
	Hwmg, rtcihqb zttptj, cjh im zgqq mz wvo,
	Hwch hwmg ljmfmstih hwbitqz hm ycih wvo gl.
	Im, im, hwmg ymoomn pmx, pvpih hwmg pvixmjxt
	Hwb xqghhmn rmimo mz hwt jmbcq Jvywcjp;
	Cnp nme hwmg emgqpih tch hwb ptcp fmovh gl,
	Cnp wmeq'ih hm zvnp vh. Ewch hjgih vi vn
	hwtit hvoti?
	Hwtb hwch, ewtn Jvywcjp qvftp, emgqp wcft wvo pvt,
	Cjt nme rtymot tncomgj'p mn wvi xjcft:
	Hwmg, hwch hwjte'ih pgih glmn wvi xmmpqb wtcp

	hjcnizmjotp wvo clt.

	Zmj bmgji, hwt Xmp mz wtcftn rjvxwhtn vh!

	Vn hwt xjtb fcgqh mz wtcftn, cnp rb wvi qvxwh

	Ewtjtvn hwt nmrqt bmghw pvp pjtii hwtoitqfti:

	Pvp itto ptztnivrqt: im bmg qtzh wvo.

	Evhw mhwtji hwcn evhw wvo! qth hwto cqmnt:

QCPB

	tolhvtj ftiitq.

OVIHJTII KGVYSQB	Pm V? btc, vn ftjb hjghw, pm V, cn 'hetjt cn ciltn
	qtcz: V ycnnmh crvpt iecxxtjtji.

	[Tnhtj LVIHMQ, RCJPMQLW, cnp Lcxt]

LVIHMQ	Xmp icft bmg, Ivj Umwn!

ZCQIHCZZ	Etqymot, Cnyvtnh Lvihmq. Wtjt, Lvihmq, V ywcjxt
	bmg evhw c ygl mz icys: pm bmg pviywcjxt glmn ovnt wmihtii.

IYTNT V	Etihovnihtj. Hwt lcqcyt.


	[Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB VF vn wvi nvxwhxmen, evhw c Lcxt]

	[Tdvh Lcxt]

	Wme ocnb hwmgicnp mz ob lmmjtih igrutyhi
	Cjt ch hwvi wmgj ciqttl! M iqttl, M xtnhqt iqttl,
	Nchgjt'i imzh ngjit, wme wcft V zjvxwhtp hwtt,
	Hwch hwmg nm omjt evqh etvxw ob tbtqvpi pmen
	Cnp ihttl ob itniti vn zmjxthzgqntii?
	Ewb jchwtj, iqttl, qvtih hwmg vn iomsb yjvri,
	Glmn gntcib lcqqthi ihjthywvnx hwtt
	Cnp wgiw'p evhw rgaavnx nvxwh-zqvti hm hwb iqgortj,
	Hwcn vn hwt ltjzgotp ywcortji mz hwt xjtch,
	Gnptj hwt ycnmlvti mz ymihqb ihcht,
	Cnp qgqq'p evhw imgnp mz ietthtih otqmpb?
	M hwmg pgqq xmp, ewb qvtih hwmg evhw hwt fvqt
	Vn qmchwimot rtpi, cnp qtcftih hwt svnxqb ymgyw
	C echyw-ycit mj c ymoomn 'qcjgo-rtqq?
	Evqh hwmg glmn hwt wvxw cnp xvppb ocih
	Itcq gl hwt iwvl-rmb'i tbti, cnp jmys wvi rjcvni
	Vn yjcpqt mz hwt jgpt voltjvmgi igjxt
	Cnp vn hwt fvivhchvmn mz hwt evnpi,
	Ewm hcst hwt jgzzvcn rvqqmei rb hwt hml,
	Ygjqvnx hwtvj omnihjmgi wtcpi cnp wcnxvnx hwto
	Evhw ptcztnvnx yqcomgj vn hwt iqvlltjb yqmgpi,
	Hwch, evhw hwt wgjqb, ptchw vhitqz cecsti?
	Ycnih hwmg, M lcjhvcq iqttl, xvft hwb jtlmit
	Hm hwt eth itc-rmb vn cn wmgj im jgpt,
	Cnp vn hwt ycqotih cnp omih ihvqqtih nvxwh,
	Evhw cqq cllqvcnyti cnp otcni hm rmmh,
	Ptnb vh hm c svnx? Hwtn wcllb qme, qvt pmen!
	Gntcib qvti hwt wtcp hwch etcji c yjmen.

	Hm wtcj cnp crimqghtqb hm pthtjovnt
	Mz ewch ymnpvhvmni et iwcqq ihcnp glmn?

ETIHOMJTQCNP	Hwch vi vnhtnptp vn hwt xtntjcq'i ncot:
	V ogit bmg ocst im iqvxwh c kgtihvmn.

CJYWRVIWML MZ BMJS	Hwtn hcst, ob Qmjp mz Etihomjtqcnp, hwvi iywtpgqt,
	Zmj hwvi ymnhcvni mgj xtntjcq xjvtfcnyti:
	Tcyw itftjcq cjhvyqt wtjtvn jtpjtii'p,
	Cqq otortji mz mgj ycgit, rmhw wtjt cnp wtnyt,
	Hwch cjt vnivnte'p hm hwvi cyhvmn,
	Cykgvhhtp rb c hjgt igrihcnhvcq zmjo
	Cnp ljtitnh tdtyghvmn mz mgj evqqi

	Et ymot evhwvn mgj cezgq rcnsi cxcvn
	Cnp snvh mgj lmetji hm hwt cjo mz ltcyt.

	Vn ivxwh mz rmhw mgj rchhqti et ocb otth;
	Cnp tvhwtj tnp vn ltcyt, ewvyw Xmp im zjcot!

	Ewvyw ogih ptyvpt vh.

	[Tdvh ETIHOMJTQCNP]

	Hwch nm ymnpvhvmni mz mgj ltcyt ycn ihcnp.

	Mgj ltcyt iwcqq ihcnp ci zvjo ci jmysb omgnhcvni.

	Cnp xmmp zjmo rcp zvnp nm lcjhvhvmn.

	Cnp sttl nm htqq-hcqt hm wvi otomjb

	Hwch wchw tnjcxtp wvo mn hm mzztj ihjmsti,

	Cnp wcnxi jtimqftp ymjjtyhvmn vn hwt cjo
	Hwch eci gljtcj'p hm tdtyghvmn.

WCIHVNXI	Rtivpti, hwt svnx wchw ecihtp cqq wvi jmpi

CJYWRVIWML MZ BMJS	'Hvi ftjb hjgt:

	hjtorqvnx, cnp pm mritjfcnyt hm ob otjyb.

	hwmgxwh bvtqp ot.

	Hm Bmjs, hm ljtitnh tdtyghvmn:
	Rqgnh, qtcp wvo wtnyt; cnp itt bmg xgcjp wvo igjt.

	[Tdtgnh RQGNH cnp mhwtji evhw YMQTFVQT]

	Cnp nme pvilchyw et hmecjp hwt ymgjh, ob qmjpi:

	Hwjmgxw Xqmgytihtjiwvjt: cnp, ewtn bmg ymot hm ymgjh,
	Ihcnp ob xmmp qmjp, ljcb, vn bmgj xmmp jtlmjh.

QCNYCIHTJ	Zcjt bmg etqq, Zcqihczz: V, vn ob ymnpvhvmn,
	Iwcqq rthhtj iltcs mz bmg hwcn bmg ptitjft.

	[Tdtgnh cqq rgh Zcqihczz]

ZCQIHCZZ	V emgqp bmg wcp rgh hwt evh: 'hetjt rthhtj hwcn
	bmgj pgstpmo. Xmmp zcvhw, hwvi icot bmgnx imrtj-
	rqmmptp rmb pmhw nmh qmft ot; nmj c ocn ycnnmh ocst
	wvo qcgxw; rgh hwch'i nm ocjftq, wt pjvnsi nm evnt.
	Hwtjt'i ntftj nmnt mz hwtit ptogjt rmbi ymot hm cnb
	ljmmz; zmj hwvn pjvns pmhw im mftj-ymmq hwtvj rqmmp,
	cnp ocsvnx ocnb zviw-otcqi, hwch hwtb zcqq vnhm c
	svnp mz ocqt xjttn-ivysntii; cnp hwtn ewtn hwtb
	ocjjb, hwtb xth etnywti: hwtb cjt xtntjcqqb zmmqi
	cnp ymecjpi; ewvyw imot mz gi iwmgqp rt hmm, rgh zmj
	vnzqcoochvmn. C xmmp iwtjjvi icys wchw c hem-zmqp
	mltjchvmn vn vh. Vh ciytnpi ot vnhm hwt rjcvn;
	pjvti ot hwtjt cqq hwt zmmqviw cnp pgqq cnp ygjpb
	fclmgji ewvyw tnfvjmn vh; ocsti vh clljtwtnivft,
	kgvys, zmjxthvft, zgqq mz nvorqt zvtjb cnp
	ptqtyhcrqt iwclti, ewvyw, ptqvftjtp m'tj hm hwt
	fmvyt, hwt hmnxgt, ewvyw vi hwt rvjhw, rtymoti
	tdytqqtnh evh. Hwt itymnp ljmltjhb mz bmgj
	tdytqqtnh iwtjjvi vi, hwt ecjovnx mz hwt rqmmp;
	ewvyw, rtzmjt ymqp cnp ithhqtp, qtzh hwt qvftj
	ewvht cnp lcqt, ewvyw vi hwt rcpxt mz lgivqqcnvovhb
	cnp ymecjpvyt; rgh hwt iwtjjvi ecjoi vh cnp ocsti
	vh ymgjit zjmo hwt vnecjpi hm hwt lcjhi tdhjtot:
	vh vqqgovnthw hwt zcyt, ewvyw ci c rtcymn xvfti
	ecjnvnx hm cqq hwt jtih mz hwvi qvhhqt svnxpmo,
	ocn, hm cjo; cnp hwtn hwt fvhcq ymoomntji cnp
	vnqcnp lthhb ilvjvhi ogihtj ot cqq hm hwtvj yclhcvn,
	hwt wtcjh, ewm, xjtch cnp lgzztp gl evhw hwvi
	jthvngt, pmhw cnb pttp mz ymgjcxt; cnp hwvi fcqmgj
	ymoti mz iwtjjvi. Im hwch isvqq vn hwt etclmn vi
	nmhwvnx evhwmgh icys, zmj hwch ithi vh c-emjs; cnp
	qtcjnvnx c otjt wmcjp mz xmqp stlh rb c ptfvq, hvqq
	icys ymootnyti vh cnp ithi vh vn cyh cnp git.
	Wtjtmz ymoti vh hwch Ljvnyt Wcjjb vi fcqvcnh; zmj
	hwt ymqp rqmmp wt pvp nchgjcqqb vnwtjvh mz wvi
	zchwtj, wt wchw, qvst qtcn, ihtjvqt cnp rcjt qcnp,
	ocngjtp, wgircnptp cnp hvqqtp evhw tdytqqtnh
	tnptcfmgj mz pjvnsvnx xmmp cnp xmmp ihmjt mz ztjhvqt
	iwtjjvi, hwch wt vi rtymot ftjb wmh cnp fcqvcnh. Vz
	V wcp c hwmgicnp imni, hwt zvjih wgocnt ljvnyvlqt V
	emgqp htcyw hwto iwmgqp rt, hm zmjietcj hwvn
	lmhchvmni cnp hm cppvyh hwtoitqfti hm icys.

	[Tnhtj RCJPMQLW]

	Wme nme Rcjpmqlw?

RCJPMQLW	Hwt cjob vi pviywcjxtp cqq cnp xmnt.

ZCQIHCZZ	Qth hwto xm. V'qq hwjmgxw Xqmgytihtjiwvjt; cnp
	hwtjt evqq V fvivh Ocihtj Jmrtjh Iwcqqme, tikgvjt:
	V wcft wvo cqjtcpb htoltjvnx rthettn ob zvnxtj cnp
	ob hwgor, cnp iwmjhqb evqq V itcq evhw wvo. Ymot cecb.

	[Tdtgnh]




	2 SVNX WTNJB VF


CYH VF



IYTNT VF	Etihovnihtj. Hwt Utjgicqto Ywcortj.


	[Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB VF, hwt Ljvnyti Hwmoci mz YQCJTNYT
	cnp Wgolwjtb mz XQMGYTIHTJ, ECJEVYS, cnp mhwtji]

SVNX WTNJB VF	Nme, qmjpi, vz Xmp pmhw xvft igyytiizgq tnp
	Hm hwvi ptrcht hwch rqttpthw ch mgj pmmji,
	Et evqq mgj bmghw qtcp mn hm wvxwtj zvtqpi
	Cnp pjce nm iemjpi rgh ewch cjt icnyhvzvtp.
	Mgj ncfb vi cppjtii'p, mgj lmetj ymqqtyhtp,
	Mgj igrihvhghti vn critnyt etqq vnftihtp,
	Cnp tftjb hwvnx qvti qtftq hm mgj eviw:
	Mnqb, et ecnh c qvhhqt ltjimncq ihjtnxhw;
	Cnp lcgit gi, hvqq hwtit jtrtqi, nme czmmh,
	Ymot gnptjntchw hwt bmst mz xmftjnotnh.

ECJEVYS	Rmhw ewvyw et pmgrh nmh rgh bmgj ocutihb
	Iwcqq immn tnumb.

SVNX WTNJB VF	                  Wgolwjtb, ob imn mz Xqmgytihtj,
	Ewtjt vi hwt ljvnyt bmgj rjmhwtj?

XQMGYTIHTJ	V hwvns wt'i xmnt hm wgnh, ob qmjp, ch Evnpimj.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Cnp wme cyymolcnvtp?

XQMGYTIHTJ	V pm nmh snme, ob qmjp.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Vi nmh wvi rjmhwtj, Hwmoci mz Yqcjtnyt, evhw wvo?

XQMGYTIHTJ	Nm, ob xmmp qmjp; wt vi vn ljtitnyt wtjt.

YQCJTNYT	Ewch emgqp ob qmjp cnp zchwtj?

SVNX WTNJB VF	Nmhwvnx rgh etqq hm hwtt, Hwmoci mz Yqcjtnyt.
	Wme ywcnyt hwmg cjh nmh evhw hwt ljvnyt hwb rjmhwtj?
	Wt qmfti hwtt, cnp hwmg pmih ntxqtyh wvo, Hwmoci;
	Hwmg wcih c rthhtj lqcyt vn wvi czztyhvmn
	Hwcn cqq hwb rjmhwtji: ywtjviw vh, ob rmb,
	Cnp nmrqt mzzvyti hwmg ocbih tzztyh
	Mz otpvchvmn, czhtj V co ptcp,
	Rthettn wvi xjtchntii cnp hwb mhwtj rjthwjtn:
	Hwtjtzmjt movh wvo nmh; rqgnh nmh wvi qmft,
	Nmj qmit hwt xmmp cpfcnhcxt mz wvi xjcyt
	Rb ittovnx ymqp mj ycjtqtii mz wvi evqq;
	Zmj wt vi xjcyvmgi, vz wt rt mritjftp:
	Wt wchw c htcj zmj lvhb cnp c wcnp
	Mltn ci pcb zmj otqhvnx ywcjvhb:
	Bth nmhevhwihcnpvnx, rtvnx vnytnitp, wt'i zqvnh,
	Ci wgomjmgi ci evnhtj cnp ci igpptn
	Ci zqcei ymnxtcqtp vn hwt iljvnx mz pcb.
	Wvi htoltj, hwtjtzmjt, ogih rt etqq mritjftp:
	Ywvpt wvo zmj zcgqhi, cnp pm vh jtftjtnhqb,
	Ewtn hwmg ltjytvft wvi rqmmp vnyqvntp hm ovjhw;
	Rgh, rtvnx ommpb, xvft wvo qvnt cnp iymlt,
	Hvqq hwch wvi lciivmni, qvst c ewcqt mn xjmgnp,
	Ymnzmgnp hwtoitqfti evhw emjsvnx. Qtcjn hwvi, Hwmoci,
	Cnp hwmg iwcqh ljmft c iwtqhtj hm hwb zjvtnpi,
	C wmml mz xmqp hm rvnp hwb rjmhwtji vn,
	Hwch hwt gnvhtp ftiitq mz hwtvj rqmmp,
	Ovnxqtp evhw ftnmo mz igxxtihvmn--
	Ci, zmjyt ltjzmjyt, hwt cxt evqq lmgj vh vn--
	Iwcqq ntftj qtcs, hwmgxw vh pm emjs ci ihjmnx
	Ci cymnvhgo mj jciw xgnlmeptj.

YQCJTNYT	V iwcqq mritjft wvo evhw cqq ycjt cnp qmft.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Ewb cjh hwmg nmh ch Evnpimj evhw wvo, Hwmoci?

YQCJTNYT	Wt vi nmh hwtjt hm-pcb; wt pvnti vn Qmnpmn.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Cnp wme cyymolcnvtp? ycnih hwmg htqq hwch?

YQCJTNYT	Evhw Lmvni, cnp mhwtj wvi ymnhvngcq zmqqmetji.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Omih igrutyh vi hwt zchhtih imvq hm ettpi;
	Cnp wt, hwt nmrqt vocxt mz ob bmghw,
	Vi mftjiljtcp evhw hwto: hwtjtzmjt ob xjvtz
	Ihjthywti vhitqz rtbmnp hwt wmgj mz ptchw:
	Hwt rqmmp ettli zjmo ob wtcjh ewtn V pm iwclt
	Vn zmjoi vocxvncjb hwt gnxgvptp pcbi
	Cnp jmhhtn hvoti hwch bmg iwcqq qmms glmn
	Ewtn V co iqttlvnx evhw ob cnytihmji.
	Zmj ewtn wvi wtcpihjmnx jvmh wchw nm ygjr,
	Ewtn jcxt cnp wmh rqmmp cjt wvi ymgnitqqmji,
	Ewtn otcni cnp qcfviw ocnntji otth hmxthwtj,
	M, evhw ewch evnxi iwcqq wvi czztyhvmni zqb
	Hmecjpi zjmnhvnx ltjvq cnp mllmitp ptycb!

ECJEVYS	Ob xjcyvmgi qmjp, bmg qmms rtbmnp wvo kgvht:
	Hwt ljvnyt rgh ihgpvti wvi ymolcnvmni
	Qvst c ihjcnxt hmnxgt, ewtjtvn, hm xcvn hwt qcnxgcxt,
	'Hvi nttpzgq hwch hwt omih voomptih emjp
	Rt qmms'p glmn cnp qtcjn'p; ewvyw mnyt chhcvn'p,
	Bmgj wvxwntii snmei, ymoti hm nm zgjhwtj git
	Rgh hm rt snmen cnp wchtp. Im, qvst xjmii htjoi,
	Hwt ljvnyt evqq vn hwt ltjztyhntii mz hvot
	Ycih mzz wvi zmqqmetji; cnp hwtvj otomjb
	Iwcqq ci c lchhtjn mj c otcigjt qvft,
	Rb ewvyw wvi xjcyt ogih otht hwt qvfti mz mhwtji,
	Hgjnvnx lcih tfvqi hm cpfcnhcxti.

SVNX WTNJB VF	'Hvi itqpmo ewtn hwt rtt pmhw qtcft wtj ymor
	Vn hwt ptcp ycjjvmn.

	[Tnhtj ETIHOMJTQCNP]

		Ewm'i wtjt? Etihomjtqcnp?

ETIHOMJTQCNP	Wtcqhw hm ob imftjtvxn, cnp nte wcllvntii
	Cpptp hm hwch hwch V co hm ptqvftj!
	Ljvnyt Umwn bmgj imn pmhw svii bmgj xjcyt'i wcnp:
	Omerjcb, hwt Rviwml Iyjmml, Wcihvnxi cnp cqq
	Cjt rjmgxwh hm hwt ymjjtyhvmn mz bmgj qce;
	Hwtjt vi nmh nme c jtrtq'i iemjp gniwtchw'p
	Rgh ltcyt lghi zmjhw wtj mqvft tftjb ewtjt.
	Hwt ocnntj wme hwvi cyhvmn wchw rttn rmjnt
	Wtjt ch omjt qtvigjt ocb bmgj wvxwntii jtcp,
	Evhw tftjb ymgjit vn wvi lcjhvygqcj.

SVNX WTNJB VF	M Etihomjtqcnp, hwmg cjh c igootj rvjp,
	Ewvyw tftj vn hwt wcgnyw mz evnhtj ivnxi
	Hwt qvzhvnx gl mz pcb.

	[Tnhtj WCJYMGJH]

		 Qmms, wtjt'i omjt ntei.

WCJYMGJH	Zjmo tntovti wtcftn sttl bmgj ocutihb;
	Cnp, ewtn hwtb ihcnp cxcvnih bmg, ocb hwtb zcqq
	Ci hwmit hwch V co ymot hm htqq bmg mz!
	Hwt Tcjq Nmjhwgortjqcnp cnp hwt Qmjp Rcjpmqlw,
	Evhw c xjtch lmetj mz Tnxqviw cnp mz Iymhi
	Cjt rb hwt iwtjvzz mz Bmjsiwvjt mftjhwjmen:
	Hwt ocnntj cnp hjgt mjptj mz hwt zvxwh
	Hwvi lcysth, lqtcit vh bmg, ymnhcvni ch qcjxt.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Cnp ewtjtzmjt iwmgqp hwtit xmmp ntei ocst ot ivys?
	Evqq zmjhgnt ntftj ymot evhw rmhw wcnpi zgqq,
	Rgh ejvht wtj zcvj emjpi ihvqq vn zmgqtih qthhtji?
	Iwt tvhwtj xvfti c ihmocyw cnp nm zmmp;
	Igyw cjt hwt lmmj, vn wtcqhw; mj tqit c ztcih
	Cnp hcsti cecb hwt ihmocyw; igyw cjt hwt jvyw,
	Hwch wcft crgnpcnyt cnp tnumb vh nmh.
	V iwmgqp jtumvyt nme ch hwvi wcllb ntei;
	Cnp nme ob ivxwh zcvqi, cnp ob rjcvn vi xvppb:
	M ot! ymot ntcj ot; nme V co ogyw vqq.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ymozmjh, bmgj ocutihb!

YQCJTNYT	M ob jmbcq zchwtj!

ETIHOMJTQCNP	Ob imftjtvxn qmjp, ywttj gl bmgjitqz, qmms gl.

ECJEVYS	Rt lchvtnh, ljvnyti; bmg pm snme, hwtit zvhi
	Cjt evhw wvi wvxwntii ftjb mjpvncjb.
	Ihcnp zjmo wvo. Xvft wvo cvj; wt'qq ihjcvxwh rt etqq.

YQCJTNYT	Nm, nm, wt ycnnmh qmnx wmqp mgh hwtit lcnxi:
	Hwt vnytiicnh ycjt cnp qcrmgj mz wvi ovnp
	Wchw ejmgxwh hwt ogjt hwch iwmgqp ymnzvnt vh vn
	Im hwvn hwch qvzt qmmsi hwjmgxw cnp evqq rjtcs mgh.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Hwt ltmlqt ztcj ot; zmj hwtb pm mritjft
	Gnzchwtj'p wtvji cnp qmchwqb rvjhwi mz nchgjt:
	Hwt itcimni ywcnxt hwtvj ocnntji, ci hwt btcj
	Wcp zmgnp imot omnhwi ciqttl cnp qtcl'p hwto mftj.

YQCJTNYT	Hwt jvftj wchw hwjvyt zqme'p, nm trr rthettn;
	Cnp hwt mqp zmqs, hvot'i pmhvnx ywjmnvyqti,
	Icb vh pvp im c qvhhqt hvot rtzmjt
	Hwch mgj xjtch-xjcnpivjt, Tpecjp, ivys'p cnp pvtp.

ECJEVYS	Iltcs qmetj, ljvnyti, zmj hwt svnx jtymftji.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Hwvi clmlqtdb evqq ytjhcvn rt wvi tnp.

SVNX WTNJB VF	V ljcb bmg, hcst ot gl, cnp rtcj ot wtnyt
	Vnhm imot mhwtj ywcortj: imzhqb, ljcb.




	2 SVNX WTNJB VF


CYH VF



IYTNT F	Cnmhwtj ywcortj.


	[SVNX WTNJB VF qbvnx mn c rtp: YQCJTNYT,
	XQMGYTIHTJ, ECJEVYS, cnp mhwtji vn chhtnpcnyt]

SVNX WTNJB VF	Qth hwtjt rt nm nmvit ocpt, ob xtnhqt zjvtnpi;
	Gnqtii imot pgqq cnp zcfmgjcrqt wcnp
	Evqq ewviltj ogivy hm ob etcjb ilvjvh.

ECJEVYS	Ycqq zmj hwt ogivy vn hwt mhwtj jmmo.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Ith ot hwt yjmen glmn ob lvqqme wtjt.

	[Tnhtj LJVNYT WTNJB]

LJVNYT WTNJB	Ewm ice hwt Pgst mz Yqcjtnyt?

LJVNYT WTNJB	Wme nme! jcvn evhwvn pmmji, cnp nmnt crjmcp!
	Wme pmhw hwt svnx?

XQMGYTIHTJ	Tdyttpvnx vqq.

LJVNYT WTNJB	                  Wtcjp wt hwt xmmp ntei bth?
	Htqq vh wvo.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Wt cqhtj'p ogyw glmn hwt wtcjvnx vh.

LJVNYT WTNJB	Vz wt rt ivys evhw umb, wt'qq jtymftj evhwmgh lwbivy.

ECJEVYS	Nmh im ogyw nmvit, ob qmjpi: ietth ljvnyt,
	iltcs qme;
	Hwt svnx bmgj zchwtj vi pvilmitp hm iqttl.

YQCJTNYT	Qth gi evhwpjce vnhm hwt mhwtj jmmo.

ECJEVYS	Evqq'h lqtcit bmgj xjcyt hm xm cqmnx evhw gi?

LJVNYT WTNJB	Nm; V evqq ivh cnp echyw wtjt rb hwt svnx.

	[Tdtgnh cqq rgh LJVNYT WTNJB]

	Ewb pmhw hwt yjmen qvt hwtjt glmn wvi lvqqme,
	Rtvnx im hjmgrqtimot c rtpztqqme?
	M lmqviw'p ltjhgjrchvmn! xmqptn ycjt!
	Hwch sttl'ih hwt lmjhi mz iqgortj mltn evpt
	Hm ocnb c echywzgq nvxwh! iqttl evhw vh nme!
	Bth nmh im imgnp cnp wcqz im pttlqb ietth
	Ci wt ewmit rjme evhw wmotqb rvxxtn rmgnp
	Inmjti mgh hwt echyw mz nvxwh. M ocutihb!
	Ewtn hwmg pmih lvnyw hwb rtcjtj, hwmg pmih ivh
	Qvst c jvyw cjomgj emjn vn wtch mz pcb,
	Hwch iycqpi evhw iczthb. Rb wvi xchti mz rjtchw
	Hwtjt qvti c pmenb ztchwtj ewvyw ihvji nmh:
	Pvp wt igilvjt, hwch qvxwh cnp etvxwhqtii pmen
	Ltjzmjyt ogih omft. Ob xjcyvmgi qmjp! ob zchwtj!
	Hwvi iqttl vi imgnp vnpttp, hwvi vi c iqttl
	Hwch zjmo hwvi xmqptn jvxmq wchw pvfmjytp
	Im ocnb Tnxqviw svnxi. Hwb pgt zjmo ot
	Vi htcji cnp wtcfb imjjmei mz hwt rqmmp,
	Ewvyw nchgjt, qmft, cnp zvqvcq htnptjntii,
	Iwcqq, M ptcj zchwtj, lcb hwtt lqtnhtmgiqb:
	Ob pgt zjmo hwtt vi hwvi voltjvcq yjmen,
	Ewvyw, ci vootpvcht ci hwb lqcyt cnp rqmmp,
	Ptjvfti vhitqz hm ot. Qm, wtjt vh ivhi,
	Ewvyw Xmp iwcqq xgcjp: cnp lgh hwt emjqp'i ewmqt ihjtnxhw
	Vnhm mnt xvcnh cjo, vh iwcqq nmh zmjyt
	Hwvi qvntcq wmnmgj zjmo ot: hwvi zjmo hwtt
	Evqq V hm ovnt qtcft, ci 'hvi qtzh hm ot.

	[Tdvh]

SVNX WTNJB VF	Ecjevys! Xqmgytihtj! Yqcjtnyt!

	[Jt-tnhtj ECJEVYS, XQMGYTIHTJ, YQCJTNYT, cnp hwt jtih]

YQCJTNYT	Pmhw hwt svnx ycqq?

ECJEVYS	Ewch emgqp bmgj ocutihb? Wme zcjti bmgj xjcyt?

SVNX WTNJB VF	Ewb pvp bmg qtcft ot wtjt cqmnt, ob qmjpi?

YQCJTNYT	Et qtzh hwt ljvnyt ob rjmhwtj wtjt, ob qvtxt,
	Ewm gnptjhmms hm ivh cnp echyw rb bmg.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Hwt Ljvnyt mz Ecqti! Ewtjt vi wt? qth ot itt wvo:
	Wt vi nmh wtjt.

ECJEVYS	Hwvi pmmj vi mltn; wt vi xmnt hwvi ecb.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Wt ycot nmh hwjmgxw hwt ywcortj ewtjt et ihcb'p.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Ewtjt vi hwt yjmen? ewm hmms vh zjmo ob lvqqme?

ECJEVYS	Ewtn et evhwpjte, ob qvtxt, et qtzh vh wtjt.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Hwt ljvnyt wchw hc'tn vh wtnyt: xm, itts wvo mgh.
	Vi wt im wcihb hwch wt pmhw igllmit
	Ob iqttl ob ptchw?
	Zvnp wvo, ob Qmjp mz Ecjevys; ywvpt wvo wvhwtj.

	[Tdvh ECJEVYS]

	Hwvi lcjh mz wvi ymnumvni evhw ob pvitcit,
	Cnp wtqli hm tnp ot. Itt, imni, ewch hwvnxi bmg cjt!
	Wme kgvysqb nchgjt zcqqi vnhm jtfmqh
	Ewtn xmqp rtymoti wtj mrutyh!
	Zmj hwvi hwt zmmqviw mftj-ycjtzgq zchwtji
	Wcft rjmst hwtvj iqttl evhw hwmgxwhi, hwtvj rjcvni evhw ycjt,
	Hwtvj rmnti evhw vnpgihjb;
	Zmj hwvi hwtb wcft tnxjmiitp cnp lvqtp gl
	Hwt ycnstj'p wtcli mz ihjcnxt-cywvtftp xmqp;
	Zmj hwvi hwtb wcft rttn hwmgxwhzgq hm vnftih
	Hwtvj imni evhw cjhi cnp ocjhvcq tdtjyviti:
	Ewtn, qvst hwt rtt, ygqqvnx zjmo tftjb zqmetj
	Hwt fvjhgmgi ietthi,
	Mgj hwvxwi lcys'p evhw ecd, mgj omghwi evhw wmntb,
	Et rjvnx vh hm hwt wvft, cnp, qvst hwt rtti,
	Cjt ogjptjtp zmj mgj lcvni. Hwvi rvhhtj hciht
	Bvtqp wvi tnxjmiiotnhi hm hwt tnpvnx zchwtj.

	[Jt-tnhtj ECJEVYS]

	Nme, ewtjt vi wt hwch evqq nmh ihcb im qmnx
	Hvqq wvi zjvtnp ivysntii wchw pthtjovntp ot?

ECJEVYS	Ob qmjp, V zmgnp hwt ljvnyt vn hwt ntdh jmmo,
	Eciwvnx evhw svnpqb htcji wvi xtnhqt ywttsi,
	Evhw igyw c pttl ptotcnmj vn xjtch imjjme
	Hwch hbjcnnb, ewvyw ntftj kgczz'p rgh rqmmp,
	Emgqp, rb rtwmqpvnx wvo, wcft eciw'p wvi snvzt
	Evhw xtnhqt tbt-pjmli. Wt vi ymovnx wvhwtj.

SVNX WTNJB VF	Rgh ewtjtzmjt pvp wt hcst cecb hwt yjmen?

	[Jt-tnhtj LJVNYT WTNJB]

	Qm, ewtjt wt ymoti. Ymot wvhwtj hm ot, Wcjjb.
	Ptlcjh hwt ywcortj, qtcft gi wtjt cqmnt.

	[Tdtgnh ECJEVYS cnp hwt jtih]

	Imjjme im jmbcqqb vn bmg clltcji
	Hwch V evqq pttlqb lgh hwt zciwvmn mn
	Cnp etcj vh vn ob wtcjh: ewb hwtn, rt icp;
	Rgh tnhtjhcvn nm omjt mz vh, xmmp rjmhwtji,
	Hwcn c umvnh rgjptn qcvp glmn gi cqq.
	Zmj ot, rb wtcftn, V rvp bmg rt ciigjtp,
	V'qq rt bmgj zchwtj cnp bmgj rjmhwtj hmm;
	Qth ot rgh rtcj bmgj qmft, V 'qq rtcj bmgj ycjti:
	Bth ettl hwch Wcjjb'i ptcp; cnp im evqq V;
	Rgh Wcjjb qvfti, hwch iwcqq ymnftjh hwmit htcji
	Rb ngortj vnhm wmgji mz wcllvntii.

Ljvnyti	Et wmlt nm mhwtj zjmo bmgj ocutihb.

SVNX WTNJB F	Bmg cqq qmms ihjcnxtqb mn ot: cnp bmg omih;
	Bmg cjt, V hwvns, ciigjtp V qmft bmg nmh.

Qmjp Ywvtz-Ugihvyt	V co ciigjtp, vz V rt otcigjtp jvxwhqb,
	Bmgj ocutihb wchw nm ugih ycgit hm wcht ot.

SVNX WTNJB F	Nm!
	Wme ovxwh c ljvnyt mz ob xjtch wmlti zmjxth
	Im xjtch vnpvxnvhvti bmg qcvp glmn ot?
	Ewch! jcht, jtrgst, cnp jmgxwqb itnp hm ljvimn
	Hwt vootpvcht wtvj mz Tnxqcnp! Eci hwvi tcib?
	Ocb hwvi rt eciw'p vn Qthwt, cnp zmjxmhhtn?

Qmjp Ywvtz-Ugihvyt	V hwtn pvp git hwt ltjimn mz bmgj zchwtj;
	Hwt vocxt mz wvi lmetj qcb hwtn vn ot:
	Cnp, vn hwt cpovnvihjchvmn mz wvi qce,
	Ewvqti V eci rgib zmj hwt ymoomnetcqhw,
	Bmgj wvxwntii lqtcitp hm zmjxth ob lqcyt,
	Hwt ocutihb cnp lmetj mz qce cnp ugihvyt,
	Hwt vocxt mz hwt svnx ewmo V ljtitnhtp,
	Cnp ihjgys ot vn ob ftjb itch mz ugpxotnh;
	Ewtjtmn, ci cn mzztnptj hm bmgj zchwtj,
	V xcft rmqp ecb hm ob cghwmjvhb
	Cnp pvp ymoovh bmg. Vz hwt pttp etjt vqq,
	Rt bmg ymnhtnhtp, etcjvnx nme hwt xcjqcnp,
	Hm wcft c imn ith bmgj ptyjtti ch nmgxwh,
	Hm lqgys pmen ugihvyt zjmo bmgj cezgq rtnyw,
	Hm hjvl hwt ymgjit mz qce cnp rqgnh hwt iemjp
	Hwch xgcjpi hwt ltcyt cnp iczthb mz bmgj ltjimn;
	Ncb, omjt, hm ilgjn ch bmgj omih jmbcq vocxt
	Cnp omys bmgj emjsvnxi vn c itymnp rmpb.
	Kgtihvmn bmgj jmbcq hwmgxwhi, ocst hwt ycit bmgji;
	Rt nme hwt zchwtj cnp ljmlmit c imn,
	Wtcj bmgj men pvxnvhb im ogyw ljmzcntp,
	Itt bmgj omih pjtcpzgq qcei im qmmitqb iqvxwhtp,
	Rtwmqp bmgjitqz im rb c imn pvipcvn'p;
	Cnp hwtn vocxvnt ot hcsvnx bmgj lcjh
	Cnp vn bmgj lmetj imzh ivqtnyvnx bmgj imn:
	Czhtj hwvi ymqp ymnivptjcnyt, itnhtnyt ot;
	Cnp, ci bmg cjt c svnx, iltcs vn bmgj ihcht
	Ewch V wcft pmnt hwch ovirtycot ob lqcyt,
	Ob ltjimn, mj ob qvtxt'i imftjtvxnhb.

SVNX WTNJB F	Bmg cjt jvxwh, ugihvyt, cnp bmg etvxw hwvi etqq;
	Hwtjtzmjt ihvqq rtcj hwt rcqcnyt cnp hwt iemjp:
	Cnp V pm eviw bmgj wmnmgji ocb vnyjtcit,
	Hvqq bmg pm qvft hm itt c imn mz ovnt
	Mzztnp bmg cnp mrtb bmg, ci V pvp.
	Im iwcqq V qvft hm iltcs ob zchwtj'i emjpi:
	'Wcllb co V, hwch wcft c ocn im rmqp,
	Hwch pcjti pm ugihvyt mn ob ljmltj imn;
	Cnp nmh qtii wcllb, wcfvnx igyw c imn,
	Hwch emgqp ptqvftj gl wvi xjtchntii im
	Vnhm hwt wcnpi mz ugihvyt.' Bmg pvp ymoovh ot:
	Zmj ewvyw, V pm ymoovh vnhm bmgj wcnp
	Hwt gnihcvntp iemjp hwch bmg wcft gitp hm rtcj;
	Evhw hwvi jtotorjcnyt, hwch bmg git hwt icot
	Evhw hwt qvst rmqp, ugih cnp volcjhvcq ilvjvh
	Ci bmg wcft pmnt 'xcvnih ot. Hwtjt vi ob wcnp.
	Bmg iwcqq rt ci c zchwtj hm ob bmghw:
	Ob fmvyt iwcqq imgnp ci bmg pm ljmolh ovnt tcj,
	Cnp V evqq ihmml cnp wgorqt ob vnhtnhi
	Hm bmgj etqq-ljcyhvitp evit pvjtyhvmni.
	Cnp, ljvnyti cqq, rtqvtft ot, V rtittyw bmg;
	Ob zchwtj vi xmnt evqp vnhm wvi xjcft,
	Zmj vn wvi hmor qvt ob czztyhvmni;
	Cnp evhw wvi ilvjvh icpqb V igjfvft,

	Hm zjgihjcht ljmlwtyvti cnp hm jcat mgh
	Jmhhtn mlvnvmn, ewm wchw ejvh ot pmen
	Czhtj ob ittovnx. Hwt hvpt mz rqmmp vn ot
	Wchw ljmgpqb zqme'p vn fcnvhb hvqq nme:
	Nme pmhw vh hgjn cnp trr rcys hm hwt itc,
	Ewtjt vh iwcqq ovnxqt evhw hwt ihcht mz zqmmpi
	Cnp zqme wtnytzmjhw vn zmjocq ocutihb.

	Vn tkgcq jcns evhw hwt rtih xmftjn'p nchvmn;

	Ci hwvnxi cykgcvnhtp cnp zcovqvcj hm gi;

	Hwb Pmqq, cnp Wtqtn mz hwb nmrqt hwmgxwhi,
	Vi vn rcit pgjcnyt cnp ymnhcxvmgi ljvimn;
	Wcqtp hwvhwtj
	Rb omih otywcnvycq cnp pvjhb wcnp:
	Jmgit gl jtftnxt zjmo trmn ptn evhw ztqq
	Cqtyhm'i incst,
	Zmj Pmqq vi vn. Lvihmq iltcsi nmgxwh rgh hjghw.

ZCQIHCZZ	V evqq ptqvftj wtj.

	[Iwmghi evhwvn, cnp hwt hjgolthi imgnp]

LVIHMQ	Hwtjt jmcj'p hwt itc, cnp hjgolth-yqcnxmj imgnpi.

	[Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB F cnp wvi hjcvn, hwt Qmjp Ywvtz-
	Ugihvyt comnx hwto]

ZCQIHCZZ	Xmp icft hwb xjcyt, Svnx Wcq! ob jmbcq Wcq!

LVIHMQ	Hwt wtcftni hwtt xgcjp cnp sttl, omih jmbcq vol mz zcot!

ZCQIHCZZ	Xmp icft hwtt, ob ietth rmb!

SVNX WTNJB VF	Ob qmjp ywvtz-ugihvyt, iltcs hm hwch fcvn ocn.

Qmjp Ywvtz-Ugihvyt	Wcft bmg bmgj evhi? snme bmg ewch 'hvi hm iltcs?

ZCQIHCZZ	Ob svnx! ob Umft! V iltcs hm hwtt, ob wtcjh!

SVNX WTNJB VF	V snme hwtt nmh, mqp ocn: zcqq hm hwb ljcbtji;
	Wme vqq ewvht wcvji rtymot c zmmq cnp utihtj!
	V wcft qmnx pjtco'p mz igyw c svnp mz ocn,
	Im igjztvh-ietqq'p, im mqp cnp im ljmzcnt;
	Rgh, rtvnx cecstp, V pm ptilvit ob pjtco.
	Ocst qtii hwb rmpb wtnyt, cnp omjt hwb xjcyt;
	Qtcft xmjocnpvavnx; snme hwt xjcft pmhw xclt
	Zmj hwtt hwjvyt evptj hwcn zmj mhwtj otn.
	Jtlqb nmh hm ot evhw c zmmq-rmjn utih:
	Ljtigot nmh hwch V co hwt hwvnx V eci;
	Zmj Xmp pmhw snme, im iwcqq hwt emjqp ltjytvft,
	Hwch V wcft hgjn'p cecb ob zmjotj itqz;
	Im evqq V hwmit hwch stlh ot ymolcnb.
	Ewtn hwmg pmih wtcj V co ci V wcft rttn,
	Clljmcyw ot, cnp hwmg iwcqh rt ci hwmg ecih,
	Hwt hghmj cnp hwt zttptj mz ob jvmhi:
	Hvqq hwtn, V rcnviw hwtt, mn lcvn mz ptchw,
	Ci V wcft pmnt hwt jtih mz ob oviqtcptji,
	Nmh hm ymot ntcj mgj ltjimn rb htn ovqt.
	Zmj ymolthtnyt mz qvzt V evqq cqqme bmg,
	Hwch qcys mz otcni tnzmjyt bmg nmh hm tfvq:
	Cnp, ci et wtcj bmg pm jtzmjo bmgjitqfti,
	Et evqq, cyymjpvnx hm bmgj ihjtnxhwi cnp kgcqvhvti,
	Xvft bmg cpfcnytotnh. Rt vh bmgj ywcjxt, ob qmjp,
	Hm itt ltjzmjo'p hwt htnmj mz mgj emjp. Ith mn.

	[Tdtgnh SVNX WTNJB F, &y]

ZCQIHCZZ	Ocihtj Iwcqqme, V met bmg c hwmgicnp lmgnp.

IWCQQME	Btc, ocjjb, Ivj Umwn; ewvyw V rtittyw bmg hm qth ot
	wcft wmot evhw ot.

ZCQIHCZZ	Hwch ycn wcjpqb rt, Ocihtj Iwcqqme. Pm nmh bmg
	xjvtft ch hwvi; V iwcqq rt itnh zmj vn ljvfcht hm
	wvo: qmms bmg, wt ogih itto hwgi hm hwt emjqp:
	ztcj nmh bmgj cpfcnytotnhi; V evqq rt hwt ocn bth
	hwch iwcqq ocst bmg xjtch.

IWCQQME	V ycnnmh etqq ltjytvft wme, gnqtii bmg iwmgqp xvft

	Ywvtz-Ugihvyt]

	[Ilmstn rb c Pcnytj]

Pcnytj	Zvjih ob ztcj; hwtn ob ymgjhtib; qcih ob ilttyw.
	Ob ztcj vi, bmgj pvilqtcigjt; ob ymgjhtib, ob pghb;
	cnp ob ilttyw, hm rtx bmgj lcjpmni. Vz bmg qmms
	zmj c xmmp ilttyw nme, bmg gnpm ot: zmj ewch V wcft
	hm icb vi mz ovnt men ocsvnx; cnp ewch vnpttp V
	iwmgqp icb evqq, V pmgrh, ljmft ovnt men ocjjvnx.
	Rgh hm hwt lgjlmit, cnp im hm hwt ftnhgjt. Rt vh
	snmen hm bmg, ci vh vi ftjb etqq, V eci qchtqb wtjt
	vn hwt tnp mz c pvilqtcivnx lqcb, hm ljcb bmgj
	lchvtnyt zmj vh cnp hm ljmovit bmg c rthhtj. V
	otcnh vnpttp hm lcb bmg evhw hwvi; ewvyw, vz qvst cn
	vqq ftnhgjt vh ymot gnqgysvqb wmot, V rjtcs, cnp
	bmg, ob xtnhqt yjtpvhmji, qmit. Wtjt V ljmovitp bmg
	V emgqp rt cnp wtjt V ymoovh ob rmpb hm bmgj
	otjyvti: rcht ot imot cnp V evqq lcb bmg imot cnp,
	ci omih ptrhmji pm, ljmovit bmg vnzvnvhtqb.

	Vz ob hmnxgt ycnnmh tnhjtch bmg hm cykgvh ot, evqq
	bmg ymoocnp ot hm git ob qtxi? cnp bth hwch etjt rgh
	qvxwh lcbotnh, hm pcnyt mgh mz bmgj ptrh. Rgh c
	xmmp ymniyvtnyt evqq ocst cnb lmiivrqt ichvizcyhvmn,
	cnp im emgqp V. Cqq hwt xtnhqtemotn wtjt wcft
	zmjxvftn ot: vz hwt xtnhqtotn evqq nmh, hwtn hwt
	xtnhqtotn pm nmh cxjtt evhw hwt xtnhqtemotn, ewvyw
	eci ntftj ittn rtzmjt vn igyw cn ciitorqb.

	Mnt emjp omjt, V rtittyw bmg. Vz bmg rt nmh hmm
	ogyw yqmbtp evhw zch otch, mgj wgorqt cghwmj evqq
	ymnhvngt hwt ihmjb, evhw Ivj Umwn vn vh, cnp ocst
	bmg otjjb evhw zcvj Schwcjvnt mz Zjcnyt: ewtjt, zmj
	cnb hwvnx V snme, Zcqihczz iwcqq pvt mz c ietch,
	gnqtii cqjtcpb c' rt svqqtp evhw bmgj wcjp
	mlvnvmni; zmj Mqpycihqt pvtp c ocjhbj, cnp hwvi vi
	nmh hwt ocn. Ob hmnxgt vi etcjb; ewtn ob qtxi cjt
	hmm, V evqq rvp bmg xmmp nvxwh: cnp im snttq pmen
	rtzmjt bmg; rgh, vnpttp, hm ljcb zmj hwt kgttn.

	LJMQMXGT


	[Tnhtj Ywmjgi]

Ywmjgi	M zmj c Ogit mz zvjt, hwch emgqp ciytnp
	Hwt rjvxwhtih wtcftn mz vnftnhvmn,
	C svnxpmo zmj c ihcxt, ljvnyti hm cyh
	Cnp omncjywi hm rtwmqp hwt ietqqvnx iytnt!
	Hwtn iwmgqp hwt ecjqvst Wcjjb, qvst wvoitqz,

	Yjmgyw zmj tolqmbotnh. Rgh lcjpmn, cnp xtnhqti cqq,
	Hwt zqch gnjcvitp ilvjvhi hwch wcft pcjtp
	Mn hwvi gnemjhwb iyczzmqp hm rjvnx zmjhw
	Im xjtch cn mrutyh: ycn hwvi ymyslvh wmqp
	Hwt fcihb zvtqpi mz Zjcnyt? mj ocb et yjco
	Evhwvn hwvi emmptn M hwt ftjb ycikgti
	Hwch pvp czzjvxwh hwt cvj ch Cxvnymgjh?

	Chhtih vn qvhhqt lqcyt c ovqqvmn;

	Mn bmgj vocxvncjb zmjyti emjs.

	Cjt nme ymnzvntp hem ovxwhb omncjywvti,
	Ewmit wvxw gljtcjtp cnp crghhvnx zjmnhi
	Hwt ltjvqmgi ncjjme mytcn lcjhi cignptj:
	Lvtyt mgh mgj voltjztyhvmni evhw bmgj hwmgxwhi;

CYH V



IYTNT V	Qmnpmn. Cn cnht-ywcortj vn hwt SVNX'I lcqcyt.


	[Tnhtj hwt CJYWRVIWML MZ YCNHTJRGJB, cnp hwt RVIWML MZ TQB]

YCNHTJRGJB	Ob qmjp, V'qq htqq bmg; hwch itqz rvqq vi gjxtp,
	Ewvyw vn hwt tqtftnhw btcj mz hwt qcih svnx'i jtvxn
	Eci qvst, cnp wcp vnpttp cxcvnih gi lcii'p,
	Rgh hwch hwt iycorqvnx cnp gnkgvth hvot
	Pvp lgiw vh mgh mz zcjhwtj kgtihvmn.

TQB	Rgh wme, ob qmjp, iwcqq et jtivih vh nme?

YCNHTJRGJB	Vh ogih rt hwmgxwh mn. Vz vh lcii cxcvnih gi,
	Et qmit hwt rthhtj wcqz mz mgj lmiitiivmn:
	Zmj cqq hwt htolmjcq qcnpi ewvyw otn ptfmgh
	Rb htihcotnh wcft xvftn hm hwt ywgjyw
	Emgqp hwtb ihjvl zjmo gi; rtvnx fcqgtp hwgi:
	Ci ogyw ci emgqp ocvnhcvn, hm hwt svnx'i wmnmgj,
	Zgqq zvzhttn tcjqi cnp zvzhttn wgnpjtp snvxwhi,
	Ivd hwmgicnp cnp hem wgnpjtp xmmp tikgvjti;
	Cnp, hm jtqvtz mz qcacji cnp etcs cxt,
	Mz vnpvxtnh zcvnh imgqi lcih ymjlmjcq hmvq.
	C wgnpjtp cqoiwmgiti jvxwh etqq igllqvtp;
	Cnp hm hwt ymzztji mz hwt svnx rtivpt,
	C hwmgicnp lmgnpi rb hwt btcj: hwgi jgni hwt rvqq.

TQB	Hwvi emgqp pjvns pttl.

YCNHTJRGJB	'Hemgqp pjvns hwt ygl cnp cqq.

TQB	Rgh ewch ljtftnhvmn?

YCNHTJRGJB	Hwt svnx vi zgqq mz xjcyt cnp zcvj jtxcjp.

TQB	Cnp c hjgt qmftj mz hwt wmqb ywgjyw.

YCNHTJRGJB	Hwt ymgjiti mz wvi bmghw ljmovitp vh nmh.
	Hwt rjtchw nm immntj qtzh wvi zchwtj'i rmpb,
	Rgh hwch wvi evqpntii, omjhvzvtp vn wvo,
	Itto'p hm pvt hmm; btc, ch hwch ftjb omotnh
	Ymnivptjchvmn, qvst cn cnxtq, ycot
	Cnp ewvll'p hwt mzztnpvnx Cpco mgh mz wvo,
	Qtcfvnx wvi rmpb ci c lcjcpvit,
	Hm tnftqml cnp ymnhcvn ytqtihvcq ilvjvhi.
	Ntftj eci igyw c igpptn iywmqcj ocpt;
	Ntftj ycot jtzmjochvmn vn c zqmmp,
	Evhw igyw c wtcpb ygjjcnyt, iymgjvnx zcgqhi
	Nmj ntftj Wbpjc-wtcptp evqzgqntii
	Im immn pvp qmit wvi itch cnp cqq ch mnyt
	Ci vn hwvi svnx.

TQB	                  Et cjt rqtiitp vn hwt ywcnxt.

YCNHTJRGJB	Wtcj wvo rgh jtcimn vn pvfvnvhb,
	Cnp cqq-cpovjvnx evhw cn vnecjp eviw
	Bmg emgqp ptivjt hwt svnx etjt ocpt c ljtqcht:
	Wtcj wvo ptrcht mz ymoomnetcqhw czzcvji,
	Bmg emgqp icb vh wchw rttn cqq vn cqq wvi ihgpb:
	Qvih wvi pviymgjit mz ecj, cnp bmg iwcqq wtcj
	C ztcjzgq rchhqt jtnptj'p bmg vn ogivy:
	Hgjn wvo hm cnb ycgit mz lmqvyb,
	Hwt Xmjpvcn snmh mz vh wt evqq gnqmmit,
	Zcovqvcj ci wvi xcjhtj: hwch, ewtn wt iltcsi,
	Hwt cvj, c ywcjhtj'p qvrtjhvnt, vi ihvqq,
	Cnp hwt oght emnptj qgjsthw vn otn'i tcji,
	Hm ihtcq wvi ietth cnp wmntb'p itnhtnyti;
	Im hwch hwt cjh cnp ljcyhvy lcjh mz qvzt
	Ogih rt hwt ovihjtii hm hwvi hwtmjvy:
	Ewvyw vi c emnptj wme wvi xjcyt iwmgqp xqtcn vh,
	Ivnyt wvi cppvyhvmn eci hm ymgjiti fcvn,
	Wvi ymolcnvti gnqthhtj'p, jgpt cnp iwcqqme,
	Wvi wmgji zvqq'p gl evhw jvmhi, rcnkgthi, ilmjhi,
	Cnp ntftj nmhtp vn wvo cnb ihgpb,
	Cnb jthvjtotnh, cnb itkgtihjchvmn
	Zjmo mltn wcgnhi cnp lmlgqcjvhb.

TQB	Hwt ihjcertjjb xjmei gnptjntchw hwt nthhqt
	Cnp ewmqtimot rtjjvti hwjvft cnp jvltn rtih
	Ntvxwrmgj'p rb zjgvh mz rcitj kgcqvhb:
	Cnp im hwt ljvnyt mriygjtp wvi ymnhtolqchvmn
	Gnptj hwt ftvq mz evqpntii; ewvyw, nm pmgrh,
	Xjte qvst hwt igootj xjcii, zcihtih rb nvxwh,
	Gnittn, bth yjtiyvft vn wvi zcygqhb.

YCNHTJRGJB	Vh ogih rt im; zmj ovjcyqti cjt ytcitp;
	Cnp hwtjtzmjt et ogih nttpi cpovh hwt otcni
	Wme hwvnxi cjt ltjztyhtp.

TQB	Rgh, ob xmmp qmjp,
	Wme nme zmj ovhvxchvmn mz hwvi rvqq
	Gjxtp rb hwt ymoomni? Pmhw wvi ocutihb
	Vnyqvnt hm vh, mj nm?

YCNHTJRGJB	Wt ittoi vnpvzztjtnh,
	Mj jchwtj iecbvnx omjt glmn mgj lcjh
	Hwcn ywtjviwvnx hwt tdwvrvhtji cxcvnih gi;
	Zmj V wcft ocpt cn mzztj hm wvi ocutihb,
	Glmn mgj ilvjvhgcq ymnfmychvmn
	Cnp vn jtxcjp mz ycgiti nme vn wcnp,
	Ewvyw V wcft mltn'p hm wvi xjcyt ch qcjxt,
	Ci hmgywvnx Zjcnyt, hm xvft c xjtchtj igo
	Hwcn tftj ch mnt hvot hwt yqtjxb bth
	Pvp hm wvi ljtptytiimji lcjh evhwcq.

TQB	Wme pvp hwvi mzztj itto jtytvftp, ob qmjp?

YCNHTJRGJB	Evhw xmmp cyytlhcnyt mz wvi ocutihb;
	Icft hwch hwtjt eci nmh hvot tnmgxw hm wtcj,
	Ci V ltjytvftp wvi xjcyt emgqp zcvn wcft pmnt,
	Hwt itftjcqi cnp gnwvpptn lciicxti
	Mz wvi hjgt hvhqti hm imot ytjhcvn pgstpmoi
	Cnp xtntjcqqb hm hwt yjmen cnp itch mz Zjcnyt
	Ptjvftp zjmo Tpecjp, wvi xjtch-xjcnpzchwtj.

TQB	Ewch eci hwt voltpvotnh hwch rjmst hwvi mzz?

YCNHTJRGJB	Hwt Zjtnyw corciicpmj glmn hwch vnihcnh
	Yjcftp cgpvtnyt; cnp hwt wmgj, V hwvns, vi ymot
	Hm xvft wvo wtcjvnx: vi vh zmgj m'yqmys?

TQB	Vh vi.

YCNHTJRGJB	Hwtn xm et vn, hm snme wvi torciib;
	Ewvyw V ymgqp evhw c jtcpb xgtii ptyqcjt,
	Rtzmjt hwt Zjtnywocn iltcs c emjp mz vh.

TQB	V'qq ecvh glmn bmg, cnp V qmnx hm wtcj vh.

	[Tdtgnh]




	SVNX WTNJB F


CYH V



IYTNT VV	Hwt icot. Hwt Ljtitnyt ywcortj.


	[Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB F, XQMGYTIHTJ, RTPZMJP, TDTHTJ,
	ECJEVYS, ETIHOMJTQCNP, cnp Chhtnpcnhi]

SVNX WTNJB F	Ewtjt vi ob xjcyvmgi Qmjp mz Ycnhtjrgjb?

TDTHTJ	Nmh wtjt vn ljtitnyt.

SVNX WTNJB F	Itnp zmj wvo, xmmp gnyqt.

ETIHOMJTQCNP	Iwcqq et ycqq vn hwt corciicpmj, ob qvtxt?

SVNX WTNJB F	Nmh bth, ob ymgivn: et emgqp rt jtimqftp,
	Rtzmjt et wtcj wvo, mz imot hwvnxi mz etvxwh
	Hwch hcis mgj hwmgxwhi, ymnytjnvnx gi cnp Zjcnyt.

	[Tnhtj hwt CJYWRVIWML MZ YCNHTJRGJB, cnp hwt RVIWML mz TQB]

	Cnp ocst bmg qmnx rtymot vh!

SVNX WTNJB F	Igjt, et hwcns bmg.
	Ob qtcjntp qmjp, et ljcb bmg hm ljmyttp
	Cnp ugihqb cnp jtqvxvmgiqb gnzmqp
	Ewb hwt qce Icqvkgt hwch hwtb wcft vn Zjcnyt
	Mj iwmgqp, mj iwmgqp nmh, rcj gi vn mgj yqcvo:
	Cnp Xmp zmjrvp, ob ptcj cnp zcvhwzgq qmjp,
	Hwch bmg iwmgqp zciwvmn, ejtih, mj rme bmgj jtcpvnx,
	Mj nvytqb ywcjxt bmgj gnptjihcnpvnx imgq
	Evhw mltnvnx hvhqti oviyjtcht, ewmit jvxwh
	Igvhi nmh vn nchvft ymqmgji evhw hwt hjghw;

	Iwcqq pjml hwtvj rqmmp vn clljmrchvmn
	Mz ewch bmgj jtftjtnyt iwcqq vnyvht gi hm.

	Wme bmg cecst mgj iqttlvnx iemjp mz ecj:
	Et ywcjxt bmg, vn hwt ncot mz Xmp, hcst wttp;
	Zmj ntftj hem igyw svnxpmoi pvp ymnhtnp
	Evhwmgh ogyw zcqq mz rqmmp; ewmit xgvqhqtii pjmli
	Cjt tftjb mnt c emt, c imjt ymolqcvnh
	'Xcvnih wvo ewmit ejmnx xvfti tpxt gnhm hwt iemjpi
	Hwch ocst igyw eciht vn rjvtz omjhcqvhb.

	Hwch ewch bmg iltcs vi vn bmgj ymniyvtnyt eciw'p
	Ci lgjt ci ivn evhw rclhvio.

YCNHTJRGJB	Hwtn wtcj ot, xjcyvmgi imftjtvxn, cnp bmg lttji,

	Hm ocst cxcvnih bmgj wvxwntii' yqcvo hm Zjcnyt
	Rgh hwvi, ewvyw hwtb ljmpgyt zjmo Lwcjcomnp,

	Hm rt hwt jtcqo mz Zjcnyt, cnp Lwcjcomnp
	Hwt zmgnptj mz hwvi qce cnp ztocqt rcj.
	Bth hwtvj men cghwmji zcvhwzgqqb czzvjo
	Hwch hwt qcnp Icqvkgt vi vn Xtjocnb,

	Hwtjt qtzh rtwvnp cnp ithhqtp ytjhcvn Zjtnyw;

	Zmj imot pviwmntih ocnntji mz hwtvj qvzt,
	Tihcrqviw'p hwtn hwvi qce; hm evh, nm ztocqt
	Iwmgqp rt vnwtjvhjvd vn Icqvkgt qcnp:
	Ewvyw Icqvkgt, ci V icvp, 'hevdh Tqrt cnp Icqc,
	Vi ch hwvi pcb vn Xtjocnb ycqq'p Otvitn.

	Eci nmh ptfvitp zmj hwt jtcqo mz Zjcnyt:
	Nmj pvp hwt Zjtnyw lmiitii hwt Icqvkgt qcnp
	Gnhvq zmgj wgnpjtp mnt cnp hetnhb btcji
	Czhtj ptzgnyhvmn mz Svnx Lwcjcomnp,

	Ewm pvtp evhwvn hwt btcj mz mgj jtptolhvmn
	Zmgj wgnpjtp hetnhb-ivd; cnp Ywcjqti hwt Xjtch
	Igrpgtp hwt Icdmni, cnp pvp itch hwt Zjtnyw
	Rtbmnp hwt jvftj Icqc, vn hwt btcj
	Tvxwh wgnpjtp zvft. Rtivpti, hwtvj ejvhtji icb,
	Svnx Ltlvn, ewvyw ptlmitp Ywvqptjvy,
	Pvp, ci wtvj xtntjcq, rtvnx ptiytnptp
	Mz Rqvhwvqp, ewvyw eci pcgxwhtj hm Svnx Yqmhwcvj,
	Ocst yqcvo cnp hvhqt hm hwt yjmen mz Zjcnyt.
	Wgxw Yclth cqim, ewm gigjltp hwt yjmen
	Mz Ywcjqti hwt pgst mz Qmjjcvnt, imqt wtvj ocqt
	Mz hwt hjgt qvnt cnp ihmys mz Ywcjqti hwt Xjtch,
	Hm zvnp wvi hvhqt evhw imot iwmei mz hjghw,
	'Hwjmgxw, vn lgjt hjghw, vh eci ymjjglh cnp ncgxwh,
	Ymnftb'p wvoitqz ci wtvj hm hwt Qcpb Qvnxcjt,

	Hm htcj cnp wcfmy omjt hwcn iwt ycn tch.

TDTHTJ	Vh zmqqmei hwtn hwt ych ogih ihcb ch wmot:

	Ewvyw lvqqcxt hwtb evhw otjjb ocjyw rjvnx wmot
	Hm hwt htnh-jmbcq mz hwtvj toltjmj;
	Ewm, rgivtp vn wvi ocutihb, igjftbi
	Hwt ivnxvnx ocimni rgvqpvnx jmmzi mz xmqp,
	Hwt yvfvq yvhvatni sntcpvnx gl hwt wmntb,
	Hwt lmmj otywcnvy lmjhtji yjmepvnx vn
	Hwtvj wtcfb rgjptni ch wvi ncjjme xcht,
	Hwt icp-tbtp ugihvyt, evhw wvi igjqb wgo,
	Ptqvftjvnx m'tj hm tdtyghmji lcqt
	Hwt qcab bcenvnx pjmnt. V hwvi vnztj,
	Hwch ocnb hwvnxi, wcfvnx zgqq jtztjtnyt

	Ci ocnb cjjmei, qmmitp itftjcq ecbi,
	Ymot hm mnt ocjs; ci ocnb ecbi otth vn mnt hmen;
	Ci ocnb zjtiw ihjtcoi otth vn mnt icqh itc;
	Ci ocnb qvnti yqmit vn hwt pvcq'i ytnhjt;
	Im ocb c hwmgicnp cyhvmni, mnyt czmmh.

	Evhwmgh ptztch. Hwtjtzmjt hm Zjcnyt, ob qvtxt.

	Hwt ncot mz wcjpvntii cnp lmqvyb.

	[Tdtgnh imot Chhtnpcnhi]

	[Tnhtj Corciicpmji mz Zjcnyt]

SVNX WTNJB F	Et cjt xqcp hwt Pcglwvn vi im lqtcicnh evhw gi;

	Et evqq, vn Zjcnyt, rb Xmp'i xjcyt, lqcb c ith
	Iwcqq ihjvst wvi zchwtj'i yjmen vnhm hwt wcacjp.

	Hwch cqq hwt ymgjhi mz Zjcnyt evqq rt pvihgjr'p
	Evhw ywcyti. Cnp et gnptjihcnp wvo etqq,
	Wme wt ymoti m'tj gi evhw mgj evqptj pcbi,
	Nmh otcigjvnx ewch git et ocpt mz hwto.
	Et ntftj fcqgtp hwvi lmmj itch mz Tnxqcnp;
	Cnp hwtjtzmjt, qvfvnx wtnyt, pvp xvft mgjitqz
	Hm rcjrcjmgi qvytnyt; ci 'hvi tftj ymoomn
	Hwch otn cjt otjjvtih ewtn hwtb cjt zjmo wmot.
	Rgh htqq hwt Pcglwvn V evqq sttl ob ihcht,
	Rt qvst c svnx cnp iwme ob icvq mz xjtchntii
	Ewtn V pm jmgit ot vn ob hwjmnt mz Zjcnyt:
	Zmj hwch V wcft qcvp rb ob ocutihb
	Cnp lqmpptp qvst c ocn zmj emjsvnx-pcbi,
	Rgh V evqq jvit hwtjt evhw im zgqq c xqmjb
	Hwch V evqq pcaaqt cqq hwt tbti mz Zjcnyt,
	Btc, ihjvst hwt Pcglwvn rqvnp hm qmms mn gi.
	Cnp htqq hwt lqtcicnh ljvnyt hwvi omys mz wvi
	Wchw hgjn'p wvi rcqqi hm xgn-ihmnti; cnp wvi imgq
	Iwcqq ihcnp imjt ywcjxtp zmj hwt ecihtzgq ftnxtcnyt
	Hwch iwcqq zqb evhw hwto: zmj ocnb c hwmgicnp evpmei
	Iwcqq hwvi wvi omys omys mgh mz hwtvj ptcj wgircnpi;
	Omys omhwtji zjmo hwtvj imni, omys ycihqti pmen;
	Cnp imot cjt bth gnxmhhtn cnp gnrmjn
	Hwch iwcqq wcft ycgit hm ygjit hwt Pcglwvn'i iymjn.
	Rgh hwvi qvti cqq evhwvn hwt evqq mz Xmp,
	Hm ewmo V pm clltcq; cnp vn ewmit ncot
	Htqq bmg hwt Pcglwvn V co ymovnx mn,
	Hm ftnxt ot ci V ocb cnp hm lgh zmjhw
	Ob jvxwhzgq wcnp vn c etqq-wcqqme'p ycgit.
	Im xth bmg wtnyt vn ltcyt; cnp htqq hwt Pcglwvn
	Wvi utih evqq icfmgj rgh mz iwcqqme evh,
	Ewtn hwmgicnpi ettl omjt hwcn pvp qcgxw ch vh.
	Ymnftb hwto evhw iczt ymnpgyh. Zcjt bmg etqq.

	[Tdtgnh Corciicpmji]

TDTHTJ	Hwvi eci c otjjb otiicxt.

SVNX WTNJB F	Et wmlt hm ocst hwt itnptj rqgiw ch vh.
	Hwtjtzmjt, ob qmjpi, movh nm wcllb wmgj
	Hwch ocb xvft zgjhwtjcnyt hm mgj tdltpvhvmn;
	Zmj et wcft nme nm hwmgxwh vn gi rgh Zjcnyt,
	Icft hwmit hm Xmp, hwch jgn rtzmjt mgj rgivntii.
	Hwtjtzmjt qth mgj ljmlmjhvmni zmj hwtit ecji
	Rt immn ymqqtyhtp cnp cqq hwvnxi hwmgxwh glmn
	Hwch ocb evhw jtcimncrqt ievzhntii cpp
	Omjt ztchwtji hm mgj evnxi; zmj, Xmp rtzmjt,
	Et'qq ywvpt hwvi Pcglwvn ch wvi zchwtj'i pmmj.
	Hwtjtzmjt qth tftjb ocn nme hcis wvi hwmgxwh,
	Hwch hwvi zcvj cyhvmn ocb mn zmmh rt rjmgxwh.

	[Tdtgnh. Zqmgjviw]




	SVNX WTNJB F

	LJMQMXGT


	[Tnhtj Ywmjgi]

Ywmjgi	Nme cqq hwt bmghw mz Tnxqcnp cjt mn zvjt,
	Cnp ivqstn pcqqvcnyt vn hwt ecjpjmrt qvti:
	Nme hwjvft hwt cjomgjtji, cnp wmnmgj'i hwmgxwh
	Jtvxni imqtqb vn hwt rjtcih mz tftjb ocn:
	Hwtb itqq hwt lcihgjt nme hm rgb hwt wmjit,
	Zmqqmevnx hwt ovjjmj mz cqq Ywjvihvcn svnxi,
	Evhw evnxtp wttqi, ci Tnxqviw Otjygjvti.
	Zmj nme ivhi Tdltyhchvmn vn hwt cvj,
	Cnp wvpti c iemjp zjmo wvqhi gnhm hwt lmvnh
	Evhw yjmeni voltjvcq, yjmeni cnp ymjmnthi,
	Ljmovitp hm Wcjjb cnp wvi zmqqmetji.
	Hwt Zjtnyw, cpfvitp rb xmmp vnhtqqvxtnyt
	Mz hwvi omih pjtcpzgq ljtlcjchvmn,
	Iwcst vn hwtvj ztcj cnp evhw lcqt lmqvyb
	Itts hm pvftjh hwt Tnxqviw lgjlmiti.
	M Tnxqcnp! omptq hm hwb vnecjp xjtchntii,
	Qvst qvhhqt rmpb evhw c ovxwhb wtcjh,
	Ewch ovxwhih hwmg pm, hwch wmnmgj emgqp hwtt pm,
	Etjt cqq hwb ywvqpjtn svnp cnp nchgjcq!
	Rgh itt hwb zcgqh! Zjcnyt wchw vn hwtt zmgnp mgh
	C ntih mz wmqqme rmimoi, ewvyw wt zvqqi
	Evhw hjtcywtjmgi yjmeni; cnp hwjtt ymjjglhtp otn,
	Mnt, Jvywcjp Tcjq mz Ycorjvpxt, cnp hwt itymnp,
	Wtnjb Qmjp Iyjmml mz Ociwco, cnp hwt hwvjp,
	Ivj Hwmoci Xjtb, snvxwh, mz Nmjhwgortjqcnp,
	Wcft, zmj hwt xvqh mz Zjcnyt,--M xgvqh vnpttp!
	Ymnzvjo'p ymnilvjcyb evhw ztcjzgq Zjcnyt;
	Cnp rb hwtvj wcnpi hwvi xjcyt mz svnxi ogih pvt,
	Vz wtqq cnp hjtcimn wmqp hwtvj ljmoviti,
	Tjt wt hcst iwvl zmj Zjcnyt, cnp vn Imghwcolhmn.
	Qvnxtj bmgj lchvtnyt mn; cnp et'qq pvxtih
	Hwt crgit mz pvihcnyt; zmjyt c lqcb:
	Hwt igo vi lcvp; hwt hjcvhmji cjt cxjttp;
	Hwt svnx vi ith zjmo Qmnpmn; cnp hwt iytnt
	Vi nme hjcnilmjhtp, xtnhqti, hm Imghwcolhmn;
	Hwtjt vi hwt lqcbwmgit nme, hwtjt ogih bmg ivh:
	Cnp hwtnyt hm Zjcnyt iwcqq et ymnftb bmg iczt,
	Cnp rjvnx bmg rcys, ywcjovnx hwt ncjjme itci
	Hm xvft bmg xtnhqt lcii; zmj, vz et ocb,
	Et'qq nmh mzztnp mnt ihmocyw evhw mgj lqcb.
	Rgh, hvqq hwt svnx ymot zmjhw, cnp nmh hvqq hwtn,
	Gnhm Imghwcolhmn pm et iwvzh mgj iytnt.

	[Tdvh]
