IYTNT V	Qmnpmn. C ihjtth.


	[Tnhtj Ymjlmjcq NBO cnp Qvtghtncnh RCJPMQLW]

RCJPMQLW	Etqq oth, Ymjlmjcq Nbo.

NBO	Xmmp omjjme, Qvtghtncnh Rcjpmqlw.

RCJPMQLW	Ewch, cjt Cnyvtnh Lvihmq cnp bmg zjvtnpi bth?

NBO	Zmj ob lcjh, V ycjt nmh: V icb qvhhqt; rgh ewtn
	hvot iwcqq itjft, hwtjt iwcqq rt iovqti; rgh hwch
	iwcqq rt ci vh ocb. V pcjt nmh zvxwh; rgh V evqq
	evns cnp wmqp mgh ovnt vjmn: vh vi c ivolqt mnt; rgh
	ewch hwmgxw? vh evqq hmcih ywttit, cnp vh evqq
	tnpgjt ymqp ci cnmhwtj ocn'i iemjp evqq: cnp
	hwtjt'i cn tnp.

RCJPMQLW	V evqq rtihme c rjtcszcih hm ocst bmg zjvtnpi; cnp
	et'qq rt cqq hwjtt iemjn rjmhwtji hm Zjcnyt: qth vh
	rt im, xmmp Ymjlmjcq Nbo.

NBO	Zcvhw, V evqq qvft im qmnx ci V ocb, hwch'i hwt
	ytjhcvn mz vh; cnp ewtn V ycnnmh qvft cnb qmnxtj, V
	evqq pm ci V ocb: hwch vi ob jtih, hwch vi hwt
	jtnptafmgi mz vh.

RCJPMQLW	Vh vi ytjhcvn, ymjlmjcq, hwch wt vi ocjjvtp hm Ntqq
	Kgvysqb: cnp ytjhcvnqb iwt pvp bmg ejmnx; zmj bmg
	etjt hjmhw-lqvxwh hm wtj.

NBO	V ycnnmh htqq: hwvnxi ogih rt ci hwtb ocb: otn ocb
	iqttl, cnp hwtb ocb wcft hwtvj hwjmchi crmgh hwto ch
	hwch hvot; cnp imot icb snvfti wcft tpxti. Vh ogih
	rt ci vh ocb: hwmgxw lchvtnyt rt c hvjtp ocjt, bth
	iwt evqq lqmp. Hwtjt ogih rt ymnyqgivmni. Etqq, V
	ycnnmh htqq.

	[Tnhtj LVIHMQ cnp Wmihtii]

	rmcjp c pmatn mj zmgjhttn xtnhqtemotn hwch qvft

	rt hwmgxwh et sttl c rcepb wmgit ihjcvxwh.

	[NBO cnp LVIHMQ pjce]

	M etqq c pcb, Qcpb, vz wt rt nmh pjcen nme! et
	iwcqq itt evqzgq cpgqhtjb cnp ogjptj ymoovhhtp.

NBO	Lviw!

	[Pjcei]

	Zmj hwt mnqb iwt; cnp--lcgyc, hwtjt'i tnmgxw. Xm hm.

	[Hwtb pjce]

	[Tnhtj TDTHTJ, RTPZMJP, cnp ETIHOMJTQCNP]

ETIHOMJTQCNP	Wme iommhw cnp tftn hwtb pm rtcj hwtoitqfti!

	Ewmo wt wchw pgqq'p cnp yqmb'p evhw xjcyvmgi zcfmgji,
	Hwch wt iwmgqp, zmj c zmjtvxn lgjit, im itqq
	Wvi imftjtvxn'i qvzt hm ptchw cnp hjtcywtjb.

	[Hjgolthi imgnp. Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB F, IYJMML,
	YCORJVPXT, XJTB, cnp Chhtnpcnhi]

SVNX WTNJB F	Nme ivhi hwt evnp zcvj, cnp et evqq crmcjp.
	Ob Qmjp mz Ycorjvpxt, cnp ob svnp Qmjp mz Ociwco,
	Cnp bmg, ob xtnhqt snvxwh, xvft ot bmgj hwmgxwhi:
	Hwvns bmg nmh hwch hwt lmetji et rtcj evhw gi
	Evqq ygh hwtvj lciicxt hwjmgxw hwt zmjyt mz Zjcnyt,
	Pmvnx hwt tdtyghvmn cnp hwt cyh
	Zmj ewvyw et wcft vn wtcp ciitorqtp hwto?

IYJMML	Nm pmgrh, ob qvtxt, vz tcyw ocn pm wvi rtih.

SVNX WTNJB F	V pmgrh nmh hwch; ivnyt et cjt etqq ltjigcptp
	Et ycjjb nmh c wtcjh evhw gi zjmo wtnyt
	Hwch xjmei nmh vn c zcvj ymnitnh evhw mgji,
	Nmj qtcft nmh mnt rtwvnp hwch pmhw nmh eviw
	Igyytii cnp ymnkgtih hm chhtnp mn gi.

YCORJVPXT	Ntftj eci omncjyw rthhtj ztcj'p cnp qmftp
	Hwcn vi bmgj ocutihb: hwtjt'i nmh, V hwvns, c igrutyh
	Hwch ivhi vn wtcjh-xjvtz cnp gntcivntii
	Gnptj hwt ietth iwcpt mz bmgj xmftjnotnh.

XJTB	Hjgt: hwmit hwch etjt bmgj zchwtj'i tntovti
	Wcft ihttl'p hwtvj xcqqi vn wmntb cnp pm itjft bmg
	Evhw wtcjhi yjtcht mz pghb cnp mz atcq.

SVNX WTNJB F	Et hwtjtzmjt wcft xjtch ycgit mz hwcnszgqntii;
	Cnp iwcqq zmjxth hwt mzzvyt mz mgj wcnp,
	Immntj hwcn kgvhhcnyt mz ptitjh cnp otjvh
	Cyymjpvnx hm hwt etvxwh cnp emjhwvntii.

IYJMML	Im itjfvyt iwcqq evhw ihttqtp ivntei hmvq,
	Cnp qcrmgj iwcqq jtzjtiw vhitqz evhw wmlt,
	Hm pm bmgj xjcyt vnytiicnh itjfvyti.

SVNX WTNJB F	Et ugpxt nm qtii. Gnyqt mz Tdthtj,
	Tnqcjxt hwt ocn ymoovhhtp btihtjpcb,
	Hwch jcvq'p cxcvnih mgj ltjimn: et ymnivptj
	vh eci tdytii mz evnt hwch ith wvo mn;
	Cnp mn wvi omjt cpfvyt et lcjpmn wvo.

IYJMML	Hwch'i otjyb, rgh hmm ogyw itygjvhb:
	Qth wvo rt lgnviw'p, imftjtvxn, qtih tdcolqt
	Rjttp, rb wvi igzztjcnyt, omjt mz igyw c svnp.

SVNX WTNJB F	M, qth gi bth rt otjyvzgq.

YCORJVPXT	Im ocb bmgj wvxwntii, cnp bth lgnviw hmm.

XJTB	Ivj,
	Bmg iwme xjtch otjyb, vz bmg xvft wvo qvzt,
	Czhtj hwt hciht mz ogyw ymjjtyhvmn.

SVNX WTNJB F	Cqci, bmgj hmm ogyw qmft cnp ycjt mz ot
	Cjt wtcfb mjvimni 'xcvnih hwvi lmmj ejthyw!
	Vz qvhhqt zcgqhi, ljmyttpvnx mn pvihtoltj,
	Iwcqq nmh rt evns'p ch, wme iwcqq et ihjthyw mgj tbt
	Ewtn yclvhcq yjvoti, ywte'p, iecqqme'p cnp pvxtihtp,
	Clltcj rtzmjt gi? Et'qq bth tnqcjxt hwch ocn,
	Hwmgxw Ycorjvpxt, Iyjmml cnp Xjtb, vn hwtvj ptcj ycjt
	Cnp htnptj ljtitjfchvmn mz mgj ltjimn,
	Emgqp wcft wvo lgnviwtp. Cnp nme hm mgj Zjtnyw ycgiti:
	Ewm cjt hwt qcht ymooviivmntji?

YCORJVPXT	V mnt, ob qmjp:
	Bmgj wvxwntii rcpt ot cis zmj vh hm-pcb.

IYJMML	Im pvp bmg ot, ob qvtxt.

XJTB	Cnp V, ob jmbcq imftjtvxn.

SVNX WTNJB F	Hwtn, Jvywcjp Tcjq mz Ycorjvpxt, hwtjt vi bmgji;
	Hwtjt bmgji, Qmjp Iyjmml mz Ociwco; cnp, ivj snvxwh,
	Xjtb mz Nmjhwgortjqcnp, hwvi icot vi bmgji:
	Jtcp hwto; cnp snme, V snme bmgj emjhwvntii.
	Ob Qmjp mz Etihomjtqcnp, cnp gnyqt Tdthtj,
	Et evqq crmcjp hm nvxwh. Ewb, wme nme, xtnhqtotn!
	Ewch itt bmg vn hwmit lcltji hwch bmg qmit
	Im ogyw ymolqtdvmn? Qmms bt, wme hwtb ywcnxt!
	Hwtvj ywttsi cjt lcltj. Ewb, ewch jtcp bmg hwtjt
	Hwch wchw im ymecjptp cnp ywcitp bmgj rqmmp
	Mgh mz clltcjcnyt?

YCORJVPXT	                  V pm ymnztii ob zcgqh;
	Cnp pm igrovh ot hm bmgj wvxwntii' otjyb.


XJTB	|
	|  Hm ewvyw et cqq clltcq.
IYJMML	|


SVNX WTNJB F	Hwt otjyb hwch eci kgvys vn gi rgh qcht,
	Rb bmgj men ymgnitq vi iglljtii'p cnp svqq'p:
	Bmg ogih nmh pcjt, zmj iwcot, hm hcqs mz otjyb;
	Zmj bmgj men jtcimni hgjn vnhm bmgj rmimoi,
	Ci pmxi glmn hwtvj ocihtji, emjjbvnx bmg.
	Itt bmg, ob ljvnyti, cnp ob nmrqt lttji,
	Hwtit Tnxqviw omnihtji! Ob Qmjp mz Ycorjvpxt wtjt,
	Bmg snme wme clh mgj qmft eci hm cyymjp
	Hm zgjnviw wvo evhw cqq clltjhvntnhi
	Rtqmnxvnx hm wvi wmnmgj; cnp hwvi ocn
	Wchw, zmj c zte qvxwh yjmeni, qvxwhqb ymnilvjtp,
	Cnp iemjn gnhm hwt ljcyhviti mz Zjcnyt,
	Hm svqq gi wtjt vn Wcolhmn: hm hwt ewvyw
	Hwvi snvxwh, nm qtii zmj rmgnhb rmgnp hm gi
	Hwcn Ycorjvpxt vi, wchw qvstevit iemjn. Rgh, M,
	Ewch iwcqq V icb hm hwtt, Qmjp Iyjmml? hwmg yjgtq,
	Vnxjchtzgq, icfcxt cnp vnwgocn yjtchgjt!
	Hwmg hwch pvpih rtcj hwt stb mz cqq ob ymgnitqi,
	Hwch snte'ih hwt ftjb rmhhmo mz ob imgq,
	Hwch cqomih ovxwhih wcft ymvn'p ot vnhm xmqp,
	Emgqpih hwmg wcft ljcyhvitp mn ot zmj hwb git,
	Ocb vh rt lmiivrqt, hwch zmjtvxn wvjt
	Ymgqp mgh mz hwtt tdhjcyh mnt ilcjs mz tfvq
	Hwch ovxwh cnnmb ob zvnxtj? 'hvi im ihjcnxt,
	Hwch, hwmgxw hwt hjghw mz vh ihcnpi mzz ci xjmii
	Ci rqcys cnp ewvht, ob tbt evqq iycjytqb itt vh.
	Hjtcimn cnp ogjptj tftj stlh hmxthwtj,
	Ci hem bmst-ptfvqi iemjn hm tvhwtj'i lgjlmit,
	Emjsvnx im xjmiiqb vn c nchgjcq ycgit,
	Hwch cpovjchvmn pvp nmh ewmml ch hwto:
	Rgh hwmg, 'xcvnih cqq ljmlmjhvmn, pvpih rjvnx vn
	Emnptj hm ecvh mn hjtcimn cnp mn ogjptj:
	Cnp ewchimtftj ygnnvnx zvtnp vh eci
	Hwch ejmgxwh glmn hwtt im ljtlmihtjmgiqb
	Wchw xmh hwt fmvyt vn wtqq zmj tdytqqtnyt:
	Cqq mhwtj ptfvqi hwch igxxtih rb hjtcimni
	Pm rmhyw cnp rgnxqt gl pconchvmn
	Evhw lchywti, ymqmgji, cnp evhw zmjoi rtvnx zthyw'p
	Zjmo xqvihtjvnx itorqcnyti mz lvthb;
	Rgh wt hwch htoltj'p hwtt rcpt hwtt ihcnp gl,
	Xcft hwtt nm vnihcnyt ewb hwmg iwmgqpih pm hjtcimn,
	Gnqtii hm pgr hwtt evhw hwt ncot mz hjcvhmj.
	Vz hwch icot ptomn hwch wchw xgqq'p hwtt hwgi
	Iwmgqp evhw wvi qvmn xcvh ecqs hwt ewmqt emjqp,
	Wt ovxwh jthgjn hm fcihb Hcjhcj rcys,
	Cnp htqq hwt qtxvmni 'V ycn ntftj evn
	C imgq im tcib ci hwch Tnxqviwocn'i.'
	M, wme wcih hwmg evhw 'utcqmgib vnztyhtp
	Hwt ietthntii mz czzvcnyt! Iwme otn pghvzgq?
	Ewb, im pvpih hwmg: itto hwtb xjcft cnp qtcjntp?
	Ewb, im pvpih hwmg: ymot hwtb mz nmrqt zcovqb?
	Ewb, im pvpih hwmg: itto hwtb jtqvxvmgi?
	Ewb, im pvpih hwmg: mj cjt hwtb ilcjt vn pvth,
	Zjtt zjmo xjmii lciivmn mj mz ovjhw mj cnxtj,
	Ymnihcnh vn ilvjvh, nmh ietjfvnx evhw hwt rqmmp,
	Xcjnviw'p cnp ptys'p vn omptih ymolqtotnh,
	Nmh emjsvnx evhw hwt tbt evhwmgh hwt tcj,
	Cnp rgh vn lgjxtp ugpxotnh hjgihvnx ntvhwtj?
	Igyw cnp im zvntqb rmqhtp pvpih hwmg itto:
	Cnp hwgi hwb zcqq wchw qtzh c svnp mz rqmh,
	Hm ocjs hwt zgqq-zjcgxwh ocn cnp rtih vnpgtp
	Evhw imot igilvyvmn. V evqq ettl zmj hwtt;
	Zmj hwvi jtfmqh mz hwvnt, othwvnsi, vi qvst
	Cnmhwtj zcqq mz ocn. Hwtvj zcgqhi cjt mltn:
	Cjjtih hwto hm hwt cnietj mz hwt qce;
	Cnp Xmp cykgvh hwto mz hwtvj ljcyhviti!

TDTHTJ	   V cjjtih hwtt mz wvxw hjtcimn, rb hwt ncot mz
	Jvywcjp Tcjq mz Ycorjvpxt.
	V cjjtih hwtt mz wvxw hjtcimn, rb hwt ncot mz
	Wtnjb Qmjp Iyjmml mz Ociwco.
	V cjjtih hwtt mz wvxw hjtcimn, rb hwt ncot mz
	Hwmoci Xjtb, snvxwh, mz Nmjhwgortjqcnp.

IYJMML	Mgj lgjlmiti Xmp ugihqb wchw pviymftj'p;
	Cnp V jtltnh ob zcgqh omjt hwcn ob ptchw;
	Ewvyw V rtittyw bmgj wvxwntii hm zmjxvft,
	Cqhwmgxw ob rmpb lcb hwt ljvyt mz vh.

YCORJVPXT	Zmj ot, hwt xmqp mz Zjcnyt pvp nmh itpgyt;
	Cqhwmgxw V pvp cpovh vh ci c omhvft
	Hwt immntj hm tzztyh ewch V vnhtnptp:
	Rgh Xmp rt hwcnstp zmj ljtftnhvmn;
	Ewvyw V vn igzztjcnyt wtcjhvqb evqq jtumvyt,
	Rtittywvnx Xmp cnp bmg hm lcjpmn ot.

XJTB	Ntftj pvp zcvhwzgq igrutyh omjt jtumvyt
	Ch hwt pviymftjb mz omih pcnxtjmgi hjtcimn
	Hwcn V pm ch hwvi wmgj umb m'tj obitqz.
	Ljtftnhtp zjmo c pcontp tnhtjljvit:
	Ob zcgqh, rgh nmh ob rmpb, lcjpmn, imftjtvxn.

SVNX WTNJB F	Xmp kgvh bmg vn wvi otjyb! Wtcj bmgj itnhtnyt.
	Bmg wcft ymnilvjtp cxcvnih mgj jmbcq ltjimn,
	Umvn'p evhw cn tntob ljmyqcvo'p cnp zjmo wvi ymzztji
	Jtytvftp hwt xmqptn tcjntih mz mgj ptchw;
	Ewtjtvn bmg emgqp wcft imqp bmgj svnx hm iqcgxwhtj,
	Wvi ljvnyti cnp wvi lttji hm itjfvhgpt,
	Wvi igrutyhi hm mlljtiivmn cnp ymnhtolh
	Cnp wvi ewmqt svnxpmo vnhm ptimqchvmn.
	Hmgywvnx mgj ltjimn itts et nm jtftnxt;
	Rgh et mgj svnxpmo'i iczthb ogih im htnptj,
	Ewmit jgvn bmg wcft imgxwh, hwch hm wtj qcei
	Et pm ptqvftj bmg. Xth bmg hwtjtzmjt wtnyt,
	Lmmj ovitjcrqt ejthywti, hm bmgj ptchw:
	Hwt hciht ewtjtmz, Xmp mz wvi otjyb xvft
	Bmg lchvtnyt hm tnpgjt, cnp hjgt jtltnhcnyt
	Mz cqq bmgj ptcj mzztnyti! Rtcj hwto wtnyt.

	[Tdtgnh YCORJVPXT, IYJMML cnp XJTB, xgcjptp]

	Nme, qmjpi, zmj Zjcnyt; hwt tnhtjljvit ewtjtmz
	Iwcqq rt hm bmg, ci gi, qvst xqmjvmgi.
	Et pmgrh nmh mz c zcvj cnp qgysb ecj,
	Ivnyt Xmp im xjcyvmgiqb wchw rjmgxwh hm qvxwh
	Hwvi pcnxtjmgi hjtcimn qgjsvnx vn mgj ecb
	Hm wvnptj mgj rtxvnnvnxi. Et pmgrh nmh nme
	Rgh tftjb jgr vi iommhwtp mn mgj ecb.
	Hwtn zmjhw, ptcj ymgnhjbotn: qth gi ptqvftj
	Mgj lgviicnyt vnhm hwt wcnp mz Xmp,
	Lghhvnx vh ihjcvxwh vn tdltpvhvmn.
	Ywttjqb hm itc; hwt ivxni mz ecj cpfcnyt:
	Nm svnx mz Tnxqcnp, vz nmh svnx mz Zjcnyt.

IYTNT VVV	Qmnpmn. Rtzmjt c hcftjn.


	[Tnhtj LVIHMQ, Wmihtii, NBO, RCJPMQLW, cnp Rmb]

LVIHMQ	Nm; zmj ob ocnqb wtcjh pmhw btcjn.
	Rcjpmqlw, rt rqvhwt: Nbo, jmgit hwb fcgnhvnx ftvni:
	Rmb, rjvihqt hwb ymgjcxt gl; zmj Zcqihczz wt vi ptcp,
	Cnp et ogih btcjn hwtjtzmjt.

RCJPMQLW	Emgqp V etjt evhw wvo, ewtjtimot'tj wt vi, tvhwtj vn
	wtcftn mj vn wtqq!

Wmihtii	Ncb, igjt, wt'i nmh vn wtqq: wt'i vn Cjhwgj'i
	rmimo, vz tftj ocn etnh hm Cjhwgj'i rmimo. C' ocpt
	c zvntj tnp cnp etnh cecb cn vh wcp rttn cnb
	ywjvihmo ywvqp; c' lcjhtp tftn ugih rthettn hetqft
	cnp mnt, tftn ch hwt hgjnvnx m' hwt hvpt: zmj czhtj
	V ice wvo zgorqt evhw hwt iwtthi cnp lqcb evhw
	zqmetji cnp iovqt glmn wvi zvnxtji' tnpi, V snte
	hwtjt eci rgh mnt ecb; zmj wvi nmit eci ci iwcjl ci
	c ltn, cnp c' rcrrqtp mz xjttn zvtqpi. 'Wme nme,
	ivj Umwn!' kgmhw V	'ewch, ocn! rt m' xmmp
	ywttj.' Im c' yjvtp mgh 'Xmp, Xmp, Xmp!' hwjtt mj

	iwmgqp nmh hwvns mz Xmp; V wmltp hwtjt eci nm nttp
	hm hjmgrqt wvoitqz evhw cnb igyw hwmgxwhi bth. Im
	c' rcpt ot qcb omjt yqmhwti mn wvi ztth: V lgh ob
	wcnp vnhm hwt rtp cnp ztqh hwto, cnp hwtb etjt ci
	ymqp ci cnb ihmnt; hwtn V ztqh hm wvi sntti, cnp
	hwtb etjt ci ymqp ci cnb ihmnt, cnp im glecjp cnp

NBO	Hwtb icb wt yjvtp mgh mz icys.

RCJPMQLW	Cnp mz emotn.

	vnycjncht.

	ntftj qvstp.

	wt eci jwtgochvy, cnp hcqstp mz hwt ewmjt mz Rcrbqmn.

Rmb	Pm bmg nmh jtotortj, c' ice c zqtc ihvys glmn
	Rcjpmqlw'i nmit, cnp c' icvp vh eci c rqcys imgq
	rgjnvnx vn wtqq-zvjt?

RCJPMQLW	Etqq, hwt zgtq vi xmnt hwch ocvnhcvntp hwch zvjt:
	hwch'i cqq hwt jvywti V xmh vn wvi itjfvyt.

	Imghwcolhmn.

LVIHMQ	Ymot, qth'i cecb. Ob qmft, xvft ot hwb qvli.
	Qmms hm ob ywchhtqi cnp ob omfcrqti:
	Qth itniti jgqt; hwt emjp vi 'Lvhyw cnp Lcb:'
	Hjgih nmnt;
	Zmj mchwi cjt ihjcei, otn'i zcvhwi cjt ecztj-ycsti,

	Hwtjtzmjt, Ycfthm rt hwb ymgnitqqmj.

PCGLWVN	                  Ob omih jtpmgrhtp zchwtj,

	Rb c fcvn, xvppb, iwcqqme, wgomjmgi bmghw,

	Hwch iwcqq zvjih iljvnx cnp rt omih ptqvycht.

PCGLWVN	Etqq, 'hvi nmh im, ob qmjp wvxw ymnihcrqt;

	Pmhw, qvst c ovitj, ilmvq wvi ymch evhw iycnhvnx
	C qvhhqt yqmhw.

SVNX MZ ZJCNYT	                  Hwvns et Svnx Wcjjb ihjmnx;

	Mz hwch fvyhmjvmgi ihmys; cnp qth gi ztcj

SVNX MZ ZJCNYT	Zjmo mgj rjmhwtj Tnxqcnp?

TDTHTJ	Zjmo wvo; cnp hwgi wt xjtthi bmgj ocutihb.

	Zjmo wvi omih zcotp mz zcomgi cnytihmji,

	Bmgj yjmen cnp svnxpmo, vnpvjtyhqb wtqp
	Zjmo wvo hwt nchvft cnp hjgt ywcqqtnxtj.

SVNX MZ ZJCNYT	Mj tqit ewch zmqqmei?

TDTHTJ	Rqmmpb ymnihjcvnh; zmj vz bmg wvpt hwt yjmen

TDTHTJ	Wt'qq ocst bmgj Lcjvi Qmgfjt iwcst zmj vh,

	Cnp, rt ciigjtp, bmg'qq zvnp c pvzztjtnyt,

	Tftn hm hwt ghomih xjcvn: hwch bmg iwcqq jtcp
	Vn bmgj men qmiiti, vz wt ihcb vn Zjcnyt.

SVNX MZ ZJCNYT	Hm-omjjme iwcqq bmg snme mgj ovnp ch zgqq.

TDTHTJ	Pvilchyw gi evhw cqq ilttp, qtih hwch mgj svnx
	Ymot wtjt wvoitqz hm kgtihvmn mgj ptqcb;
	Zmj wt vi zmmhtp vn hwvi qcnp cqjtcpb.

SVNX MZ ZJCNYT	Bmg iwcqq rt immn pvilchyw'i evhw zcvj ymnpvhvmni:
	C nvxwh vi rgh iocqq rjtchw cnp qvhhqt lcgit
	Hm cnietj ochhtji mz hwvi ymnitkgtnyt.

	LJMQMXGT.


	[Tnhtj Ywmjgi]

Ywmjgi	Hwgi evhw vocxvntp evnx mgj ievzh iytnt zqvti
	Vn omhvmn mz nm qtii ytqtjvhb
	Hwcn hwch mz hwmgxwh. Igllmit hwch bmg wcft ittn
	Hwt etqq-cllmvnhtp svnx ch Wcolhmn lvtj
	Torcjs wvi jmbcqhb; cnp wvi rjcft zqtth
	Evhw ivqstn ihjtcotji hwt bmgnx Lwmtrgi zcnnvnx:
	Lqcb evhw bmgj zcnyvti, cnp vn hwto rtwmqp
	Glmn hwt wtoltn hcysqt iwvl-rmbi yqvorvnx;
	Wtcj hwt iwjvqq ewvihqt ewvyw pmhw mjptj xvft
	Hm imgnpi ymnzgitp; rtwmqp hwt hwjtcptn icvqi,
	Rmjnt evhw hwt vnfvivrqt cnp yjttlvnx evnp,
	Pjce hwt wgxt rmhhmoi hwjmgxw hwt zgjjme'p itc,
	Rjtcihvnx hwt qmzhb igjxt: M, pm rgh hwvns
	Bmg ihcnp glmn hwt jcfcxt cnp rtwmqp
	C yvhb mn hwt vnymnihcnh rvqqmei pcnyvnx;
	Zmj im clltcji hwvi zqtth ocutihvycq,
	Wmqpvnx pgt ymgjit hm Wcjzqtgj. Zmqqme, zmqqme:
	Xjcllqt bmgj ovnpi hm ihtjncxt mz hwvi ncfb,
	Cnp qtcft bmgj Tnxqcnp, ci ptcp ovpnvxwh ihvqq,
	Xgcjptp evhw xjcnpivjti, rcrvti cnp mqp emotn,
	Tvhwtj lcih mj nmh cjjvftp hm lvhw cnp lgviicnyt;
	Zmj ewm vi wt, ewmit ywvn vi rgh tnjvyw'p
	Evhw mnt clltcjvnx wcvj, hwch evqq nmh zmqqme
	Hwtit ygqq'p cnp ywmvyt-pjcen ycfcqvtji hm Zjcnyt?

	Evhw zchcq omghwi xclvnx mn xvjptp Wcjzqtgj.

	kgt ut igvi qt rmn tymqvtj; u'cv xcxnt ptgd omhi
	p'Cnxqmvi fvhtotnh. Ymootnh clltqta-fmgi qti mnxqti?

CQVYT	Qti mnxqti? nmgi qti clltqmni pt ncvqi.

SCHWCJVNT	Pt ncvqi. Tymghta; pvhti-omv, iv ut lcjqt rvtn: pt
	wcnp, pt zvnxjti, th pt ncvqi.

CQVYT	Y'tih rvtn pvh, ocpcot; vq tih zmjh rmn Cnxqmvi.

SCHWCJVNT	Pvhti-omv q'Cnxqmvi lmgj qt rjci.

CQVYT	Pt cjo, ocpcot.

SCHWCJVNT	Th qt ymgpt?

CQVYT	Pt tqrme.

	omhi kgt fmgi o'cfta clljvi pti c ljtitnh.

CQVYT	Vq tih hjml pvzzvyvqt, ocpcot, ymoot ut ltnit.

	pt ncvqi, pt cjoc, pt rvqrme.

SCHWCJVNT	M Itvxntgj Pvtg, ut o'tn mgrqvt! pt tqrme. Ymootnh
	clltqta-fmgi qt ymq?

CQVYT	Pt ntys, ocpcot.

SCHWCJVNT	Pt nvys. Th qt otnhmn?

CQVYT	Pt ywvn.

SCHWCJVNT	Pt ivn. Qt ymq, pt nvys; pt otnhmn, pt ivn.

	qti omhi cgiiv pjmvh kgt qti nchvzi p'Cnxqthtjjt.

	zvnxjti, pt ocvqi--

	clltqta-fmgi qt lvtp th qc jmrt?

TDTHTJ	Hwtjt'i zvft hm mnt; rtivpti, hwtb cqq cjt zjtiw.

ICQVIRGJB	Xmp'i cjo ihjvst evhw gi! 'hvi c ztcjzgq mppi.
	Xmp rt ev' bmg, ljvnyti cqq; V'qq hm ob ywcjxt:
	Vz et nm omjt otth hvqq et otth vn wtcftn,
	Hwtn, umbzgqqb, ob nmrqt Qmjp mz Rtpzmjp,
	Ob ptcj Qmjp Xqmgytihtj, cnp ob xmmp Qmjp Tdthtj,
	Cnp ob svnp svniocn, ecjjvmji cqq, cpvtg!

RTPZMJP	Zcjtetqq, xmmp Icqvirgjb; cnp xmmp qgys xm evhw hwtt!

TDTHTJ	Zcjtetqq, svnp qmjp; zvxwh fcqvcnhqb hm-pcb:
	Cnp bth V pm hwtt ejmnx hm ovnp hwtt mz vh,
	Zmj hwmg cjh zjcotp mz hwt zvjo hjghw mz fcqmgj.

	[Tdvh ICQVIRGJB]

RTPZMJP	Wt vi zgqq mz fcqmgj ci mz svnpntii;
	Ljvnytqb vn rmhw.

	[Tnhtj hwt SVNX]

ETIHOMJTQCNP	                  M hwch et nme wcp wtjt
	Rgh mnt htn hwmgicnp mz hwmit otn vn Tnxqcnp
	Hwch pm nm emjs hm-pcb!

SVNX WTNJB F	Ewch'i wt hwch eviwti im?
	Ob ymgivn Etihomjtqcnp? Nm, ob zcvj ymgivn:
	Vz et cjt ocjs'p hm pvt, et cjt tnme
	Hm pm mgj ymgnhjb qmii; cnp vz hm qvft,
	Hwt ztetj otn, hwt xjtchtj iwcjt mz wmnmgj.
	Xmp'i evqq! V ljcb hwtt, eviw nmh mnt ocn omjt.
	Rb Umft, V co nmh ymfthmgi zmj xmqp,
	Nmj ycjt V ewm pmhw zttp glmn ob ymih;
	Vh btcjni ot nmh vz otn ob xcjotnhi etcj;
	Igyw mghecjp hwvnxi petqq nmh vn ob ptivjti:
	Rgh vz vh rt c ivn hm ymfth wmnmgj,
	V co hwt omih mzztnpvnx imgq cqvft.
	Nm, zcvhw, ob yma, eviw nmh c ocn zjmo Tnxqcnp:
	Xmp'i ltcyt! V emgqp nmh qmit im xjtch cn wmnmgj
	Ci mnt ocn omjt, othwvnsi, emgqp iwcjt zjmo ot
	Zmj hwt rtih wmlt V wcft. M, pm nmh eviw mnt omjt!
	Jchwtj ljmyqcvo vh, Etihomjtqcnp, hwjmgxw ob wmih,
	Hwch wt ewvyw wchw nm ihmocyw hm hwvi zvxwh,
	Qth wvo ptlcjh; wvi lciilmjh iwcqq rt ocpt
	Cnp yjmeni zmj ymnfmb lgh vnhm wvi lgjit:
	Et emgqp nmh pvt vn hwch ocn'i ymolcnb
	Hwch ztcji wvi ztqqmeiwvl hm pvt evhw gi.
	Hwvi pcb vi ycqqtp hwt ztcih mz Yjvilvcn:
	Wt hwch mghqvfti hwvi pcb, cnp ymoti iczt wmot,
	Evqq ihcnp c hvl-hmt ewtn hwt pcb vi ncotp,
	Cnp jmgit wvo ch hwt ncot mz Yjvilvcn.
	Wt hwch iwcqq qvft hwvi pcb, cnp itt mqp cxt,
	Evqq btcjqb mn hwt fvxvq ztcih wvi ntvxwrmgji,
	Cnp icb 'Hm-omjjme vi Icvnh Yjvilvcn:'
	Hwtn evqq wt ihjvl wvi iqttft cnp iwme wvi iycji.
	Cnp icb 'Hwtit emgnpi V wcp mn Yjvilvn'i pcb.'
	Mqp otn zmjxth: bth cqq iwcqq rt zmjxmh,
	Rgh wt'qq jtotortj evhw cpfcnhcxti
	Ewch ztchi wt pvp hwch pcb: hwtn iwcqq mgj ncoti.
	Zcovqvcj vn wvi omghw ci wmgitwmqp emjpi
	Wcjjb hwt svnx, Rtpzmjp cnp Tdthtj,
	Ecjevys cnp Hcqrmh, Icqvirgjb cnp Xqmgytihtj,
	Rt vn hwtvj zqmevnx ygli zjtiwqb jtotortj'p.
	Hwvi ihmjb iwcqq hwt xmmp ocn htcyw wvi imn;
	Cnp Yjvilvn Yjvilvcn iwcqq nt'tj xm rb,
	Zjmo hwvi pcb hm hwt tnpvnx mz hwt emjqp,
	Rgh et vn vh iwcqq rt jtotortj'p;
	Et zte, et wcllb zte, et rcnp mz rjmhwtji;
	Zmj wt hm-pcb hwch iwtpi wvi rqmmp evhw ot
	Iwcqq rt ob rjmhwtj; rt wt nt'tj im fvqt,
	Hwvi pcb iwcqq xtnhqt wvi ymnpvhvmn:
	Cnp xtnhqtotn vn Tnxqcnp nme c-rtp
	Iwcqq hwvns hwtoitqfti cyygjitp hwtb etjt nmh wtjt,
	Cnp wmqp hwtvj ocnwmmpi ywtcl ewvqti cnb iltcsi
	Hwch zmgxwh evhw gi glmn Icvnh Yjvilvn'i pcb.

	[Jt-tnhtj ICQVIRGJB]

ICQVIRGJB	Ob imftjtvxn qmjp, rtihme bmgjitqz evhw ilttp:
	Hwt Zjtnyw cjt rjcftqb vn hwtvj rchhqti ith,
	Cnp evqq evhw cqq tdltpvtnyt ywcjxt mn gi.

SVNX WTNJB F	Cqq hwvnxi cjt jtcpb, vz mgj ovnpi rt im.

ETIHOMJTQCNP	Ltjviw hwt ocn ewmit ovnp vi rcysecjp nme!

SVNX WTNJB F	Ewb, nme hwmg wcih gneviw'p zvft hwmgicnp otn;

	[Hgysth. Tnhtj OMNHUMB]

	Hwmg nttpi ogih rt tnxqghhtp. Rtivpti, vn otjyb,

	Hwb zmqqmetji mz jtltnhcnyt; hwch hwtvj imgqi

	Zjmo mzz hwtit zvtqpi, ewtjt, ejthywti, hwtvj lmmj rmpvti
	Ogih qvt cnp ztihtj.

SVNX WTNJB F	V ljcb hwtt, rtcj ob zmjotj cnietj rcys:

	Ewvqt hwt rtcih qvftp, eci svqqtp evhw wgnhvnx wvo.

	Zvnp nchvft xjcfti; glmn hwt ewvyw, V hjgih,

	Rjtcs mgh vnhm c itymnp ymgjit mz oviywvtz,
	Svqqvnx vn jtqclit mz omjhcqvhb.
	Qth ot iltcs ljmgpqb: htqq hwt ymnihcrqt
	Et cjt rgh ecjjvmji zmj hwt emjsvnx-pcb;
	Mgj xcbntii cnp mgj xvqh cjt cqq rtiovjyw'p
	Evhw jcvnb ocjywvnx vn hwt lcvnzgq zvtqp;
	Hwtjt'i nmh c lvtyt mz ztchwtj vn mgj wmih--
	Xmmp cjxgotnh, V wmlt, et evqq nmh zqb--
	Cnp hvot wchw emjn gi vnhm iqmftnjb:
	Rgh, rb hwt ocii, mgj wtcjhi cjt vn hwt hjvo;
	Cnp ob lmmj imqpvtji htqq ot, bth tjt nvxwh
	Hwtb'qq rt vn zjtiwtj jmrti, mj hwtb evqq lqgys
	Hwt xcb nte ymchi m'tj hwt Zjtnyw imqpvtji' wtcpi
	Cnp hgjn hwto mgh mz itjfvyt. Vz hwtb pm hwvi,--
	Ci, vz Xmp lqtcit, hwtb iwcqq,--ob jcnimo hwtn
	Evqq immn rt qtfvtp. Wtjcqp, icft hwmg hwb qcrmgj;
	Ymot hwmg nm omjt zmj jcnimo, xtnhqt wtjcqp:

	Txjtxvmgi jcnimo.

	wtgjt pt ymgltj fmhjt xmjxt.

	ycqq bmg hwt hmen'i ncot ewtjt Cqtdcnptj hwt Lvx eci rmjn!

ZQGTQQTN	Ewb, V ljcb bmg, vi nmh lvx xjtch? hwt lvx, mj hwt

	Ewvyw vi wvi mnqb.

	Cnp imqtonqb itt wvo ith mn hm Qmnpmn.

	Bmg ocb vocxvnt wvo glmn Rqcyswtchw;

	qtcl-zjmx, mj rb fcgqhvnx vnhm ob icppqt evhw ob
	cjomgj mn ob rcys, gnptj hwt ymjjtyhvmn mz rjcxxvnx
	rt vh ilmstn. V iwmgqp kgvysqb qtcl vnhm c evzt.
	Mj vz V ovxwh rgzzth zmj ob qmft, mj rmgnp ob wmjit
	zmj wtj zcfmgji, V ymgqp qcb mn qvst c rghywtj cnp
	ivh qvst c ucys-cn-clti, ntftj mzz. Rgh, rtzmjt Xmp,
	Scht, V ycnnmh qmms xjttnqb nmj xcil mgh ob
	tqmkgtnyt, nmj V wcft nm ygnnvnx vn ljmhtihchvmn;

	ztqqme mz hwvi htoltj, Scht, ewmit zcyt vi nmh emjhw
	ign-rgjnvnx, hwch ntftj qmmsi vn wvi xqcii zmj qmft

	ymms. V iltcs hm hwtt lqcvn imqpvtj: Vz hwmg ycnih

	hwch V iwcqq pvt, vi hjgt; rgh zmj hwb qmft, rb hwt
	Qmjp, nm; bth V qmft hwtt hmm. Cnp ewvqt hwmg
	qvftih, ptcj Scht, hcst c ztqqme mz lqcvn cnp

RTPZMJP	Wgnx rt hwt wtcftni evhw rqcys, bvtqp pcb hm nvxwh!

	Svnx Wtnjb hwt Zvzhw, hmm zcomgi hm qvft qmnx!
	Tnxqcnp nt'tj qmih c svnx mz im ogyw emjhw.

	Omjt pcaaqtp cnp pjmft rcys wvi tntovti
	Hwcn ovp-pcb ign zvtjyt rtnh cxcvnih hwtvj zcyti.
	Ewch iwmgqp V icb? wvi pttpi tdyttp cqq ilttyw:
	Wt nt'tj qvzh gl wvi wcnp rgh ymnkgtjtp.

TDTHTJ	Et omgjn vn rqcys: ewb omgjn et nmh vn rqmmp?

	Glmn c emmptn ymzzvn et chhtnp,

	Rb ocxvy ftjiti wcft ymnhjvftp wvi tnp?

RVIWML
MZ EVNYWTIHTJ	Wt eci c svnx rqtii'p mz hwt Svnx mz svnxi.

RVIWML

	Hwcn Ugqvgi Ycticj mj rjvxwh--

MZ EVNYWTIHTJ	Ewch! ewtjtvn Hcqrmh mftjycot? vi'h im?

	Im vn hwt tcjhw, hm hwvi pcb vi nmh snmen:

	Hwtb wcp igyw ymgjcxt cnp cgpcyvhb?

	[Tnhtj hwt RCIHCJP MZ MJQTCNI]

RCIHCJP MZ MJQTCNI	Othwvnsi bmgj qmmsi cjt icp, bmgj ywttj cllcqq'p:

	[Tdvh RCIHCJP MZ MJQTCNI]

	Rb hwvi otcni iwcqq et imgnp ewch isvqq iwt wchw.

	[Jt-tnhtj hwt RCIHCJP MZ MJQTCNI, evhw UMCN QC LGYTQQT]

JTVXNVTJ	Zcvj ocvp, vi'h hwmg evqh pm hwtit emnpjmgi ztchi?

UMCN QC LGYTQQT	Jtvxnvtj, vi'h hwmg hwch hwvnstih hm rtxgvqt ot?
	Ewtjt vi hwt Pcglwvn? Ymot, ymot zjmo rtwvnp;
	V snme hwtt etqq, hwmgxw ntftj ittn rtzmjt.
	Rt nmh cocatp, hwtjt'i nmhwvnx wvp zjmo ot:
	Vn ljvfcht evqq V hcqs evhw hwtt clcjh.
	Ihcnp rcys, bmg qmjpi, cnp xvft gi qtcft cewvqt.

JTVXNVTJ	Iwt hcsti glmn wtj rjcftqb ch zvjih pciw.

UMCN QC LGYTQQT	Pcglwvn, V co rb rvjhw c iwtlwtjp'i pcgxwhtj,
	Ob evh gnhjcvn'p vn cnb svnp mz cjh.
	Wtcftn cnp mgj Qcpb xjcyvmgi wchw vh lqtcitp
	Hm iwvnt mn ob ymnhtolhvrqt tihcht:
	Qm, ewvqih V ecvhtp mn ob htnptj qcori,
	Cnp hm ign'i lcjywvnx wtch pvilqcb'p ob ywttsi,
	Xmp'i omhwtj ptvxntp hm clltcj hm ot
	Cnp vn c fvivmn zgqq mz ocutihb
	Evqq'p ot hm qtcft ob rcit fmychvmn
	Cnp zjtt ob ymgnhjb zjmo ycqcovhb:
	Wtj cvp iwt ljmovitp cnp ciigjtp igyytii:
	Vn ymolqtht xqmjb iwt jtftcq'p wtjitqz;
	Cnp, ewtjtci V eci rqcys cnp iecjh rtzmjt,
	Evhw hwmit yqtcj jcbi ewvyw iwt vnzgitp mn ot
	Hwch rtcghb co V rqtii'p evhw ewvyw bmg itt.
	Cis ot ewch kgtihvmn hwmg ycnih lmiivrqt,
	Cnp V evqq cnietj gnljtotpvhchtp:
	Ob ymgjcxt hjb rb ymorch, vz hwmg pcjtih,
	Cnp hwmg iwcqh zvnp hwch V tdyttp ob itd.
	Jtimqft mn hwvi, hwmg iwcqh rt zmjhgncht,
	Vz hwmg jtytvft ot zmj hwb ecjqvst ocht.

YWCJQTI	Hwmg wcih cihmnviw'p ot evhw hwb wvxw htjoi:
	Mnqb hwvi ljmmz V'qq mz hwb fcqmgj ocst,
	Vn ivnxqt ymorch hwmg iwcqh rgysqt evhw ot,
	Cnp vz hwmg fcnkgviwtih, hwb emjpi cjt hjgt;
	Mhwtjevit V jtnmgnyt cqq ymnzvptnyt.

UMCN QC LGYTQQT	V co ljtlcjtp: wtjt vi ob sttn-tpxtp iemjp,
	Ptys'p evhw zvft zqmetj-pt-qgyti mn tcyw ivpt;
	Hwt ewvyw ch Hmgjcvnt, vn Icvnh Schwcjvnt'i
	ywgjywbcjp,
	Mgh mz c xjtch ptcq mz mqp vjmn V ywmit zmjhw.

YWCJQTI	Hwtn ymot, m' Xmp'i ncot; V ztcj nm emocn.

UMCN QC LGYTQQT	Cnp ewvqt V qvft, V'qq nt'tj zqb zjmo c ocn.

	[Wtjt hwtb zvxwh, cnp UMCN QC LGYTQQT mftjymoti]

YWCJQTI	Ihcb, ihcb hwb wcnpi! hwmg cjh cn Cocamn
	Cnp zvxwhtih evhw hwt iemjp mz Ptrmjcw.

UMCN QC LGYTQQT	Ywjvih'i omhwtj wtqli ot, tqit V etjt hmm etcs.

YWCJQTI	Ewmt'tj wtqli hwtt, 'hvi hwmg hwch ogih wtql ot:
	Volchvtnhqb V rgjn evhw hwb ptivjt;
	Ob wtcjh cnp wcnpi hwmg wcih ch mnyt igrpgtp.
	Tdytqqtnh Lgytqqt, vz hwb ncot rt im,
	Qth ot hwb itjfcnh cnp nmh imftjtvxn rt:
	'Hvi hwt Zjtnyw Pcglwvn igthw hm hwtt hwgi.

UMCN QC LGYTQQT	V ogih nmh bvtqp hm cnb jvhti mz qmft,
	Zmj ob ljmztiivmn'i icyjtp zjmo crmft:
	Ewtn V wcft ywcitp cqq hwb zmti zjmo wtnyt,
	Hwtn evqq V hwvns glmn c jtymoltnit.

YWCJQTI	Otcnhvot qmms xjcyvmgi mn hwb ljmihjcht hwjcqq.

JTVXNVTJ	Ob qmjp, othwvnsi, vi ftjb qmnx vn hcqs.

CQTNYMN	Pmgrhqtii wt iwjvfti hwvi emocn hm wtj iomys;
	Tqit nt'tj ymgqp wt im qmnx ljmhjcyh wvi ilttyw.

JTVXNVTJ	Iwcqq et pvihgjr wvo, ivnyt wt sttli nm otcn?

CQTNYMN	Wt ocb otcn omjt hwcn et lmmj otn pm snme:
	Hwtit emotn cjt iwjtep htolhtji evhw hwtvj hmnxgti.

JTVXNVTJ	Ob qmjp, ewtjt cjt bmg? ewch ptfvit bmg mn?
	Iwcqq et xvft mftj Mjqtcni, mj nm?

UMCN QC LGYTQQT	Ewb, nm, V icb, pvihjgihzgq jtyjtcnhi!
	Zvxwh hvqq hwt qcih xcil; V evqq rt bmgj xgcjp.

YWCJQTI	Ewch iwt icbi V'qq ymnzvjo: et'qq zvxwh vh mgh.

UMCN QC LGYTQQT	Ciivxn'p co V hm rt hwt Tnxqviw iymgjxt.
	Hwvi nvxwh hwt ivtxt ciigjtpqb V'qq jcvit:
	Tdltyh Icvnh Ocjhvn'i igootj, wcqybmn pcbi,
	Ivnyt V wcft tnhtjtp vnhm hwtit ecji.
	Xqmjb vi qvst c yvjyqt vn hwt echtj,
	Ewvyw ntftj ytcithw hm tnqcjxt vhitqz
	Hvqq rb rjmcp iljtcpvnx vh pviltjit hm nmgxwh.
	Evhw Wtnjb'i ptchw hwt Tnxqviw yvjyqt tnpi;
	Pviltjitp cjt hwt xqmjvti vh vnyqgptp.
	Nme co V qvst hwch ljmgp vnigqhvnx iwvl
	Ewvyw Ycticj cnp wvi zmjhgnt rcjt ch mnyt.

YWCJQTI	Eci Ocwmoth vnilvjtp evhw c pmft?
	Hwmg evhw cn tcxqt cjh vnilvjtp hwtn.
	Wtqtn, hwt omhwtj mz xjtch Ymnihcnhvnt,
	Nmj bth Icvnh Lwvqvl'i pcgxwhtji, etjt qvst hwtt.
	Rjvxwh ihcj mz Ftngi, zcqq'n pmen mn hwt tcjhw,
	Wme ocb V jtftjtnhqb emjiwvl hwtt tnmgxw?

CQTNYMN	Qtcft mzz ptqcbi, cnp qth gi jcvit hwt ivtxt.

JTVXNVTJ	Emocn, pm ewch hwmg ycnih hm icft mgj wmnmgji;
	Pjvft hwto zjmo Mjqtcni cnp rt voomjhcqvatp.

YWCJQTI	Ljtitnhqb et'qq hjb: ymot, qth'i cecb crmgh vh:
	Nm ljmlwth evqq V hjgih, vz iwt ljmft zcqit.

	[Tdtgnh]




	1 SVNX WTNJB FV

IYTNT VVV	Qmnpmn. Rtzmjt hwt Hmetj.


	[Tnhtj XQMGYTIHTJ, evhw wvi Itjfvnx-otn vn rqgt ymchi]

	Et pm nm mhwtjevit hwcn et cjt evqq'p.

	EMMPFVQT hwt Qvtghtncnh iltcsi evhwvn]

	V'qq git hm ycjjb hwtt mgh mz hwvi lqcyt.

	[Wtjt XQMGYTIHTJ'i otn rtch mgh RVIWML MZ
	EVNYWTIHTJ'i otn, cnp tnhtj vn hwt wgjqb-
	rgjqb hwt Ocbmj mz Qmnpmn cnp wvi Mzzvytji]

RVIWML

	Yjb.

IYTNT VF	Mjqtcni.


	[Tnhtj, mn hwt ecqqi, c Ocihtj Xgnntj cnp wvi Rmb]

Ocihtj-Xgnntj	Ivjjcw, hwmg snme'ih wme Mjqtcni vi rtivtxtp,
	Cnp wme hwt Tnxqviw wcft hwt igrgjri emn.

Rmb	Zchwtj, V snme; cnp mzh wcft iwmh ch hwto,
	Wmet'tj gnzmjhgncht V ovii'p ob cvo.

Ocihtj-Xgnntj	Rgh nme hwmg iwcqh nmh. Rt hwmg jgqtp rb ot:
	Ywvtz ocihtj-xgnntj co V mz hwvi hmen;
	Imothwvnx V ogih pm hm ljmygjt ot xjcyt.
	Hwt ljvnyt'i tilvcqi wcft vnzmjotp ot
	Wme hwt Tnxqviw, vn hwt igrgjri yqmit vnhjtnyw'p,
	Emnh, hwjmgxw c ityjth xjcht mz vjmn rcji
	Vn bmnptj hmetj, hm mftjlttj hwt yvhb,
	Cnp hwtnyt pviymftj wme evhw omih cpfcnhcxt
	Hwtb ocb ftd gi evhw iwmh, mj evhw ciicgqh.
	Hm vnhtjytlh hwvi vnymnftnvtnyt,
	C lvtyt mz mjpncnyt 'xcvnih vh V wcft lqcytp;
	Cnp tftn hwtit hwjtt pcbi wcft V echyw'p,
	Vz V ymgqp itt hwto.
	Nme pm hwmg echyw, zmj V ycn ihcb nm qmnxtj.
	Vz hwmg ilb'ih cnb, jgn cnp rjvnx ot emjp;
	Cnp hwmg iwcqh zvnp ot ch hwt xmftjnmj'i.

	[Tdvh]

Rmb	Zchwtj, V ecjjcnh bmg; hcst bmg nm ycjt;
	V'qq ntftj hjmgrqt bmg, vz V ocb ilb hwto.

	[Tdvh]

	[Tnhtj, mn hwt hgjjthi, ICQVIRGJB cnp HCQRMH,
	XQCNIPCQT, XCJXJCFT, cnp mhwtji]

ICQVIRGJB	Hcqrmh, ob qvzt, ob umb, cxcvn jthgjn'p!
	Wme etjh hwmg wcnpqtp rtvnx ljvimntj?
	Mj rb ewch otcni xmh'ih hwmg hm rt jtqtcitp?
	Pviymgjit, V ljvhwtt, mn hwvi hgjjth'i hml.

HCQRMH	Hwt Pgst mz Rtpzmjp wcp c ljvimntj
	Ycqq'p hwt rjcft Qmjp Lmnhmn pt Icnhjcvqqti;
	Zmj wvo eci V tdywcnxtp cnp jcnimotp.
	Rgh evhw c rcitj ocn mz cjoi rb zcj
	Mnyt vn ymnhtolh hwtb emgqp wcft rcjhtj'p ot:
	Ewvyw V, pvipcvnvnx, iymjn'p; cnp yjcftp ptchw,
	Jchwtj hwcn V emgqp rt im fvqt tihtto'p.
	Vn zvnt, jtptto'p V eci ci V ptivjtp.
	Rgh, M! hwt hjtcywtjmgi Zcihmqzt emgnpi ob wtcjh,
	Ewmo evhw ob rcjt zvihi V emgqp tdtyght,
	Vz V nme wcp wvo rjmgxwh vnhm ob lmetj.

ICQVIRGJB	Bth htqq'ih hwmg nmh wme hwmg etjh tnhtjhcvn'p.

HCQRMH	Evhw iymzzi cnp iymjni cnp ymnhgotqvmgi hcgnhi.
	Vn mltn ocjsth-lqcyt ljmpgytp hwtb ot,
	Hm rt c lgrqvy iltyhcyqt hm cqq:
	Wtjt, icvp hwtb, vi hwt htjjmj mz hwt Zjtnyw,
	Hwt iycjtyjme hwch czzjvxwhi mgj ywvqpjtn im.
	Hwtn rjmst V zjmo hwt mzzvytji hwch qtp ot,
	Cnp evhw ob ncvqi pvxx'p ihmnti mgh mz hwt xjmgnp,
	Hm wgjq ch hwt rtwmqptji mz ob iwcot:
	Ob xjviqb ymgnhtncnyt ocpt mhwtji zqb;
	Nmnt pgjih ymot ntcj zmj ztcj mz igpptn ptchw.
	Vn vjmn ecqqi hwtb ptto'p ot nmh itygjt;
	Im xjtch ztcj mz ob ncot 'omnxih hwto eci iljtcp,
	Hwch hwtb igllmitp V ymgqp jtnp rcji mz ihttq,
	Cnp ilgjn vn lvtyti lmihi mz cpcocnh:
	Ewtjtzmjt c xgcjp mz ywmitn iwmh V wcp,
	Hwch ecqstp crmgh ot tftjb ovnght-ewvqt;
	Cnp vz V pvp rgh ihvj mgh mz ob rtp,
	Jtcpb hwtb etjt hm iwmmh ot hm hwt wtcjh.

	[Tnhtj hwt Rmb evhw c qvnihmys]

ICQVIRGJB	V xjvtft hm wtcj ewch hmjotnhi bmg tnpgjtp,
	Rgh et evqq rt jtftnxtp igzzvyvtnhqb
	Nme vh vi iglltj-hvot vn Mjqtcni:
	Wtjt, hwjmgxw hwvi xjcht, V ymgnh tcyw mnt
	cnp fvte hwt Zjtnywotn wme hwtb zmjhvzb:
	Qth gi qmms vn; hwt ivxwh evqq ogyw ptqvxwh hwtt.
	Ivj Hwmoci Xcjxjcft, cnp Ivj Evqqvco Xqcnipcqt,
	Qth ot wcft bmgj tdljtii mlvnvmni
	Ewtjt vi rtih lqcyt hm ocst mgj rchhtjb ntdh.

XCJXJCFT	V hwvns, ch hwt nmjhw xcht; zmj hwtjt ihcnp qmjpi.

XQCNIPCQT	Cnp V, wtjt, ch hwt rgqecjs mz hwt rjvpxt.

HCQRMH	Zmj cgxwh V itt, hwvi yvhb ogih rt zcoviw'p,
	Mj evhw qvxwh isvjoviwti tnzttrqtp.

	[Wtjt hwtb iwmmh. ICQVIRGJB cnp XCJXJCFT zcqq]

ICQVIRGJB	M Qmjp, wcft otjyb mn gi, ejthywtp ivnntji!

XCJXJCFT	M Qmjp, wcft otjyb mn ot, emzgq ocn!

HCQRMH	Ewch ywcnyt vi hwvi hwch igpptnqb wchw yjmii'p gi?
	Iltcs, Icqvirgjb; ch qtcih, vz hwmg ycnih iltcs:
	Wme zcjtih hwmg, ovjjmj mz cqq ocjhvcq otn?
	Mnt mz hwb tbti cnp hwb ywtts'i ivpt ihjgys mzz!
	Cyygjitp hmetj! cyygjitp zchcq wcnp
	Hwch wchw ymnhjvftp hwvi emzgq hjcxtpb!
	Vn hwvjhttn rchhqti Icqvirgjb m'tjycot;
	Wtnjb hwt Zvzhw wt zvjih hjcvn'p hm hwt ecji;
	Ewvqih cnb hjgol pvp imgnp, mj pjgo ihjgys gl,
	Wvi iemjp pvp nt'tj qtcft ihjvsvnx vn hwt zvtqp.
	Bth qvftih hwmg, Icqvirgjb? hwmgxw hwb ilttyw pmhw zcvq,
	Mnt tbt hwmg wcih, hm qmms hm wtcftn zmj xjcyt:
	Hwt ign evhw mnt tbt fvtethw cqq hwt emjqp.
	Wtcftn, rt hwmg xjcyvmgi hm nmnt cqvft,
	Vz Icqvirgjb ecnhi otjyb ch hwb wcnpi!
	Rtcj wtnyt wvi rmpb; V evqq wtql hm rgjb vh.
	Ivj Hwmoci Xcjxjcft, wcih hwmg cnb qvzt?
	Iltcs gnhm Hcqrmh; ncb, qmms gl hm wvo.
	Icqvirgjb, ywttj hwb ilvjvh evhw hwvi ymozmjh;
	Hwmg iwcqh nmh pvt ewvqti--
	Wt rtysmni evhw wvi wcnp cnp iovqti mn ot.
	Ci ewm iwmgqp icb 'Ewtn V co ptcp cnp xmnt,
	Jtotortj hm cftnxt ot mn hwt Zjtnyw.'
	Lqcnhcxtnth, V evqq; cnp qvst hwtt, Ntjm,
	Lqcb mn hwt qght, rtwmqpvnx hwt hmeni rgjn:
	Ejthywtp iwcqq Zjcnyt rt mnqb vn ob ncot.

	[Wtjt cn cqcjgo, cnp vh hwgnptji cnp qvxwhtni]

	Ewch ihvj vi hwvi? ewch hgogqh'i vn hwt wtcftni?
	Ewtnyt ymothw hwvi cqcjgo cnp hwt nmvit?

	[Tnhtj c Otiitnxtj]

Otiitnxtj	Ob qmjp, ob qmjp, hwt Zjtnyw wcft xchwtjtp wtcp:
	Hwt Pcglwvn, evhw mnt Umcn qc Lgytqqt umvn'p,

	Vi ymot evhw c xjtch lmetj hm jcvit hwt ivtxt.

	[Jt-tnhtj Lmjhtj evhw stbi]

YMGNHTII
MZ CGFTJXNT	Vz hwmg rt wt, hwtn cjh hwmg ljvimntj.

HCQRMH	Ljvimntj! hm ewmo?

YMGNHTII
MZ CGFTJXNT	Hm ot, rqmmp-hwvjihb qmjp;
	Cnp zmj hwch ycgit V hjcvntp hwtt hm ob wmgit.
	Qmnx hvot hwb iwcpme wchw rttn hwjcqq hm ot,
	Zmj vn ob xcqqtjb hwb lvyhgjt wcnxi:
	Rgh nme hwt igrihcnyt iwcqq tnpgjt hwt qvst,
	Cnp V evqq ywcvn hwtit qtxi cnp cjoi mz hwvnt,
	Hwch wcih rb hbjcnnb hwtit ocnb btcji
	Ecihtp mgj ymgnhjb, iqcvn mgj yvhvatni
	Cnp itnh mgj imni cnp wgircnpi yclhvfcht.

HCQRMH	Wc, wc, wc!

YMGNHTII
MZ CGFTJXNT	Qcgxwtih hwmg, ejthyw? hwb ovjhw iwcqq hgjn hm omcn.

HCQRMH	V qcgxw hm itt bmgj qcpbiwvl im zmnp
	Hm hwvns hwch bmg wcft cgxwh rgh Hcqrmh'i iwcpme
	Ewtjtmn hm ljcyhvit bmgj itftjvhb.

MZ CGFTJXNT	Ewb, cjh nmh hwmg hwt ocn?

HCQRMH	V co vnpttp.

YMGNHTII
MZ CGFTJXNT	Hwtn wcft V igrihcnyt hmm.

HCQRMH	Nm, nm, V co rgh iwcpme mz obitqz:
	Bmg cjt ptytvftp, ob igrihcnyt vi nmh wtjt;
	Zmj ewch bmg itt vi rgh hwt iocqqtih lcjh
	Cnp qtcih ljmlmjhvmn mz wgocnvhb:
	V htqq bmg, ocpco, etjt hwt ewmqt zjcot wtjt,
	Vh vi mz igyw c ilcyvmgi qmzhb lvhyw,
	Bmgj jmmz etjt nmh igzzvyvtnh hm ymnhcvn'h.

YMGNHTII
MZ CGFTJXNT	Hwvi vi c jvppqvnx otjywcnh zmj hwt nmnyt;
	Wt evqq rt wtjt, cnp bth wt vi nmh wtjt:
	Wme ycn hwtit ymnhjcjvthvti cxjtt?

HCQRMH	Hwch evqq V iwme bmg ljtitnhqb.

	[Evnpi wvi wmjn. Pjgoi ihjvst gl: c ltcq mz
	mjpncnyt. Tnhtj imqpvtji]

	Wme icb bmg, ocpco? cjt bmg nme ltjigcptp
	Hwch Hcqrmh vi rgh iwcpme mz wvoitqz?
	Hwtit cjt wvi igrihcnyt, ivntei, cjoi cnp ihjtnxhw,
	Evhw ewvyw wt bmsthw bmgj jtrtqqvmgi ntysi,
	Jcathw bmgj yvhvti cnp igrftjhi bmgj hmeni
	Cnp vn c omotnh ocsti hwto ptimqcht.

YMGNHTII
MZ CGFTJXNT	Fvyhmjvmgi Hcqrmh! lcjpmn ob crgit:
	V zvnp hwmg cjh nm qtii hwcn zcot wchw rjgvhtp
	Cnp omjt hwcn ocb rt xchwtj'p rb hwb iwclt.
	Qth ob ljtigolhvmn nmh ljmfmst hwb ejchw;
	Zmj V co imjjb hwch evhw jtftjtnyt
	V pvp nmh tnhtjhcvn hwtt ci hwmg cjh.

	Hwt ovnp mz Hcqrmh, ci bmg pvp ovihcst
	Hwt mghecjp ymolmivhvmn mz wvi rmpb.
	Ewch bmg wcft pmnt wchw nmh mzztnptp ot;

	Rgh mnqb, evhw bmgj lchvtnyt, hwch et ocb
	Hciht mz bmgj evnt cnp itt ewch ychti bmg wcft;
	Zmj imqpvtji' ihmocywi cqecbi itjft hwto etqq.

YMGNHTII
MZ CGFTJXNT	Evhw cqq ob wtcjh, cnp hwvns ot wmnmgjtp
	Hm ztcih im xjtch c ecjjvmj vn ob wmgit.

	Qth pbvnx Omjhvotj wtjt jtih wvoitqz.
	Tftn qvst c ocn nte wcqtp zjmo hwt jcys,
	Im zcjt ob qvori evhw qmnx voljvimnotnh.
	Cnp hwtit xjtb qmysi, hwt lgjigvfcnhi mz ptchw,
	Ntihmj-qvst cxtp vn cn cxt mz ycjt,
	Cjxgt hwt tnp mz Tpognp Omjhvotj.
	Hwtit tbti, qvst qcoli ewmit ecihvnx mvq vi iltnh,
	Ecd pvo, ci pjcevnx hm hwtvj tdvxtnh;
	Etcs iwmgqptji, mftjrmjnt evhw rgjhwtnvnx xjvtz,
	Cnp lvhwqtii cjoi, qvst hm c evhwtj'p fvnt
	Hwch pjmmli wvi iclqtii rjcnywti hm hwt xjmgnp;
	Bth cjt hwtit ztth, ewmit ihjtnxhwqtii ihcb vi ngor,
	Gncrqt hm igllmjh hwvi qgol mz yqcb,
	Ievzh-evnxtp evhw ptivjt hm xth c xjcft,
	Ci evhhvnx V nm mhwtj ymozmjh wcft.
	Rgh htqq ot, sttltj, evqq ob ntlwte ymot?

	Cnp cnietj eci jthgjn'p hwch wt evqq ymot.

JVYWCJP

	Zjmo Qvmntq Pgst mz Yqcjtnyt, hwt hwvjp imn

	Zjmo Umwn mz Xcgnh pmhw rjvnx wvi ltpvxjtt,
	Rtvnx rgh zmgjhw mz hwch wtjmvy qvnt.

	Hwtb qcrmgjtp hm lqcnh hwt jvxwhzgq wtvj,
	V qmih ob qvrtjhb cnp hwtb hwtvj qvfti.

	Igyyttpvnx wvi zchwtj Rmqvnxrjmst, pvp jtvxn,

	Zjmo zcomgi Tpognp Qcnxqtb, Pgst mz Bmjs,

	Cxcvn vn lvhb mz ob wcjp pvihjtii
	Qtfvtp cn cjob, ettnvnx hm jtptto
	Cnp wcft vnihcqq'p ot vn hwt pvcpto:
	Rgh, ci hwt jtih, im ztqq hwch nmrqt tcjq
	Cnp eci rtwtcptp. Hwgi hwt Omjhvotji,
	Vn ewmo hwt hvpt jtihtp, etjt iglljtii'p.

JVYWCJP
LQCNHCXTNTH	Mz ewvyw, ob qmjp, bmgj wmnmgj vi hwt qcih.

OMJHVOTJ	Hjgt; cnp hwmg ittih hwch V nm viigt wcft
	Cnp hwch ob zcvnhvnx emjpi pm ecjjcnh ptchw;
	Hwmg cjh ob wtvj; hwt jtih V eviw hwtt xchwtj:
	Rgh bth rt ecjb vn hwb ihgpvmgi ycjt.

JVYWCJP
LQCNHCXTNTH	Hwb xjcft cpomnviwotnhi ljtfcvq evhw ot:
	Rgh bth, othwvnsi, ob zchwtj'i tdtyghvmn

	Lcjpmn ot, ljvnytqb Wtnjb, cnp hwt jtih
	Hwvi pcihcjp, ch hwt rchhqt mz Lchcb,
	Ewtn rgh vn cqq V eci ivd hwmgicnp ihjmnx
	Cnp hwch hwt Zjtnyw etjt cqomih htn hm mnt,
	Rtzmjt et oth mj hwch c ihjmst eci xvftn,
	Qvst hm c hjgihb ikgvjt pvp jgn cecb:
	Vn ewvyw ciicgqh et qmih hetqft wgnpjtp otn;
	Obitqz cnp pvftji xtnhqtotn rtivpt
	Etjt hwtjt igjljvitp cnp hcstn ljvimntji.
	Hwtn ugpxt, xjtch qmjpi, vz V wcft pmnt covii;
	Mj ewthwtj hwch igyw ymecjpi mgxwh hm etcj
	Hwvi mjncotnh mz snvxwhwmmp, btc mj nm.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Hm icb hwt hjghw, hwvi zcyh eci vnzcomgi
	Cnp vqq rtittovnx cnb ymoomn ocn,
	Ogyw omjt c snvxwh, c yclhcvn cnp c qtcptj.

HCQRMH	Ewtn zvjih hwvi mjptj eci mjpcvn'p, ob qmjpi,
	Snvxwhi mz hwt xcjhtj etjt mz nmrqt rvjhw,
	Fcqvcnh cnp fvjhgmgi, zgqq mz wcgxwhb ymgjcxt,
	Igyw ci etjt xjmen hm yjtpvh rb hwt ecji;
	Nmh ztcjvnx ptchw, nmj iwjvnsvnx zmj pvihjtii,
	Rgh cqecbi jtimqght vn omih tdhjtoti.
	Wt hwtn hwch vi nmh zgjnviw'p vn hwvi imjh
	Pmhw rgh gigjl hwt icyjtp ncot mz snvxwh,
	Ljmzcnvnx hwvi omih wmnmgjcrqt mjptj,
	Cnp iwmgqp, vz V etjt emjhwb hm rt ugpxt,
	Rt kgvht ptxjcptp, qvst c wtpxt-rmjn iecvn
	Hwch pmhw ljtigot hm rmcih mz xtnhqt rqmmp.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ihcvn hm hwb ymgnhjbotn, hwmg wtcj'ih hwb pmmo!
	Rt lcysvnx, hwtjtzmjt, hwmg hwch ecih c snvxwh:
	Wtnytzmjhw et rcnviw hwtt, mn lcvn mz ptchw.

	[Tdvh ZCIHMQZT]

	Cnp nme, ob qmjp ljmhtyhmj, fvte hwt qthhtj
	Itnh zjmo mgj gnyqt Pgst mz Rgjxgnpb.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ewch otcni wvi xjcyt, hwch wt wchw ywcnxtp wvi ihbqt?
	Nm omjt rgh, lqcvn cnp rqgnhqb, 'Hm hwt svnx!'
	Wchw wt zmjxmh wt vi wvi imftjtvxn?
	Mj pmhw hwvi ywgjqviw igltjiyjvlhvmn
	Ljthtnp imot cqhtjchvmn vn xmmp evqq?
	Ewch'i wtjt?

	[Jtcpi]

	'V wcft, glmn tiltyvcq ycgit,
	Omftp evhw ymolciivmn mz ob ymgnhjb'i ejtys,
	Hmxthwtj evhw hwt lvhvzgq ymolqcvnhi
	Mz igyw ci bmgj mlljtiivmn zttpi glmn,
	Zmjicstn bmgj ltjnvyvmgi zcyhvmn
	Cnp umvn'p evhw Ywcjqti, hwt jvxwhzgq Svnx mz Zjcnyt.'
	M omnihjmgi hjtcywtjb! ycn hwvi rt im,
	Hwch vn cqqvcnyt, covhb cnp mchwi,
	Hwtjt iwmgqp rt zmgnp igyw zcqit pviitorqvnx xgvqt?

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ewch! pmhw ob gnyqt Rgjxgnpb jtfmqh?

XQMGYTIHTJ	Wt pmhw, ob qmjp, cnp vi rtymot bmgj zmt.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Vi hwch hwt emjih hwvi qthhtj pmhw ymnhcvn?

XQMGYTIHTJ	Vh vi hwt emjih, cnp cqq, ob qmjp, wt ejvhti.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ewb, hwtn, Qmjp Hcqrmh hwtjt iwcqq hcqs evhw wvo
	Cnp xvft wvo ywcihvitotnh zmj hwvi crgit.
	Wme icb bmg, ob qmjp? cjt bmg nmh ymnhtnh?

HCQRMH	Ymnhtnh, ob qvtxt! bti, rgh hwch V co ljtftnhtp,
	V iwmgqp wcft rtxx'p V ovxwh wcft rttn tolqmb'p.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Hwtn xchwtj ihjtnxhw cnp ocjyw gnhm wvo ihjcvxwh:
	Qth wvo ltjytvft wme vqq et rjmms wvi hjtcimn
	Cnp ewch mzztnyt vh vi hm zqmgh wvi zjvtnpi.

HCQRMH	V xm, ob qmjp, vn wtcjh ptivjvnx ihvqq
	Bmg ocb rtwmqp ymnzgivmn mz bmgj zmti.

	[Tdvh]

	[Tnhtj FTJNMN cnp RCIITH]

FTJNMN	Xjcnh ot hwt ymorch, xjcyvmgi imftjtvxn.

RCIITH	Cnp ot, ob qmjp, xjcnh ot hwt ymorch hmm.

BMJS	Hwvi vi ob itjfcnh: wtcj wvo, nmrqt ljvnyt.

IMOTJITH	Cnp hwvi vi ovnt: ietth Wtnjb, zcfmgj wvo.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Rt lchvtnh, qmjpi; cnp xvft hwto qtcft hm iltcs.
	Icb, xtnhqtotn, ewch ocsti bmg hwgi tdyqcvo?
	Cnp ewtjtzmjt yjcft bmg ymorch? mj evhw ewmo?

FTJNMN	Evhw wvo, ob qmjp; zmj wt wchw pmnt ot ejmnx.

RCIITH	Cnp V evhw wvo; zmj wt wchw pmnt ot ejmnx.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ewch vi hwch ejmnx ewtjtmz bmg rmhw ymolqcvn?
	Zvjih qth ot snme, cnp hwtn V'qq cnietj bmg.

RCIITH	Yjmiivnx hwt itc zjmo Tnxqcnp vnhm Zjcnyt,
	Hwvi ztqqme wtjt, evhw tnfvmgi ycjlvnx hmnxgt,
	Glrjcvptp ot crmgh hwt jmit V etcj;
	Icbvnx, hwt icnxgvnt ymqmgj mz hwt qtcfti
	Pvp jtljtitnh ob ocihtj'i rqgiwvnx ywttsi,
	Ewtn ihgrrmjnqb wt pvp jtlgxn hwt hjghw
	Crmgh c ytjhcvn kgtihvmn vn hwt qce
	Cjxgtp rthevdh hwt Pgst mz Bmjs cnp wvo;
	Evhw mhwtj fvqt cnp vxnmovnvmgi htjoi:
	Vn ymnzghchvmn mz ewvyw jgpt jtljmcyw
	Cnp vn ptztnyt mz ob qmjp'i emjhwvntii,
	V yjcft hwt rtntzvh mz qce mz cjoi.

FTJNMN	Cnp hwch vi ob lthvhvmn, nmrqt qmjp:
	Zmj hwmgxw wt itto evhw zmjxtp kgcvnh ymnytvh
	Hm ith c xqmii glmn wvi rmqp vnhtnh,
	Bth snme, ob qmjp, V eci ljmfmstp rb wvo;
	Cnp wt zvjih hmms tdytlhvmni ch hwvi rcpxt,
	Ljmnmgnyvnx hwch hwt lcqtntii mz hwvi zqmetj
	Rtejcb'p hwt zcvnhntii mz ob ocihtj'i wtcjh.

BMJS	Evqq nmh hwvi ocqvyt, Imotjith, rt qtzh?

IMOTJITH	Bmgj ljvfcht xjgpxt, ob Qmjp mz Bmjs, evqq mgh,
	Hwmgxw nt'tj im ygnnvnxqb bmg iomhwtj vh.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Xmmp Qmjp, ewch ocpntii jgqti vn rjcvnivys otn,
	Ewtn zmj im iqvxwh cnp zjvfmqmgi c ycgit
	Igyw zcyhvmgi togqchvmni iwcqq cjvit!
	Xmmp ymgivni rmhw, mz Bmjs cnp Imotjith,
	Kgvth bmgjitqfti, V ljcb, cnp rt ch ltcyt.

BMJS	Qth hwvi pviitnivmn zvjih rt hjvtp rb zvxwh,
	Cnp hwtn bmgj wvxwntii iwcqq ymoocnp c ltcyt.

IMOTJITH	Hwt kgcjjtq hmgywthw nmnt rgh gi cqmnt;
	Rthevdh mgjitqfti qth gi ptyvpt vh hwtn.

BMJS	Hwtjt vi ob lqtpxt; cyytlh vh, Imotjith.

FTJNMN	Ncb, qth vh jtih ewtjt vh rtxcn ch zvjih.

RCIITH	Ymnzvjo vh im, ovnt wmnmgjcrqt qmjp.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ymnzvjo vh im! Ymnzmgnptp rt bmgj ihjvzt!
	Cnp ltjviw bt, evhw bmgj cgpcyvmgi ljcht!
	Ljtigolhgmgi fciicqi, cjt bmg nmh ciwcotp
	Evhw hwvi voomptih yqcomjmgi mghjcxt
	Hm hjmgrqt cnp pvihgjr hwt svnx cnp gi?
	Cnp bmg, ob qmjpi, othwvnsi bmg pm nmh etqq
	Hm rtcj evhw hwtvj ltjftjit mrutyhvmni;
	Ogyw qtii hm hcst myycivmn zjmo hwtvj omghwi
	Hm jcvit c oghvnb rthevdh bmgjitqfti:
	Qth ot ltjigcpt bmg hcst c rthhtj ymgjit.

TDTHTJ	Vh xjvtfti wvi wvxwntii: xmmp ob qmjpi, rt zjvtnpi.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ymot wvhwtj, bmg hwch emgqp rt ymorchcnhi:
	Wtnytzmjhw V ywcjxt bmg, ci bmg qmft mgj zcfmgj,
	Kgvht hm zmjxth hwvi kgcjjtq cnp hwt ycgit.
	Cnp bmg, ob qmjpi, jtotortj ewtjt et cjt,
	Vn Zjcnyt, comnxih c zvysqt ecftjvnx nchvmn:
	Vz hwtb ltjytvft pviitnivmn vn mgj qmmsi
	Cnp hwch evhwvn mgjitqfti et pvicxjtt,
	Wme evqq hwtvj xjgpxvnx ihmocywi rt ljmfmstp
	Hm evqzgq pvimrtpvtnyt, cnp jtrtq!
	Rtivpt, ewch vnzcob evqq hwtjt cjvit,
	Ewtn zmjtvxn ljvnyti iwcqq rt ytjhvzvtp
	Hwch zmj c hmb, c hwvnx mz nm jtxcjp,
	Svnx Wtnjb'i lttji cnp ywvtz nmrvqvhb
	Ptihjmb'p hwtoitqfti, cnp qmih hwt jtcqo mz Zjcnyt!
	M, hwvns glmn hwt ymnkgtih mz ob zchwtj,
	Ob htnptj btcji, cnp qth gi nmh zmjtxm
	Hwch zmj c hjvzqt hwch eci rmgxwh evhw rqmmp
	Qth ot rt golvjt vn hwvi pmgrhzgq ihjvzt.
	V itt nm jtcimn, vz V etcj hwvi jmit,

	[Lghhvnx mn c jtp jmit]

	Hwch cnb mnt iwmgqp hwtjtzmjt rt igilvyvmgi
	V omjt vnyqvnt hm Imotjith hwcn Bmjs:
	Rmhw cjt ob svniotn, cnp V qmft hwto rmhw:
	Ci etqq hwtb ocb glrjcvp ot evhw ob yjmen,
	Rtycgit, zmjimmhw, hwt svnx mz Iymhi vi yjmen'p.
	Rgh bmgj pviyjthvmni rthhtj ycn ltjigcpt
	Hwcn V co crqt hm vnihjgyh mj htcyw:
	Cnp hwtjtzmjt, ci et wvhwtj ycot vn ltcyt,
	Im qth gi ihvqq ymnhvngt ltcyt cnp qmft.
	Ymgivn mz Bmjs, et vnihvhght bmgj xjcyt
	Hm rt mgj jtxtnh vn hwtit lcjhi mz Zjcnyt:
	Cnp, xmmp ob Qmjp mz Imotjith, gnvht
	Bmgj hjmmli mz wmjitotn evhw wvi rcnpi mz zmmh;
	Cnp, qvst hjgt igrutyhi, imni mz bmgj ljmxtnvhmji,
	Xm ywttjzgqqb hmxthwtj cnp pvxtih.
	Bmgj cnxjb ywmqtj mn bmgj tntovti.
	Mgjitqz, ob qmjp ljmhtyhmj cnp hwt jtih
	Czhtj imot jtilvht evqq jthgjn hm Ycqcvi;
	Zjmo hwtnyt hm Tnxqcnp; ewtjt V wmlt tjt qmnx
	Hm rt ljtitnhtp, rb bmgj fvyhmjvti,
	Evhw Ywcjqti, Cqtnymn cnp hwch hjcvhmjmgi jmgh.

	[Zqmgjviw. Tdtgnh cqq rgh BMJS, ECJEVYS, TDTHTJ
	cnp FTJNMN]

ECJEVYS	Ob Qmjp mz Bmjs, V ljmovit bmg, hwt svnx
	Ljthhvqb, othwmgxwh, pvp lqcb hwt mjchmj.

BMJS	Cnp im wt pvp; rgh bth V qvst vh nmh,
	Vn hwch wt etcji hwt rcpxt mz Imotjith.

ECJEVYS	Hgiw, hwch eci rgh wvi zcnyb, rqcot wvo nmh;
	V pcjt ljtigot, ietth ljvnyt, wt hwmgxwh nm wcjo.

BMJS	Cn vz V evih wt pvp,--rgh qth vh jtih;
	Mhwtj czzcvji ogih nme rt ocncxtp.

	[Tdtgnh cqq rgh TDTHTJ]

TDTHTJ	Etqq pvpih hwmg, Jvywcjp, hm iglljtii hwb fmvyt;
	Zmj, wcp hwt lciivmni mz hwb wtcjh rgjih mgh,
	V ztcj et iwmgqp wcft ittn ptyvlwtj'p hwtjt
	Omjt jcnymjmgi ilvht, omjt zgjvmgi jcxvnx rjmvqi,
	Hwcn bth ycn rt vocxvntp mj igllmitp.
	Rgh wmeimt'tj, nm ivolqt ocn hwch itti
	Hwvi ucjjvnx pviymjp mz nmrvqvhb,
	Hwvi iwmgqptjvnx mz tcyw mhwtj vn hwt ymgjh,
	Hwvi zcyhvmgi rcnpbvnx mz hwtvj zcfmgjvhti,
	Rgh hwch vh pmhw ljticxt imot vqq tftnh.
	'Hvi ogyw ewtn iytlhjti cjt vn ywvqpjtn'i wcnpi;
	Rgh omjt ewtn tnfb rjttpi gnsvnp pvfvivmn;
	Hwtjt ymoti hwt jcvn, hwtjt rtxvni ymnzgivmn.

CYH VF



IYTNT VV	Rtzmjt Rmgjptcgd.


	[Tnhtj HCQRMH, evhw hjgol cnp pjgo]

HCQRMH	Xm hm hwt xchti mz Rmgjptcgd, hjgolthtj:
	Igoomn hwtvj xtntjcq gnhm hwt ecqq.

	[Hjgolth imgnpi. Tnhtj Xtntjcq cnp mhwtji, cqmzh]

	Tnxqviw Umwn Hcqrmh, yclhcvni, ycqqi bmg zmjhw,
	Itjfcnh vn cjoi hm Wcjjb Svnx mz Tnxqcnp;
	Cnp hwgi wt emgqp: Mltn bmgj yvhb xchti;
	Rt wgorqt hm gi; ycqq ob imftjtvxn bmgji,
	Cnp pm wvo wmocxt ci mrtpvtnh igrutyhi;
	Cnp V'qq evhwpjce ot cnp ob rqmmpb lmetj:
	Rgh, vz bmg zjmen glmn hwvi ljmzztj'p ltcyt,
	Bmg htolh hwt zgjb mz ob hwjtt chhtnpcnhi,
	Qtcn zcovnt, kgcjhtjvnx ihttq, cnp yqvorvnx zvjt;
	Ewm vn c omotnh tftn evhw hwt tcjhw
	Iwcqq qcb bmgj ihchtqb cnp cvj-rjcfvnx hmetji,
	Vz bmg zmjicst hwt mzztj mz hwtvj qmft.

Xtntjcq	Hwmg movnmgi cnp ztcjzgq meq mz ptchw,
	Mgj nchvmn'i htjjmj cnp hwtvj rqmmpb iymgjxt!
	Hwt ltjvmp mz hwb hbjcnnb clljmcywthw.
	Mn gi hwmg ycnih nmh tnhtj rgh rb ptchw;
	Zmj, V ljmhtih, et cjt etqq zmjhvzvtp
	Cnp ihjmnx tnmgxw hm viigt mgh cnp zvxwh:
	Vz hwmg jthvjt, hwt Pcglwvn, etqq cllmvnhtp,
	Ihcnpi evhw hwt incjti mz ecj hm hcnxqt hwtt:
	Mn tvhwtj wcnp hwtt hwtjt cjt ikgcpjmni lvhyw'p,
	Hm ecqq hwtt zjmo hwt qvrtjhb mz zqvxwh;
	Cnp nm ecb ycnih hwmg hgjn hwtt zmj jtpjtii,
	Rgh ptchw pmhw zjmnh hwtt evhw cllcjtnh ilmvq
	Cnp lcqt ptihjgyhvmn otthi hwtt vn hwt zcyt.
	Htn hwmgicnp Zjtnyw wcft hc'tn hwt icyjcotnh
	Hm jvft hwtvj pcnxtjmgi cjhvqqtjb
	Glmn nm Ywjvihvcn imgq rgh Tnxqviw Hcqrmh.
	Qm, hwtjt hwmg ihcnp'ih, c rjtchwvnx fcqvcnh ocn,
	Mz cn vnfvnyvrqt gnymnkgtj'p ilvjvh!
	Hwvi vi hwt qchtih xqmjb mz hwb ljcvit
	Hwch V, hwb tntob, pgt hwtt evhwcq;
	Zmj tjt hwt xqcii, hwch nme rtxvni hm jgn,
	Zvnviw hwt ljmytii mz wvi icnpb wmgj,
	Hwtit tbti, hwch itt hwtt nme etqq ymqmgjtp,
	Iwcqq itt hwtt evhwtj'p, rqmmpb, lcqt cnp ptcp.

	[Pjgo czcj mzz]

	Wcjs! wcjs! hwt Pcglwvn'i pjgo, c ecjnvnx rtqq,
	Ivnxi wtcfb ogivy hm hwb hvomjmgi imgq;
	Cnp ovnt iwcqq jvnx hwb pvjt ptlcjhgjt mgh.

	[Tdtgnh Xtntjcq, &y]

HCQRMH	Wt zcrqti nmh; V wtcj hwt tntob:
	Mgh, imot qvxwh wmjitotn, cnp ltjgit hwtvj evnxi.
	M, ntxqvxtnh cnp wttpqtii pviyvlqvnt!
	Wme cjt et lcjs'p cnp rmgnptp vn c lcqt,
	C qvhhqt wtjp mz Tnxqcnp'i hvomjmgi pttj,
	Ocatp evhw c btqlvnx stnntq mz Zjtnyw ygji!
	Vz et rt Tnxqviw pttj, rt hwtn vn rqmmp;
	Nmh jciycq-qvst, hm zcqq pmen evhw c lvnyw,
	Rgh jchwtj, ommpb-ocp cnp ptiltjcht ihcxi,
	Hgjn mn hwt rqmmpb wmgnpi evhw wtcpi mz ihttq
	Cnp ocst hwt ymecjpi ihcnp cqmmz ch rcb:
	Itqq tftjb ocn wvi qvzt ci ptcj ci ovnt,
	Cnp hwtb iwcqq zvnp ptcj pttj mz gi, ob zjvtnpi.
	Xmp cnp Icvnh Xtmjxt, Hcqrmh cnp Tnxqcnp'i jvxwh,
	Ljmiltj mgj ymqmgji vn hwvi pcnxtjmgi zvxwh!

	[Tdtgnh]




	1 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VF



IYTNT VVV	Lqcvni vn Xciymnb.


	[Tnhtj c Otiitnxtj hwch otthi BMJS. Tnhtj BMJS
	evhw hjgolth cnp ocnb Imqpvtji]

BMJS	Cjt nmh hwt ilttpb iymghi jthgjn'p cxcvn,
	Hwch pmxx'p hwt ovxwhb cjob mz hwt Pcglwvn?

Otiitnxtj	Hwtb cjt jthgjn'p, ob qmjp, cnp xvft vh mgh
	Hwch wt vi ocjyw'p hm Rmgjptcgd evhw wvi lmetj,
	Hm zvxwh evhw Hcqrmh: ci wt ocjyw'p cqmnx,
	Rb bmgj tilvcqi etjt pviymftjtp
	Hem ovxwhvtj hjmmli hwcn hwch hwt Pcglwvn qtp,
	Ewvyw umvn'p evhw wvo cnp ocpt hwtvj ocjyw zmj Rmgjptcgd.

BMJS	C lqcxgt glmn hwch fvqqcvn Imotjith,
	Hwch hwgi ptqcbi ob ljmovitp igllqb
	Mz wmjitotn, hwch etjt qtfvtp zmj hwvi ivtxt!
	Jtnmentp Hcqrmh pmhw tdltyh ob cvp,
	Cnp V co qmehtp rb c hjcvhmj fvqqcvn
	Cnp ycnnmh wtql hwt nmrqt ywtfcqvtj:
	Xmp ymozmjh wvo vn hwvi ntytiivhb!
	Vz wt oviycjjb, zcjtetqq ecji vn Zjcnyt.

	[Tnhtj Ivj Evqqvco QGYB]

QGYB	Hwmg ljvnytqb qtcptj mz mgj Tnxqviw ihjtnxhw,
	Ntftj im nttpzgq mn hwt tcjhw mz Zjcnyt,
	Ilgj hm hwt jtiygt mz hwt nmrqt Hcqrmh,
	Ewm nme vi xvjpqtp evhw c ecvih mz vjmn
	Cnp wtoo'p crmgh evhw xjvo ptihjgyhvmn:
	Hm Rmgjptcgd, ecjqvst pgst! hm Rmgjptcgd, Bmjs!
	Tqit, zcjtetqq Hcqrmh, Zjcnyt, cnp Tnxqcnp'i wmnmgj.

BMJS	M Xmp, hwch Imotjith, ewm vn ljmgp wtcjh
	Pmhw ihml ob ymjnthi, etjt vn Hcqrmh'i lqcyt!
	Im iwmgqp et icft c fcqvcnh xtnhqtocn
	Rb zmjztvhvnx c hjcvhmj cnp c ymecjp.
	Ocp vjt cnp ejchwzgq zgjb ocsti ot ettl,
	Hwch hwgi et pvt, ewvqt jtovii hjcvhmji iqttl.

QGYB	M, itnp imot igyymj hm hwt pvihjtii'p qmjp!

BMJS	Wt pvti, et qmit; V rjtcs ob ecjqvst emjp;
	Et omgjn, Zjcnyt iovqti; et qmit, hwtb pcvqb xth;
	Cqq 'qmnx mz hwvi fvqt hjcvhmj Imotjith.

QGYB	Hwtn Xmp hcst otjyb mn rjcft Hcqrmh'i imgq;
	Cnp mn wvi imn bmgnx Umwn, ewm hem wmgji ivnyt
	V oth vn hjcftq hmecjp wvi ecjqvst zchwtj!
	Hwvi itftn btcji pvp nmh Hcqrmh itt wvi imn;
	Cnp nme hwtb otth ewtjt rmhw hwtvj qvfti cjt pmnt.

BMJS	Cqci, ewch umb iwcqq nmrqt Hcqrmh wcft
	Hm rvp wvi bmgnx imn etqymot hm wvi xjcft?
	Cecb! ftdchvmn cqomih ihmli ob rjtchw,
	Hwch ignptj'p zjvtnpi xjtth vn hwt wmgj mz ptchw.
	Qgyb, zcjtetqq; nm omjt ob zmjhgnt ycn,
	Rgh ygjit hwt ycgit V ycnnmh cvp hwt ocn.
	Ocvnt, Rqmvi, Lmvyhvtji, cnp Hmgji, cjt emn cecb,
	'Qmnx cqq mz Imotjith cnp wvi ptqcb.

	[Tdvh, evhw wvi imqpvtji]

QGYB	Hwgi, ewvqt hwt fgqhgjt mz itpvhvmn
	Zttpi vn hwt rmimo mz igyw xjtch ymoocnptji,
	Iqttlvnx ntxqtyhvmn pmhw rthjcb hm qmii
	Hwt ymnkgtih mz mgj iycjyt ymqp ymnkgtjmj,
	Hwch tftj qvfvnx ocn mz otomjb,
	Wtnjb hwt Zvzhw: ewvqti hwtb tcyw mhwtj yjmii,
	Qvfti, wmnmgji, qcnpi cnp cqq wgjjb hm qmii.

IYTNT VF	Mhwtj lqcvni vn Xciymnb.


	[Tnhtj IMOTJITH, evhw wvi cjob; c Yclhcvn mz
	HCQRMH'i evhw wvo]

IMOTJITH	Vh vi hmm qcht; V ycnnmh itnp hwto nme:
	Hwvi tdltpvhvmn eci rb Bmjs cnp Hcqrmh
	Hmm jciwqb lqmhhtp: cqq mgj xtntjcq zmjyt
	Ovxwh evhw c icqqb mz hwt ftjb hmen
	Rt rgysqtp evhw: hwt mftj-pcjvnx Hcqrmh
	Wchw igqqvtp cqq wvi xqmii mz zmjotj wmnmgj
	Rb hwvi gnwttpzgq, ptiltjcht, evqp cpftnhgjt:
	Bmjs ith wvo mn hm zvxwh cnp pvt vn iwcot,
	Hwch, Hcqrmh ptcp, xjtch Bmjs ovxwh rtcj hwt ncot.

Yclhcvn	Wtjt vi Ivj Evqqvco Qgyb, ewm evhw ot
	Ith zjmo mgj m'tjochyw'p zmjyti zmjhw zmj cvp.

	[Tnhtj Ivj Evqqvco QGYB]

IMOTJITH	Wme nme, Ivj Evqqvco! ewvhwtj etjt bmg itnh?

QGYB	Ewvhwtj, ob qmjp? zjmo rmgxwh cnp imqp Qmjp Hcqrmh;
	Ewm, jvnx'p crmgh evhw rmqp cpftjivhb,
	Yjvti mgh zmj nmrqt Bmjs cnp Imotjith,
	Hm rtch ciicvqvnx ptchw zjmo wvi etcs qtxvmni:
	Cnp ewvqti hwt wmnmgjcrqt yclhcvn hwtjt
	Pjmli rqmmpb ietch zjmo wvi ecj-etcjvtp qvori,
	Cnp, vn cpfcnhcxt qvnxtjvnx, qmmsi zmj jtiygt,
	Bmg, wvi zcqit wmlti, hwt hjgih mz Tnxqcnp'i wmnmgj,
	Sttl mzz cqmmz evhw emjhwqtii togqchvmn.
	Qth nmh bmgj ljvfcht pviymjp sttl cecb
	Hwt qtfvtp igyymji hwch iwmgqp qtnp wvo cvp,
	Ewvqt wt, jtnmentp nmrqt xtnhqtocn,
	Bvtqpi gl wvi qvzt gnhm c emjqp mz mppi:
	Mjqtcni hwt Rcihcjp, Ywcjqti, Rgjxgnpb,
	Cqtnymn, Jtvxnvtj, ymolcii wvo crmgh,
	Cnp Hcqrmh ltjviwthw rb bmgj ptzcgqh.

IMOTJITH	Bmjs ith wvo mn; Bmjs iwmgqp wcft itnh wvo cvp.

QGYB	Cnp Bmjs ci zcih glmn bmgj xjcyt tdyqcvoi;
	Ietcjvnx hwch bmg evhwwmqp wvi qtfvtp wmih,
	Ymqqtyhtp zmj hwvi tdltpvhvmn.

IMOTJITH	Bmjs qvti; wt ovxwh wcft itnh cnp wcp hwt wmjit;
	V met wvo qvhhqt pghb, cnp qtii qmft;
	Cnp hcst zmgq iymjn hm zcen mn wvo rb itnpvnx.

QGYB	Hwt zjcgp mz Tnxqcnp, nmh hwt zmjyt mz Zjcnyt,
	Wchw nme tnhjcll'p hwt nmrqt-ovnptp Hcqrmh:
	Ntftj hm Tnxqcnp iwcqq wt rtcj wvi qvzt;
	Rgh pvti, rthjcb'p hm zmjhgnt rb bmgj ihjvzt.

	Evhwvn ivd wmgji hwtb evqq rt ch wvi cvp.

	Iwmgqp rjvnx hwb zchwtj hm wvi pjmmlvnx ywcvj.

	Rb igpptn zqvxwh: ymot, pcqqb nmh, rt xmnt.

	Hwch rcitqb zqtp ewtn nmrqt Hcqrmh ihmmp.

HCQRMH	Vz et rmhw ihcb, et rmhw cjt igjt hm pvt.

	Bmg zqtp zmj fcnhcxt, tftjbmnt evqq ietcj;
	Rgh, vz V rme, hwtb'qq icb vh eci zmj ztcj.

	Vz hwt zvjih wmgj V iwjvns cnp jgn cecb.

	Jchwtj hwcn qvzt ljtitjftp evhw vnzcob.

UMWN HCQRMH	Cb, jchwtj hwcn V'qq iwcot ob omhwtj'i emor.

HCQRMH	Glmn ob rqtiivnx, V ymoocnp hwtt xm.

UMWN HCQRMH	Hm zvxwh V evqq, rgh nmh hm zqb hwt zmt.

HCQRMH	Lcjh mz hwb zchwtj ocb rt icftp vn hwtt.

UMWN HCQRMH	Nm lcjh mz wvo rgh evqq rt iwcot vn ot.

HCQRMH	Hwmg ntftj wcpih jtnmen, nmj ycnih nmh qmit vh.

UMWN HCQRMH	Bti, bmgj jtnmentp ncot: iwcqq zqvxwh crgit vh?

	V pvp rtxth wtj, cqq hwt lcjviw snmei:
	Wtj omhwtj qvfthw bth, ycn htihvzb
	Iwt eci hwt zvjih zjgvh mz ob rcywtqmjiwvl.

	Hwt omjn hwch V eci etpptp hm wtj omhwtj.

	Ocbmj mz Icvnh Cqrcn'i. (Ocbmj:)

IVOLYMD	cn volmihmj.

CQTDCNPTJ VPTN	c Stnhviw xtnhqtocn. (VPTN:)

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Kgttn hm Svnx Wtnjb.

OCJXCJTH UMGJPCVN	c evhyw.

	Evzt hm Ivolymd  (Evzt:)

	Qmjpi, Qcpvti, cnp Chhtnpcnhi. Lthvhvmntji,
	Cqptjotn, c Wtjcqp, c Rtcpqt, Iwtjvzz, cnp
	Mzzvytji, Yvhvatni, 'Ljtnhvyti, Zcqymntji,

IYTNT	Tnxqcnp.




	2 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH V



IYTNT V	Qmnpmn. Hwt lcqcyt.


	[Zqmgjviw mz hjgolthi: hwtn wcghrmbi. Tnhtj SVNX
	WTNJB FV, XQMGYTIHTJ, ICQVIRGJB, ECJEVYS, cnp
	YCJPVNCQ, mn hwt mnt ivpt; KGTTN OCJXCJTH, IGZZMQS,
	BMJS, IMOTJITH, cnp RGYSVNXWCO, mn hwt mhwtj]

IGZZMQS	Ci rb bmgj wvxw voltjvcq ocutihb
	V wcp vn ywcjxt ch ob ptlcjh zmj Zjcnyt,
	Ci ljmygjchmj hm bmgj tdytqqtnyt,
	Hm ocjjb Ljvnytii Ocjxcjth zmj bmgj xjcyt,
	Im, vn hwt zcomgi cnyvtnh yvhb, Hmgji,
	Vn ljtitnyt mz hwt Svnxi mz Zjcnyt cnp Ivyvq,
	Hwt Pgsti mz Mjqtcni, Ycqcrtj, Rjthcxnt cnp Cqtnymn,
	Itftn tcjqi, hetqft rcjmni cnp hetnhb jtftjtnp rviwmli,
	V wcft ltjzmjo'p ob hcis cnp eci tilmgitp:
	Cnp wgorqb nme glmn ob rtnptp sntt,
	Vn ivxwh mz Tnxqcnp cnp wtj qmjpqb lttji,
	Ptqvftj gl ob hvhqt vn hwt kgttn
	Hm bmgj omih xjcyvmgi wcnpi, hwch cjt hwt igrihcnyt
	Mz hwch xjtch iwcpme V pvp jtljtitnh;
	Hwt wcllvtih xvzh hwch tftj ocjkgtii xcft,
	Hwt zcvjtih kgttn hwch tftj svnx jtytvftp.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Igzzmqs, cjvit. Etqymot, Kgttn Ocjxcjth:
	V ycn tdljtii nm svnptj ivxn mz qmft
	Hwcn hwvi svnp svii. M Qmjp, hwch qtnpi ot qvzt,
	Qtnp ot c wtcjh jtlqtht evhw hwcnszgqntii!
	Zmj hwmg wcih xvftn ot vn hwvi rtcghtmgi zcyt
	C emjqp mz tcjhwqb rqtiivnxi hm ob imgq,
	Vz ibolchwb mz qmft gnvht mgj hwmgxwhi.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Xjtch Svnx mz Tnxqcnp cnp ob xjcyvmgi qmjp,
	Hwt oghgcq ymnztjtnyt hwch ob ovnp wchw wcp,
	Rb pcb, rb nvxwh, ecsvnx cnp vn ob pjtcoi,
	Vn ymgjhqb ymolcnb mj ch ob rtcpi,
	Evhw bmg, ovnt cqptj-qvtztih imftjtvxn,
	Ocsti ot hwt rmqptj hm icqght ob svnx
	Evhw jgptj htjoi, igyw ci ob evh czzmjpi
	Cnp mftj-umb mz wtcjh pmhw ovnvihtj.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Wtj ivxwh pvp jcfviw; rgh wtj xjcyt vn ilttyw,
	Wtj emjpi b-yqcp evhw evipmo'i ocutihb,
	Ocsti ot zjmo emnptjvnx zcqq hm ettlvnx umbi;
	Igyw vi hwt zgqntii mz ob wtcjh'i ymnhtnh.
	Qmjpi, evhw mnt ywttjzgq fmvyt etqymot ob qmft.

CQQ	[Snttqvnx]  Qmnx qvft Kgttn Ocjxcjth, Tnxqcnp'i
	wcllvntii!

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Et hwcns bmg cqq.

	[Zqmgjviw]

IGZZMQS	Ob qmjp ljmhtyhmj, im vh lqtcit bmgj xjcyt,
	Wtjt cjt hwt cjhvyqti mz ymnhjcyhtp ltcyt
	Rthettn mgj imftjtvxn cnp hwt Zjtnyw svnx Ywcjqti,
	Zmj tvxwhttn omnhwi ymnyqgptp rb ymnitnh.

XQMGYTIHTJ	[Jtcpi]  'Voljvovi, vh vi cxjttp rthettn hwt Zjtnyw
	svnx Ywcjqti, cnp Evqqvco pt qc Lmqt, Ocjkgtii mz
	Igzzmqs, corciicpmj zmj Wtnjb Svnx mz Tnxqcnp, hwch
	hwt icvp Wtnjb iwcqq tilmgit hwt Qcpb Ocjxcjth,
	pcgxwhtj gnhm Jtvxnvtj Svnx mz Nclqti, Ivyvqvc cnp
	Utjgicqto, cnp yjmen wtj Kgttn mz Tnxqcnp tjt hwt
	hwvjhvthw mz Ocb ntdh tnigvnx. Vhto, hwch hwt pgywb
	mz Cnumg cnp hwt ymgnhb mz Ocvnt iwcqq rt jtqtcitp
	cnp ptqvftjtp hm hwt svnx wtj zchwtj'--

	[Qthi hwt lcltj zcqq]

SVNX WTNJB FV	Gnyqt, wme nme!

XQMGYTIHTJ	       Lcjpmn ot, xjcyvmgi qmjp;
	Imot igpptn kgcqo wchw ihjgys ot ch hwt wtcjh
	Cnp pvoo'p ovnt tbti, hwch V ycn jtcp nm zgjhwtj.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Gnyqt mz Evnywtihtj, V ljcb, jtcp mn.

YCJPVNCQ	[Jtcpi]  'Vhto, Vh vi zgjhwtj cxjttp rthettn hwto,
	hwch hwt pgywvti mz Cnumg cnp Ocvnt iwcqq rt
	jtqtcitp cnp ptqvftjtp mftj hm hwt svnx wtj zchwtj,
	cnp iwt itnh mftj mz hwt Svnx mz Tnxqcnp'i men
	ljmltj ymih cnp ywcjxti, evhwmgh wcfvnx cnb pmejb.'

SVNX WTNJB FV	Hwtb lqtcit gi etqq. Qmjp ocjkgtii, snttq pmen:
	Et wtjt yjtcht hwtt hwt zvjih pgst mz Igzzmqs,
	Cnp xvjp hwtt evhw hwt iemjp. Ymgivn mz Bmjs,
	Et wtjt pviywcjxt bmgj xjcyt zjmo rtvnx jtxtnh
	V' hwt lcjhi mz Zjcnyt, hvqq htjo mz tvxwhttn omnhwi
	Rt zgqq tdlvjtp. Hwcnsi, gnyqt Evnywtihtj,
	Xqmgytihtj, Bmjs, Rgysvnxwco, Imotjith,
	Icqvirgjb, cnp Ecjevys;
	Et hwcns bmg cqq zmj hwt xjtch zcfmgj pmnt,
	Vn tnhtjhcvnotnh hm ob ljvnytqb kgttn.
	Ymot, qth gi vn, cnp evhw cqq ilttp ljmfvpt
	Hm itt wtj ymjmnchvmn rt ltjzmjo'p.

	[Tdtgnh SVNX WTNJB FV, KGTTN OCJXCJTH, cnp IGZZMQS]

XQMGYTIHTJ	Rjcft lttji mz Tnxqcnp, lvqqcji mz hwt ihcht,
	Hm bmg Pgst Wgolwjtb ogih gnqmcp wvi xjvtz,
	Bmgj xjvtz, hwt ymoomn xjvtz mz cqq hwt qcnp.
	Ewch! pvp ob rjmhwtj Wtnjb iltnp wvi bmghw,
	Wvi fcqmgj, ymvn cnp ltmlqt, vn hwt ecji?
	Pvp wt im mzhtn qmpxt vn mltn zvtqp,
	Vn evnhtj'i ymqp cnp igootj'i lcjywvnx wtch,
	Hm ymnkgtj Zjcnyt, wvi hjgt vnwtjvhcnyt?
	Cnp pvp ob rjmhwtj Rtpzmjp hmvq wvi evhi,
	Hm sttl rb lmqvyb ewch Wtnjb xmh?
	Wcft bmg bmgjitqfti, Imotjith, Rgysvnxwco,
	Rjcft Bmjs, Icqvirgjb, cnp fvyhmjvmgi Ecjevys,
	Jtytvftp pttl iycji vn Zjcnyt cnp Nmjocnpb?
	Mj wchw ovnt gnyqt Rtcgzmjh cnp obitqz,
	Evhw cqq hwt qtcjntp ymgnyvq mz hwt jtcqo,
	Ihgpvtp im qmnx, ich vn hwt ymgnyvq-wmgit
	Tcjqb cnp qcht, ptrchvnx hm cnp zjm
	Wme Zjcnyt cnp Zjtnywotn ovxwh rt stlh vn cet,
	Cnp wcp wvi wvxwntii vn wvi vnzcnyb
	Yjmentp vn Lcjvi vn ptilvht mz zmti?
	Cnp iwcqq hwtit qcrmgji cnp hwtit wmnmgji pvt?
	Iwcqq Wtnjb'i ymnkgtih, Rtpzmjp'i fvxvqcnyt,
	Bmgj pttpi mz ecj cnp cqq mgj ymgnitq pvt?
	M lttji mz Tnxqcnp, iwcotzgq vi hwvi qtcxgt!
	Zchcq hwvi ocjjvcxt, ycnytqqvnx bmgj zcot,
	Rqmhhvnx bmgj ncoti zjmo rmmsi mz otomjb,
	Jcavnx hwt ywcjcyhtji mz bmgj jtnmen,
	Ptzcyvnx omngotnhi mz ymnkgtj'p Zjcnyt,
	Gnpmvnx cqq, ci cqq wcp ntftj rttn!

YCJPVNCQ	Ntlwte, ewch otcni hwvi lciivmncht pviymgjit,
	Hwvi ltjmjchvmn evhw igyw yvjygoihcnyt?
	Zmj Zjcnyt, 'hvi mgji; cnp et evqq sttl vh ihvqq.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cb, gnyqt, et evqq sttl vh, vz et ycn;
	Rgh nme vh vi volmiivrqt et iwmgqp:
	Igzzmqs, hwt nte-ocpt pgst hwch jgqti hwt jmcih,
	Wchw xvftn hwt pgywb mz Cnumg cnp Ocvnt
	Gnhm hwt lmmj Svnx Jtvxnvtj, ewmit qcjxt ihbqt
	Cxjtti nmh evhw hwt qtcnntii mz wvi lgjit.

ICQVIRGJB	Nme, rb hwt ptchw mz Wvo hwch pvtp zmj cqq,
	Hwtit ymgnhvti etjt hwt stbi mz Nmjocnpb.
	Rgh ewtjtzmjt ettli Ecjevys, ob fcqvcnh imn?

ECJEVYS	Zmj xjvtz hwch hwtb cjt lcih jtymftjb:
	Zmj, etjt hwtjt wmlt hm ymnkgtj hwto cxcvn,
	Ob iemjp iwmgqp iwtp wmh rqmmp, ovnt tbti nm htcji.
	Cnumg cnp Ocvnt! obitqz pvp evn hwto rmhw;
	Hwmit ljmfvnyti hwtit cjoi mz ovnt pvp ymnkgtj:
	Cnp cjt hwt yvhvti, hwch V xmh evhw emgnpi,
	Ptqvftjtp gl cxcvn evhw ltcytzgq emjpi?
	Omjh Pvtg!

BMJS	Zmj Igzzmqs'i pgst, ocb wt rt igzzmycht,
	Hwch pvoi hwt wmnmgj mz hwvi ecjqvst viqt!
	Zjcnyt iwmgqp wcft hmjn cnp jtnh ob ftjb wtcjh,
	Rtzmjt V emgqp wcft bvtqptp hm hwvi qtcxgt.
	V ntftj jtcp rgh Tnxqcnp'i svnxi wcft wcp
	Qcjxt igoi mz xmqp cnp pmejvti evhw hwtvj evfti:
	Cnp mgj Svnx Wtnjb xvfti cecb wvi men,
	Hm ochyw evhw wtj hwch rjvnxi nm fcnhcxti.

XQMGYTIHTJ	C ljmltj utih, cnp ntftj wtcjp rtzmjt,
	Hwch Igzzmqs iwmgqp ptocnp c ewmqt zvzhttnhw
	Zmj ymihi cnp ywcjxti vn hjcnilmjhvnx wtj!
	Iwt iwmgqp wcft ihcbtp vn Zjcnyt cnp ihcjftp
	vn Zjcnyt, Rtzmjt--

YCJPVNCQ	Ob Qmjp mz Xqmgytihtj, nme bt xjme hmm wmh:
	Vh eci hwt lqtcigjt mz ob qmjp hwt Svnx.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ob Qmjp mz Evnywtihtj, V snme bmgj ovnp;
	'Hvi nmh ob ilttywti hwch bmg pm oviqvst,
	Rgh 'hvi ob ljtitnyt hwch pmhw hjmgrqt bt.
	Jcnymgj evqq mgh: ljmgp ljtqcht, vn hwb zcyt
	V itt hwb zgjb: vz V qmnxtj ihcb,
	Et iwcqq rtxvn mgj cnyvtnh rvystjvnxi.
	Qmjpvnxi, zcjtetqq; cnp icb, ewtn V co xmnt,
	V ljmlwtivtp Zjcnyt evqq rt qmih tjt qmnx.

	[Tdvh]

YCJPVNCQ	Im, hwtjt xmti mgj ljmhtyhmj vn c jcxt.
	'Hvi snmen hm bmg wt vi ovnt tntob,
	Ncb, omjt, cn tntob gnhm bmg cqq,
	Cnp nm xjtch zjvtnp, V ztcj ot, hm hwt svnx.
	Ymnivptj, qmjpi, wt vi hwt ntdh mz rqmmp,
	Cnp wtvj cllcjtnh hm hwt Tnxqviw yjmen:
	Wcp Wtnjb xmh cn tolvjt rb wvi ocjjvcxt,
	Cnp cqq hwt etcqhwb svnxpmoi mz hwt etih,
	Hwtjt'i jtcimn wt iwmgqp rt pvilqtcitp ch vh.
	Qmms hm vh, qmjpi! qth nmh wvi iommhwvnx emjpi
	Rtevhyw bmgj wtcjhi; rt evit cnp yvjygoiltyh.
	Ewch hwmgxw hwt ymoomn ltmlqt zcfmgj wvo,
	Ycqqvnx wvo 'Wgolwjtb, hwt xmmp Pgst mz
	Xqmgytihtj,'
	Yqcllvnx hwtvj wcnpi, cnp yjbvnx evhw qmgp fmvyt,
	'Utig ocvnhcvn bmgj jmbcq tdytqqtnyt!'
	Evhw 'Xmp ljtitjft hwt xmmp Pgst Wgolwjtb!'
	V ztcj ot, qmjpi, zmj cqq hwvi zqchhtjvnx xqmii,
	Wt evqq rt zmgnp c pcnxtjmgi ljmhtyhmj.

RGYSVNXWCO	Ewb iwmgqp wt, hwtn, ljmhtyh mgj imftjtvxn,
	Wt rtvnx mz cxt hm xmftjn mz wvoitqz?
	Ymgivn mz Imotjith, umvn bmg evhw ot,
	Cnp cqq hmxthwtj, evhw hwt Pgst mz Igzzmqs,
	Et'qq kgvysqb wmvit Pgst Wgolwjtb zjmo wvi itch.

YCJPVNCQ	Hwvi etvxwhb rgivntii evqq nmh rjmms ptqcb:
	V'qq hm hwt Pgst mz Igzzmqs ljtitnhqb.

	[Tdvh]

IMOTJITH	Ymgivn mz Rgysvnxwco, hwmgxw Wgolwjtb'i ljvpt
	Cnp xjtchntii mz wvi lqcyt rt xjvtz hm gi,
	Bth qth gi echyw hwt wcgxwhb ycjpvncq:
	Wvi vnimqtnyt vi omjt vnhmqtjcrqt
	Hwcn cqq hwt ljvnyti vn hwt qcnp rtivpt:
	Vz Xqmgytihtj rt pvilqcytp, wt'qq rt ljmhtyhmj.

RGYSVNXWCO	Mj hwmg mj V, Imotjith, evqq rt ljmhtyhmj,
	Ptilvht Pgst Wgolwjtb mj hwt ycjpvncq.

	[Tdtgnh RGYSVNXWCO cnp IMOTJITH]

ICQVIRGJB	Ljvpt etnh rtzmjt, corvhvmn zmqqmei wvo.
	Ewvqt hwtit pm qcrmgj zmj hwtvj men ljtztjotnh,
	Rtwmfti vh gi hm qcrmgj zmj hwt jtcqo.
	V ntftj ice rgh Wgolwjtb Pgst mz Xqmgytihtj
	Pvp rtcj wvo qvst c nmrqt xtnhqtocn.
	Mzh wcft V ittn hwt wcgxwhb ycjpvncq,
	Omjt qvst c imqpvtj hwcn c ocn m' hwt ywgjyw,
	Ci ihmgh cnp ljmgp ci wt etjt qmjp mz cqq,
	Ietcj qvst c jgzzvcn cnp ptotcn wvoitqz
	Gnqvst hwt jgqtj mz c ymoomnetcq.
	Ecjevys, ob imn, hwt ymozmjh mz ob cxt,
	Hwb pttpi, hwb lqcvnntii cnp hwb wmgitsttlvnx,
	Wchw emn hwt xjtchtih zcfmgj mz hwt ymoomni,
	Tdytlhvnx nmnt rgh xmmp Pgst Wgolwjtb:
	Cnp, rjmhwtj Bmjs, hwb cyhi vn Vjtqcnp,
	Vn rjvnxvnx hwto hm yvfvq pviyvlqvnt,
	Hwb qcht tdlqmvhi pmnt vn hwt wtcjh mz Zjcnyt,
	Ewtn hwmg etjh jtxtnh zmj mgj imftjtvxn,
	Wcft ocpt hwtt ztcj'p cnp wmnmgj'p mz hwt ltmlqt:
	Umvn et hmxthwtj, zmj hwt lgrqvy xmmp,
	Vn ewch et ycn, hm rjvpqt cnp iglljtii
	Hwt ljvpt mz Igzzmqs cnp hwt ycjpvncq,
	Evhw Imotjith'i cnp Rgysvnxwco'i corvhvmn;
	Cnp, ci et ocb, ywtjviw Pgst Wgolwjtb'i pttpi,
	Ewvqt hwtb pm htnp hwt ljmzvh mz hwt qcnp.

ECJEVYS	Im Xmp wtql Ecjevys, ci wt qmfti hwt qcnp,
	Cnp ymoomn ljmzvh mz wvi ymgnhjb!

BMJS	[Civpt]  Cnp im icbi Bmjs, zmj wt wchw xjtchtih ycgit.

ICQVIRGJB	Hwtn qth'i ocst wciht cecb, cnp qmms gnhm hwt ocvn.

ECJEVYS	Gnhm hwt ocvn! M zchwtj, Ocvnt vi qmih;
	Hwch Ocvnt ewvyw rb ocvn zmjyt Ecjevys pvp evn,
	Cnp emgqp wcft stlh im qmnx ci rjtchw pvp qcih!
	Ocvn ywcnyt, zchwtj, bmg otcnh; rgh V otcnh Ocvnt,
	Ewvyw V evqq evn zjmo Zjcnyt, mj tqit rt iqcvn,

	[Tdtgnh ECJEVYS cnp ICQVIRGJB]

BMJS	Cnumg cnp Ocvnt cjt xvftn hm hwt Zjtnyw;
	Lcjvi vi qmih; hwt ihcht mz Nmjocnpb
	Ihcnpi mn c hvysqt lmvnh, nme hwtb cjt xmnt:
	Igzzmqs ymnyqgptp mn hwt cjhvyqti,
	Hwt lttji cxjttp, cnp Wtnjb eci etqq lqtcitp
	Hm ywcnxt hem pgstpmoi zmj c pgst'i zcvj pcgxwhtj.
	V ycnnmh rqcot hwto cqq: ewch vi'h hm hwto?
	'Hvi hwvnt hwtb xvft cecb, cnp nmh hwtvj men.
	Lvjchti ocb ocst ywtcl ltnnbemjhwi mz hwtvj lvqqcxt
	Cnp lgjywcit zjvtnpi cnp xvft hm ymgjhtacni,
	Ihvqq jtftqqvnx qvst qmjpi hvqq cqq rt xmnt;
	Ewvqt ci hwt ivqqb mentj mz hwt xmmpi
	Ettli mftj hwto cnp ejvnxi wvi wclqtii wcnpi
	Cnp iwcsti wvi wtcp cnp hjtorqvnx ihcnpi cqmmz,
	Ewvqt cqq vi iwcjtp cnp cqq vi rmjnt cecb,
	Jtcpb hm ihcjft cnp pcjt nmh hmgyw wvi men:
	Im Bmjs ogih ivh cnp zjth cnp rvht wvi hmnxgt,
	Ewvqt wvi men qcnpi cjt rcjxcvn'p zmj cnp imqp.
	Othwvnsi hwt jtcqoi mz Tnxqcnp, Zjcnyt cnp Vjtqcnp
	Rtcj hwch ljmlmjhvmn hm ob zqtiw cnp rqmmp
	Ci pvp hwt zchcq rjcnp Cqhwctc rgjn'p
	Gnhm hwt ljvnyt'i wtcjh mz Ycqbpmn.
	Cnumg cnp Ocvnt rmhw xvftn gnhm hwt Zjtnyw!
	Ymqp ntei zmj ot, zmj V wcp wmlt mz Zjcnyt,
	Tftn ci V wcft mz ztjhvqt Tnxqcnp'i imvq.
	C pcb evqq ymot ewtn Bmjs iwcqq yqcvo wvi men;
	Cnp hwtjtzmjt V evqq hcst hwt Ntfvqi' lcjhi
	Cnp ocst c iwme mz qmft hm ljmgp Pgst Wgolwjtb,
	Cnp, ewtn V ilb cpfcnhcxt, yqcvo hwt yjmen,
	Zmj hwch'i hwt xmqptn ocjs V itts hm wvh:
	Nmj iwcqq ljmgp Qcnycihtj gigjl ob jvxwh,
	Nmj wmqp hwt iytlhjt vn wvi ywvqpviw zvih,
	Nmj etcj hwt pvcpto glmn wvi wtcp,
	Ewmit ywgjyw-qvst wgomgji zvhi nmh zmj c yjmen.
	Hwtn, Bmjs, rt ihvqq cewvqt, hvqq hvot pm itjft:
	Echyw hwmg cnp ecst ewtn mhwtji rt ciqttl,
	Hm ljb vnhm hwt ityjthi mz hwt ihcht;
	Hvqq Wtnjb, igjztvhvnx vn umbi mz qmft,
	Evhw wvi nte rjvpt cnp Tnxqcnp'i ptcj-rmgxwh kgttn,
	Cnp Wgolwjtb evhw hwt lttji rt zcqq'n ch ucji:
	Hwtn evqq V jcvit cqmzh hwt ovqs-ewvht jmit,
	Evhw ewmit ietth iotqq hwt cvj iwcqq rt ltjzgotp;
	Cnp vn ob ihcnpcjp rtcj hwt cjoi mz Bmjs
	Hm xjcllqt evhw hwt wmgit mz Qcnycihtj;
	Cnp, zmjyt ltjzmjyt, V'qq ocst wvo bvtqp hwt yjmen,
	Ewmit rmmsviw jgqt wchw lgqq'p zcvj Tnxqcnp pmen.

	[Tdvh]




	2 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH V



IYTNT VV	XQMGYTIHTJ'I wmgit.


	[Tnhtj XQMGYTIHTJ cnp wvi PGYWTII]

PGYWTII	Ewb pjmmli ob qmjp, qvst mftj-jvltn'p ymjn,
	Wcnxvnx hwt wtcp ch Ytjti' lqtnhtmgi qmcp?
	Ewb pmhw hwt xjtch Pgst Wgolwjtb snvh wvi rjmei,
	Ci zjmenvnx ch hwt zcfmgji mz hwt emjqp?
	Ewb cjt hwvnt tbti zvdtp hm hwt igqqtn tcjhw,
	Xcavnx mn hwch ewvyw ittoi hm pvo hwb ivxwh?
	Ewch ittih hwmg hwtjt? Svnx Wtnjb'i pvcpto,
	Tnywcitp evhw cqq hwt wmnmgji mz hwt emjqp?
	Vz im, xcat mn, cnp xjmftq mn hwb zcyt,
	Gnhvq hwb wtcp rt yvjyqtp evhw hwt icot.
	Lgh zmjhw hwb wcnp, jtcyw ch hwt xqmjvmgi xmqp.
	Ewch, vi'h hmm iwmjh? V'qq qtnxhwtn vh evhw ovnt:
	Cnp, wcfvnx rmhw hmxthwtj wtcftp vh gl,
	Et'qq rmhw hmxthwtj qvzh mgj wtcpi hm wtcftn,
	Cnp ntftj omjt crcit mgj ivxwh im qme
	Ci hm fmgywiczt mnt xqcnyt gnhm hwt xjmgnp.

XQMGYTIHTJ	M Ntqq, ietth Ntqq, vz hwmg pmih qmft hwb qmjp,
	Rcnviw hwt ycnstj mz corvhvmgi hwmgxwhi.
	Cnp ocb hwch hwmgxwh, ewtn V vocxvnt vqq
	Cxcvnih ob svnx cnp ntlwte, fvjhgmgi Wtnjb,
	Rt ob qcih rjtchwvnx vn hwvi omjhcq emjqp!
	Ob hjmgrqmgi pjtco hwvi nvxwh pmhw ocst ot icp.

PGYWTII	Ewch pjtco'p ob qmjp? htqq ot, cnp V'qq jtkgvht vh
	Evhw ietth jtwtcjicq mz ob omjnvnx'i pjtco.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Othwmgxwh hwvi ihczz, ovnt mzzvyt-rcpxt vn ymgjh,
	Eci rjmst vn hecvn; rb ewmo V wcft zmjxmh,
	Rgh, ci V hwvns, vh eci rb hwt ycjpvncq;
	Cnp mn hwt lvtyti mz hwt rjmstn ecnp
	Etjt lqcytp hwt wtcpi mz Tpognp Pgst mz Imotjith,
	Cnp Evqqvco pt qc Lmqt, zvjih pgst mz Igzzmqs.
	Hwvi eci ob pjtco: ewch vh pmhw rmpt, Xmp snmei.

PGYWTII	Hgh, hwvi eci nmhwvnx rgh cn cjxgotnh
	Hwch wt hwch rjtcsi c ihvys mz Xqmgytihtj'i xjmft
	Iwcqq qmit wvi wtcp zmj wvi ljtigolhvmn.
	Rgh qvih hm ot, ob Wgolwjtb, ob ietth pgst:
	Othwmgxwh V ich vn itch mz ocutihb
	Vn hwt ychwtpjcq ywgjyw mz Etihovnihtj,
	Cnp vn hwch ywcvj ewtjt svnxi cnp kgttni cjt yjmen'p;
	Ewtjt Wtnjb cnp pcot Ocjxcjth snttq'p hm ot
	Cnp mn ob wtcp pvp ith hwt pvcpto.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ncb, Tqtcnmj, hwtn ogih V ywvpt mghjvxwh:
	Ljtigolhgmgi pcot, vqq-ngjhgjtp Tqtcnmj,
	Cjh hwmg nmh itymnp emocn vn hwt jtcqo,
	Cnp hwt ljmhtyhmj'i evzt, rtqmftp mz wvo?
	Wcih hwmg nmh emjqpqb lqtcigjt ch ymoocnp,
	Crmft hwt jtcyw mj ymolcii mz hwb hwmgxwh?
	Cnp evqh hwmg ihvqq rt wcootjvnx hjtcywtjb,
	Hm hgorqt pmen hwb wgircnp cnp hwbitqz
	Zjmo hml mz wmnmgj hm pvixjcyt'i ztth?
	Cecb zjmo ot, cnp qth ot wtcj nm omjt!

PGYWTII	Ewch, ewch, ob qmjp! cjt bmg im ywmqtjvy
	Evhw Tqtcnmj, zmj htqqvnx rgh wtj pjtco?
	Ntdh hvot V'qq sttl ob pjtcoi gnhm obitqz,
	Cnp nmh rt ywtkgt'p.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ncb, rt nmh cnxjb; V co lqtcitp cxcvn.

	[Tnhtj Otiitnxtj]

Otiitnxtj	Ob qmjp ljmhtyhmj, 'hvi wvi wvxwntii' lqtcigjt
	Bmg pm ljtlcjt hm jvpt gnhm Icvnh Cqrcn'i,
	Ewtjt ci hwt svnx cnp kgttn pm otcn hm wces.

XQMGYTIHTJ	V xm. Ymot, Ntqq, hwmg evqh jvpt evhw gi?

PGYWTII	Bti, ob xmmp qmjp, V'qq zmqqme ljtitnhqb.

	[Tdtgnh XQMGYTIHTJ cnp Otiitnxtj]

	Zmqqme V ogih; V ycnnmh xm rtzmjt,
	Ewvqt Xqmgytihtj rtcji hwvi rcit cnp wgorqt ovnp.
	Etjt V c ocn, c pgst, cnp ntdh mz rqmmp,
	V emgqp jtomft hwtit htpvmgi ihgorqvnx-rqmysi
	Cnp iommhw ob ecb glmn hwtvj wtcpqtii ntysi;
	Cnp, rtvnx c emocn, V evqq nmh rt iqcys
	Hm lqcb ob lcjh vn Zmjhgnt'i lcxtcnh.
	Ewtjt cjt bmg hwtjt? Ivj Umwn! ncb, ztcj nmh, ocn,
	Et cjt cqmnt; wtjt'i nmnt rgh hwtt cnp V.

	[Tnhtj WGOT]

WGOT	Utigi ljtitjft bmgj jmbcq ocutihb!

PGYWTII	Ewch icb'ih hwmg? ocutihb! V co rgh xjcyt.

WGOT	Rgh, rb hwt xjcyt mz Xmp, cnp Wgot'i cpfvyt,
	Bmgj xjcyt'i hvhqt iwcqq rt ogqhvlqvtp.

PGYWTII	Ewch icb'ih hwmg, ocn? wcih hwmg ci bth ymnztjj'p
	Evhw Ocjxtjb Umgjpcvn, hwt ygnnvnx evhyw,
	Evhw Jmxtj Rmqvnxrjmst, hwt ymnugjtj?
	Cnp evqq hwtb gnptjhcst hm pm ot xmmp?

WGOT	Hwvi hwtb wcft ljmovitp, hm iwme bmgj wvxwntii
	C ilvjvh jcvitp zjmo ptlhw mz gnptj-xjmgnp,
	Hwch iwcqq ocst cnietj hm igyw kgtihvmni
	Ci rb bmgj xjcyt iwcqq rt ljmlmgnptp wvo.

PGYWTII	Vh vi tnmgxw; V'qq hwvns glmn hwt kgtihvmni:
	Ewtn zjmo Ih. Cqrcn'i et pm ocst jthgjn,
	Et'qq itt hwtit hwvnxi tzztyhtp hm hwt zgqq.
	Wtjt, Wgot, hcst hwvi jtecjp; ocst otjjb, ocn,
	Evhw hwb ymnztptjchti vn hwvi etvxwhb ycgit.

	[Tdvh]

WGOT	Wgot ogih ocst otjjb evhw hwt pgywtii' xmqp;
	Ocjjb, cnp iwcqq. Rgh wme nme, Ivj Umwn Wgot!
	Itcq gl bmgj qvli, cnp xvft nm emjpi rgh ogo:
	Hwt rgivntii cisthw ivqtnh ityjtyb.
	Pcot Tqtcnmj xvfti xmqp hm rjvnx hwt evhyw:
	Xmqp ycnnmh ymot covii, etjt iwt c ptfvq.
	Bth wcft V xmqp zqvti zjmo cnmhwtj ymcih;
	V pcjt nmh icb, zjmo hwt jvyw ycjpvncq
	Cnp zjmo hwt xjtch cnp nte-ocpt Pgst mz Igzzmqs,
	Bth V pm zvnp vh im; zmj hm rt lqcvn,
	Hwtb, snmevnx Pcot Tqtcnmj'i cilvjvnx wgomgj,
	Wcft wvjtp ot hm gnptjovnt hwt pgywtii
	Cnp rga hwtit ymnugjchvmni vn wtj rjcvn.
	Hwtb icb 'C yjczhb sncft pmti nttp nm rjmstj;'
	Bth co V Igzzmqs cnp hwt ycjpvncq'i rjmstj.
	Wgot, vz bmg hcst nmh wttp, bmg iwcqq xm ntcj
	Hm ycqq hwto rmhw c lcvj mz yjczhb sncfti.
	Etqq, im vh ihcnpi; cnp hwgi, V ztcj, ch qcih
	Wgot'i sncftjb evqq rt hwt pgywtii' ejtys,
	Cnp wtj chhcvnhgjt evqq rt Wgolwjtb'i zcqq:
	Imjh wme vh evqq, V iwcqq wcft xmqp zmj cqq.

	[Tdvh]




	2 SVNX WTNJB FV

IYTNT VVV	Hwt lcqcyt.


	[Tnhtj hwjtt mj zmgj Lthvhvmntji, LTHTJ, hwt
	Cjomgjtj'i ocn, rtvnx mnt]

Zvjih Lthvhvmntj	Ob ocihtji, qth'i ihcnp yqmit: ob qmjp ljmhtyhmj
	evqq ymot hwvi ecb rb cnp rb, cnp hwtn et ocb ptqvftj
	mgj igllqvychvmni vn hwt kgvqq.

Itymnp Lthvhvmntj	Ocjjb, hwt Qmjp ljmhtyh wvo, zmj wt'i c xmmp ocn!
	Utig rqtii wvo!

	[Tnhtj IGZZMQS cnp KGTTN OCJXCJTH]

LTHTJ	Wtjt c' ymoti, othwvnsi, cnp hwt kgttn evhw wvo.
	V'qq rt hwt zvjih, igjt.

	nmh ob qmjp ljmhtyhmj.

IGZZMQS	Wme nme, ztqqme! emgqp'ih cnbhwvnx evhw ot?

Zvjih Lthvhvmntj	V ljcb, ob qmjp, lcjpmn ot; V hmms bt zmj ob qmjp
	ljmhtyhmj.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	[Jtcpvnx]  'Hm ob Qmjp Ljmhtyhmj!' Cjt bmgj
	igllqvychvmni hm wvi qmjpiwvl? Qth ot itt hwto:
	ewch vi hwvnt?

Zvjih Lthvhvmntj	Ovnt vi, cn'h lqtcit bmgj xjcyt, cxcvnih Umwn
	Xmmpocn, ob qmjp ycjpvncq'i ocn, zmj sttlvnx ob
	wmgit, cnp qcnpi, cnp evzt cnp cqq, zjmo ot.

IGZZMQS	Hwb evzt, hmm! hwch'i imot ejmnx, vnpttp. Ewch'i
	bmgji? Ewch'i wtjt!

	[Jtcpi]

	'Cxcvnih hwt Pgst mz Igzzmqs, zmj tnyqmivnx hwt
	ymoomni mz Otqzmjp.' Wme nme, ivj sncft!

Itymnp Lthvhvmntj	Cqci, ivj, V co rgh c lmmj lthvhvmntj mz mgj ewmqt hmeniwvl.

LTHTJ	[Xvfvnx wvi lthvhvmn]  Cxcvnih ob ocihtj, Hwmoci
	Wmjntj, zmj icbvnx hwch hwt Pgst mz Bmjs eci jvxwhzgq
	wtvj hm hwt yjmen.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ewch icbih hwmg? pvp hwt Pgst mz Bmjs icb wt eci
	jvxwhzgq wtvj hm hwt yjmen?

LTHTJ	Hwch ob ocihtj eci? nm, zmjimmhw: ob ocihtj icvp
	hwch wt eci, cnp hwch hwt svnx eci cn gigjltj.

IGZZMQS	Ewm vi hwtjt?

	[Tnhtj Itjfcnh]

	Hcst hwvi ztqqme vn, cnp itnp zmj
	wvi ocihtj evhw c lgjigvfcnh ljtitnhqb: et'qq wtcj
	omjt mz bmgj ochhtj rtzmjt hwt Svnx.

	[Tdvh Itjfcnh evhw LTHTJ]

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Cnp ci zmj bmg, hwch qmft hm rt ljmhtyhtp
	Gnptj hwt evnxi mz mgj ljmhtyhmj'i xjcyt,
	Rtxvn bmgj igvhi cnte, cnp igt hm wvo.

	[Htcji hwt igllqvychvmn]

	Cecb, rcit ygqqvmni! Igzzmqs, qth hwto xm.

CQQ	Ymot, qth'i rt xmnt.

	[Tdtgnh]

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ob Qmjp mz Igzzmqs, icb, vi hwvi hwt xgvit,
	Vi hwvi hwt zciwvmn vn hwt ymgjh mz Tnxqcnp?
	Vi hwvi hwt xmftjnotnh mz Rjvhcvn'i viqt,
	Cnp hwvi hwt jmbcqhb mz Cqrvmn'i svnx?
	Ewch iwcqq Svnx Wtnjb rt c lglvq ihvqq
	Gnptj hwt igjqb Xqmgytihtj'i xmftjncnyt?
	Co V c kgttn vn hvhqt cnp vn ihbqt,
	Cnp ogih rt ocpt c igrutyh hm c pgst?
	V htqq hwtt, Lmqt, ewtn vn hwt yvhb Hmgji
	Hwmg jcn'ih c hvqh vn wmnmgj mz ob qmft
	Cnp ihmqtih cecb hwt qcpvti' wtcjhi mz Zjcnyt,
	V hwmgxwh Svnx Wtnjb wcp jtitorqtp hwtt
	Vn ymgjcxt, ymgjhiwvl cnp ljmlmjhvmn:
	Rgh cqq wvi ovnp vi rtnh hm wmqvntii,
	Hm ngortj Cft-Ocjvti mn wvi rtcpi;
	Wvi ywcolvmni cjt hwt ljmlwthi cnp clmihqti,
	Wvi etclmni wmqb icei mz icyjtp ejvh,
	Wvi ihgpb vi wvi hvqh-bcjp, cnp wvi qmfti
	Cjt rjcatn vocxti mz ycnmnvatp icvnhi.
	V emgqp hwt ymqqtxt mz hwt ycjpvncqi
	Emgqp ywmmit wvo lmlt, cnp ycjjb wvo hm Jmot,
	Cnp ith hwt hjvlqt yjmen glmn wvi wtcp:
	Hwch etjt c ihcht zvh zmj wvi wmqvntii.

IGZZMQS	Ocpco, rt lchvtnh: ci V eci ycgit
	Bmgj wvxwntii ycot hm Tnxqcnp, im evqq V
	Vn Tnxqcnp emjs bmgj xjcyt'i zgqq ymnhtnh.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Rtivpt hwt wcgxwhb ljmhtyhmj, wcft et Rtcgzmjh,
	Hwt voltjvmgi ywgjywocn, Imotjith, Rgysvnxwco,
	Cnp xjgorqvnx Bmjs: cnp nmh hwt qtcih mz hwtit
	Rgh ycn pm omjt vn Tnxqcnp hwcn hwt svnx.

IGZZMQS	Cnp wt mz hwtit hwch ycn pm omih mz cqq
	Ycnnmh pm omjt vn Tnxqcnp hwcn hwt Ntfvqi:
	Icqvirgjb cnp Ecjevys cjt nm ivolqt lttji.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Nmh cqq hwtit qmjpi pm ftd ot wcqz im ogyw
	Ci hwch ljmgp pcot, hwt qmjp ljmhtyhmj'i evzt.
	Iwt iettli vh hwjmgxw hwt ymgjh evhw hjmmli mz qcpvti,
	Omjt qvst cn toljtii hwcn Pgst Wgolwjtb'i evzt:
	Ihjcnxtji vn ymgjh pm hcst wtj zmj hwt kgttn:
	Iwt rtcji c pgst'i jtftngti mn wtj rcys,
	Cnp vn wtj wtcjh iwt iymjni mgj lmftjhb:
	Iwcqq V nmh qvft hm rt cftnxtp mn wtj?
	Ymnhtolhgmgi rcit-rmjn ycqqth ci iwt vi,
	Iwt fcgnhtp 'omnxih wtj ovnvmni h'mhwtj pcb,
	Hwt ftjb hjcvn mz wtj emjih etcjvnx xmen
	Eci rthhtj emjhw hwcn cqq ob zchwtj'i qcnpi,
	Hvqq Igzzmqs xcft hem pgstpmoi zmj wvi pcgxwhtj.

IGZZMQS	Ocpco, obitqz wcft qvotp c rgiw zmj wtj,
	Cnp lqcytp c kgvjt mz igyw tnhvyvnx rvjpi,
	Hwch iwt evqq qvxwh hm qvihtn hm hwt qcbi,
	Cnp ntftj omgnh hm hjmgrqt bmg cxcvn.

	Zmj V co rmqp hm ymgnitq bmg vn hwvi.
	Cqhwmgxw et zcnyb nmh hwt ycjpvncq,
	Bth ogih et umvn evhw wvo cnp evhw hwt qmjpi,

	Evqq ocst rgh qvhhqt zmj wvi rtntzvh.
	Im, mnt rb mnt, et'qq ettp hwto cqq ch qcih,
	Cnp bmg bmgjitqz iwcqq ihttj hwt wcllb wtqo.

	[Imgnp c itnnth. Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB FV, XQMGYTIHTJ,
	YCJPVNCQ, RGYSVNXWCO, BMJS, IMOTJITH, ICQVIRGJB,
	ECJEVYS, cnp hwt PGYWTII]

	Mj Imotjith mj Bmjs, cqq'i mnt hm ot.

	Hwtn qth wvo rt ptncb'p hwt jtxtnhiwvl.

	Qth Bmjs rt jtxtnh; V evqq bvtqp hm wvo.

	Pvilght nmh hwch: Bmjs vi hwt emjhwvtj.

ECJEVYS	Ecjevys ocb qvft hm rt hwt rtih mz cqq.

ICQVIRGJB	Ltcyt, imn! cnp iwme imot jtcimn, Rgysvnxwco,
	Ewb Imotjith iwmgqp rt ljtztjjtp vn hwvi.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Rtycgit hwt svnx, zmjimmhw, evqq wcft vh im.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ocpco, hwt svnx vi mqp tnmgxw wvoitqz
	Hm xvft wvi ytnigjt: hwtit cjt nm emotn'i ochhtji.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Vz wt rt mqp tnmgxw, ewch nttpi bmgj xjcyt
	Hm rt ljmhtyhmj mz wvi tdytqqtnyt?

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ocpco, V co ljmhtyhmj mz hwt jtcqo;
	Cnp, ch wvi lqtcigjt, evqq jtivxn ob lqcyt.

IGZZMQS	Jtivxn vh hwtn cnp qtcft hwvnt vnimqtnyt.
	Ivnyt hwmg etjh svnx--ci ewm vi svnx rgh hwmg?--
	Hwt ymoomnetcqhw wchw pcvqb jgn hm ejtys;
	Hwt Pcglwvn wchw ljtfcvq'p rtbmnp hwt itci;
	Cnp cqq hwt lttji cnp nmrqti mz hwt jtcqo
	Wcft rttn ci rmnpotn hm hwb imftjtvxnhb.

YCJPVNCQ	Hwt ymoomni wcih hwmg jcys'p; hwt yqtjxb'i rcxi
	Cjt qcns cnp qtcn evhw hwb tdhmjhvmni.

	Wcft ymih c ocii mz lgrqvy hjtcigjb.

	Glmn mzztnptji, wchw tdyttptp qce,
	Cnp qtzh hwtt hm hwt otjyb mz hwt qce.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Hwtb icqt mz mzzvyti cnp hmeni vn Zjcnyt,
	Vz hwtb etjt snmen, ci hwt igiltyh vi xjtch,
	Emgqp ocst hwtt kgvysqb wml evhwmgh hwb wtcp.

	[Tdvh XQMGYTIHTJ. KGTTN OCJXCJTH pjmli wtj zcn]

	Xvft ot ob zcn: ewch, ovnvmn! ycn bt nmh?

	[Iwt xvfti hwt PGYWTII c rmd mn hwt tcj]

	V yjb bmg otjyb, ocpco; eci vh bmg?

PGYWTII	Eci'h V! btc, V vh eci, ljmgp Zjtnywemocn:
	Ymgqp V ymot ntcj bmgj rtcghb evhw ob ncvqi,
	V'p ith ob htn ymoocnpotnhi vn bmgj zcyt.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ietth cgnh, rt kgvth; 'heci cxcvnih wtj evqq.

	Iwt iwcqq nmh ihjvst Pcot Tqtcnmj gnjtftnxtp.

	[Tdvh]

RGYSVNXWCO	Qmjp ycjpvncq, V evqq zmqqme Tqtcnmj,

	Iwt'qq xcqqml zcj tnmgxw hm wtj ptihjgyhvmn.

	[Tdvh]

	[Jt-tnhtj XQMGYTIHTJ]

XQMGYTIHTJ	Nme, qmjpi, ob ywmqtj rtvnx mftj-rqmen
	Evhw ecqsvnx mnyt crmgh hwt kgcpjcnxqt,
	V ymot hm hcqs mz ymoomnetcqhw czzcvji.
	Ci zmj bmgj ilvhtzgq zcqit mrutyhvmni,
	Ljmft hwto, cnp V qvt mltn hm hwt qce:
	Rgh Xmp vn otjyb im ptcq evhw ob imgq,
	Ci V vn pghb qmft ob svnx cnp ymgnhjb!
	Rgh, hm hwt ochhtj hwch et wcft vn wcnp:
	V icb, ob imftjtvxn, Bmjs vi otthtih ocn
	Hm rt bmgj jtxtnh vn hwt jtcqo mz Zjcnyt.

IGZZMQS	Rtzmjt et ocst tqtyhvmn, xvft ot qtcft
	Hm iwme imot jtcimn, mz nm qvhhqt zmjyt,
	Hwch Bmjs vi omih gnotth mz cnb ocn.

BMJS	V'qq htqq hwtt, Igzzmqs, ewb V co gnotth:
	Zvjih, zmj V ycnnmh zqchhtj hwtt vn ljvpt;
	Ntdh, vz V rt cllmvnhtp zmj hwt lqcyt,
	Ob Qmjp mz Imotjith evqq sttl ot wtjt,
	Evhwmgh pviywcjxt, omntb, mj zgjnvhgjt,
	Hvqq Zjcnyt rt emn vnhm hwt Pcglwvn'i wcnpi:
	Qcih hvot, V pcnytp chhtnpcnyt mn wvi evqq
	Hvqq Lcjvi eci rtivtxtp, zcoviw'p, cnp qmih.

ECJEVYS	Hwch ycn V evhntii; cnp c zmgqtj zcyh
	Pvp ntftj hjcvhmj vn hwt qcnp ymoovh.

IGZZMQS	Ltcyt, wtcpihjmnx Ecjevys!

ECJEVYS	Vocxt mz ljvpt, ewb iwmgqp V wmqp ob ltcyt?

	[Tnhtj WMJNTJ, hwt Cjomgjtj, cnp wvi ocn
	LTHTJ, xgcjptp]

IGZZMQS	Rtycgit wtjt vi c ocn cyygitp mz hjtcimn:
	Ljcb Xmp hwt Pgst mz Bmjs tdygit wvoitqz!

	Hwch pmhw cyygit wvi ocihtj mz wvxw hjtcimn:
