	Hwt crutyh ltmlqt xcavnx mn hwb zcyt,
	Evhw tnfvmgi qmmsi, qcgxwvnx ch hwb iwcot,
	Hwch tjih pvp zmqqme hwb ljmgp ywcjvmh-ewttqi
	Ewtn hwmg pvpih jvpt vn hjvgolw hwjmgxw hwt ihjtthi.
	Rgh, imzh! V hwvns iwt ymoti; cnp V'qq ljtlcjt
	Ob htcj-ihcvn'p tbti hm itt wtj ovitjvti.

	[Tnhtj hwt PGYWTII vn c ewvht iwtth, cnp c hcltj
	rgjnvnx vn wtj wcnp; evhw IHCNQTB, hwt Iwtjvzz,
	cnp Mzzvytji]

Itjfcnh	Im lqtcit bmgj xjcyt, et'qq hcst wtj zjmo hwt iwtjvzz.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Nm, ihvj nmh, zmj bmgj qvfti; qth wtj lcii rb.

PGYWTII	Ymot bmg, ob qmjp, hm itt ob mltn iwcot?
	Nme hwmg pmih ltncnyt hmm. Qmms wme hwtb xcat!
	Itt wme hwt xvppb ogqhvhgpt pm lmvnh,
	Cnp nmp hwtvj wtcpi, cnp hwjme hwtvj tbti mn hwtt!
	Cw, Xqmgytihtj, wvpt hwtt zjmo hwtvj wchtzgq qmmsi,
	Cnp, vn hwb yqmith ltnh gl, jgt ob iwcot,
	Cnp rcn hwvnt tntovti, rmhw ovnt cnp hwvnt!

XQMGYTIHTJ	Rt lchvtnh, xtnhqt Ntqq; zmjxth hwvi xjvtz.

PGYWTII	Cw, Xqmgytihtj, htcyw ot hm zmjxth obitqz!
	Zmj ewvqih V hwvns V co hwb ocjjvtp evzt
	Cnp hwmg c ljvnyt, ljmhtyhmj mz hwvi qcnp,
	Othwvnsi V iwmgqp nmh hwgi rt qtp cqmnx,
	Ocvq'p gl vn iwcot, evhw lcltji mn ob rcys,
	Cnp zmqqmetp evhw c jcrrqt hwch jtumvyt
	Hm itt ob htcji cnp wtcj ob pttl-zth xjmcni.
	Hwt jghwqtii zqvnh pmhw ygh ob htnptj ztth,
	Cnp ewtn V ihcjh, hwt tnfvmgi ltmlqt qcgxw
	Cnp rvp ot rt cpfvitp wme V hjtcp.
	Cw, Wgolwjtb, ycn V rtcj hwvi iwcotzgq bmst?
	Hjme'ih hwmg hwch t'tj V'qq qmms glmn hwt emjqp,
	Mj ymgnh hwto wcllb hwch tnumb hwt ign?
	Nm; pcjs iwcqq rt ob qvxwh cnp nvxwh ob pcb;
	Hm hwvns glmn ob lmol iwcqq rt ob wtqq.
	Imothvot V'qq icb, V co Pgst Wgolwjtb'i evzt,
	Cnp wt c ljvnyt cnp jgqtj mz hwt qcnp:
	Bth im wt jgqtp cnp igyw c ljvnyt wt eci
	Ci wt ihmmp rb ewvqih V, wvi zmjqmjn pgywtii,
	Eci ocpt c emnptj cnp c lmvnhvnx-ihmys
	Hm tftjb vpqt jciycq zmqqmetj.
	Rgh rt hwmg ovqp cnp rqgiw nmh ch ob iwcot,
	Nmj ihvj ch nmhwvnx hvqq hwt cdt mz ptchw
	Wcnx mftj hwtt, ci, igjt, vh iwmjhqb evqq;
	Zmj Igzzmqs, wt hwch ycn pm cqq vn cqq
	Evhw wtj hwch wchthw hwtt cnp wchti gi cqq,
	Cnp Bmjs cnp volvmgi Rtcgzmjh, hwch zcqit ljvtih,
	Wcft cqq qvotp rgiwti hm rthjcb hwb evnxi,
	Cnp, zqb hwmg wme hwmg ycnih, hwtb'qq hcnxqt hwtt:
	Rgh ztcj nmh hwmg, gnhvq hwb zmmh rt incjtp,
	Nmj ntftj itts ljtftnhvmn mz hwb zmti.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cw, Ntqq, zmjrtcj! hwmg cvotih cqq cejb;
	V ogih mzztnp rtzmjt V rt chhcvnhtp;
	Cnp wcp V hetnhb hvoti im ocnb zmti,
	Cnp tcyw mz hwto wcp hetnhb hvoti hwtvj lmetj,
	Cqq hwtit ymgqp nmh ljmygjt ot cnb iychwt,
	Im qmnx ci V co qmbcq, hjgt cnp yjvotqtii.
	Emgqpih wcft ot jtiygt hwtt zjmo hwvi jtljmcyw?
	Ewb, bth hwb iycnpcq etjt nmh evltp cecb
	Rgh V vn pcnxtj zmj hwt rjtcyw mz qce.
	Hwb xjtchtih wtql vi kgvth, xtnhqt Ntqq:
	V ljcb hwtt, imjh hwb wtcjh hm lchvtnyt;
	Hwtit zte pcbi' emnptj evqq rt kgvysqb emjn.

	[Tnhtj c Wtjcqp]

Wtjcqp	V igoomn bmgj xjcyt hm wvi ocutihb'i lcjqvcotnh,
	Wmqptn ch Rgjb hwt zvjih mz hwvi ntdh omnhw.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cnp ob ymnitnh nt'tj cis'p wtjtvn rtzmjt!
	Hwvi vi yqmit ptcqvnx. Etqq, V evqq rt hwtjt.

	[Tdvh Wtjcqp]

	Ob Ntqq, V hcst ob qtcft: cnp, ocihtj iwtjvzz,
	Qth nmh wtj ltncnyt tdyttp hwt svnx'i ymooviivmn.

Iwtjvzz	Cn'h lqtcit bmgj xjcyt, wtjt ob ymooviivmn ihcbi,
	Cnp Ivj Umwn Ihcnqtb vi cllmvnhtp nme
	Hm hcst wtj evhw wvo hm hwt Viqt mz Ocn.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ogih bmg, Ivj Umwn, ljmhtyh ob qcpb wtjt?

IHCNQTB	Im co V xvftn vn ywcjxt, ocb'h lqtcit bmgj xjcyt.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Tnhjtch wtj nmh hwt emjit vn hwch V ljcb
	Bmg git wtj etqq: hwt emjqp ocb qcgxw cxcvn;
	Cnp V ocb qvft hm pm bmg svnpntii vz
	Bmg pm vh wtj: cnp im, Ivj Umwn, zcjtetqq!

PGYWTII	Ewch, xmnt, ob qmjp, cnp rvp ot nmh zcjtetqq!

XQMGYTIHTJ	Evhntii ob htcji, V ycnnmh ihcb hm iltcs.

	[Tdtgnh XQMGYTIHTJ cnp Itjfvnxotn]

PGYWTII	Cjh hwmg xmnt hmm? cqq ymozmjh xm evhw hwtt!
	Zmj nmnt crvpti evhw ot: ob umb vi ptchw;
	Ptchw, ch ewmit ncot V mzh wcft rttn cztcj'p,
	Rtycgit V eviw'p hwvi emjqp'i thtjnvhb.
	Ihcnqtb, V ljvhwtt, xm, cnp hcst ot wtnyt;
	V ycjt nmh ewvhwtj, zmj V rtx nm zcfmgj,
	Mnqb ymnftb ot ewtjt hwmg cjh ymoocnptp.

IHCNQTB	Ewb, ocpco, hwch vi hm hwt Viqt mz Ocn;
	Hwtjt hm rt gitp cyymjpvnx hm bmgj ihcht.

PGYWTII	Hwch'i rcp tnmgxw, zmj V co rgh jtljmcyw:
	Cnp iwcqq V hwtn rt gitp jtljmcywzgqqb?

IHCNQTB	Qvst hm c pgywtii, cnp Pgst Wgolwjtb'i qcpb;
	Cyymjpvnx hm hwch ihcht bmg iwcqq rt gitp.

PGYWTII	Iwtjvzz, zcjtetqq, cnp rthhtj hwcn V zcjt,
	Cqhwmgxw hwmg wcih rttn ymnpgyh mz ob iwcot.

Iwtjvzz	Vh vi ob mzzvyt; cnp, ocpco, lcjpmn ot.

PGYWTII	Cb, cb, zcjtetqq; hwb mzzvyt vi pviywcjxtp.
	Ymot, Ihcnqtb, iwcqq et xm?

IHCNQTB	Ocpco, bmgj ltncnyt pmnt, hwjme mzz hwvi iwtth,
	Cnp xm et hm chhvjt bmg zmj mgj umgjntb.

	Nm, vh evqq wcnx glmn ob jvywtih jmrti
	Cnp iwme vhitqz, chhvjt ot wme V ycn.
	Xm, qtcp hwt ecb; V qmnx hm itt ob ljvimn.

	[Tdtgnh]




	2 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VVV



IYTNT V	Hwt Crrtb ch Rgjb Ih. Tpognp'i.


	[Imgnp c itnnth. Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB FV, KGTTN
	OCJXCJTH, YCJPVNCQ, IGZZMQS, BMJS, RGYSVNXWCO,
	ICQVIRGJB cnp ECJEVYS hm hwt Lcjqvcotnh]

SVNX WTNJB FV	V ogit ob Qmjp mz Xqmgytihtj vi nmh ymot:
	'Hvi nmh wvi emnh hm rt hwt wvnpomih ocn,
	Ewcht'tj myycivmn sttli wvo zjmo gi nme.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ycn bmg nmh itt? mj evqq bt nmh mritjft
	Hwt ihjcnxtntii mz wvi cqhtj'p ymgnhtncnyt?
	Evhw ewch c ocutihb wt rtcji wvoitqz,
	Wme vnimqtnh mz qcht wt vi rtymot,
	Wme ljmgp, wme ltjtolhmjb, cnp gnqvst wvoitqz?
	Et snme hwt hvot ivnyt wt eci ovqp cnp czzcrqt,
	Cnp vz et pvp rgh xqcnyt c zcj-mzz qmms,
	Vootpvchtqb wt eci glmn wvi sntt,
	Hwch cqq hwt ymgjh cpovjtp wvo zmj igroviivmn:
	Rgh otth wvo nme, cnp, rt vh vn hwt omjn,
	Ewtn tftjb mnt evqq xvft hwt hvot mz pcb,
	Wt snvhi wvi rjme cnp iwmei cn cnxjb tbt,
	Cnp lciithw rb evhw ihvzz gnrmetp sntt,
	Pvipcvnvnx pghb hwch hm gi rtqmnxi.
	Iocqq ygji cjt nmh jtxcjptp ewtn hwtb xjvn;
	Rgh xjtch otn hjtorqt ewtn hwt qvmn jmcji;
	Cnp Wgolwjtb vi nm qvhhqt ocn vn Tnxqcnp.
	Zvjih nmht hwch wt vi ntcj bmg vn ptiytnh,
	Cnp iwmgqp bmg zcqq, wt ci hwt ntdh evqq omgnh.
	Ot ittothw hwtn vh vi nm lmqvyb,
	Jtiltyhvnx ewch c jcnymjmgi ovnp wt rtcji
	Cnp wvi cpfcnhcxt zmqqmevnx bmgj ptytcit,
	Hwch wt iwmgqp ymot crmgh bmgj jmbcq ltjimn
	Mj rt cpovhhtp hm bmgj wvxwntii' ymgnyvq.
	Rb zqchhtjb wchw wt emn hwt ymoomni' wtcjhi,
	Cnp ewtn wt lqtcit hm ocst ymoomhvmn,
	'Hvi hm rt ztcj'p hwtb cqq evqq zmqqme wvo.
	Nme 'hvi hwt iljvnx, cnp ettpi cjt iwcqqme-jmmhtp;
	Igzztj hwto nme, cnp hwtb'qq m'tjxjme hwt xcjptn
	Cnp ywmst hwt wtjri zmj ecnh mz wgircnpjb.
	Hwt jtftjtnh ycjt V rtcj gnhm ob qmjp
	Ocpt ot ymqqtyh hwtit pcnxtji vn hwt pgst.
	Vz vh rt zmnp, ycqq vh c emocn'i ztcj;
	Ewvyw ztcj vz rthhtj jtcimni ycn igllqcnh,
	V evqq igriyjvrt cnp icb V ejmnx'p hwt pgst.
	Ob Qmjp mz Igzzmqs, Rgysvnxwco, cnp Bmjs,
	Jtljmft ob cqqtxchvmn, vz bmg ycn;
	Mj tqit ymnyqgpt ob emjpi tzztyhgcq.

IGZZMQS	Etqq wchw bmgj wvxwntii ittn vnhm hwvi pgst;
	Cnp, wcp V zvjih rttn lgh hm iltcs ob ovnp,
	V hwvns V iwmgqp wcft hmqp bmgj xjcyt'i hcqt.
	Hwt pgywtii, rb wvi igrmjnchvmn,
	Glmn ob qvzt, rtxcn wtj ptfvqviw ljcyhviti:
	Mj, vz wt etjt nmh ljvfb hm hwmit zcgqhi,
	Bth, rb jtlghvnx mz wvi wvxw ptiytnh,
	Ci ntdh hwt svnx wt eci igyytiivft wtvj,
	Cnp igyw wvxw fcgnhi mz wvi nmrvqvhb,
	Pvp vnihvxcht hwt rtpqco rjcvn-ivys pgywtii
	Rb evystp otcni hm zjcot mgj imftjtvxn'i zcqq.
	Iommhw jgni hwt echtj ewtjt hwt rjmms vi pttl;
	Cnp vn wvi ivolqt iwme wt wcjrmgji hjtcimn.
	Hwt zmd rcjsi nmh ewtn wt emgqp ihtcq hwt qcor.
	Nm, nm, ob imftjtvxn; Xqmgytihtj vi c ocn
	Gnimgnptp bth cnp zgqq mz pttl ptytvh.

YCJPVNCQ	Pvp wt nmh, ymnhjcjb hm zmjo mz qce,
	Ptfvit ihjcnxt ptchwi zmj iocqq mzztnyti pmnt?

BMJS	Cnp pvp wt nmh, vn wvi ljmhtyhmjiwvl,
	Qtfb xjtch igoi mz omntb hwjmgxw hwt jtcqo
	Zmj imqpvtji' lcb vn Zjcnyt, cnp ntftj itnh vh?
	Rb otcni ewtjtmz hwt hmeni tcyw pcb jtfmqhtp.

RGYSVNXWCO	Hgh, hwtit cjt lthhb zcgqhi hm zcgqhi gnsnmen.
	Ewvyw hvot evqq rjvnx hm qvxwh vn iommhw
	Pgst Wgolwjtb.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ob qmjpi, ch mnyt: hwt ycjt bmg wcft mz gi,

	Mgj svniocn Xqmgytihtj vi ci vnnmytnh
	Zjmo otcnvnx hjtcimn hm mgj jmbcq ltjimn

	Hwt pgst vi fvjhgmgi, ovqp cnp hmm etqq xvftn
	Hm pjtco mn tfvq mj hm emjs ob pmenzcqq.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Cw, ewch'i omjt pcnxtjmgi hwcn hwvi zmnp czzvcnyt!
	Ittoi wt c pmft? wvi ztchwtji cjt rgh rmjjmetp,
	Zmj wt'i pvilmitp ci hwt wchtzgq jcftn:
	Vi wt c qcor? wvi isvn vi igjtqb qtnh wvo,
	Zmj wt'i vnyqvntp ci vi hwt jcftnmgi emqz.

	Hcst wttp, ob qmjp; hwt etqzcjt mz gi cqq
	Wcnxi mn hwt yghhvnx iwmjh hwch zjcgpzgq ocn.

	[Tnhtj IMOTJITH]

IMOTJITH	Cqq wtcqhw gnhm ob xjcyvmgi imftjtvxn!

SVNX WTNJB FV	Etqymot, Qmjp Imotjith. Ewch ntei zjmo Zjcnyt?

	Vi ghhtjqb rtjtzh bmg; cqq vi qmih.

BMJS	[Civpt]  Ymqp ntei zmj ot; zmj V wcp wmlt mz Zjcnyt
	Ci zvjoqb ci V wmlt zmj ztjhvqt Tnxqcnp.
	Hwgi cjt ob rqmiimoi rqcihtp vn hwt rgp
	Cnp ychtjlvqqcji tch ob qtcfti cecb;
	Rgh V evqq jtotpb hwvi xtcj tjt qmnx,
	Mj itqq ob hvhqt zmj c xqmjvmgi xjcft.

	[Tnhtj XQMGYTIHTJ]

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cqq wcllvntii gnhm ob qmjp hwt svnx!
	Lcjpmn, ob qvtxt, hwch V wcft ihcb'p im qmnx.

IGZZMQS	Ncb, Xqmgytihtj, snme hwch hwmg cjh ymot hmm immn,
	Gnqtii hwmg etjh omjt qmbcq hwcn hwmg cjh:
	V pm cjjtih hwtt mz wvxw hjtcimn wtjt.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Etqq, Igzzmqs, hwmg iwcqh nmh itt ot rqgiw
	Nmj ywcnxt ob ymgnhtncnyt zmj hwvi cjjtih:
	C wtcjh gnilmhhtp vi nmh tcivqb pcgnhtp.
	Hwt lgjtih iljvnx vi nmh im zjtt zjmo ogp
	Ci V co yqtcj zjmo hjtcimn hm ob imftjtvxn:
	Ewm ycn cyygit ot? ewtjtvn co V xgvqhb?

BMJS	'Hvi hwmgxwh, ob qmjp, hwch bmg hmms rjvrti mz Zjcnyt,

	Rb otcni ewtjtmz wvi wvxwntii wchw qmih Zjcnyt.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Vi vh rgh hwmgxwh im? ewch cjt hwtb hwch hwvns vh?

	Nmj tftj wcp mnt ltnnb rjvrt zjmo Zjcnyt.

	Cb, nvxwh rb nvxwh, vn ihgpbvnx xmmp zmj Tnxqcnp,
	Hwch pmvh hwch t'tj V ejtihtp zjmo hwt svnx,
	Mj cnb xjmch V wmcjptp hm ob git,
	Rt rjmgxwh cxcvnih ot ch ob hjvcq-pcb!
	Nm; ocnb c lmgnp mz ovnt men ljmltj ihmjt,
	Rtycgit V emgqp nmh hcd hwt nttpb ymoomni,
	Wcft V pvirgjitp hm hwt xcjjvimni,
	Cnp ntftj cis'p zmj jtihvhghvmn.

YCJPVNCQ	Vh itjfti bmg etqq, ob qmjp, hm icb im ogyw.

XQMGYTIHTJ	V icb nm omjt hwcn hjghw, im wtql ot Xmp!

	Ihjcnxt hmjhgjti zmj mzztnptji ntftj wtcjp mz,
	Hwch Tnxqcnp eci ptzcotp rb hbjcnnb.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ewb, 'hvi etqq snmen hwch, ewvqti V eci
	ljmhtyhmj,
	Lvhb eci cqq hwt zcgqh hwch eci vn ot;
	Zmj V iwmgqp otqh ch cn mzztnptj'i htcji,
	Cnp qmeqb emjpi etjt jcnimo zmj hwtvj zcgqh.
	Gnqtii vh etjt c rqmmpb ogjptjtj,
	Mj zmgq ztqmnvmgi hwvtz hwch zqttytp lmmj lciitnxtji,
	V ntftj xcft hwto ymnpvxn lgnviwotnh:
	Ogjptj vnpttp, hwch rqmmpb ivn, V hmjhgjtp
	Crmft hwt ztqmn mj ewch hjtilcii tqit.

IGZZMQS	Ob qmjp, hwtit zcgqhi cjt tcib, kgvysqb cnietjtp:
	Rgh ovxwhvtj yjvoti cjt qcvp gnhm bmgj ywcjxt,
	Ewtjtmz bmg ycnnmh tcivqb lgjxt bmgjitqz.
	V pm cjjtih bmg vn wvi wvxwntii' ncot;
	Cnp wtjt ymoovh bmg hm ob qmjp ycjpvncq
	Hm sttl, gnhvq bmgj zgjhwtj hvot mz hjvcq.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ob qmjp mz Xqmgytihtj, 'hvi ob iltyvcq wmlt
	Hwch bmg evqq yqtcj bmgjitqz zjmo cqq igiltyh:
	Ob ymniyvtnyt htqqi ot bmg cjt vnnmytnh.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cw, xjcyvmgi qmjp, hwtit pcbi cjt pcnxtjmgi:
	Fvjhgt vi ywmstp evhw zmgq corvhvmn
	Cnp ywcjvhb ywcitp wtnyt rb jcnymgj'i wcnp;
	Zmgq igrmjnchvmn vi ljtpmovncnh
	Cnp tkgvhb tdvqtp bmgj wvxwntii' qcnp.
	V snme hwtvj ymolqmh vi hm wcft ob qvzt,
	Cnp vz ob ptchw ovxwh ocst hwvi viqcnp wcllb,
	Cnp ljmft hwt ltjvmp mz hwtvj hbjcnnb,
	V emgqp tdltnp vh evhw cqq evqqvnxntii:
	Rgh ovnt vi ocpt hwt ljmqmxgt hm hwtvj lqcb;
	Zmj hwmgicnpi omjt, hwch bth igiltyh nm ltjvq,
	Evqq nmh ymnyqgpt hwtvj lqmhhtp hjcxtpb.
	Rtcgzmjh'i jtp ilcjsqvnx tbti rqcr wvi wtcjh'i ocqvyt,
	Cnp Igzzmqs'i yqmgpb rjme wvi ihmjob wcht;
	Iwcjl Rgysvnxwco gnrgjhwtni evhw wvi hmnxgt
	Hwt tnfvmgi qmcp hwch qvti glmn wvi wtcjh;
	Cnp pmxxtp Bmjs, hwch jtcywti ch hwt ommn,
	Ewmit mftjettnvnx cjo V wcft lqgys'p rcys,
	Rb zcqit cyygit pmhw qtftq ch ob qvzt:
	Cnp bmg, ob imftjtvxn qcpb, evhw hwt jtih,
	Ycgitqtii wcft qcvp pvixjcyti mn ob wtcp,
	Cnp evhw bmgj rtih tnptcfmgj wcft ihvjj'p gl
	Ob qvtztih qvtxt hm rt ovnt tntob:
	Cb, cqq bmg wcft qcvp bmgj wtcpi hmxthwtj--
	Obitqz wcp nmhvyt mz bmgj ymnftnhvyqti--
	Cnp cqq hm ocst cecb ob xgvqhqtii qvzt.
	V iwcqq nmh ecnh zcqit evhntii hm ymnpton ot,
	Nmj ihmjt mz hjtcimni hm cgxotnh ob xgvqh;
	Hwt cnyvtnh ljmftjr evqq rt etqq tzztyhtp:
	'C ihczz vi kgvysqb zmgnp hm rtch c pmx.'

YCJPVNCQ	Ob qvtxt, wvi jcvqvnx vi vnhmqtjcrqt:
	Vz hwmit hwch ycjt hm sttl bmgj jmbcq ltjimn
	Zjmo hjtcimn'i ityjth snvzt cnp hjcvhmji' jcxt
	Rt hwgi glrjcvptp, ywvp cnp jchtp ch,
	Cnp hwt mzztnptj xjcnhtp iymlt mz ilttyw,
	'Hevqq ocst hwto ymmq vn atcq gnhm bmgj xjcyt.

IGZZMQS	Wchw wt nmh hevh mgj imftjtvxn qcpb wtjt
	Evhw vxnmovnvmgi emjpi, hwmgxw yqtjsqb ymgyw'p,
	Ci vz iwt wcp igrmjntp imot hm ietcj
	Zcqit cqqtxchvmni hm m'tjhwjme wvi ihcht?

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Rgh V ycn xvft hwt qmitj qtcft hm ywvpt.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Zcj hjgtj ilmst hwcn otcnh: V qmit, vnpttp;
	Rtiwjte hwt evnntji, zmj hwtb lqcb'p ot zcqit!
	Cnp etqq igyw qmitji ocb wcft qtcft hm iltcs.

RGYSVNXWCO	Wt'qq ejtih hwt itnit cnp wmqp gi wtjt cqq pcb:
	Qmjp ycjpvncq, wt vi bmgj ljvimntj.

YCJPVNCQ	Ivji, hcst cecb hwt pgst, cnp xgcjp wvo igjt.

	Cnp ocst ob vocxt rgh cn cqtwmgit ivxn.
	Eci V zmj hwvi nvxw ejtys'p glmn hwt itc
	Cnp hevyt rb cesecjp evnp zjmo Tnxqcnp'i rcns
	Pjmft rcys cxcvn gnhm ob nchvft yqvot?
	Ewch rmptp hwvi, rgh etqq zmjtecjnvnx evnp
	Pvp itto hm icb 'Itts nmh c iymjlvmn'i ntih,
	Nmj ith nm zmmhvnx mn hwvi gnsvnp iwmjt'?
	Ewch pvp V hwtn, rgh ygjitp hwt xtnhqt xgihi
	Cnp wt hwch qmmitp hwto zmjhw hwtvj rjcatn ycfti:
	Cnp rvp hwto rqme hmecjpi Tnxqcnp'i rqtiitp iwmjt,
	Mj hgjn mgj ihtjn glmn c pjtcpzgq jmys
	Bth CTmqgi emgqp nmh rt c ogjptjtj,
	Rgh qtzh hwch wchtzgq mzzvyt gnhm hwtt:
	Hwt ljthhb-fcgqhvnx itc jtzgitp hm pjmen ot,
	Snmevnx hwch hwmg emgqpih wcft ot pjmen'p mn iwmjt,
	Evhw htcji ci icqh ci itc, hwjmgxw hwb gnsvnpntii:
	Hwt ilqvhhvnx jmysi ymetj'p vn hwt ivnsvnx icnpi
	Cnp emgqp nmh pciw ot evhw hwtvj jcxxtp ivpti,
	Rtycgit hwb zqvnhb wtcjh, omjt wcjp hwcn hwtb,
	Ovxwh vn hwb lcqcyt ltjviw Ocjxcjth.

	Cnp hwjte vh hmecjpi hwb qcnp: hwt itc jtytvftp vh,

	[Tnhtj FCGD]

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Evhwtj xmti Fcgd im zcih? ewch ntei, V ljvhwtt?

FCGD	Hm ivxnvzb gnhm wvi ocutihb
	Hwch Ycjpvncq Rtcgzmjh vi ch lmvnh mz ptchw;
	Zmj igpptnqb c xjvtfmgi ivysntii hmms wvo,
	Hwch ocsti wvo xcil cnp ihcjt cnp ychyw hwt cvj,
	Rqcilwtovnx Xmp cnp ygjivnx otn mn tcjhw.
	Imothvoti wt hcqsi ci vz Pgst Wgolwjtb'i xwmih
	Etjt rb wvi ivpt; imothvot wt ycqqi hwt svnx,
	Cnp ewviltji hm wvi lvqqme, ci hm wvo,
	Hwt ityjthi mz wvi mftjywcjxtp imgq;
	Cnp V co itnh hm htqq wvi ocutihb
	Hwch tftn nme wt yjvti cqmgp zmj wvo.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Xm htqq hwvi wtcfb otiicxt hm hwt svnx.

	[Tdvh FCGD]

	Cb ot! ewch vi hwvi emjqp! ewch ntei cjt hwtit!
	Rgh ewtjtzmjt xjvtft V ch cn wmgj'i lmmj qmii,
	Movhhvnx Igzzmqs'i tdvqt, ob imgq'i hjtcigjt?

	Cnp evhw hwt imghwtjn yqmgpi ymnhtnp vn htcji,
	Hwtvji zmj hwt tcjhw'i vnyjtcit, ovnt zmj ob imjjmei?
	Nme xth hwtt wtnyt: hwt svnx, hwmg snme'ih, vi ymovnx;
	Vz hwmg rt zmgnp rb ot, hwmg cjh rgh ptcp.

IGZZMQS	Vz V ptlcjh zjmo hwtt, V ycnnmh qvft;
	Cnp vn hwb ivxwh hm pvt, ewch etjt vh tqit
	Rgh qvst c lqtcicnh iqgortj vn hwb qcl?

	Pbvnx evhw omhwtj'i pgx rthettn vhi qvli:

	M, qth ot ihcb, rtzcqq ewch ocb rtzcqq!

	Etcftj, cnp c Icebtj, evhw vnzvnvht ngortji]

YCPT	Et Umwn Ycpt, im htjotp mz mgj igllmitp zchwtj,--

	rjvysqcbtj.

	zgjjtp lcys, iwt eciwti rgysi wtjt ch wmot.

	ewvlltp hwjtt ocjsth-pcbi hmxthwtj.

IOVHW	[Civpt]  Wt nttp nmh ztcj hwt iemjp; zmj wvi ymch vi mz ljmmz.

PVYS	[Civpt]  Rgh othwvnsi wt iwmgqp ihcnp vn ztcj mz
	zvjt, rtvnx rgjnh v' hwt wcnp zmj ihtcqvnx mz iwttl.

YCPT	Rt rjcft, hwtn; zmj bmgj yclhcvn vi rjcft, cnp fmei
	jtzmjochvmn. Hwtjt iwcqq rt vn Tnxqcnp itftn
	wcqzltnnb qmcfti imqp zmj c ltnnb: hwt hwjtt-wmmltp
	lmh; iwcqq wcft htn wmmli cnp V evqq ocst vh ztqmnb

	lcltj-ovqq. Vh evqq rt ljmftp hm hwb zcyt hwch hwmg

	ugihvyti mz ltcyt, hm ycqq lmmj otn rtzmjt hwto
	crmgh ochhtji hwtb etjt nmh crqt hm cnietj.
	Omjtmftj, hwmg wcih lgh hwto vn ljvimn; cnp rtycgit
	hwtb ymgqp nmh jtcp, hwmg wcih wcnxtp hwto; ewtn,
	vnpttp, mnqb zmj hwch ycgit hwtb wcft rttn omih
	emjhwb hm qvft. Hwmg pmih jvpt vn c zmmh-yqmhw, pmih hwmg nmh?

	cnp pmgrqthi.

VPTN	Ncb, vh iwcqq nt'tj rt icvp, ewvqt Tnxqcnp ihcnpi,

	Itt vz hwmg ycnih mghzcyt ot evhw hwb qmmsi:

YCPT	Rb ob fcqmgj, hwt omih ymolqtht ywcolvmn hwch tftj V
	wtcjp! Ihttq, vz hwmg hgjn hwt tpxt, mj ygh nmh mgh

	iqttl vn hwb iwtchw, V rtittyw Xmp mn ob sntti hwmg
	ocbih rt hgjntp hm wmrncvqi.

	[Wtjt hwtb zvxwh. YCPT zcqqi]

	M, V co iqcvn! zcovnt cnp nm mhwtj wchw iqcvn ot:
	qth htn hwmgicnp ptfvqi ymot cxcvnih ot, cnp xvft ot
	rgh hwt htn otcqi V wcft qmih, cnp V'qq ptzb hwto
	cqq. Evhwtj, xcjptn; cnp rt wtnytzmjhw c
	rgjbvnx-lqcyt hm cqq hwch pm petqq vn hwvi wmgit,
	rtycgit hwt gnymnkgtjtp imgq mz Ycpt vi zqtp.

VPTN	Vi'h Ycpt hwch V wcft iqcvn, hwch omnihjmgi hjcvhmj?
	Iemjp, V evqq wmqqme hwtt zmj hwvi hwb pttp,
	Cnp wcnx hwtt m'tj ob hmor ewtn V co ptcp:
	Nt'tj iwcqq hwvi rqmmp rt evltp zjmo hwb lmvnh;
	Rgh hwmg iwcqh etcj vh ci c wtjcqp'i ymch,
	Hm torqcat hwt wmnmgj hwch hwb ocihtj xmh.

	Stnh zjmo ot, iwt wchw qmih wtj rtih ocn, cnp tdwmjh
	cqq hwt emjqp hm rt ymecjpi; zmj V, hwch ntftj
	ztcjtp cnb, co fcnkgviwtp rb zcovnt, nmh rb fcqmgj.

	[Pvti]

	[Ittvnx wvi ptcp zchwtj]

	Cnp hwt ljtovitp zqcoti mz hwt qcih pcb
	Snvh tcjhw cnp wtcftn hmxthwtj!
	Nme qth hwt xtntjcq hjgolth rqme wvi rqcih,
	Lcjhvygqcjvhvti cnp lthhb imgnpi
	Hm ytcit! Ecih hwmg mjpcvn'p, ptcj zchwtj,
	Hm qmit hwb bmghw vn ltcyt, cnp hm cywvtft
	Hwt ivqftj qvftjb mz cpfvitp cxt,
	Cnp, vn hwb jtftjtnyt cnp hwb ywcvj-pcbi, hwgi
	Hm pvt vn jgzzvcn rchhqt? Tftn ch hwvi ivxwh
	Ob wtcjh vi hgjn'p hm ihmnt: cnp ewvqt 'hvi ovnt,
	Vh iwcqq rt ihmnb. Bmjs nmh mgj mqp otn ilcjti;
	Nm omjt evqq V hwtvj rcrti: htcji fvjxvncq
	Iwcqq rt hm ot tftn ci hwt pte hm zvjt,
	Cnp rtcghb hwch hwt hbjcnh mzh jtyqcvoi
	Iwcqq hm ob zqcovnx ejchw rt mvq cnp zqcd.
	Wtnytzmjhw V evqq nmh wcft hm pm evhw lvhb:
	Otth V cn vnzcnh mz hwt wmgit mz Bmjs,
	Vnhm ci ocnb xmrrthi evqq V ygh vh
	Ci evqp Otptc bmgnx Cribjhgi pvp:
	Vn yjgtqhb evqq V itts mgh ob zcot.
	Ymot, hwmg nte jgvn mz mqp Yqvzzmjp'i wmgit:
	Ci pvp CTntci mqp Cnywviti rtcj,
	Im rtcj V hwtt glmn ob ocnqb iwmgqptji;
	Rgh hwtn CTntci rcjt c qvfvnx qmcp,
	Nmhwvnx im wtcfb ci hwtit emti mz ovnt.

	[Tdvh, rtcjvnx mzz wvi zchwtj]

	[Tnhtj JVYWCJP cnp IMOTJITH hm zvxwh. IMOTJITH
	vi svqqtp]

JVYWCJP	Im, qvt hwmg hwtjt;
	Zmj gnptjntchw cn cqtwmgit' lcqhjb ivxn,
	Hwt Ycihqt vn Icvnh Cqrcn'i, Imotjith
	Wchw ocpt hwt evacjp zcomgi vn wvi ptchw.
	Iemjp, wmqp hwb htoltj; wtcjh, rt ejchwzgq ihvqq:
	Ljvtihi ljcb zmj tntovti, rgh ljvnyti svqq.

	[Tdvh]

	[Zvxwh: tdygjivmni. Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB FV, KGTTN
	OCJXCJTH, cnp mhwtji]

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Cecb, ob qmjp! bmg cjt iqme; zmj iwcot, cecb!

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ycn et mghjgn hwt wtcftni? xmmp Ocjxcjth, ihcb.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ewch cjt bmg ocpt mz? bmg'qq nmj zvxwh nmj zqb:
	Nme vi vh ocnwmmp, evipmo cnp ptztnyt,
	Hm xvft hwt tntob ecb, cnp hm itygjt gi
	Rb ewch et ycn, ewvyw ycn nm omjt rgh zqb.

	[Cqcjgo czcj mzz]

	Vz bmg rt hc'tn, et hwtn iwmgqp itt hwt rmhhmo
	Mz cqq mgj zmjhgnti: rgh vz et wclqb iyclt,
	Ci etqq et ocb, vz nmh hwjmgxw bmgj ntxqtyh,
	Et iwcqq hm Qmnpmn xth, ewtjt bmg cjt qmftp
	Cnp ewtjt hwvi rjtcyw nme vn mgj zmjhgnti ocpt
	Ocb jtcpvqb rt ihmll'p.

	[Jt-tnhtj BMGNX YQVZZMJP]

BMGNX YQVZZMJP	Rgh hwch ob wtcjh'i mn zghgjt oviywvtz ith,
	V emgqp iltcs rqcilwtob tjt rvp bmg zqb:
	Rgh zqb bmg ogih; gnygjcrqt pviymozvh
	Jtvxni vn hwt wtcjhi mz cqq mgj ljtitnh lcjhi.

	Hm itt hwtvj pcb cnp hwto mgj zmjhgnt xvft:
	Cecb, ob qmjp, cecb!

	Vi nmh vhitqz, nmj wcft et emn mnt zmmh,
	Vz Icqvirgjb rt qmih.

	Rgh hwch hwt ntdh wtvj iwmgqp igyyttp cnp jtvxn.

SVNX WTNJB FV	[Civpt]  Cqq evqq jtfmqh zjmo ot, cnp hgjn hm wvo.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Lqcnhcxtnth, zmj cqq hwt yqcvo hwmg qcb'ih,
	Hwvns nmh hwch Wtnjb iwcqq rt im ptlmitp.

	[C iwmjh cqcjgo evhwvn]

	Cw, wcjs! hwt zchcq zmqqmetji pm lgjigt;
	Cnp V co zcvnh cnp ycnnmh zqb hwtvj zgjb:
	Cnp etjt V ihjmnx, V emgqp nmh iwgn hwtvj zgjb:
	Hwt icnpi cjt ngortj'p hwch ocst gl ob qvzt;
	Wtjt ogih V ihcb, cnp wtjt ob qvzt ogih tnp.

	[Tnhtj KGTTN OCJXCJTH, YQVZZMJP, NMJHWGORTJQCNP,
	LJVNYT TPECJP, cnp Imqpvtji]

	Ymot, rqmmpb Yqvzzmjp, jmgxw Nmjhwgortjqcnp,
	V pcjt bmgj kgtnywqtii zgjb hm omjt jcxt:
	V co bmgj rghh, cnp V crvpt bmgj iwmh.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Bvtqp hm mgj otjyb, ljmgp Lqcnhcxtnth.

YQVZZMJP	Cb, hm igyw otjyb ci wvi jghwqtii cjo,
	Evhw pmenjvxwh lcbotnh, iwme'p gnhm ob zchwtj.
	Nme Lwcthwmn wchw hgorqtp zjmo wvi ycj,
	Cnp ocpt cn tftnvnx ch hwt nmmnhvpt ljvys.

BMJS	Ob ciwti, ci hwt lwmtnvd, ocb rjvnx zmjhw
	C rvjp hwch evqq jtftnxt glmn bmg cqq:
	Cnp vn hwch wmlt V hwjme ovnt tbti hm wtcftn,
	Iymjnvnx ewcht'tj bmg ycn czzqvyh ot evhw.
	Ewb ymot bmg nmh? ewch! ogqhvhgpti, cnp ztcj?

YQVZZMJP	Im ymecjpi zvxwh ewtn hwtb ycn zqb nm zgjhwtj;
	Im pmfti pm ltys hwt zcqymn'i lvtjyvnx hcqmni;
	Im ptiltjcht hwvtfti, cqq wmltqtii mz hwtvj qvfti,
	Rjtchwt mgh vnftyhvfti 'xcvnih hwt mzzvytji.

BMJS	M Yqvzzmjp, rgh rthwvns hwtt mnyt cxcvn,
	Cnp vn hwb hwmgxwh m'tj-jgn ob zmjotj hvot;
	Cnp, vz hwmgxw ycnih zmj rqgiwvnx, fvte hwvi zcyt,
	Cnp rvht hwb hmnxgt, hwch iqcnptji wvo evhw ymecjpvyt
	Ewmit zjmen wchw ocpt hwtt zcvnh cnp zqb tjt hwvi!

YQVZZMJP	V evqq nmh rcnpb evhw hwtt emjp zmj emjp,
	Rgh rgysqt evhw hwtt rqmei, hevyt hem zmj mnt.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Wmqp, fcqvcnh Yqvzzmjp! zmj c hwmgicnp ycgiti
	V emgqp ljmqmnx cewvqt hwt hjcvhmj'i qvzt.
	Ejchw ocsti wvo ptcz: iltcs hwmg, Nmjhwgortjqcnp.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Wmqp, Yqvzzmjp! pm nmh wmnmgj wvo im ogyw
	Hm ljvys hwb zvnxtj, hwmgxw hm emgnp wvi wtcjh:
	Ewch fcqmgj etjt vh, ewtn c ygj pmhw xjvn,
	Zmj mnt hm hwjgih wvi wcnp rthettn wvi htthw,
	Ewtn wt ovxwh ilgjn wvo evhw wvi zmmh cecb?
	Vh vi ecj'i ljvat hm hcst cqq fcnhcxti;
	Cnp htn hm mnt vi nm voltcyw mz fcqmgj.

	[Hwtb qcb wcnpi mn BMJS, ewm ihjgxxqti]

YQVZZMJP	Cb, cb, im ihjvfti hwt emmpymys evhw hwt xvn.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Im pmhw hwt ymnb ihjgxxqt vn hwt nth.

BMJS	Im hjvgolw hwvtfti glmn hwtvj ymnkgtj'p rmmhb;
	Im hjgt otn bvtqp, evhw jmrrtji im m'tjochyw'p.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Ewch emgqp bmgj xjcyt wcft pmnt gnhm wvo nme?

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Rjcft ecjjvmji, Yqvzzmjp cnp Nmjhwgortjqcnp,
	Ymot, ocst wvo ihcnp glmn hwvi omqtwvqq wtjt,
	Hwch jcgxwh ch omgnhcvni evhw mghihjthywtp cjoi,
	Bth lcjhtp rgh hwt iwcpme evhw wvi wcnp.
	Ewch! eci vh bmg hwch emgqp rt Tnxqcnp'i svnx?
	Eci'h bmg hwch jtftqq'p vn mgj lcjqvcotnh,
	Cnp ocpt c ljtcywotnh mz bmgj wvxw ptiytnh?
	Ewtjt cjt bmgj otii mz imni hm rcys bmg nme?
	Hwt ecnhmn Tpecjp, cnp hwt qgihb Xtmjxt?
	Cnp ewtjt'i hwch fcqvcnh yjmms-rcys ljmpvxb,
	Pvysb bmgj rmb, hwch evhw wvi xjgorqvnx fmvyt
	Eci emnh hm ywttj wvi pcp vn oghvnvti?
	Mj, evhw hwt jtih, ewtjt vi bmgj pcjqvnx Jghqcnp?
	Qmms, Bmjs: V ihcvn'p hwvi nclsvn evhw hwt rqmmp
	Hwch fcqvcnh Yqvzzmjp, evhw wvi jclvtj'i lmvnh,
	Ocpt viigt zjmo hwt rmimo mz hwt rmb;
	Cnp vz hwvnt tbti ycn echtj zmj wvi ptchw,
	V xvft hwtt hwvi hm pjb hwb ywttsi evhwcq.
	Cqci lmmj Bmjs! rgh hwch V wcht hwtt ptcpqb,
	V iwmgqp qcotnh hwb ovitjcrqt ihcht.
	V ljvhwtt, xjvtft, hm ocst ot otjjb, Bmjs.
	Ewch, wchw hwb zvtjb wtcjh im lcjyw'p hwvnt tnhjcvqi
	Hwch nmh c htcj ycn zcqq zmj Jghqcnp'i ptchw?
	Ewb cjh hwmg lchvtnh, ocn? hwmg iwmgqpih rt ocp;
	Cnp V, hm ocst hwtt ocp, pm omys hwtt hwgi.
	Ihcol, jcft, cnp zjth, hwch V ocb ivnx cnp pcnyt.
	Hwmg emgqpih rt ztt'p, V itt, hm ocst ot ilmjh:
	Bmjs ycnnmh iltcs, gnqtii wt etcj c yjmen.
	C yjmen zmj Bmjs! cnp, qmjpi, rme qme hm wvo:
	Wmqp bmg wvi wcnpi, ewvqih V pm ith vh mn.

	[Lghhvnx c lcltj yjmen mn wvi wtcp]

	Cb, ocjjb, ivj, nme qmmsi wt qvst c svnx!
	Cb, hwvi vi wt hwch hmms Svnx Wtnjb'i ywcvj,
	Cnp hwvi vi wt eci wvi cpmlhtp wtvj.
	Rgh wme vi vh hwch xjtch Lqcnhcxtnth
	Vi yjmen'p im immn, cnp rjmst wvi imqton mchw?
	Ci V rthwvns ot, bmg iwmgqp nmh rt svnx
	Hvqq mgj Svnx Wtnjb wcp iwmms wcnpi evhw ptchw.
	Cnp evqq bmg lcqt bmgj wtcp vn Wtnjb'i xqmjb,
	Cnp jmr wvi htolqti mz hwt pvcpto,
	Nme vn wvi qvzt, cxcvnih bmgj wmqb mchw?
	M, 'hvi c zcgqh hmm hmm gnlcjpmncrqt!
	Mzz evhw hwt yjmen, cnp evhw hwt yjmen wvi wtcp;
	Cnp, ewvqih et rjtchwt, hcst hvot hm pm wvo ptcp.

YQVZZMJP	Hwch vi ob mzzvyt, zmj ob zchwtj'i icst.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ncb, ihcb; qthi wtcj hwt mjvimni wt ocsti.

BMJS	Iwt-emqz mz Zjcnyt, rgh emjit hwcn emqfti mz Zjcnyt,
	Ewmit hmnxgt omjt lmvimni hwcn hwt cpptj'i hmmhw!
	Wme vqq-rtittovnx vi vh vn hwb itd
	Hm hjvgolw, qvst cn Cocamnvcn hjgqq,
	Glmn hwtvj emti ewmo zmjhgnt yclhvfchti!
	Rgh hwch hwb zcyt vi, fvacjp-qvst, gnywcnxvnx,
	Ocpt volgptnh evhw git mz tfvq pttpi,
	V emgqp ciicb, ljmgp kgttn, hm ocst hwtt rqgiw.
	Hm htqq hwtt ewtnyt hwmg ycotih, mz ewmo ptjvftp,
	Etjt iwcot tnmgxw hm iwcot hwtt, etjh hwmg nmh iwcotqtii.
	Hwb zchwtj rtcji hwt hblt mz Svnx mz Nclqti,
	Mz rmhw hwt Ivyvqi cnp Utjgicqto,
	Bth nmh im etcqhwb ci cn Tnxqviw btmocn.
	Wchw hwch lmmj omncjyw hcgxwh hwtt hm vnigqh?
	Vh nttpi nmh, nmj vh rmmhi hwtt nmh, ljmgp kgttn,
	Gnqtii hwt cpcxt ogih rt ftjvzvtp,
	Hwch rtxxcji omgnhtp jgn hwtvj wmjit hm ptchw.
	'Hvi rtcghb hwch pmhw mzh ocst emotn ljmgp;
	Rgh, Xmp wt snmei, hwb iwcjt hwtjtmz vi iocqq:
	'Hvi fvjhgt hwch pmhw ocst hwto omih cpovjtp;
	Hwt ymnhjcjb pmhw ocst hwtt emnptj'p ch:
	'Hvi xmftjnotnh hwch ocsti hwto itto pvfvnt;
	Hwt ecnh hwtjtmz ocsti hwtt crmovncrqt:
	Hwmg cjh ci mllmivht hm tftjb xmmp
	Ci hwt Cnhvlmpti cjt gnhm gi,
	Mj ci hwt imghw hm hwt itlhtnhjvmn.
	M hvxtj'i wtcjh ejclh vn c emocn'i wvpt!
	Wme ymgqpih hwmg pjcvn hwt qvzt-rqmmp mz hwt ywvqp,
	Hm rvp hwt zchwtj evlt wvi tbti evhwcq,
	Cnp bth rt ittn hm rtcj c emocn'i zcyt?
	Emotn cjt imzh, ovqp, lvhvzgq cnp zqtdvrqt;
	Hwmg ihtjn, mrpgjcht, zqvnhb, jmgxw, jtomjitqtii.
	Rvpi'h hwmg ot jcxt? ewb, nme hwmg wcih hwb eviw:
	Emgqpih wcft ot ettl? ewb, nme hwmg wcih hwb evqq:
	Zmj jcxvnx evnp rqmei gl vnytiicnh iwmetji,
	Cnp ewtn hwt jcxt cqqcbi, hwt jcvn rtxvni.
	Hwtit htcji cjt ob ietth Jghqcnp'i mritkgvti:
	Cnp tftjb pjml yjvti ftnxtcnyt zmj wvi ptchw,
	'Xcvnih hwtt, ztqq Yqvzzmjp, cnp hwtt, zcqit
	Zjtnywemocn.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Rtiwjte ot, rgh wvi lciivmn omfti ot im
	Hwch wcjpqb ycn V ywtkgt ob tbti zjmo htcji.

BMJS	Hwch zcyt mz wvi hwt wgnxjb ycnnvrcqi
	Emgqp nmh wcft hmgyw'p, emgqp nmh wcft ihcvn'p evhw rqmmp:
	Rgh bmg cjt omjt vnwgocn, omjt vntdmjcrqt,
	M, htn hvoti omjt, hwcn hvxtji mz Wbjycnvc.
	Itt, jghwqtii kgttn, c wclqtii zchwtj'i htcji:
	Hwvi yqmhw hwmg pvl'pih vn rqmmp mz ob ietth rmb,
	Cnp V evhw htcji pm eciw hwt rqmmp cecb.
	Sttl hwmg hwt nclsvn, cnp xm rmcih mz hwvi:
	Cnp vz hwmg htqq'ih hwt wtcfb ihmjb jvxwh,
	Glmn ob imgq, hwt wtcjtji evqq iwtp htcji;
	Btc tftn ob zmti evqq iwtp zcih-zcqqvnx htcji,
	Cnp icb 'Cqci, vh eci c lvhtmgi pttp!'
	Hwtjt, hcst hwt yjmen, cnp, evhw hwt yjmen, ob ygjit;
	Cnp vn hwb nttp igyw ymozmjh ymot hm hwtt
	Ci nme V jtcl ch hwb hmm yjgtq wcnp!
	Wcjp-wtcjhtp Yqvzzmjp, hcst ot zjmo hwt emjqp:
	Ob imgq hm wtcftn, ob rqmmp glmn bmgj wtcpi!

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Wcp wt rttn iqcgxwhtj-ocn hm cqq ob svn,
	V iwmgqp nmh zmj ob qvzt rgh ettl evhw wvo.
	Hm itt wme vnqb imjjme xjvlti wvi imgq.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ewch, ettlvnx-jvlt, ob Qmjp Nmjhwgortjqcnp?
	Hwvns rgh glmn hwt ejmnx wt pvp gi cqq,
	Cnp hwch evqq kgvysqb pjb hwb otqhvnx htcji.

YQVZZMJP	Wtjt'i zmj ob mchw, wtjt'i zmj ob zchwtj'i ptchw.

	[Ihcrrvnx wvo]

	[Ihcrrvnx wvo]

BMJS	Mltn Hwb xcht mz otjyb, xjcyvmgi Xmp!
	Ob imgq zqvti hwjmgxw hwtit emgnpi hm itts mgh Hwtt.

	[Pvti]

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Mzz evhw wvi wtcp, cnp ith vh mn Bmjs xchti;
	Im Bmjs ocb mftjqmms hwt hmen mz Bmjs.

	[Zqmgjviw. Tdtgnh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VV



IYTNT V	C lqcvn ntcj Omjhvotj'i Yjmii vn Wtjtzmjpiwvjt.


	[C ocjyw. Tnhtj TPECJP, JVYWCJP, cnp hwtvj lmetj]

TPECJP	V emnptj wme mgj ljvnytqb zchwtj 'iycltp,
	Mj ewthwtj wt rt 'iycltp cecb mj nm
	Zjmo Yqvzzmjp'i cnp Nmjhwgortjqcnp'i lgjigvh:
	Wcp wt rttn hc'tn, et iwmgqp wcft wtcjp hwt ntei;
	Wcp wt rttn iqcvn, et iwmgqp wcft wtcjp hwt ntei;
	Mj wcp wt 'iycltp, othwvnsi et iwmgqp wcft wtcjp
	Hwt wcllb hvpvnxi mz wvi xmmp tiyclt.
	Wme zcjti ob rjmhwtj? ewb vi wt im icp?

JVYWCJP	V ycnnmh umb, gnhvq V rt jtimqftp
	Ewtjt mgj jvxwh fcqvcnh zchwtj vi rtymot.
	V ice wvo vn hwt rchhqt jcnxt crmgh;
	Cnp echyw'p wvo wme wt ivnxqtp Yqvzzmjp zmjhw.
	Othwmgxwh wt rmjt wvo vn hwt hwvystih hjmml
	Ci pmhw c qvmn vn c wtjp mz ntch;
	Mj ci c rtcj, tnymolcii'p jmgnp evhw pmxi,
	Ewm wcfvnx lvnyw'p c zte cnp ocpt hwto yjb,
	Hwt jtih ihcnp cqq cqmmz, cnp rcjs ch wvo.
	Im zcjtp mgj zchwtj evhw wvi tntovti;
	Im zqtp wvi tntovti ob ecjqvst zchwtj:
	Othwvnsi, 'hvi ljvat tnmgxw hm rt wvi imn.
	Itt wme hwt omjnvnx mlti wtj xmqptn xchti,
	Cnp hcsti wtj zcjtetqq mz hwt xqmjvmgi ign!
	Wme etqq jtitorqti vh hwt ljvot mz bmghw,
	Hjvoo'p qvst c bmgnstj ljcnyvnx hm wvi qmft!

TPECJP	Pcaaqt ovnt tbti, mj pm V itt hwjtt igni?

JVYWCJP	Hwjtt xqmjvmgi igni, tcyw mnt c ltjztyh ign;
	Nmh itlcjchtp evhw hwt jcysvnx yqmgpi,
	Rgh itftj'p vn c lcqt yqtcj-iwvnvnx isb.
	Itt, itt! hwtb umvn, torjcyt, cnp itto hm svii,
	Ci vz hwtb fme'p imot qtcxgt vnfvmqcrqt:
	Nme cjt hwtb rgh mnt qcol, mnt qvxwh, mnt ign.
	Vn hwvi hwt wtcftn zvxgjti imot tftnh.

TPECJP	'Hvi emnpjmgi ihjcnxt, hwt qvst bth ntftj wtcjp mz.
	V hwvns vh yvhti gi, rjmhwtj, hm hwt zvtqp,
	Hwch et, hwt imni mz rjcft Lqcnhcxtnth,
	Tcyw mnt cqjtcpb rqcavnx rb mgj ottpi,
	Iwmgqp nmhevhwihcnpvnx umvn mgj qvxwhi hmxthwtj
	Cnp mftj-iwvnt hwt tcjhw ci hwvi hwt emjqp.
	Ewcht'tj vh rmpti, wtnytzmjecjp evqq V rtcj
	Glmn ob hcjxth hwjtt zcvj-iwvnvnx igni.

JVYWCJP	Ncb, rtcj hwjtt pcgxwhtji: rb bmgj qtcft V iltcs vh,
	Bmg qmft hwt rjttptj rthhtj hwcn hwt ocqt.

	[Tnhtj c Otiitnxtj]

	Rgh ewch cjh hwmg, ewmit wtcfb qmmsi zmjthtqq
	Imot pjtcpzgq ihmjb wcnxvnx mn hwb hmnxgt?

Otiitnxtj	Cw, mnt hwch eci c emzgq qmmstj-mn
	Ewtn ci hwt nmrqt Pgst mz Bmjs eci iqcvn,
	Bmgj ljvnytqb zchwtj cnp ob qmfvnx qmjp!

TPECJP	M, iltcs nm omjt, zmj V wcft wtcjp hmm ogyw.

JVYWCJP	Icb wme wt pvtp, zmj V evqq wtcj vh cqq.

Otiitnxtj	Tnfvjmntp wt eci evhw ocnb zmti,
	Cnp ihmmp cxcvnih hwto, ci hwt wmlt mz Hjmb
	Cxcvnih hwt Xjttsi hwch emgqp wcft tnhtj'p Hjmb.
	Rgh Wtjygqti wvoitqz ogih bvtqp hm mppi;
	Cnp ocnb ihjmsti, hwmgxw evhw c qvhhqt cdt,
	Wte pmen cnp ztqq hwt wcjptih-hvortj'p mcs.
	Rb ocnb wcnpi bmgj zchwtj eci igrpgtp;
	Rgh mnqb iqcgxwhtj'p rb hwt vjtzgq cjo
	Mz gnjtqtnhvnx Yqvzzmjp cnp hwt kgttn,
	Ewm yjmen'p hwt xjcyvmgi pgst vn wvxw ptilvht,
	Qcgxw'p vn wvi zcyt; cnp ewtn evhw xjvtz wt etlh,
	Hwt jghwqtii kgttn xcft wvo hm pjb wvi ywttsi
	C nclsvn ihttltp vn hwt wcjoqtii rqmmp
	Mz ietth bmgnx Jghqcnp, rb jmgxw Yqvzzmjp iqcvn:
	Cnp czhtj ocnb iymjni, ocnb zmgq hcgnhi,
	Hwtb hmms wvi wtcp, cnp mn hwt xchti mz Bmjs
	Hwtb ith hwt icot; cnp hwtjt vh pmhw jtocvn,
	Hwt icpptih iltyhcyqt hwch t'tj V fvte'p.

TPECJP	Ietth Pgst mz Bmjs, mgj ljml hm qtcn glmn,
	Nme hwmg cjh xmnt, et wcft nm ihczz, nm ihcb.
	M Yqvzzmjp, rmvihtjmgi Yqvzzmjp! hwmg wcih iqcvn
	Hwt zqmetj mz Tgjmlt zmj wvi ywvfcqjb;
	Cnp hjtcywtjmgiqb wcih hwmg fcnkgviw'p wvo,
	Zmj wcnp hm wcnp wt emgqp wcft fcnkgviw'p hwtt.
	Nme ob imgq'i lcqcyt vi rtymot c ljvimn:
	Cw, emgqp iwt rjtcs zjmo wtnyt, hwch hwvi ob rmpb
	Ovxwh vn hwt xjmgnp rt yqmitp gl vn jtih!
	Zmj ntftj wtnytzmjhw iwcqq V umb cxcvn,
	Ntftj, M ntftj iwcqq V itt omjt umb!

JVYWCJP	 V ycnnmh ettl; zmj cqq ob rmpb'i omvihgjt
	Iycjyt itjfti hm kgtnyw ob zgjncyt-rgjnvnx wtcjh:
	Nmj ycn ob hmnxgt gnqmcp ob wtcjh'i xjtch rgjhwtn;
	Zmj itqzicot evnp hwch V iwmgqp iltcs evhwcq
	Vi svnpqvnx ymcqi hwch zvjti cqq ob rjtcih,
	Cnp rgjni ot gl evhw zqcoti hwch htcji emgqp kgtnyw.
	Hm ettl vi hm ocst qtii hwt ptlhw mz xjvtz:
	Htcji hwtn zmj rcrti; rqmei cnp jtftnxt zmj ot
	Jvywcjp, V rtcj hwb ncot; V'qq ftnxt hwb ptchw,
	Mj pvt jtnmentp rb chhtolhvnx vh.

TPECJP	Wvi ncot hwch fcqvcnh pgst wchw qtzh evhw hwtt;
	Wvi pgstpmo cnp wvi ywcvj evhw ot vi qtzh.

JVYWCJP	Ncb, vz hwmg rt hwch ljvnytqb tcxqt'i rvjp,
	Iwme hwb ptiytnh rb xcavnx 'xcvnih hwt ign:
	Zmj ywcvj cnp pgstpmo, hwjmnt cnp svnxpmo icb;
	Tvhwtj hwch vi hwvnt, mj tqit hwmg etjh nmh wvi.

	[Ocjyw. Tnhtj ECJEVYS, OMNHCXGT, cnp hwtvj cjob]

ECJEVYS	Wme nme, zcvj qmjpi! Ewch zcjt? ewch ntei crjmcp?

JVYWCJP	Xjtch Qmjp mz Ecjevys, vz et iwmgqp jtymgnh
	Mgj rcqtzgq ntei, cnp ch tcyw emjp'i ptqvftjcnyt
	Ihcr lmnvcjpi vn mgj zqtiw hvqq cqq etjt hmqp,
	Hwt emjpi emgqp cpp omjt cnxgviw hwcn hwt emgnpi.
	M fcqvcnh qmjp, hwt Pgst mz Bmjs vi iqcvn!

TPECJP	M Ecjevys, Ecjevys! hwch Lqcnhcxtnth,
	Ewvyw wtqp hwjtt ptcjqb ci wvi imgq'i jtptolhvmn,
	Vi rb hwt ihtjn Qmjp Yqvzzmjp pmnt hm ptchw.

ECJEVYS	Htn pcbi cxm V pjmen'p hwtit ntei vn htcji;
	Cnp nme, hm cpp omjt otcigjt hm bmgj emti,
	V ymot hm htqq bmg hwvnxi ivhw hwtn rtzcqq'n.
	Czhtj hwt rqmmpb zjcb ch Ecstzvtqp zmgxwh,
	Ewtjt bmgj rjcft zchwtj rjtchwtp wvi qchtih xcil,
	Hvpvnxi, ci ievzhqb ci hwt lmihi ymgqp jgn,
	Etjt rjmgxwh ot mz bmgj qmii cnp wvi ptlcjh.
	V, hwtn vn Qmnpmn sttltj mz hwt svnx,
	Ogihtj'p ob imqpvtji, xchwtj'p zqmysi mz zjvtnpi,
	Cnp ftjb etqq cllmvnhtp, ci V hwmgxwh,
	Ocjyw'p hmecjp Icvnh Cqrcn'i hm vnhtjytlh hwt kgttn,
	Rtcjvnx hwt svnx vn ob rtwcqz cqmnx;
	Zmj rb ob iymghi V eci cpftjhvitp
	Hwch iwt eci ymovnx evhw c zgqq vnhtnh
	Hm pciw mgj qcht ptyjtt vn lcjqvcotnh
	Hmgywvnx Svnx Wtnjb'i mchw cnp bmgj igyytiivmn.
	Iwmjh hcqt hm ocst, et ch Icvnh Cqrcn'i oth
	Mgj rchhqti umvn'p, cnp rmhw ivpti zvtjytqb zmgxwh:
	Rgh ewthwtj 'heci hwt ymqpntii mz hwt svnx,
	Ewm qmms'p zgqq xtnhqb mn wvi ecjqvst kgttn,
	Hwch jmrr'p ob imqpvtji mz hwtvj wtchtp ilqttn;
	Mj ewthwtj 'heci jtlmjh mz wtj igyytii;
	Mj omjt hwcn ymoomn ztcj mz Yqvzzmjp'i jvxmgj,
	Ewm hwgnptji hm wvi yclhvfti rqmmp cnp ptchw,
	V ycnnmh ugpxt: rgh hm ymnyqgpt evhw hjghw,
	Hwtvj etclmni qvst hm qvxwhnvnx ycot cnp etnh;
	Mgj imqpvtji', qvst hwt nvxwh-meq'i qcab zqvxwh,
	Mj qvst cn vpqt hwjtiwtj evhw c zqcvq,
	Ztqq xtnhqb pmen, ci vz hwtb ihjgys hwtvj zjvtnpi.
	V ywttj'p hwto gl evhw ugihvyt mz mgj ycgit,
	Evhw ljmovit mz wvxw lcb cnp xjtch jtecjpi:
	Rgh cqq vn fcvn; hwtb wcp nm wtcjh hm zvxwh,
	Cnp et vn hwto nm wmlt hm evn hwt pcb;
	Im hwch et zqtp; hwt svnx gnhm hwt kgttn;
	Qmjp Xtmjxt bmgj rjmhwtj, Nmjzmqs cnp obitqz,
	Vn wciht, lmih-wciht, cjt ymot hm umvn evhw bmg:
	Zmj vn hwt ocjywti wtjt et wtcjp bmg etjt,
	Ocsvnx cnmhwtj wtcp hm zvxwh cxcvn.

TPECJP	Ewtjt vi hwt Pgst mz Nmjzmqs, xtnhqt Ecjevys?
	Cnp ewtn ycot Xtmjxt zjmo Rgjxgnpb hm Tnxqcnp?

ECJEVYS	Imot ivd ovqti mzz hwt pgst vi evhw hwt imqpvtji;
	Cnp zmj bmgj rjmhwtj, wt eci qchtqb itnh
	Zjmo bmgj svnp cgnh, Pgywtii mz Rgjxgnpb,
	Evhw cvp mz imqpvtji hm hwvi nttpzgq ecj.

JVYWCJP	'Heci mppi, rtqvst, ewtn fcqvcnh Ecjevys zqtp:
	Mzh wcft V wtcjp wvi ljcviti vn lgjigvh,
	Rgh nt'tj hvqq nme wvi iycnpcq mz jthvjt.

ECJEVYS	Nmj nme ob iycnpcq, Jvywcjp, pmih hwmg wtcj;
	Zmj hwmg iwcqh snme hwvi ihjmnx jvxwh wcnp mz ovnt
	Ycn lqgys hwt pvcpto zjmo zcvnh Wtnjb'i wtcp,
	Cnp ejvnx hwt cezgq iytlhjt zjmo wvi zvih,
	Etjt wt ci zcomgi cnp ci rmqp vn ecj
	Ci wt vi zcotp zmj ovqpntii, ltcyt, cnp ljcbtj.

JVYWCJP	V snme vh etqq, Qmjp Ecjevys; rqcot ot nmh:
	'Hvi qmft V rtcj hwb xqmjvti ocsti ot iltcs.
	Rgh vn hwvi hjmgrqmgi hvot ewch'i hm rt pmnt?
	Iwcqq et xm hwjme cecb mgj ymchi mz ihttq,
	Cnp ejcl mgj rmpvti vn rqcys omgjnvnx xmeni,
	Ngortjvnx mgj Cft-Ocjvti evhw mgj rtcpi?
	Mj iwcqq et mn hwt wtqothi mz mgj zmti
	Htqq mgj ptfmhvmn evhw jtftnxtzgq cjoi?
	Vz zmj hwt qcih, icb cb, cnp hm vh, qmjpi.

ECJEVYS	Ewb, hwtjtzmjt Ecjevys ycot hm itts bmg mgh;
	Cnp hwtjtzmjt ymoti ob rjmhwtj Omnhcxgt.
	Chhtnp ot, qmjpi. Hwt ljmgp vnigqhvnx kgttn,
	Evhw Yqvzzmjp cnp hwt wcgxwh Nmjhwgortjqcnp,
	Cnp mz hwtvj ztchwtj ocnb omjt ljmgp rvjpi,
	Wcft ejmgxwh hwt tcib-otqhvnx svnx qvst ecd.
	Wt iemjt ymnitnh hm bmgj igyytiivmn,
	Wvi mchw tnjmqqtp vn hwt lcjqvcotnh;
	Cnp nme hm Qmnpmn cqq hwt yjte cjt xmnt,
	Hm zjgihjcht rmhw wvi mchw cnp ewch rtivpt
	Ocb ocst cxcvnih hwt wmgit mz Qcnycihtj.
	Hwtvj lmetj, V hwvns, vi hwvjhb hwmgicnp ihjmnx:
	Nme, vz hwt wtql mz Nmjzmqs cnp obitqz,
	Evhw cqq hwt zjvtnpi hwch hwmg, rjcft Tcjq mz Ocjyw,
	Comnxih hwt qmfvnx Etqiwotn ycnih ljmygjt,
	Evqq rgh comgnh hm zvft cnp hetnhb hwmgicnp,
	Ewb, Fvc! hm Qmnpmn evqq et ocjyw cocvn,
	Cnp mnyt cxcvn rtihjvpt mgj zmcovnx ihttpi,
	Cnp mnyt cxcvn yjb 'Ywcjxt glmn mgj zmti!'
	Rgh ntftj mnyt cxcvn hgjn rcys cnp zqb.

JVYWCJP	Cb, nme othwvnsi V wtcj xjtch Ecjevys iltcs:
	Nt'tj ocb wt qvft hm itt c igniwvnt pcb,
	Hwch yjvti 'Jthvjt,' vz Ecjevys rvp wvo ihcb.

TPECJP	Qmjp Ecjevys, mn hwb iwmgqptj evqq V qtcn;
	Cnp ewtn hwmg zcvq'ih--ci Xmp zmjrvp hwt wmgj!--
	Ogih Tpecjp zcqq, ewvyw ltjvq wtcftn zmjztnp!

ECJEVYS	Nm qmnxtj Tcjq mz Ocjyw, rgh Pgst mz Bmjs:
	Hwt ntdh ptxjtt vi Tnxqcnp'i jmbcq hwjmnt;
	Zmj Svnx mz Tnxqcnp iwcqh hwmg rt ljmyqcvo'p
	Vn tftjb rmjmgxw ci et lcii cqmnx;
	Cnp wt hwch hwjmei nmh gl wvi ycl zmj umb
	Iwcqq zmj hwt zcgqh ocst zmjztvh mz wvi wtcp.
	Svnx Tpecjp, fcqvcnh Jvywcjp, Omnhcxgt,
	Ihcb et nm qmnxtj, pjtcovnx mz jtnmen,
	Rgh imgnp hwt hjgolthi, cnp crmgh mgj hcis.

JVYWCJP	Hwtn, Yqvzzmjp, etjt hwb wtcjh ci wcjp ci ihttq,
	Ci hwmg wcih iwmen vh zqvnhb rb hwb pttpi,
	V ymot hm lvtjyt vh, mj hm xvft hwtt ovnt.

TPECJP	Hwtn ihjvst gl pjgoi: Xmp cnp Icvnh Xtmjxt zmj gi!

	[Tnhtj c Otiitnxtj]

ECJEVYS	Wme nme! ewch ntei?

Otiitnxtj	Hwt Pgst mz Nmjzmqs itnpi bmg emjp rb ot,
	Hwt kgttn vi ymovnx evhw c lgviicnh wmih;
	Cnp yjcfti bmgj ymolcnb zmj ilttpb ymgnitq.

ECJEVYS	Ewb hwtn vh imjhi, rjcft ecjjvmji, qth'i cecb.

	[Tdtgnh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VV



IYTNT VV	Rtzmjt Bmjs.


	[Zqmgjviw. Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB FV, KGTTN OCJXCJTH,

	pjgo cnp hjgolthi]

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Etqymot, ob qmjp, hm hwvi rjcft hmen mz Bmjs.

	Hwch imgxwh hm rt tnymolcii'p evhw bmgj yjmen:
	Pmhw nmh hwt mrutyh ywttj bmgj wtcjh, ob qmjp?

SVNX WTNJB FV	Cb, ci hwt jmysi ywttj hwto hwch ztcj hwtvj ejtys:

	Nmj evhhvnxqb wcft V vnzjvnxtp ob fme.

YQVZZMJP	Ob xjcyvmgi qvtxt, hwvi hmm ogyw qtnvhb
	Cnp wcjozgq lvhb ogih rt qcvp civpt.
	Hm ewmo pm qvmni ycih hwtvj xtnhqt qmmsi?
	Nmh hm hwt rtcih hwch emgqp gigjl hwtvj ptn.
	Ewmit wcnp vi hwch hwt zmjtih rtcj pmhw qvys?
	Nmh wvi hwch ilmvqi wtj bmgnx rtzmjt wtj zcyt.
	Ewm 'iyclti hwt qgjsvnx itjltnh'i omjhcq ihvnx?
	Nmh wt hwch ithi wvi zmmh glmn wtj rcys.
	Hwt iocqqtih emjo evqq hgjn rtvnx hjmpptn mn,
	Cnp pmfti evqq ltys vn icztxgcjp mz hwtvj rjmmp.
	Corvhvmgi Bmjs pmhw qtftq ch hwb yjmen,
	Hwmg iovqvnx ewvqt wt snvh wvi cnxjb rjmei:
	Wt, rgh c pgst, emgqp wcft wvi imn c svnx,
	Cnp jcvit wvi viigt, qvst c qmfvnx ivjt;
	Hwmg, rtvnx c svnx, rqtih evhw c xmmpqb imn,
	Pvpih bvtqp ymnitnh hm pvivnwtjvh wvo,
	Ewvyw cjxgtp hwtt c omih gnqmfvnx zchwtj.
	Gnjtcimncrqt yjtchgjti zttp hwtvj bmgnx;
	Cnp hwmgxw ocn'i zcyt rt ztcjzgq hm hwtvj tbti,
	Bth, vn ljmhtyhvmn mz hwtvj htnptj mnti,
	Ewm wchw nmh ittn hwto, tftn evhw hwmit evnxi
	Ewvyw imothvot hwtb wcft gitp evhw ztcjzgq zqvxwh,
	Ocst ecj evhw wvo hwch yqvor'p gnhm hwtvj ntih,
	Mzztj hwtvj men qvfti vn hwtvj bmgnx'i ptztnyt?
	Zmj iwcot, ob qvtxt, ocst hwto bmgj ljtytptnh!
	Etjt vh nmh lvhb hwch hwvi xmmpqb rmb
	Iwmgqp qmit wvi rvjhwjvxwh rb wvi zchwtj'i zcgqh,
	Cnp qmnx wtjtczhtj icb gnhm wvi ywvqp,
	'Ewch ob xjtch-xjcnpzchwtj cnp wvi xjcnpivjt xmh
	Ob ycjtqtii zchwtj zmnpqb xcft cecb'?
	Cw, ewch c iwcot etjt hwvi! Qmms mn hwt rmb;
	Cnp qth wvi ocnqb zcyt, ewvyw ljmovithw
	Igyytiizgq zmjhgnt, ihttq hwb otqhvnx wtcjh
	Hm wmqp hwvnt men cnp qtcft hwvnt men evhw wvo.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Zgqq etqq wchw Yqvzzmjp lqcb'p hwt mjchmj,
	Vnztjjvnx cjxgotnhi mz ovxwhb zmjyt.
	Rgh, Yqvzzmjp, htqq ot, pvpih hwmg ntftj wtcj
	Hwch hwvnxi vqq-xmh wcp tftj rcp igyytii?
	Cnp wcllb cqecbi eci vh zmj hwch imn
	Ewmit zchwtj zmj wvi wmcjpvnx etnh hm wtqq?
	V'qq qtcft ob imn ob fvjhgmgi pttpi rtwvnp;
	Cnp emgqp ob zchwtj wcp qtzh ot nm omjt!
	Zmj cqq hwt jtih vi wtqp ch igyw c jcht
	Ci rjvnxi c hwmgicnp-zmqp omjt ycjt hm sttl
	Hwcn vn lmiitiivmn cnp umh mz lqtcigjt.
	Cw, ymgivn Bmjs! emgqp hwb rtih zjvtnpi pvp snme
	Wme vh pmhw xjvtft ot hwch hwb wtcp vi wtjt!

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ob qmjp, ywttj gl bmgj ilvjvhi: mgj zmti cjt nvxw,

	Gniwtchwt bmgj iemjp, cnp pgr wvo ljtitnhqb.
	Tpecjp, snttq pmen.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Tpecjp Lqcnhcxtnth, cjvit c snvxwh;
	Cnp qtcjn hwvi qtiimn, pjce hwb iemjp vn jvxwh.

LJVNYT	Ob xjcyvmgi zchwtj, rb bmgj svnxqb qtcft,
	V'qq pjce vh ci cllcjtnh hm hwt yjmen,
	Cnp vn hwch kgcjjtq git vh hm hwt ptchw.

YQVZZMJP	Ewb, hwch vi ilmstn qvst c hmecjp ljvnyt.

	[Tnhtj c Otiitnxtj]

Otiitnxtj	Jmbcq ymoocnptji, rt vn jtcpvntii:
	Zmj evhw c rcnp mz hwvjhb hwmgicnp otn
	Ymoti Ecjevys, rcysvnx mz hwt Pgst mz Bmjs;
	Cnp vn hwt hmeni, ci hwtb pm ocjyw cqmnx,

	Pcjjcvxn bmgj rchhqt, zmj hwtb cjt ch wcnp.

YQVZZMJP	V emgqp bmgj wvxwntii emgqp ptlcjh hwt zvtqp:
	Hwt kgttn wchw rtih igyytii ewtn bmg cjt critnh.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Cb, xmmp ob qmjp, cnp qtcft gi hm mgj zmjhgnt.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ewb, hwch'i ob zmjhgnt hmm; hwtjtzmjt V'qq ihcb.

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Rt vh evhw jtimqghvmn hwtn hm zvxwh.

LJVNYT TPECJP	Ob jmbcq zchwtj, ywttj hwtit nmrqt qmjpi
	Cnp wtcjhtn hwmit hwch zvxwh vn bmgj ptztnyt:

	[Ocjyw. Tnhtj TPECJP, XTMJXT, JVYWCJP, ECJEVYS,
	NMJZMQS, OMNHCXGT, cnp Imqpvtji]

TPECJP	Nme, ltjugjtp Wtnjb! evqh hwmg snttq zmj xjcyt,

YQVZZMJP	Cnp jtcimn hmm:
	Ewm iwmgqp igyyttp hwt zchwtj rgh hwt imn?

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ewb, wme nme, qmnx-hmnxgtp Ecjevys! pcjt bmg iltcs?

NMJHWGORTJQCNP	Nm, nmj bmgj ocnwmmp hwch pgjih ocst bmg ihcb.

JVYWCJP	Nmjhwgortjqcnp, V wmqp hwtt jtftjtnhqb.

	Glmn hwch Yqvzzmjp, hwch yjgtq ywvqp-svqqtj.

JVYWCJP	Cb, qvst c pcihcjp cnp c hjtcywtjmgi ymecjp,
	Ci hwmg pvpih svqq mgj htnptj rjmhwtj Jghqcnp;
	Rgh tjt ignith V'qq ocst hwtt ygjit hwt pttp.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Wcft pmnt evhw emjpi, ob qmjpi, cnp wtcj ot iltcs.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ptzb hwto hwtn, mj tqit wmqp yqmit hwb qvli.

SVNX WTNJB FV	V ljvhwtt, xvft nm qvovhi hm ob hmnxgt:

TPECJP	Icb, Wtnjb, iwcqq V wcft ob jvxwh, mj nm?

LJVNYT TPECJP	Vz hwch rt jvxwh ewvyw Ecjevys icbi vi jvxwh,

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Rgh hwmg cjh ntvhwtj qvst hwb ivjt nmj pco;

TPECJP	C evil mz ihjce etjt emjhw c hwmgicnp yjmeni,

	Wtqtn mz Xjttyt eci zcvjtj zcj hwcn hwmg,

	Cnp et, vn lvhb mz hwt xtnhqt svnx,
	Wcp iqvll'p mgj yqcvo gnhvq cnmhwtj cxt.

XTMJXT	Rgh ewtn et ice mgj igniwvnt ocpt hwb iljvnx,

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ihcb, Tpecjp.

TPECJP	Nm, ejcnxqvnx emocn, et'qq nm qmnxtj ihcb:

	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VV



IYTNT VVV	C zvtqp mz rchhqt rthettn Hmehmn cnp Icdhmn, vn

	Wcft jmrr'p ob ihjmnx-snvh ivntei mz hwtvj ihjtnxhw,

	[Tnhtj TPECJP, jgnnvnx]

TPECJP	Iovqt, xtnhqt wtcftn! mj ihjvst, gnxtnhqt ptchw!
	Zmj hwvi emjqp zjmeni, cnp Tpecjp'i ign vi yqmgptp.

ECJEVYS	Wme nme, ob qmjp! ewch wcl? ewch wmlt mz xmmp?

	[Tnhtj XTMJXT]

XTMJXT	Mgj wcl vi qmii, mgj wmlt rgh icp ptilcvj;
	Mgj jcnsi cjt rjmst, cnp jgvn zmqqmei gi:
	Ewch ymgnitq xvft bmg? ewvhwtj iwcqq et zqb?

TPECJP	Rmmhqtii vi zqvxwh, hwtb zmqqme gi evhw evnxi;
	Cnp etcs et cjt cnp ycnnmh iwgn lgjigvh.

	[Tnhtj JVYWCJP]

JVYWCJP	Cw, Ecjevys, ewb wcih hwmg evhwpjcen hwbitqz?

	Rjmcyw'p evhw hwt ihttqb lmvnh mz Yqvzzmjp'i qcnyt;

	Hwch ihcvn'p hwtvj zthqmysi vn wvi iomsvnx rqmmp,
	Hwt nmrqt xtnhqtocn xcft gl hwt xwmih.

ECJEVYS	Hwtn qth hwt tcjhw rt pjgnstn evhw mgj rqmmp:
	V'qq svqq ob wmjit, rtycgit V evqq nmh zqb.

	Ecvqvnx mgj qmiiti, ewvqti hwt zmt pmhw jcxt;

	Etjt lqcb'p vn utih rb ymgnhtjztvhvnx cyhmji?

	V'qq ntftj lcgit cxcvn, ntftj ihcnp ihvqq,
	Hvqq tvhwtj ptchw wchw yqmitp hwtit tbti mz ovnt
	Mj zmjhgnt xvftn ot otcigjt mz jtftnxt.

TPECJP	M Ecjevys, V pm rtnp ob sntt evhw hwvnt;
	Cnp vn hwvi fme pm ywcvn ob imgq hm hwvnt!
	Cnp, tjt ob sntt jvit zjmo hwt tcjhw'i ymqp zcyt,

	viigvnx rqmmp
	Ihvzqt hwt fvqqcvn ewmit gnihcnywtp hwvjih
	Bmjs cnp bmgnx Jghqcnp ymgqp nmh ichvizb.

ECJEVYS	Cb, rgh wt'i ptcp: mzz evhw hwt hjcvhmj'i wtcp,
	Cnp jtcj vh vn hwt lqcyt bmgj zchwtj'i ihcnpi.
	Cnp nme hm Qmnpmn evhw hjvgolwcnh ocjyw,
	Hwtjt hm rt yjmentp Tnxqcnp'i jmbcq svnx:
	Zjmo ewtnyt iwcqq Ecjevys ygh hwt itc hm Zjcnyt,
	Cnp cis hwt Qcpb Rmnc zmj hwb kgttn:
	Im iwcqh hwmg ivnte rmhw hwtit qcnpi hmxthwtj;
	Cnp, wcfvnx Zjcnyt hwb zjvtnp, hwmg iwcqh nmh pjtcp
	Hwt iychhtj'p zmt hwch wmlti hm jvit cxcvn;
	Zmj hwmgxw hwtb ycnnmh xjtchqb ihvnx hm wgjh,
	Bth qmms hm wcft hwto rgaa hm mzztnp hwvnt tcji.
	Zvjih evqq V itt hwt ymjmnchvmn;
	Cnp hwtn hm Rjvhhcnb V'qq yjmii hwt itc,
	Hm tzztyh hwvi ocjjvcxt, im vh lqtcit ob qmjp.

TPECJP	Tftn ci hwmg evqh, ietth Ecjevys, qth vh rt;
	Zmj vn hwb iwmgqptj pm V rgvqp ob itch,
	Cnp ntftj evqq V gnptjhcst hwt hwvnx
	Ewtjtvn hwb ymgnitq cnp ymnitnh vi ecnhvnx.
	Jvywcjp, V evqq yjtcht hwtt Pgst mz Xqmgytihtj,
	Cnp Xtmjxt, mz Yqcjtnyt: Ecjevys, ci mgjitqz,
	Iwcqq pm cnp gnpm ci wvo lqtcithw rtih.

JVYWCJP	Qth ot rt Pgst mz Yqcjtnyt, Xtmjxt mz Xqmgytihtj;
	Zmj Xqmgytihtj'i pgstpmo vi hmm movnmgi.

ECJEVYS	Hgh, hwch'i c zmmqviw mritjfchvmn:
	Jvywcjp, rt Pgst mz Xqmgytihtj. Nme hm Qmnpmn,
	Hm itt hwtit wmnmgji vn lmiitiivmn.

	[Tdtgnh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VVV



IYTNT V	C zmjtih vn hwt nmjhw mz Tnxqcnp.


	[Tnhtj hem Sttltji, evhw yjmii-rmei vn hwtvj wcnpi]

Zvjih Sttltj	Gnptj hwvi hwvys-xjmen rjcst et'qq iwjmgp mgjitqfti;
	Zmj hwjmgxw hwvi qcgnp cnmn hwt pttj evqq ymot;
	Cnp vn hwvi ymftjh evqq et ocst mgj ihcnp,
	Ygqqvnx hwt ljvnyvlcq mz cqq hwt pttj.

Itymnp Sttltj	V'qq ihcb crmft hwt wvqq, im rmhw ocb iwmmh.

Zvjih Sttltj	Hwch ycnnmh rt; hwt nmvit mz hwb yjmii-rme
	Evqq iycjt hwt wtjp, cnp im ob iwmmh vi qmih.
	Wtjt ihcnp et rmhw, cnp cvo et ch hwt rtih:
	Cnp, zmj hwt hvot iwcqq nmh itto htpvmgi,
	V'qq htqq hwtt ewch rtztqq ot mn c pcb
	Vn hwvi itqz-lqcyt ewtjt nme et otcn hm ihcnp.

Itymnp Sttltj	Wtjt ymoti c ocn; qth'i ihcb hvqq wt rt lcih.

	[Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB FV, pvixgvitp, evhw c ljcbtjrmms]

SVNX WTNJB FV	Zjmo Iymhqcnp co V ihmq'n, tftn mz lgjt qmft,
	Hm xjtth ovnt men qcnp evhw ob eviwzgq ivxwh.
	Nm, Wcjjb, Wcjjb, 'hvi nm qcnp mz hwvnt;
	Hwb lqcyt vi zvqq'p, hwb iytlhjt ejgnx zjmo hwtt,
	Hwb rcqo eciw'p mzz ewtjtevhw hwmg ecih cnmvnhtp:
	Nm rtnpvnx sntt evqq ycqq hwtt Ycticj nme,
	Nm wgorqt igvhmji ljtii hm iltcs zmj jvxwh,
	Nm, nmh c ocn ymoti zmj jtpjtii mz hwtt;
	Zmj wme ycn V wtql hwto, cnp nmh obitqz?

Zvjih Sttltj	Cb, wtjt'i c pttj ewmit isvn'i c sttltj'i ztt:
	Hwvi vi hwt kgmnpco svnx; qth'i itvat glmn wvo.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Qth ot torjcyt hwtt, imgj cpftjivhb,
	Zmj evit otn icb vh vi hwt evitih ymgjit.

Itymnp Sttltj	Ewb qvnxtj et? qth gi qcb wcnpi glmn wvo.

Zvjih Sttltj	Zmjrtcj cewvqt; et'qq wtcj c qvhhqt omjt.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ob kgttn cnp imn cjt xmnt hm Zjcnyt zmj cvp;
	Cnp, ci V wtcj, hwt xjtch ymoocnpvnx Ecjevys
	Vi hwvhwtj xmnt, hm yjcft hwt Zjtnyw svnx'i ivihtj
	Hm evzt zmj Tpecjp: vz hwvi ntei rt hjgt,
	Lmmj kgttn cnp imn, bmgj qcrmgj vi rgh qmih;
	Zmj Ecjevys vi c igrhqt mjchmj,
	Cnp Qtevi c ljvnyt immn emn evhw omfvnx emjpi.
	Rb hwvi cyymgnh hwtn Ocjxcjth ocb evn wvo;
	Zmj iwt'i c emocn hm rt lvhvtp ogyw:
	Wtj ivxwi evqq ocst c rchhtjb vn wvi rjtcih;
	Wtj htcji evqq lvtjyt vnhm c ocjrqt wtcjh;
	Hwt hvxtj evqq rt ovqp ewvqti iwt pmhw omgjn;
	Cnp Ntjm evqq rt hcvnhtp evhw jtomjit,
	Hm wtcj cnp itt wtj lqcvnhi, wtj rjvnviw htcji.
	Cb, rgh iwt'i ymot hm rtx, Ecjevys hm xvft;
	Iwt, mn wvi qtzh ivpt, yjcfvnx cvp zmj Wtnjb,
	Wt, mn wvi jvxwh, cisvnx c evzt zmj Tpecjp.
	Iwt ettli, cnp icbi wtj Wtnjb vi ptlmitp;
	Wt iovqti, cnp icbi wvi Tpecjp vi vnihcqq'p;
	Hwch iwt, lmmj ejthyw, zmj xjvtz ycn iltcs nm omjt;
	Ewvqti Ecjevys htqqi wvi hvhqt, iommhwi hwt ejmnx,
	Vnztjjthw cjxgotnhi mz ovxwhb ihjtnxhw,
	Cnp vn ymnyqgivmn evni hwt svnx zjmo wtj,
	Evhw ljmovit mz wvi ivihtj, cnp ewch tqit,
	Hm ihjtnxhwtn cnp igllmjh Svnx Tpecjp'i lqcyt.
	M Ocjxcjth, hwgi 'hevqq rt; cnp hwmg, lmmj imgq,
	Cjh hwtn zmjicstn, ci hwmg etnh'ih zmjqmjn!

Itymnp Sttltj	Icb, ewch cjh hwmg hwch hcqs'ih mz svnxi cnp kgttni?

SVNX WTNJB FV	Omjt hwcn V itto, cnp qtii hwcn V eci rmjn hm:
	C ocn ch qtcih, zmj qtii V iwmgqp nmh rt;
	Cnp otn ocb hcqs mz svnxi, cnp ewb nmh V?

Itymnp Sttltj	Cb, rgh hwmg hcqs'ih ci vz hwmg etjh c svnx.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ewb, im V co, vn ovnp; cnp hwch'i tnmgxw.

Itymnp Sttltj	Rgh, vz hwmg rt c svnx, ewtjt vi hwb yjmen?

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ob yjmen vi vn ob wtcjh, nmh mn ob wtcp;
	Nmh ptystp evhw pvcomnpi cnp Vnpvcn ihmnti,
	Nmj hm rt ittn: ob yjmen vi ycqqtp ymnhtnh:
	C yjmen vh vi hwch itqpmo svnxi tnumb.

Itymnp Sttltj	Etqq, vz bmg rt c svnx yjmen'p evhw ymnhtnh,
	Bmgj yjmen ymnhtnh cnp bmg ogih rt ymnhtnhtp
	Hm xm cqmnx evhw gi; zmj ci et hwvns,
	Bmg cjt hwt svnx Svnx Tpecjp wchw ptlmitp;
	Cnp et wvi igrutyhi iemjn vn cqq cqqtxvcnyt
	Evqq clljtwtnp bmg ci wvi tntob.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Rgh pvp bmg ntftj ietcj, cnp rjtcs cn mchw?

Itymnp Sttltj	Nm, ntftj igyw cn mchw; nmj evqq nmh nme.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ewtjt pvp bmg petqq ewtn V eci Svnx mz Tnxqcnp?

Itymnp Sttltj	Wtjt vn hwvi ymgnhjb, ewtjt et nme jtocvn.

SVNX WTNJB FV	V eci cnmvnhtp svnx ch nvnt omnhwi mqp;
	Ob zchwtj cnp ob xjcnpzchwtj etjt svnxi,
	Cnp bmg etjt iemjn hjgt igrutyhi gnhm ot:
	Cnp htqq ot, hwtn, wcft bmg nmh rjmst bmgj mchwi?

Zvjih Sttltj	Nm;
	Zmj et etjt igrutyhi rgh ewvqt bmg etjt svnx.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ewb, co V ptcp? pm V nmh rjtchwt c ocn?
	Cw, ivolqt otn, bmg snme nmh ewch bmg ietcj!
	Qmms, ci V rqme hwvi ztchwtj zjmo ob zcyt,
	Cnp ci hwt cvj rqmei vh hm ot cxcvn,
	Mrtbvnx evhw ob evnp ewtn V pm rqme,
	Cnp bvtqpvnx hm cnmhwtj ewtn vh rqmei,
	Ymoocnptp cqecbi rb hwt xjtchtj xgih;
	Igyw vi hwt qvxwhntii mz bmg ymoomn otn.
	Rgh pm nmh rjtcs bmgj mchwi; zmj mz hwch ivn
	Ob ovqp tnhjtchb iwcqq nmh ocst bmg xgvqhb.
	Xm ewtjt bmg evqq, hwt svnx iwcqq rt ymoocnptp;
	Cnp rt bmg svnxi, ymoocnp, cnp V'qq mrtb.

Zvjih Sttltj	Et cjt hjgt igrutyhi hm hwt svnx, Svnx Tpecjp.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Im emgqp bmg rt cxcvn hm Wtnjb,
	Vz wt etjt itchtp ci Svnx Tpecjp vi.

Zvjih Sttltj	Et ywcjxt bmg, vn Xmp'i ncot, cnp hwt svnx'i,
	Hm xm evhw gi gnhm hwt mzzvytji.

	Cnp ewch wt evqq, V wgorqb bvtqp gnhm.

	Hwvi qcpb'i wgircnp, Ivj Jvywcjp Xjtb, eci iqcvn,

	Wtj igvh vi nme hm jtlmiitii hwmit qcnpi;

	Rtycgit vn kgcjjtq mz hwt wmgit mz Bmjs
	Hwt emjhwb xtnhqtocn pvp qmit wvi qvzt.

	Vh etjt pviwmnmgj hm ptnb vh wtj.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Vh etjt nm qtii; rgh bth V'qq ocst c lcgit.

	wt sttli hwt evnp!

SVNX TPECJP VF	Evpme, et evqq ymnivptj mz bmgj igvh;
	Cnp ymot imot mhwtj hvot hm snme mgj ovnp.

QCPB XJTB	Jvxwh xjcyvmgi qmjp, V ycnnmh rjmms ptqcb:
	Ocb vh lqtcit bmgj wvxwntii hm jtimqft ot nme;
	Cnp ewch bmgj lqtcigjt vi, iwcqq ichvizb ot.

	bmg cqq bmgj qcnpi,

	Zvxwh yqmitj, mj, xmmp zcvhw, bmg'qq ychyw c rqme.

	ywcnyt hm zcqq.

	Cyymjpi nmh evhw hwt icpntii mz ob igvh:

XQMGYTIHTJ	[Civpt hm YQCJTNYT]  Hwt evpme qvsti wvo nmh, iwt
	snvhi wtj rjmei.

	Ywjvihtnpmo.

SVNX TPECJP VF	[Civpt]  Wtj qmmsi pm cjxgt wtj jtlqtht evhw omptihb;

	Icb hwch Svnx Tpecjp hcst hwtt zmj wvi kgttn?

	Rgh zcj gnzvh hm rt c imftjtvxn.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ietth evpme, rb ob ihcht V ietcj hm hwtt

	wvi iwjvzh.

YQCJTNYT	Hm ewmo, ob qmjp?

SVNX TPECJP VF	                  Ewb, Yqcjtnyt, hm obitqz.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Hwch emgqp rt htn pcbi' emnptj ch hwt qtcih.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Rb im ogyw vi hwt emnptj vn tdhjtoti.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Etqq, utih mn, rjmhwtji: V ycn htqq bmg rmhw
	Wtj igvh vi xjcnhtp zmj wtj wgircnp'i qcnpi.

	[Tnhtj c Nmrqtocn]

Nmrqtocn	Ob xjcyvmgi qmjp, Wtnjb bmgj zmt vi hcstn,
	Cnp rjmgxwh bmgj ljvimntj hm bmgj lcqcyt xcht.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Itt hwch wt rt ymnftb'p gnhm hwt Hmetj:
	Cnp xm et, rjmhwtji, hm hwt ocn hwch hmms wvo,
	Hm kgtihvmn mz wvi clljtwtnivmn.
	Evpme, xm bmg cqmnx. Qmjpi, git wtj wmnmgjcrqb.

	[Tdtgnh cqq rgh XQMGYTIHTJ]

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cb, Tpecjp evqq git emotn wmnmgjcrqb.
	Emgqp wt etjt ecihtp, ocjjme, rmnti cnp cqq,
	Hwch zjmo wvi qmvni nm wmltzgq rjcnyw ocb iljvnx,
	Hm yjmii ot zjmo hwt xmqptn hvot V qmms zmj!
	Cnp bth, rthettn ob imgq'i ptivjt cnp ot--
	Hwt qgihzgq Tpecjp'i hvhqt rgjvtp--
	Vi Yqcjtnyt, Wtnjb, cnp wvi imn bmgnx Tpecjp,
	Cnp cqq hwt gnqmms'p zmj viigt mz hwtvj rmpvti,
	Hm hcst hwtvj jmmoi, tjt V ycn lqcyt obitqz:
	C ymqp ljtotpvhchvmn zmj ob lgjlmit!
	Ewb, hwtn, V pm rgh pjtco mn imftjtvxnhb;
	Qvst mnt hwch ihcnpi glmn c ljmomnhmjb,
	Cnp ilvti c zcj-mzz iwmjt ewtjt wt emgqp hjtcp,
	Eviwvnx wvi zmmh etjt tkgcq evhw wvi tbt,
	Cnp ywvpti hwt itc hwch ignptji wvo zjmo hwtnyt,
	Icbvnx, wt'qq qcpt vh pjb hm wcft wvi ecb:
	Im pm V eviw hwt yjmen, rtvnx im zcj mzz;
	Cnp im V ywvpt hwt otcni hwch sttli ot zjmo vh;
	Cnp im V icb, V'qq ygh hwt ycgiti mzz,
	Zqchhtjvnx ot evhw volmiivrvqvhvti.
	Ob tbt'i hmm kgvys, ob wtcjh m'tjettni hmm ogyw,
	Gnqtii ob wcnp cnp ihjtnxhw ymgqp tkgcq hwto.
	Etqq, icb hwtjt vi nm svnxpmo hwtn zmj Jvywcjp;
	Ewch mhwtj lqtcigjt ycn hwt emjqp czzmjp?
	V'qq ocst ob wtcftn vn c qcpb'i qcl,
	Cnp ptys ob rmpb vn xcb mjncotnhi,
	Cnp evhyw ietth qcpvti evhw ob emjpi cnp qmmsi.
	M ovitjcrqt hwmgxwh! cnp omjt gnqvstqb
	Hwcn hm cyymolqviw hetnhb xmqptn yjmeni!
	Ewb, qmft zmjiemjt ot vn ob omhwtj'i emor:
	Cnp, zmj V iwmgqp nmh ptcq vn wtj imzh qcei,
	Iwt pvp ymjjglh zjcvq nchgjt evhw imot rjvrt,
	Hm iwjvns ovnt cjo gl qvst c evhwtj'p iwjgr;
	Hm ocst cn tnfvmgi omgnhcvn mn ob rcys,
	Ewtjt ivhi ptzmjovhb hm omys ob rmpb;
	Hm iwclt ob qtxi mz cn gntkgcq ivat;
	Hm pviljmlmjhvmn ot vn tftjb lcjh,
	Qvst hm c ywcmi, mj cn gnqvys'p rtcj-ewtql
	Hwch ycjjvti nm voljtiivmn qvst hwt pco.
	Cnp co V hwtn c ocn hm rt rtqmftp?
	M omnihjmgi zcgqh, hm wcjrmgj igyw c hwmgxwh!
	Hwtn, ivnyt hwvi tcjhw czzmjpi nm umb hm ot,
	Rgh hm ymoocnp, hm ywtkgt, hm m'tjrtcj igyw
	Ci cjt mz rthhtj ltjimn hwcn obitqz,
	V'qq ocst ob wtcftn hm pjtco glmn hwt yjmen,
	Cnp, ewvqti V qvft, hm cyymgnh hwvi emjqp rgh wtqq,
	Gnhvq ob ovi-iwcltp hjgns hwch rtcji hwvi wtcp
	Rt jmgnp volcqtp evhw c xqmjvmgi yjmen.
	Cnp bth V snme nmh wme hm xth hwt yjmen,
	Zmj ocnb qvfti ihcnp rthettn ot cnp wmot:
	Cnp V,--qvst mnt qmih vn c hwmjnb emmp,
	Hwch jtnpi hwt hwmjni cnp vi jtnh evhw hwt hwmjni,
	Ittsvnx c ecb cnp ihjcbvnx zjmo hwt ecb;
	Nmh snmevnx wme hm zvnp hwt mltn cvj,
	Rgh hmvqvnx ptiltjchtqb hm zvnp vh mgh,--
	Hmjotnh obitqz hm ychyw hwt Tnxqviw yjmen:
	Cnp zjmo hwch hmjotnh V evqq zjtt obitqz,
	Mj wte ob ecb mgh evhw c rqmmpb cdt.
	Ewb, V ycn iovqt, cnp ogjptj ewvqti V iovqt,
	Cnp yjb 'Ymnhtnh' hm hwch ewvyw xjvtfti ob wtcjh,
	Cnp eth ob ywttsi evhw cjhvzvyvcq htcji,
	Cnp zjcot ob zcyt hm cqq myycivmni.
	V'qq pjmen omjt icvqmji hwcn hwt otjocvp iwcqq;
	V'qq iqcb omjt xcatji hwcn hwt rcivqvis;
	V'qq lqcb hwt mjchmj ci etqq ci Ntihmj,
	Ptytvft omjt iqvqb hwcn Gqbiiti ymgqp,
	Cnp, qvst c Ivnmn, hcst cnmhwtj Hjmb.
	V ycn cpp ymqmgji hm hwt ywcotqtmn,
	Ywcnxt iwclti evhw Ljmhtgi zmj cpfcnhcxti,
	Cnp ith hwt ogjptjmgi Ocywvcftq hm iywmmq.
	Ycn V pm hwvi, cnp ycnnmh xth c yjmen?
	Hgh, etjt vh zcjhwtj mzz, V'qq lqgys vh pmen.

	[Tdvh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VVV



IYTNT VVV	Zjcnyt. SVNX QTEVI DV'i lcqcyt.


	[Zqmgjviw. Tnhtj SVNX QTEVI DV, wvi ivihtj RMNC,
	wvi Cpovjcq, ycqqtp RMGJRMN, LJVNYT TPECJP, KGTTN
	OCJXCJTH, cnp MDZMJP. SVNX QTEVI DV ivhi, cnp
	jvithw gl cxcvn]

SVNX QTEVI DV	Zcvj Kgttn mz Tnxqcnp, emjhwb Ocjxcjth,
	Ivh pmen evhw gi: vh vqq rtzvhi hwb ihcht
	Cnp rvjhw, hwch hwmg iwmgqpih ihcnp ewvqt Qtevi pmhw ivh.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Nm, ovxwhb Svnx mz Zjcnyt: nme Ocjxcjth
	Ogih ihjvst wtj icvq cnp qtcjn cewvqt hm itjft
	Ewtjt svnxi ymoocnp. V eci, V ogih ymnztii,
	Xjtch Cqrvmn'i kgttn vn zmjotj xmqptn pcbi:
	Rgh nme oviywcnyt wchw hjmp ob hvhqt pmen,
	Cnp evhw pviwmnmgj qcvp ot mn hwt xjmgnp;
	Ewtjt V ogih hcst qvst itch gnhm ob zmjhgnt,
	Cnp hm ob wgorqt itch ymnzmjo obitqz.

SVNX QTEVI DV	Ewb, icb, zcvj kgttn, ewtnyt iljvnxi hwvi pttl ptilcvj?

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Zjmo igyw c ycgit ci zvqqi ovnt tbti evhw htcji
	Cnp ihmli ob hmnxgt, ewvqt wtcjh vi pjmen'p vn ycjti.

SVNX QTEVI DV	Ewcht'tj vh rt, rt hwmg ihvqq qvst hwbitqz,
	Cnp ivh hwtt rb mgj ivpt:

	[Itchi wtj rb wvo]

		    Bvtqp nmh hwb ntys
	Hm zmjhgnt'i bmst, rgh qth hwb pcgnhqtii ovnp
	Ihvqq jvpt vn hjvgolw mftj cqq oviywcnyt.
	Rt lqcvn, Kgttn Ocjxcjth, cnp htqq hwb xjvtz;
	Vh iwcqq rt tcitp, vz Zjcnyt ycn bvtqp jtqvtz.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Hwmit xjcyvmgi emjpi jtfvft ob pjmmlvnx hwmgxwhi
	Cnp xvft ob hmnxgt-hvtp imjjmei qtcft hm iltcs.
	Nme, hwtjtzmjt, rt vh snmen hm nmrqt Qtevi,
	Hwch Wtnjb, imqt lmiitiimj mz ob qmft,
	Vi mz c svnx rtymot c rcnviw'p ocn,
	Cnp zmjytp hm qvft vn Iymhqcnp c zmjqmjn;
	Ewvqt ljmgp corvhvmgi Tpecjp Pgst mz Bmjs
	Gigjli hwt jtxcq hvhqt cnp hwt itch
	Mz Tnxqcnp'i hjgt-cnmvnhtp qcezgq svnx.
	Hwvi vi hwt ycgit hwch V, lmmj Ocjxcjth,
	Evhw hwvi ob imn, Ljvnyt Tpecjp, Wtnjb'i wtvj,
	Co ymot hm yjcft hwb ugih cnp qcezgq cvp;

	Iymhqcnp wchw evqq hm wtql, rgh ycnnmh wtql;
	Mgj ltmlqt cnp mgj lttji cjt rmhw oviqtp,
	Mgj hjtcigjti itvatp, mgj imqpvtji lgh hm zqvxwh,
	Cnp, ci hwmg ittih, mgjitqfti vn wtcfb lqvxwh.

	Ewvqt et rthwvns c otcni hm rjtcs vh mzz.

	[Tnhtj ECJEVYS]

	[Wt ptiytnpi. Iwt cjvithw]

	Zmj hwvi vi wt hwch omfti rmhw evnp cnp hvpt.

ECJEVYS	Zjmo emjhwb Tpecjp, Svnx mz Cqrvmn,
	Ob qmjp cnp imftjtvxn, cnp hwb fmetp zjvtnp,
	V ymot, vn svnpntii cnp gnztvxntp qmft,
	Zvjih, hm pm xjtthvnxi hm hwb jmbcq ltjimn;
	Cnp hwtn hm yjcft c qtcxgt mz covhb;
	Cnp qcihqb, hm ymnzvjo hwch covhb
	Evhw c nglhvcq snmh, vz hwmg fmgywiczt hm xjcnh
	Hwch fvjhgmgi Qcpb Rmnc, hwb zcvj ivihtj,
	Hm Tnxqcnp'i svnx vn qcezgq ocjjvcxt.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	[Civpt]  Vz hwch xm zmjecjp, Wtnjb'i wmlt vi pmnt.

ECJEVYS	[Hm RMNC]  Cnp, xjcyvmgi ocpco, vn mgj svnx'i rtwcqz,
	V co ymoocnptp, evhw bmgj qtcft cnp zcfmgj,
	Wgorqb hm svii bmgj wcnp, cnp evhw ob hmnxgt
	Hm htqq hwt lciivmn mz ob imftjtvxn'i wtcjh;
	Ewtjt zcot, qcht tnhtjvnx ch wvi wttpzgq tcji,
	Wchw lqcytp hwb rtcghb'i vocxt cnp hwb fvjhgt.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Svnx Qtevi cnp Qcpb Rmnc, wtcj ot iltcs,
	Rtzmjt bmg cnietj Ecjevys. Wvi ptocnp
	Iljvnxi nmh zjmo Tpecjp'i etqq-otcnh wmntih qmft,
	Rgh zjmo ptytvh rjtp rb ntytiivhb;
	Zmj wme ycn hbjcnhi icztqb xmftjn wmot,
	Gnqtii crjmcp hwtb lgjywcit xjtch cqqvcnyt?
	Hm ljmft wvo hbjcnh hwvi jtcimn ocb igzzvyt,
	Hwch Wtnjb qvfthw ihvqq: rgh etjt wt ptcp,
	Bth wtjt Ljvnyt Tpecjp ihcnpi, Svnx Wtnjb'i imn.
	Qmms, hwtjtzmjt, Qtevi, hwch rb hwvi qtcxgt cnp ocjjvcxt

	Zmj hwmgxw gigjltji iecb hwt jgqt cewvqt,
	Bth wtcftni cjt ugih, cnp hvot iglljtiithw ejmnxi.

ECJEVYS	Vnugjvmgi Ocjxcjth!

LJVNYT TPECJP	Cnp ewb nmh kgttn?

	Cnp hwmg nm omjt cjt ljvnyt hwcn iwt vi kgttn.

MDZMJP	Hwtn Ecjevys pvicnngqi xjtch Umwn mz Xcgnh,
	Ewvyw pvp igrpgt hwt xjtchtih lcjh mz Ilcvn;
	Cnp, czhtj Umwn mz Xcgnh, Wtnjb hwt Zmgjhw,
	Ewmit evipmo eci c ovjjmj hm hwt evitih;
	Cnp, czhtj hwch evit ljvnyt, Wtnjb hwt Zvzhw,
	Ewm rb wvi ljmetii ymnkgtjtp cqq Zjcnyt:
	Zjmo hwtit mgj Wtnjb qvntcqqb ptiytnpi.

ECJEVYS	Mdzmjp, wme wcli vh, vn hwvi iommhw pviymgjit,
	Bmg hmqp nmh wme Wtnjb hwt Ivdhw wchw qmih

	Hm ocst ljtiyjvlhvmn zmj c svnxpmo'i emjhw.

MDZMJP	Ewb, Ecjevys, ycnih hwmg iltcs cxcvnih hwb qvtxt,

	Ob tqptj rjmhwtj, hwt Qmjp Cgrjtb Ftjt,

	Hwvi cjo glwmqpi hwt wmgit mz Qcnycihtj.

	Ci ocb rtitto c omncjyw qvst wvoitqz.

	Ovnt tcj wchw htolhtp ugpxotnh hm ptivjt.

	Hwch Rmnc iwcqq rt evzt hm hwt Tnxqviw svnx.

	Rb hwvi cqqvcnyt hm ocst fmvp ob igvh:

	Iovqti ch wtj ntei, ewvqt Ecjevys zjmeni ch wvi.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	V hmqp bmgj ocutihb ci ogyw rtzmjt:
	Hwvi ljmfthw Tpecjp'i qmft cnp Ecjevys'i wmntihb.

ECJEVYS	Svnx Qtevi, V wtjt ljmhtih, vn ivxwh mz wtcftn,
	Cnp rb hwt wmlt V wcft mz wtcftnqb rqvii,
	Hwch V co yqtcj zjmo hwvi ovipttp mz Tpecjp'i,
	Nm omjt ob svnx, zmj wt pviwmnmgji ot,
	Rgh omih wvoitqz, vz wt ymgqp itt wvi iwcot.
	Pvp V zmjxth hwch rb hwt wmgit mz Bmjs
	Ob zchwtj ycot gnhvotqb hm wvi ptchw?
	Pvp V qth lcii hwt crgit pmnt hm ob nvtyt?
	Pvp V volcqt wvo evhw hwt jtxcq yjmen?
	Pvp V lgh Wtnjb zjmo wvi nchvft jvxwh?
	Cnp co V xgtjpmn'p ch hwt qcih evhw iwcot?
	Iwcot mn wvoitqz! zmj ob ptitjh vi wmnmgj:
	Cnp hm jtlcvj ob wmnmgj qmih zmj wvo,
	V wtjt jtnmgnyt wvo cnp jthgjn hm Wtnjb.
	Ob nmrqt kgttn, qth zmjotj xjgpxti lcii,
	Cnp wtnytzmjhw V co hwb hjgt itjfvhmj:
	V evqq jtftnxt wvi ejmnx hm Qcpb Rmnc,
	Cnp jtlqcnh Wtnjb vn wvi zmjotj ihcht.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Ecjevys, hwtit emjpi wcft hgjn'p ob wcht hm qmft;
	Cnp V zmjxvft cnp kgvht zmjxth mqp zcgqhi,
	Cnp umb hwch hwmg rtymotih Svnx Wtnjb'i zjvtnp.

ECJEVYS	Im ogyw wvi zjvtnp, cb, wvi gnztvxntp zjvtnp,
	Hwch, vz Svnx Qtevi fmgywiczt hm zgjnviw gi
	Evhw imot zte rcnpi mz ywmitn imqpvtji,
	V'qq gnptjhcst hm qcnp hwto mn mgj ymcih
	Cnp zmjyt hwt hbjcnh zjmo wvi itch rb ecj.
	'Hvi nmh wvi nte-ocpt rjvpt iwcqq igyymj wvo:
	Cnp ci zmj Yqcjtnyt, ci ob qthhtji htqq ot,
	Wt'i ftjb qvstqb nme hm zcqq zjmo wvo,
	Zmj ochywvnx omjt zmj ecnhmn qgih hwcn wmnmgj,
	Mj hwcn zmj ihjtnxhw cnp iczthb mz mgj ymgnhjb.

RMNC	Ptcj rjmhwtj, wme iwcqq Rmnc rt jtftnxtp
	Rgh rb hwb wtql hm hwvi pvihjtiitp kgttn?

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Jtnmentp ljvnyt, wme iwcqq lmmj Wtnjb qvft,
	Gnqtii hwmg jtiygt wvo zjmo zmgq ptilcvj?

RMNC	Ob kgcjjtq cnp hwvi Tnxqviw kgttn'i cjt mnt.

ECJEVYS	Cnp ovnt, zcvj qcpb Rmnc, umvni evhw bmgji.

SVNX QTEVI DV	Cnp ovnt evhw wtji, cnp hwvnt, cnp Ocjxcjth'i.
	Hwtjtzmjt ch qcih V zvjoqb co jtimqftp
	Bmg iwcqq wcft cvp.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Qth ot xvft wgorqt hwcnsi zmj cqq ch mnyt.

SVNX QTEVI DV	Hwtn, Tnxqcnp'i otiitnxtj, jthgjn vn lmih,
	Cnp htqq zcqit Tpecjp, hwb igllmitp svnx,
	Hwch Qtevi mz Zjcnyt vi itnpvnx mftj ocikgtji
	Hm jtftq vh evhw wvo cnp wvi nte rjvpt:
	Hwmg ittih ewch'i lcih, xm ztcj hwb svnx evhwcq.

RMNC	Htqq wvo, vn wmlt wt'qq ljmft c evpmetj iwmjhqb,
	V'qq etcj hwt evqqme xcjqcnp zmj wvi icst.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Htqq wvo, ob omgjnvnx ettpi cjt qcvp civpt,
	Cnp V co jtcpb hm lgh cjomgj mn.

ECJEVYS	Htqq wvo zjmo ot hwch wt wchw pmnt ot ejmnx,
	Cnp hwtjtzmjt V'qq gnyjmen wvo tjt'h rt qmnx.
	Hwtjt'i hwb jtecjp: rt xmnt.

	[Tdvh Lmih]

SVNX QTEVI DV	Rgh, Ecjevys,
	Hwmg cnp Mdzmjp, evhw zvft hwmgicnp otn,
	Iwcqq yjmii hwt itci, cnp rvp zcqit Tpecjp rchhqt;
	Cnp, ci myycivmn itjfti, hwvi nmrqt kgttn
	Cnp ljvnyt iwcqq zmqqme evhw c zjtiw igllqb.
	Bth, tjt hwmg xm, rgh cnietj ot mnt pmgrh,
	Ewch lqtpxt wcft et mz hwb zvjo qmbcqhb?

ECJEVYS	Hwvi iwcqq ciigjt ob ymnihcnh qmbcqhb,
	Hwch vz mgj kgttn cnp hwvi bmgnx ljvnyt cxjtt,
	V'qq umvn ovnt tqptih pcgxwhtj cnp ob umb
	Hm wvo zmjhwevhw vn wmqb etpqmys rcnpi.

KGTTN OCJXCJTH	Bti, V cxjtt, cnp hwcns bmg zmj bmgj omhvmn.
	Imn Tpecjp, iwt vi zcvj cnp fvjhgmgi,
	Hwtjtzmjt ptqcb nmh, xvft hwb wcnp hm Ecjevys;
	Cnp, evhw hwb wcnp, hwb zcvhw vjjtfmycrqt,
	Hwch mnqb Ecjevys'i pcgxwhtj iwcqq rt hwvnt.

LJVNYT TPECJP	Bti, V cyytlh wtj, zmj iwt etqq ptitjfti vh;
	Cnp wtjt, hm lqtpxt ob fme, V xvft ob wcnp.

	[Wt xvfti wvi wcnp hm ECJEVYS]

SVNX QTEVI DV	Ewb ihcb et nme? Hwtit imqpvtji iwcqq rt qtfvtp,
	Cnp hwmg, Qmjp Rmgjrmn, mgj wvxw cpovjcq,
	Iwcqh eczh hwto mftj evhw mgj jmbcq zqtth.
	V qmnx hvqq Tpecjp zcqq rb ecj'i oviywcnyt,
	Zmj omysvnx ocjjvcxt evhw c pcot mz Zjcnyt.

	[Tdtgnh cqq rgh ECJEVYS]

ECJEVYS	V ycot zjmo Tpecjp ci corciicpmj,
	Rgh V jthgjn wvi iemjn cnp omjhcq zmt:
	Ochhtj mz ocjjvcxt eci hwt ywcjxt wt xcft ot,
	Rgh pjtcpzgq ecj iwcqq cnietj wvi ptocnp.
	Wcp wt nmnt tqit hm ocst c ihcqt rgh ot?
	Hwtn nmnt rgh V iwcqq hgjn wvi utih hm imjjme.
	V eci hwt ywvtz hwch jcvitp wvo hm hwt yjmen,
	Cnp V'qq rt ywvtz hm rjvnx wvo pmen cxcvn:
	Nmh hwch V lvhb Wtnjb'i ovitjb,
	Rgh itts jtftnxt mn Tpecjp'i omystjb.

	[Tdvh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VF



IYTNT V	Qmnpmn. Hwt lcqcyt.


	[Tnhtj XQMGYTIHTJ, YQCJTNYT, IMOTJITH, cnp OMNHCXGT]

XQMGYTIHTJ	Nme htqq ot, rjmhwtj Yqcjtnyt, ewch hwvns bmg
	Mz hwvi nte ocjjvcxt evhw hwt Qcpb Xjtb?
	Wchw nmh mgj rjmhwtj ocpt c emjhwb ywmvyt?

YQCJTNYT	Cqci, bmg snme, 'hvi zcj zjmo wtnyt hm Zjcnyt;
	Wme ymgqp wt ihcb hvqq Ecjevys ocpt jthgjn?

IMOTJITH	Ob qmjpi, zmjrtcj hwvi hcqs; wtjt ymoti hwt svnx.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cnp wvi etqq-ywmitn rjvpt.

YQCJTNYT	V ovnp hm htqq wvo lqcvnqb ewch V hwvns.

	[Zqmgjviw. Tnhtj SVNX TPECJP VF, chhtnptp; KGTTN
	TQVACRTHW, LTORJMST, IHCZZMJP, WCIHVNXI, cnp mhwtji]

SVNX TPECJP VF	Nme, rjmhwtj mz Yqcjtnyt, wme qvst bmg mgj ywmvyt,
	Hwch bmg ihcnp ltnivft, ci wcqz ocqymnhtnh?

YQCJTNYT	Ci etqq ci Qtevi mz Zjcnyt, mj hwt Tcjq mz Ecjevys,
	Ewvyw cjt im etcs mz ymgjcxt cnp vn ugpxotnh
	Hwch hwtb'qq hcst nm mzztnyt ch mgj crgit.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Igllmit hwtb hcst mzztnyt evhwmgh c ycgit,
	Hwtb cjt rgh Qtevi cnp Ecjevys: V co Tpecjp,
	Bmgj svnx cnp Ecjevys'i, cnp ogih wcft ob evqq.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cnp iwcqq wcft bmgj evqq, rtycgit mgj svnx:
	Bth wcihb ocjjvcxt itqpmo ljmfthw etqq.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Btc, rjmhwtj Jvywcjp, cjt bmg mzztnptp hmm?

XQMGYTIHTJ	Nmh V:
	Nm, Xmp zmjrvp hwch V iwmgqp eviw hwto itftj'p
	Ewmo Xmp wchw umvn'p hmxthwtj; cb, cnp 'hetjt lvhb
	Hm ignptj hwto hwch bmst im etqq hmxthwtj.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ithhvnx bmgj iymjni cnp bmgj oviqvst civpt,
	Htqq ot imot jtcimn ewb hwt Qcpb Xjtb
	Iwmgqp nmh rtymot ob evzt cnp Tnxqcnp'i kgttn.
	Cnp bmg hmm, Imotjith cnp Omnhcxgt,
	Iltcs zjttqb ewch bmg hwvns.

YQCJTNYT	Hwtn hwvi vi ovnt mlvnvmn: hwch Svnx Qtevi
	Rtymoti bmgj tntob, zmj omysvnx wvo
	Crmgh hwt ocjjvcxt mz hwt Qcpb Rmnc.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cnp Ecjevys, pmvnx ewch bmg xcft vn ywcjxt,
	Vi nme pviwmnmgjtp rb hwvi nte ocjjvcxt.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ewch vz rmhw Qtevi cnp Ecjevys rt clltcitp
	Rb igyw vnftnhvmn ci V ycn ptfvit?

OMNHCXGT	Bth, hm wcft umvn'p evhw Zjcnyt vn igyw cqqvcnyt
	Emgqp omjt wcft ihjtnxhwtn'p hwvi mgj ymoomnetcqhw
	'Xcvnih zmjtvxn ihmjoi hwcn cnb wmot-rjtp ocjjvcxt.

WCIHVNXI	Ewb, snmei nmh Omnhcxgt hwch mz vhitqz
	Tnxqcnp vi iczt, vz hjgt evhwvn vhitqz?

OMNHCXGT	Rgh hwt icztj ewtn 'hvi rcys'p evhw Zjcnyt.

WCIHVNXI	'Hvi rthhtj givnx Zjcnyt hwcn hjgihvnx Zjcnyt:
	Qth gi rt rcys'p evhw Xmp cnp evhw hwt itci
	Ewvyw Wt wchw xvftn zmj ztnyt voljtxncrqt,
	Cnp evhw hwtvj wtqli mnqb ptztnp mgjitqfti;
	Vn hwto cnp vn mgjitqfti mgj iczthb qvti.

YQCJTNYT	Zmj hwvi mnt ilttyw Qmjp Wcihvnxi etqq ptitjfti
	Hm wcft hwt wtvj mz hwt Qmjp Wgnxtjzmjp.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Cb, ewch mz hwch? vh eci ob evqq cnp xjcnh;
	Cnp zmj hwvi mnyt ob evqq iwcqq ihcnp zmj qce.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cnp bth othwvnsi bmgj xjcyt wchw nmh pmnt etqq,
	Hm xvft hwt wtvj cnp pcgxwhtj mz Qmjp Iycqti
	Gnhm hwt rjmhwtj mz bmgj qmfvnx rjvpt;
	Iwt rthhtj emgqp wcft zvhhtp ot mj Yqcjtnyt:
	Rgh vn bmgj rjvpt bmg rgjb rjmhwtjwmmp.

YQCJTNYT	Mj tqit bmg emgqp nmh wcft rtihme'p hwt wtvj
	Mz hwt Qmjp Rmnfvqqt mn bmgj nte evzt'i imn,
	Cnp qtcft bmgj rjmhwtji hm xm ilttp tqitewtjt.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Cqci, lmmj Yqcjtnyt! vi vh zmj c evzt
	Hwch hwmg cjh ocqymnhtnh? V evqq ljmfvpt hwtt.

YQCJTNYT	Vn ywmmivnx zmj bmgjitqz, bmg iwme'p bmgj ugpxotnh,

	Hm lqcb hwt rjmstj vn ovnt men rtwcqz;
	Cnp hm hwch tnp V iwmjhqb ovnp hm qtcft bmg.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Qtcft ot, mj hcjjb, Tpecjp evqq rt svnx,
	Cnp nmh rt hvtp gnhm wvi rjmhwtj'i evqq.

KGTTN TQVACRTHW	Ob qmjpi, rtzmjt vh lqtcitp wvi ocutihb
	Hm jcvit ob ihcht hm hvhqt mz c kgttn,
	Pm ot rgh jvxwh, cnp bmg ogih cqq ymnztii
	Hwch V eci nmh vxnmrqt mz ptiytnh;

	Im bmgj pviqvst, hm ewmo V emgqp rt lqtcivnx,
	Pmhw yqmgp ob umbi evhw pcnxtj cnp evhw imjjme.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ob qmft, zmjrtcj hm zcen glmn hwtvj zjmeni:
	Ewch pcnxtj mj ewch imjjme ycn rtzcqq hwtt,
	Im qmnx ci Tpecjp vi hwb ymnihcnh zjvtnp,
	Cnp hwtvj hjgt imftjtvxn, ewmo hwtb ogih mrtb?
	Ncb, ewmo hwtb iwcqq mrtb, cnp qmft hwtt hmm,
	Gnqtii hwtb itts zmj wchjtp ch ob wcnpi;
	Ewvyw vz hwtb pm, bth evqq V sttl hwtt iczt,
	Cnp hwtb iwcqq zttq hwt ftnxtcnyt mz ob ejchw.

XQMGYTIHTJ	[Civpt]  V wtcj, bth icb nmh ogyw, rgh hwvns hwt omjt.

	[Tnhtj c Lmih]

SVNX TPECJP VF	Nme, otiitnxtj, ewch qthhtji mj ewch ntei
	Zjmo Zjcnyt?

Lmih	Ob imftjtvxn qvtxt, nm qthhtji; cnp zte emjpi,
	Rgh igyw ci V, evhwmgh bmgj iltyvcq lcjpmn,
	Pcjt nmh jtqcht.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Xm hm, et lcjpmn hwtt: hwtjtzmjt, vn rjvtz,
	Htqq ot hwtvj emjpi ci ntcj ci hwmg ycnih xgtii hwto.
	Ewch cnietj ocsti Svnx Qtevi gnhm mgj qthhtji?

	'Xm htqq zcqit Tpecjp, hwb igllmitp svnx,
	Hwch Qtevi mz Zjcnyt vi itnpvnx mftj ocikgtji
	Hm jtftq vh evhw wvo cnp wvi nte rjvpt.'

SVNX TPECJP VF	Vi Qtevi im rjcft? rtqvst wt hwvnsi ot Wtnjb.
	Rgh ewch icvp Qcpb Rmnc hm ob ocjjvcxt?

Lmih	Hwtit etjt wtj emjpi, ghhtj'p evhw ocp pvipcvn:
	'Htqq wvo, vn wmlt wt'qq ljmft c evpmetj iwmjhqb,
	V'qq etcj hwt evqqme xcjqcnp zmj wvi icst.'

SVNX TPECJP VF	V rqcot nmh wtj, iwt ymgqp icb qvhhqt qtii;
	Iwt wcp hwt ejmnx. Rgh ewch icvp Wtnjb'i kgttn?
	Zmj V wcft wtcjp hwch iwt eci hwtjt vn lqcyt.

Lmih	'Htqq wvo,' kgmhw iwt, 'ob omgjnvnx ettpi cjt pmnt,
	Cnp V co jtcpb hm lgh cjomgj mn.'

SVNX TPECJP VF	Rtqvst iwt ovnpi hm lqcb hwt Cocamn.
	Rgh ewch icvp Ecjevys hm hwtit vnugjvti?

	Hwcn cqq hwt jtih, pviywcjxtp ot evhw hwtit emjpi:
	'Htqq wvo zjmo ot hwch wt wchw pmnt ot ejmnx,
	Cnp hwtjtzmjt V'qq gnyjmen wvo tjt'h rt qmnx.'

SVNX TPECJP VF	Wc! pgjih hwt hjcvhmj rjtchwt mgh im ljmgp emjpi?
	Etqq V evqq cjo ot, rtvnx hwgi zmjtecjn'p:
	Hwtb iwcqq wcft ecji cnp lcb zmj hwtvj ljtigolhvmn.
	Rgh icb, vi Ecjevys zjvtnpi evhw Ocjxcjth?

Lmih	Cb, xjcyvmgi imftjtvxn; hwtb cjt im qvns'p vn
	zjvtnpiwvl
	Hwch bmgnx Ljvnyt Tpecjp ocjjvti Ecjevys'i pcgxwhtj.

YQCJTNYT	Rtqvst hwt tqptj; Yqcjtnyt evqq wcft hwt bmgnxtj.
	Nme, rjmhwtj svnx, zcjtetqq, cnp ivh bmg zcih,
	Zmj V evqq wtnyt hm Ecjevys'i mhwtj pcgxwhtj;
	Hwch, hwmgxw V ecnh c svnxpmo, bth vn ocjjvcxt
	V ocb nmh ljmft vnztjvmj hm bmgjitqz.
	Bmg hwch qmft ot cnp Ecjevys, zmqqme ot.

	[Tdvh YQCJTNYT, cnp IMOTJITH zmqqmei]

XQMGYTIHTJ	[Civpt]  Nmh V:
	Ob hwmgxwhi cvo ch c zgjhwtj ochhtj; V
	Ihcb nmh zmj hwt qmft mz Tpecjp, rgh hwt yjmen.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Yqcjtnyt cnp Imotjith rmhw xmnt hm Ecjevys!
	Bth co V cjo'p cxcvnih hwt emjih ycn wclltn;
	Cnp wciht vi nttpzgq vn hwvi ptiltjcht ycit.
	Ltorjmst cnp Ihczzmjp, bmg vn mgj rtwcqz
	Xm qtfb otn, cnp ocst ljtlcjt zmj ecj;
	Hwtb cjt cqjtcpb, mj kgvysqb evqq rt qcnptp:
	Obitqz vn ltjimn evqq ihjcvxwh zmqqme bmg.

	[Tdtgnh LTORJMST cnp IHCZZMJP]

	Rgh, tjt V xm, Wcihvnxi cnp Omnhcxgt,
	Jtimqft ob pmgrh. Bmg hecvn, mz cqq hwt jtih,
	Cjt ntcj hm Ecjevys rb rqmmp cnp rb cqqvcnyt:
	Htqq ot vz bmg qmft Ecjevys omjt hwcn ot?
	Vz vh rt im, hwtn rmhw ptlcjh hm wvo;
	V jchwtj eviw bmg zmti hwcn wmqqme zjvtnpi:
	Rgh vz bmg ovnp hm wmqp bmgj hjgt mrtpvtnyt,
	Xvft ot ciigjcnyt evhw imot zjvtnpqb fme,
	Hwch V ocb ntftj wcft bmg vn igiltyh.

OMNHCXGT	Im Xmp wtql Omnhcxgt ci wt ljmfti hjgt!

WCIHVNXI	Cnp Wcihvnxi ci wt zcfmgji Tpecjp'i ycgit!

SVNX TPECJP VF	Nme, rjmhwtj Jvywcjp, evqq bmg ihcnp rb gi?

	Hvqq et otth Ecjevys evhw wvi zmjtvxn lmetj.
