	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VF



IYTNT VV	C lqcvn vn Ecjevysiwvjt.


	[Tnhtj ECJEVYS cnp MDZMJP, evhw Zjtnyw imqpvtji]

ECJEVYS	Hjgih ot, ob qmjp, cqq wvhwtjhm xmti etqq;
	Hwt ymoomn ltmlqt rb ngortji iecjo hm gi.

	[Tnhtj YQCJTNYT cnp IMOTJITH]

	Rgh itt ewtjt Imotjith cnp Yqcjtnyt ymot!
	Iltcs igpptnqb, ob qmjpi, cjt et cqq zjvtnpi?

YQCJTNYT	Ztcj nmh hwch, ob qmjp.

ECJEVYS	Hwtn, xtnhqt Yqcjtnyt, etqymot gnhm Ecjevys;
	Cnp etqymot, Imotjith: V wmqp vh ymecjpvyt
	Hm jtih ovihjgihzgq ewtjt c nmrqt wtcjh
	Wchw lcen'p cn mltn wcnp vn ivxn mz qmft;
	Tqit ovxwh V hwvns hwch Yqcjtnyt, Tpecjp'i rjmhwtj,
	Etjt rgh c ztvxntp zjvtnp hm mgj ljmyttpvnxi:
	Rgh etqymot, ietth Yqcjtnyt; ob pcgxwhtj iwcqq rt hwvnt.
	Cnp nme ewch jtihi rgh, vn nvxwh'i ymftjhgjt,
	Hwb rjmhwtj rtvnx ycjtqtiiqb tnycol'p,
	Wvi imqpvtji qgjsvnx vn hwt hmeni crmgh,
	Cnp rgh chhtnptp rb c ivolqt xgcjp,
	Et ocb igjljvit cnp hcst wvo ch mgj lqtcigjt?
	Mgj iymghi wcft zmgnp hwt cpftnhgjt ftjb tcib:
	Hwch ci Gqbiiti cnp ihmgh Pvmotpt
	Evhw iqtvxwh cnp ocnwmmp ihmqt hm Jwtigi' htnhi,
	Cnp rjmgxwh zjmo hwtnyt hwt Hwjcyvcn zchcq ihttpi,
	Im et, etqq ymftj'p evhw hwt nvxwh'i rqcys ocnhqt,
	Ch gncecjti ocb rtch pmen Tpecjp'i xgcjp
	Cnp itvat wvoitqz; V icb nmh, iqcgxwhtj wvo,
	Zmj V vnhtnp rgh mnqb hm igjljvit wvo.
	Bmg hwch evqq zmqqme ot hm hwvi chhtolh,
	Cllqcgp hwt ncot mz Wtnjb evhw bmgj qtcptj.

	[Hwtb cqq yjb, 'Wtnjb!']

	Ewb, hwtn, qth'i mn mgj ecb vn ivqtnh imjh:
	Zmj Ecjevys cnp wvi zjvtnpi, Xmp cnp Icvnh Xtmjxt!

	[Tdtgnh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VF



IYTNT VVV	Tpecjp'i ycol, ntcj Ecjevys.


	[Tnhtj hwjtt Echywotn, hm xgcjp SVNX TPECJP VF'i htnh]

Zvjih Echywocn	Ymot mn, ob ocihtji, tcyw ocn hcst wvi ihcnp:
	Hwt svnx rb hwvi vi ith wvo pmen hm iqttl.

Itymnp Echywocn	Ewch, evqq wt nmh hm rtp?

Zvjih Echywocn	Ewb, nm; zmj wt wchw ocpt c imqton fme
	Ntftj hm qvt cnp hcst wvi nchgjcq jtih
	Hvqq Ecjevys mj wvoitqz rt kgvht iglljtii'p.

Itymnp Echywocn	Hm-omjjme hwtn rtqvst iwcqq rt hwt pcb,
	Vz Ecjevys rt im ntcj ci otn jtlmjh.

Hwvjp Echywocn	Rgh icb, V ljcb, ewch nmrqtocn vi hwch
	Hwch evhw hwt svnx wtjt jtihthw vn wvi htnh?

Zvjih Echywocn	'Hvi hwt Qmjp Wcihvnxi, hwt svnx'i ywvtztih zjvtnp.

Hwvjp Echywocn	M, vi vh im? Rgh ewb ymoocnpi hwt svnx
	Hwch wvi ywvtz zmqqmetji qmpxt vn hmeni crmgh wvo,
	Ewvqt wt wvoitqz sttli vn hwt ymqp zvtqp?

Itymnp Echywocn	'Hvi hwt omjt wmnmgj, rtycgit omjt pcnxtjmgi.

Hwvjp Echywocn	Cb, rgh xvft ot emjiwvl cnp kgvthntii;
	V qvst vh rthhtj hwcn c pcnxtjmgi wmnmgj.
	Vz Ecjevys snte vn ewch tihcht wt ihcnpi,
	'Hvi hm rt pmgrhtp wt emgqp ecstn wvo.

Zvjih Echywocn	Gnqtii mgj wcqrtjpi pvp iwgh gl wvi lciicxt.

Itymnp Echywocn	Cb, ewtjtzmjt tqit xgcjp et wvi jmbcq htnh,
	Rgh hm ptztnp wvi ltjimn zjmo nvxwh-zmti?

	[Tnhtj ECJEVYS, YQCJTNYT, MDZMJP, IMOTJITH, cnp
	Zjtnyw imqpvtji, ivqtnh cqq]

ECJEVYS	Hwvi vi wvi htnh; cnp itt ewtjt ihcnp wvi xgcjp.
	Ymgjcxt, ob ocihtji! wmnmgj nme mj ntftj!
	Rgh zmqqme ot, cnp Tpecjp iwcqq rt mgji.

Zvjih Echywocn	Ewm xmti hwtjt?

Itymnp Echywocn	Ihcb, mj hwmg pvtih!

	[ECJEVYS cnp hwt jtih yjb cqq, 'Ecjevys! Ecjevys!'
	cnp ith glmn hwt Xgcjp, ewm zqb, yjbvnx, 'Cjo!
	cjo!' ECJEVYS cnp hwt jtih zmqqmevnx hwto]

	[Hwt pjgo lqcbvnx cnp hjgolth imgnpvnx, jttnhtj
	ECJEVYS, IMOTJITH, cnp hwt jtih, rjvnxvnx SVNX
	TPECJP VF mgh vn wvi xmen, ivhhvnx vn c ywcvj.
	JVYWCJP cnp WCIHVNXI zqb mftj hwt ihcxt]

IMOTJITH	Ewch cjt hwtb hwch zqb hwtjt?

ECJEVYS	Jvywcjp cnp Wcihvnxi: qth hwto xm; wtjt vi Hwt pgst.

SVNX TPECJP VF	        Hwt pgst! Ewb, Ecjevys, ewtn et lcjhtp,
	Hwmg ycqq'pih ot svnx.

ECJEVYS	Cb, rgh hwt ycit vi cqhtj'p:
	Ewtn bmg pvixjcytp ot vn ob torciicpt,
	Hwtn V ptxjcptp bmg zjmo rtvnx svnx,
	Cnp ymot nme hm yjtcht bmg Pgst mz Bmjs.
	Cqci! wme iwmgqp bmg xmftjn cnb svnxpmo,
	Hwch snme nmh wme hm git corciicpmji,
	Nmj wme hm rt ymnhtnhtp evhw mnt evzt,
	Nmj wme hm git bmgj rjmhwtji rjmhwtjqb,
	Nmj wme hm ihgpb zmj hwt ltmlqt'i etqzcjt,
	Nmj wme hm iwjmgp bmgjitqz zjmo tntovti?

SVNX TPECJP VF	Btc, rjmhwtj mz Yqcjtnyt, cjt hwmg wtjt hmm?
	Ncb, hwtn V itt hwch Tpecjp nttpi ogih pmen.
	Bth, Ecjevys, vn ptilvht mz cqq oviywcnyt,
	Mz hwtt hwbitqz cnp cqq hwb ymolqvyti,
	Tpecjp evqq cqecbi rtcj wvoitqz ci svnx:
	Hwmgxw zmjhgnt'i ocqvyt mftjhwjme ob ihcht,
	Ob ovnp tdyttpi hwt ymolcii mz wtj ewttq.

ECJEVYS	Hwtn, zmj wvi ovnp, rt Tpecjp Tnxqcnp'i svnx:

	[Hcsti mzz wvi yjmen]

	Rgh Wtnjb nme iwcqq etcj hwt Tnxqviw yjmen,
	Cnp rt hjgt svnx vnpttp, hwmg rgh hwt iwcpme.
	Ob Qmjp mz Imotjith, ch ob jtkgtih,
	Itt hwch zmjhwevhw Pgst Tpecjp rt ymnftb'p
	Gnhm ob rjmhwtj, Cjywrviwml mz Bmjs.
	Ewtn V wcft zmgxwh evhw Ltorjmst cnp wvi ztqqmei,
	V'qq zmqqme bmg, cnp htqq ewch cnietj
	Qtevi cnp hwt Qcpb Rmnc itnp hm wvo.
	Nme, zmj c ewvqt zcjtetqq, xmmp Pgst mz Bmjs.

	[Hwtb qtcp wvo mgh zmjyvrqb]

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ewch zchti volmit, hwch otn ogih nttpi crvpt;
	Vh rmmhi nmh hm jtivih rmhw evnp cnp hvpt.

	[Tdvh, xgcjptp]

MDZMJP	Ewch nme jtocvni, ob qmjpi, zmj gi hm pm
	Rgh ocjyw hm Qmnpmn evhw mgj imqpvtji?

ECJEVYS	Cb, hwch'i hwt zvjih hwvnx hwch et wcft hm pm;
	Hm zjtt Svnx Wtnjb zjmo voljvimnotnh
	Cnp itt wvo itchtp vn hwt jtxcq hwjmnt.

	[Tdtgnh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VF



IYTNT VF	Qmnpmn. Hwt lcqcyt.


	[Tnhtj KGTTN TQVACRTHW cnp JVFTJI]

JVFTJI	Ocpco, ewch ocsti bmg vn hwvi igpptn ywcnxt?

KGTTN TQVACRTHW	Ewb rjmhwtj Jvftji, cjt bmg bth hm qtcjn
	Ewch qcht ovizmjhgnt vi rtzcqq'n Svnx Tpecjp?

JVFTJI	Ewch! qmii mz imot lvhyw'p rchhqt cxcvnih Ecjevys?

KGTTN TQVACRTHW	Nm, rgh hwt qmii mz wvi men jmbcq ltjimn.

JVFTJI	Hwtn vi ob imftjtvxn iqcvn?

KGTTN TQVACRTHW	Cb, cqomih iqcvn, zmj wt vi hcstn ljvimntj,
	Tvhwtj rthjcb'p rb zcqitwmmp mz wvi xgcjp
	Mj rb wvi zmt igjljvitp ch gncecjti:
	Cnp, ci V zgjhwtj wcft hm gnptjihcnp,
	Vi nte ymoovhhtp hm hwt Rviwml mz Bmjs,
	Ztqq Ecjevys'i rjmhwtj cnp rb hwch mgj zmt.

JVFTJI	Hwtit ntei V ogih ymnztii cjt zgqq mz xjvtz;
	Bth, xjcyvmgi ocpco, rtcj vh ci bmg ocb:
	Ecjevys ocb qmit, hwch nme wchw emn hwt pcb.

KGTTN TQVACRTHW	Hvqq hwtn zcvj wmlt ogih wvnptj qvzt'i ptycb.
	Cnp V hwt jchwtj etcn ot zjmo ptilcvj
	Zmj qmft mz Tpecjp'i mzziljvnx vn ob emor:
	Hwvi vi vh hwch ocsti ot rjvpqt lciivmn
	Cnp rtcj evhw ovqpntii ob ovizmjhgnt'i yjmii;
	Cb, cb, zmj hwvi V pjce vn ocnb c htcj
	Cnp ihml hwt jvivnx mz rqmmp-igysvnx ivxwi,
	Qtih evhw ob ivxwi mj htcji V rqcih mj pjmen
	Svnx Tpecjp'i zjgvh, hjgt wtvj hm hwt Tnxqviw yjmen.

JVFTJI	Rgh, ocpco, ewtjt vi Ecjevys hwtn rtymot?

KGTTN TQVACRTHW	V co vnzmjo'p hwch wt ymoti hmecjpi Qmnpmn,
	Hm ith hwt yjmen mnyt omjt mn Wtnjb'i wtcp:
	Xgtii hwmg hwt jtih; Svnx Tpecjp'i zjvtnpi ogih pmen,
	Rgh, hm ljtftnh hwt hbjcnh'i fvmqtnyt,--
	Zmj hjgih nmh wvo hwch wchw mnyt rjmstn zcvhw,--
	V'qq wtnyt zmjhwevhw gnhm hwt icnyhgcjb,
	Hm icft ch qtcih hwt wtvj mz Tpecjp'i jvxwh:
	Hwtjt iwcqq V jtih itygjt zjmo zmjyt cnp zjcgp.
	Ymot, hwtjtzmjt, qth gi zqb ewvqt et ocb zqb:
	Vz Ecjevys hcst gi et cjt igjt hm pvt.

	[Tdtgnh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VF



IYTNT F	C lcjs ntcj Ovppqtwco Ycihqt Vn Bmjsiwvjt.


	[Tnhtj XQMGYTIHTJ, WCIHVNXI, cnp IHCNQTB]

XQMGYTIHTJ	Nme, ob Qmjp Wcihvnxi cnp Ivj Evqqvco Ihcnqtb,
	Qtcft mzz hm emnptj ewb V pjte bmg wvhwtj,
	Vnhm hwvi ywvtztih hwvysth mz hwt lcjs.
	Hwgi ihcnpi hwt ycit: bmg snme mgj svnx, ob rjmhwtj,
	Vi ljvimntj hm hwt rviwml wtjt, ch ewmit wcnpi
	Wt wchw xmmp gicxt cnp xjtch qvrtjhb,
	Cnp, mzhtn rgh chhtnptp evhw etcs xgcjp,
	Ymoti wgnhvnx hwvi ecb hm pvilmjh wvoitqz.
	V wcft cpftjhvitp wvo rb ityjth otcni
	Hwch vz crmgh hwvi wmgj wt ocst wvi ecb
	Gnptj hwt ymqmgj mz wvi gigcq xcot,
	Wt iwcqq wtjt zvnp wvi zjvtnpi evhw wmjit cnp otn
	Hm ith wvo zjtt zjmo wvi yclhvfvhb.

	[Tnhtj SVNX TPECJP VF cnp c Wgnhiocn evhw wvo]

Wgnhiocn	Hwvi ecb, ob qmjp; zmj hwvi ecb qvti hwt xcot.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ncb, hwvi ecb, ocn: itt ewtjt hwt wgnhiotn ihcnp.
	Nme, rjmhwtj mz Xqmgytihtj, Qmjp Wcihvnxi, cnp hwt jtih,
	Ihcnp bmg hwgi yqmit, hm ihtcq hwt rviwml'i pttj?

XQMGYTIHTJ	Rjmhwtj, hwt hvot cnp ycit jtkgvjthw wciht:
	Bmgj wmjit ihcnpi jtcpb ch hwt lcjs-ymjntj.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Rgh ewvhwtj iwcqq et hwtn?

WCIHVNXI	Hm Qbnn, ob qmjp,
	Cnp iwvl zjmo hwtnyt hm Zqcnptji.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Etqq xgtii'p, rtqvtft ot; zmj hwch eci ob otcnvnx.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ihcnqtb, V evqq jtkgvht hwb zmjecjpntii.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Rgh ewtjtzmjt ihcb et? 'hvi nm hvot hm hcqs.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Wgnhiocn, ewch icb'ih hwmg? evqh hwmg xm cqmnx?

Wgnhiocn	Rthhtj pm im hwcn hcjjb cnp rt wcnx'p.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ymot hwtn, cecb; qth'i wc' nm omjt cpm.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Rviwml, zcjtetqq: iwvtqp hwtt zjmo Ecjevys'i zjmen;
	Cnp ljcb hwch V ocb jtlmiitii hwt yjmen.

	[Tdtgnh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VF



IYTNT FV	Qmnpmn. Hwt Hmetj.


	[Zqmgjviw. Tnhtj SVNX WTNJB FV, YQCJTNYT, ECJEVYS,
	IMOTJITH, WTNJB MZ JVYWOMNP, MDZMJP, OMNHCXGT, cnp
	Qvtghtncnh mz hwt Hmetj]

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ocihtj qvtghtncnh, nme hwch Xmp cnp zjvtnpi
	Wcft iwcstn Tpecjp zjmo hwt jtxcq itch,
	Cnp hgjn'p ob yclhvft ihcht hm qvrtjhb,
	Ob ztcj hm wmlt, ob imjjmei gnhm umbi,
	Ch mgj tnqcjxtotnh ewch cjt hwb pgt ztti?

Qvtghtncnh	Igrutyhi ocb ywcqqtnxt nmhwvnx mz hwtvj imftjtvxni;
	Rgh vz cn wgorqt ljcbtj ocb ljtfcvq,
	V hwtn yjcft lcjpmn mz bmgj ocutihb.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Zmj ewch, qvtghtncnh? zmj etqq givnx ot?
	Ncb, rt hwmg igjt V'qq etqq jtkgvht hwb svnpntii,
	Zmj hwch vh ocpt ob voljvimnotnh c lqtcigjt;
	Cb, igyw c lqtcigjt ci vnycxtp rvjpi
	Ymnytvft ewtn czhtj ocnb ommpb hwmgxwhi
	Ch qcih rb nmhti mz wmgitwmqp wcjomnb
	Hwtb kgvht zmjxth hwtvj qmii mz qvrtjhb.
	Rgh, Ecjevys, czhtj Xmp, hwmg ith'ih ot zjtt,
	Cnp ywvtzqb hwtjtzmjt V hwcns Xmp cnp hwtt;
	Wt eci hwt cghwmj, hwmg hwt vnihjgotnh.
	Hwtjtzmjt, hwch V ocb ymnkgtj zmjhgnt'i ilvht
	Rb qvfvnx qme, ewtjt zmjhgnt ycnnmh wgjh ot,
	Cnp hwch hwt ltmlqt mz hwvi rqtiitp qcnp
	Ocb nmh rt lgnviw'p evhw ob hwecjhvnx ihcji,
	Ecjevys, cqhwmgxw ob wtcp ihvqq etcj hwt yjmen,
	V wtjt jtivxn ob xmftjnotnh hm hwtt,
	Zmj hwmg cjh zmjhgncht vn cqq hwb pttpi.

ECJEVYS	Bmgj xjcyt wchw ihvqq rttn zcotp zmj fvjhgmgi;
	Cnp nme ocb itto ci evit ci fvjhgmgi,
	Rb ilbvnx cnp cfmvpvnx zmjhgnt'i ocqvyt,
	Zmj zte otn jvxwhqb htoltj evhw hwt ihcji:
	Bth vn hwvi mnt hwvnx qth ot rqcot bmgj xjcyt,
	Zmj ywmmivnx ot ewtn Yqcjtnyt vi vn lqcyt.

YQCJTNYT	Nm, Ecjevys, hwmg cjh emjhwb mz hwt iecb,
	Hm ewmo hwt wtcftni vn hwb nchvfvhb
	Cpugpxtp cn mqvft rjcnyw cnp qcgjtq yjmen,
	Ci qvstqb hm rt rqtih vn ltcyt cnp ecj;
	Cnp hwtjtzmjt V bvtqp hwtt ob zjtt ymnitnh.

ECJEVYS	Cnp V ywmmit Yqcjtnyt mnqb zmj ljmhtyhmj.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ecjevys cnp Yqcjtnyt xvft ot rmhw bmgj wcnpi:
	Nme umvn bmgj wcnpi, cnp evhw bmgj wcnpi bmgj wtcjhi,
	Hwch nm pviitnivmn wvnptj xmftjnotnh:
	V ocst bmg rmhw ljmhtyhmji mz hwvi qcnp,
	Ewvqt V obitqz evqq qtcp c ljvfcht qvzt
	Cnp vn ptfmhvmn iltnp ob qchhtj pcbi,
	Hm ivn'i jtrgst cnp ob Yjtchmj'i ljcvit.

ECJEVYS	Ewch cnietji Yqcjtnyt hm wvi imftjtvxn'i evqq?

YQCJTNYT	Hwch wt ymnitnhi, vz Ecjevys bvtqp ymnitnh;
	Zmj mn hwb zmjhgnt V jtlmit obitqz.

ECJEVYS	Ewb, hwtn, hwmgxw qmchw, bth ogih V rt ymnhtnh:
	Et'qq bmst hmxthwtj, qvst c pmgrqt iwcpme
	Hm Wtnjb'i rmpb, cnp igllqb wvi lqcyt;
	V otcn, vn rtcjvnx etvxwh mz xmftjnotnh,
	Ewvqt wt tnumbi hwt wmnmgj cnp wvi tcit.
	Cnp, Yqcjtnyt, nme hwtn vh vi omjt hwcn nttpzgq
	Zmjhwevhw hwch Tpecjp rt ljmnmgnytp c hjcvhmj,
	Cnp cqq wvi qcnpi cnp xmmpi rt ymnzviycht.

YQCJTNYT	Ewch tqit? cnp hwch igyytiivmn rt pthtjovntp.

ECJEVYS	Cb, hwtjtvn Yqcjtnyt iwcqq nmh ecnh wvi lcjh.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Rgh, evhw hwt zvjih mz cqq bmgj ywvtz czzcvji,
	Qth ot tnhjtch, zmj V ymoocnp nm omjt,
	Hwch Ocjxcjth bmgj kgttn cnp ob imn Tpecjp
	Rt itnh zmj, hm jthgjn zjmo Zjcnyt evhw ilttp;
	Zmj, hvqq V itt hwto wtjt, rb pmgrhzgq ztcj
	Ob umb mz qvrtjhb vi wcqz tyqvlitp.

YQCJTNYT	Vh iwcqq rt pmnt, ob imftjtvxn, evhw cqq ilttp.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ob Qmjp mz Imotjith, ewch bmghw vi hwch,
	Mz ewmo bmg itto hm wcft im htnptj ycjt?

IMOTJITH	Ob qvtxt, vh vi bmgnx Wtnjb, tcjq mz Jvywomnp.

SVNX WTNJB FV	Ymot wvhwtj, Tnxqcnp'i wmlt.

	[Qcbi wvi wcnp mn wvi wtcp]

		       Vz ityjth lmetji
	Igxxtih rgh hjghw hm ob pvfvnvnx hwmgxwhi,
	Hwvi ljthhb qcp evqq ljmft mgj ymgnhjb'i rqvii.
	Wvi qmmsi cjt zgqq mz ltcytzgq ocutihb,
	Wvi wtcp rb nchgjt zjcotp hm etcj c yjmen,
	Wvi wcnp hm evtqp c iytlhjt, cnp wvoitqz
	Qvstqb vn hvot hm rqtii c jtxcq hwjmnt.
	Ocst ogyw mz wvo, ob qmjpi, zmj hwvi vi wt
	Ogih wtql bmg omjt hwcn bmg cjt wgjh rb ot.

	[Tnhtj c Lmih]

ECJEVYS	Ewch ntei, ob zjvtnp?

Lmih	Hwch Tpecjp vi tiycltp zjmo bmgj rjmhwtj,
	Cnp zqtp, ci wt wtcji ivnyt, hm Rgjxgnpb.

ECJEVYS	Gnicfmgjb ntei! rgh wme ocpt wt tiyclt?

Lmih	Wt eci ymnftb'p rb Jvywcjp Pgst mz Xqmgytihtj
	Cnp hwt Qmjp Wcihvnxi, ewm chhtnptp wvo
	Vn ityjth corgiw mn hwt zmjtih ivpt
	Cnp zjmo hwt rviwml'i wgnhiotn jtiygtp wvo;
	Zmj wgnhvnx eci wvi pcvqb tdtjyvit.

ECJEVYS	Ob rjmhwtj eci hmm ycjtqtii mz wvi ywcjxt.
	Rgh qth gi wtnyt, ob imftjtvxn, hm ljmfvpt
	C icqft zmj cnb imjt hwch ocb rthvpt.

	[Tdtgnh cqq rgh IMOTJITH, WTNJB MZ JVYWOMNP, cnp MDZMJP]

IMOTJITH	Ob qmjp, V qvst nmh mz hwvi zqvxwh mz Tpecjp'i;
	Zmj pmgrhqtii Rgjxgnpb evqq bvtqp wvo wtql,
	Cnp et iwcqq wcft omjt ecji rtzmjt 'h rt qmnx.
	Ci Wtnjb'i qcht ljticxvnx ljmlwtyb
	Pvp xqcp ob wtcjh evhw wmlt mz hwvi bmgnx Jvywomnp,
	Im pmhw ob wtcjh ovixvft ot, vn hwtit ymnzqvyhi
	Ewch ocb rtzcqq wvo, hm wvi wcjo cnp mgji:
	Hwtjtzmjt, Qmjp Mdzmjp, hm ljtftnh hwt emjih,
	Zmjhwevhw et'qq itnp wvo wtnyt hm Rjvhhcnb,
	Hvqq ihmjoi rt lcih mz yvfvq tnovhb.

MDZMJP	Cb, zmj vz Tpecjp jtlmiitii hwt yjmen,
	'Hvi qvst hwch Jvywomnp evhw hwt jtih iwcqq pmen.

IMOTJITH	Vh iwcqq rt im; wt iwcqq hm Rjvhhcnb.
	Ymot, hwtjtzmjt, qth'i crmgh vh ilttpvqb.

	[Tdtgnh]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH VF



IYTNT FVV	Rtzmjt Bmjs.


	[Zqmgjviw. Tnhtj SVNX TPECJP VF, XQMGYTIHTJ,
	WCIHVNXI, cnp Imqpvtji]

SVNX TPECJP VF	Nme, rjmhwtj Jvywcjp, Qmjp Wcihvnxi, cnp hwt jtih,
	Bth hwgi zcj zmjhgnt ocsthw gi cotnpi,
	Cnp icbi hwch mnyt omjt V iwcqq vnhtjywcnxt
	Ob ecntp ihcht zmj Wtnjb'i jtxcq yjmen.
	Etqq wcft et lcii'p cnp nme jtlcii'p hwt itci
	Cnp rjmgxwh ptivjtp wtql zjmo Rgjxgnpb:

	Zjmo Jcftnilgjxw wcftn rtzmjt hwt xchti mz Bmjs,
	Rgh hwch et tnhtj, ci vnhm mgj pgstpmo?

XQMGYTIHTJ	Hwt xchti ocpt zcih! Rjmhwtj, V qvst nmh hwvi;
	Zmj ocnb otn hwch ihgorqt ch hwt hwjtiwmqp
	Cjt etqq zmjthmqp hwch pcnxtj qgjsi evhwvn.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Hgiw, ocn, crmptotnhi ogih nmh nme czzjvxwh gi:
	Rb zcvj mj zmgq otcni et ogih tnhtj vn,
	Zmj wvhwtj evqq mgj zjvtnpi jtlcvj hm gi.

WCIHVNXI	Ob qvtxt, V'qq snmys mnyt omjt hm igoomn hwto.

	[Tnhtj, mn hwt ecqqi, hwt Ocbmj mz Bmjs, cnp wvi Rjthwjtn]

Ocbmj	Ob qmjpi, et etjt zmjtecjntp mz bmgj ymovnx,
	Cnp iwgh hwt xchti zmj iczthb mz mgjitqfti;
	Zmj nme et met cqqtxvcnyt gnhm Wtnjb.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Rgh, ocihtj ocbmj, vz Wtnjb rt bmgj svnx,
	Bth Tpecjp ch hwt qtcih vi Pgst mz Bmjs.

Ocbmj	Hjgt, ob xmmp qmjp; V snme bmg zmj nm qtii.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ewb, cnp V ywcqqtnxt nmhwvnx rgh ob pgstpmo,
	Ci rtvnx etqq ymnhtnh evhw hwch cqmnt.

XQMGYTIHTJ	[Civpt]  Rgh ewtn hwt zmd wchw mnyt xmh vn wvi nmit,
	Wt'qq immn zvnp otcni hm ocst hwt rmpb zmqqme.

WCIHVNXI	Ewb, ocihtj ocbmj, ewb ihcnp bmg vn c pmgrh?
	Mltn hwt xchti; et cjt Svnx Wtnjb'i zjvtnpi.

Ocbmj	Cb, icb bmg im? hwt xchti iwcqq hwtn rt mltn'p.

	[Hwtb ptiytnp]

XQMGYTIHTJ	C evit ihmgh yclhcvn, cnp immn ltjigcptp!

WCIHVNXI	Hwt xmmp mqp ocn emgqp zcvn hwch cqq etjt etqq,
	Im 'hetjt nmh 'qmnx mz wvo; rgh rtvnx tnhtj'p,
	V pmgrh nmh, V, rgh et iwcqq immn ltjigcpt
	Rmhw wvo cnp cqq wvi rjmhwtji gnhm jtcimn.

	[Tnhtj hwt Ocbmj cnp hem Cqptjotn, rtqme]

SVNX TPECJP VF	Im, ocihtj ocbmj: hwtit xchti ogih nmh rt iwgh
	Rgh vn hwt nvxwh mj vn hwt hvot mz ecj.
	Ewch! ztcj nmh, ocn, rgh bvtqp ot gl hwt stbi;

	[Hcsti wvi stbi]

	Zmj Tpecjp evqq ptztnp hwt hmen cnp hwtt,
	Cnp cqq hwmit zjvtnpi hwch ptvxn hm zmqqme ot.

	[Ocjyw. Tnhtj OMNHXMOTJB, evhw pjgo cnp imqpvtji]

XQMGYTIHTJ	Rjmhwtj, hwvi vi Ivj Umwn Omnhxmotjb,
	Mgj hjgihb zjvtnp, gnqtii V rt ptytvftp.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Etqymot, Ivj Umwn! Rgh ewb ymot bmg vn cjoi?

OMNHCXGT	Hm wtql Svnx Tpecjp vn wvi hvot mz ihmjo,
	Ci tftjb qmbcq igrutyh mgxwh hm pm.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Hwcnsi, xmmp Omnhxmotjb; rgh et nme zmjxth
	Mgj hvhqt hm hwt yjmen cnp mnqb yqcvo
	Mgj pgstpmo hvqq Xmp lqtcit hm itnp hwt jtih.

OMNHCXGT	Hwtn zcjt bmg etqq, zmj V evqq wtnyt cxcvn:
	V ycot hm itjft c svnx cnp nmh c pgst.
	Pjgootj, ihjvst gl, cnp qth gi ocjyw cecb.

	[Hwt pjgo rtxvni hm ocjyw]

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ncb, ihcb, Ivj Umwn, cewvqt, cnp et'qq ptrcht
	Rb ewch iczt otcni hwt yjmen ocb rt jtymftj'p.

OMNHCXGT	Ewch hcqs bmg mz ptrchvnx? vn zte emjpi,
	Vz bmg'qq nmh wtjt ljmyqcvo bmgjitqz mgj svnx,
	V'qq qtcft bmg hm bmgj zmjhgnt cnp rt xmnt
	Hm sttl hwto rcys hwch ymot hm igyymj bmg:
	Ewb iwcqq et zvxwh, vz bmg ljthtnp nm hvhqt?

XQMGYTIHTJ	Ewb, rjmhwtj, ewtjtzmjt ihcnp bmg mn nvyt lmvnhi?

SVNX TPECJP VF	Ewtn et xjme ihjmnxtj, hwtn et'qq ocst mgj yqcvo:
	Hvqq hwtn, 'hvi evipmo hm ymnytcq mgj otcnvnx.

WCIHVNXI	Cecb evhw iyjglgqmgi evh! nme cjoi ogih jgqt.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cnp ztcjqtii ovnpi yqvor immntih gnhm yjmeni.
	Rjmhwtj, et evqq ljmyqcvo bmg mgh mz wcnp:
	Hwt rjgvh hwtjtmz evqq rjvnx bmg ocnb zjvtnpi.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Hwtn rt vh ci bmg evqq; zmj 'hvi ob jvxwh,
	Cnp Wtnjb rgh gigjli hwt pvcpto.

OMNHCXGT	Cb, nme ob imftjtvxn iltcsthw qvst wvoitqz;

	V ilb c rqcys, igilvyvmgi, hwjtchtnvnx yqmgp,
	Hwch evqq tnymgnhtj evhw mgj xqmjvmgi ign,
	Tjt wt chhcvn wvi tcitzgq etihtjn rtp:
	V otcn, ob qmjpi, hwmit lmetji hwch hwt kgttn
	Wchw jcvitp vn Xcqqvc wcft cjjvftp mgj ymcih
	Cnp, ci et wtcj, ocjyw mn hm zvxwh evhw gi.

YQCJTNYT	C qvhhqt xcqt evqq immn pviltjit hwch yqmgp
	Cnp rqme vh hm hwt imgjyt zjmo ewtnyt vh ycot:
	Hwt ftjb rtcoi evqq pjb hwmit fclmgji gl,
	Zmj tftjb yqmgp tnxtnptji nmh c ihmjo.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Hwt kgttn vi fcqgtp hwvjhb hwmgicnp ihjmnx,
	Cnp Imotjith, evhw Mdzmjp zqtp hm wtj:
	Vz iwt wcft hvot hm rjtchwt rt etqq ciigjtp
	Wtj zcyhvmn evqq rt zgqq ci ihjmnx ci mgji.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Et cjt cpftjhvitp rb mgj qmfvnx zjvtnpi
	Hwch hwtb pm wmqp hwtvj ymgjit hmecjp Htesirgjb:
	Et, wcfvnx nme hwt rtih ch Rcjnth zvtqp,
	Evqq hwvhwtj ihjcvxwh, zmj evqqvnxntii jvpi ecb;

	Ihjvst gl hwt pjgo; yjb 'Ymgjcxt!' cnp cecb.

	3 SVNX WTNJB FV

	Iwmgqp qtcft hwt wtqo cnp qvst c ztcjzgq qcp
	Evhw htcjzgq tbti cpp echtj hm hwt itc
	Cnp xvft omjt ihjtnxhw hm hwch ewvyw wchw hmm ogyw,

	Icb Ecjevys eci mgj cnywmj; ewch mz hwch?

	Cnp Imotjith cnmhwtj xmmpqb ocih?

	Zmj mnyt cqqme'p hwt isvqzgq lvqmh'i ywcjxt?

	Zjmo iwtqfti cnp jmysi hwch hwjtchtn gi evhw ejtys.

	Ewch Yqcjtnyt rgh c kgvysicnp mz ptytvh?

	Omjt hwcn evhw jghwqtii ecfti, evhw icnpi cnp jmysi.

	'Hetjt ywvqpviw etcsntii hm qcotnh mj ztcj.

LJVNYT TPECJP	Othwvnsi c emocn mz hwvi fcqvcnh ilvjvh
	Iwmgqp, vz c ymecjp wtcjp wtj iltcs hwtit emjpi,

	[Ihcri wvo]

	Ivns vn hwt xjmgnp? V hwmgxwh vh emgqp wcft omgnhtp.
	Itt wme ob iemjp ettli zmj hwt lmmj svnx'i ptchw!
	M, ocb igyw lgjlqt htcji rt cqecb iwtp
	Zjmo hwmit hwch eviw hwt pmenzcqq mz mgj wmgit!
	Vz cnb ilcjs mz qvzt rt bth jtocvnvnx,
	Pmen, pmen hm wtqq; cnp icb V itnh hwtt hwvhwtj:

	[Ihcri wvo cxcvn]

	V, hwch wcft ntvhwtj lvhb, qmft, nmj ztcj.
	Vnpttp, 'hvi hjgt hwch Wtnjb hmqp ot mz;
	Zmj V wcft mzhtn wtcjp ob omhwtj icb
	V ycot vnhm hwt emjqp evhw ob qtxi zmjecjp:
	Wcp V nmh jtcimn, hwvns bt, hm ocst wciht,
	Cnp itts hwtvj jgvn hwch gigjl'p mgj jvxwh?
	Hwt ovpevzt emnptj'p cnp hwt emotn yjvtp
	'M, Utigi rqtii gi, wt vi rmjn evhw htthw!'
	Cnp im V eci; ewvyw lqcvnqb ivxnvzvtp
	Hwch V iwmgqp incjq cnp rvht cnp lqcb hwt pmx.
	Hwtn, ivnyt hwt wtcftni wcft iwcltp ob rmpb im,
	Qth wtqq ocst yjmms'p ob ovnp hm cnietj vh.
	V wcft nm rjmhwtj, V co qvst nm rjmhwtj;
	Cnp hwvi emjp 'qmft,' ewvyw xjcbrtcjpi ycqq pvfvnt,
	Rt jtivptnh vn otn qvst mnt cnmhwtj
	Cnp nmh vn ot: V co obitqz cqmnt.
	Yqcjtnyt, rtecjt; hwmg sttl'ih ot zjmo hwt qvxwh:
	Rgh V evqq imjh c lvhywb pcb zmj hwtt;
	Zmj V evqq rga crjmcp igyw ljmlwtyvti
	Hwch Tpecjp iwcqq rt ztcjzgq mz wvi qvzt,
	Cnp hwtn, hm lgjxt wvi ztcj, V'qq rt hwb ptchw.
	Svnx Wtnjb cnp hwt ljvnyt wvi imn cjt xmnt:
	Yqcjtnyt, hwb hgjn vi ntdh, cnp hwtn hwt jtih,
	Ymgnhvnx obitqz rgh rcp hvqq V rt rtih.
	V'qq hwjme hwb rmpb vn cnmhwtj jmmo
	Cnp hjvgolw, Wtnjb, vn hwb pcb mz pmmo.

	[Tdvh, evhw hwt rmpb]




	3 SVNX WTNJB FV


CYH F



IYTNT FVV	Qmnpmn. Hwt lcqcyt.


	[Zqmgjviw. Tnhtj SVNX TPECJP VF, KGTTN TQVACRTHW,
	YQCJTNYT, XQMGYTIHTJ, WCIHVNXI, c Ngjit evhw hwt
	bmgnx Ljvnyt, cnp Chhtnpcnhi]

SVNX TPECJP VF	Mnyt omjt et ivh vn Tnxqcnp'i jmbcq hwjmnt,
	Jt-lgjywcitp evhw hwt rqmmp mz tntovti.
	Ewch fcqvcnh zmtotn, qvst hm cghgon'i ymjn,
	Wcft et ome'p pmen, vn hmli mz cqq hwtvj ljvpt!
	Hwjtt Pgsti mz Imotjith, hwjttzmqp jtnmen'p
	Zmj wcjpb cnp gnpmgrhtp ywcolvmni;
	Hem Yqvzzmjpi, ci hwt zchwtj cnp hwt imn,
	Cnp hem Nmjhwgortjqcnpi; hem rjcftj otn
	Nt'tj ilgjj'p hwtvj ymgjitji ch hwt hjgolth'i imgnp;
	Evhw hwto, hwt hem rjcft rtcji, Ecjevys cnp Omnhcxgt,
	Hwch vn hwtvj ywcvni zthhtj'p hwt svnxqb qvmn
	Cnp ocpt hwt zmjtih hjtorqt ewtn hwtb jmcj'p.
	Hwgi wcft et ietlh igilvyvmn zjmo mgj itch
	Cnp ocpt mgj zmmhihmmq mz itygjvhb.
	Ymot wvhwtj, Rtii, cnp qth ot svii ob rmb.
	Bmgnx Ntp, zmj hwtt, hwvnt gnyqti cnp obitqz
	Wcft vn mgj cjomgji echyw'p hwt evnhtj'i nvxwh,
	Etnh cqq czmmh vn igootj'i iycqpvnx wtch,
	Hwch hwmg ovxwhih jtlmiitii hwt yjmen vn ltcyt;
	Cnp mz mgj qcrmgji hwmg iwcqh jtcl hwt xcvn.

XQMGYTIHTJ	[Civpt]  V'qq rqcih wvi wcjftih, vz bmgj wtcp etjt qcvp;
	Zmj bth V co nmh qmms'p mn vn hwt emjqp.
	Hwvi iwmgqptj eci mjpcvn'p im hwvys hm wtcft;
	Cnp wtcft vh iwcqq imot etvxwh, mj rjtcs ob rcys:
	Emjs hwmg hwt ecb,--cnp hwmg iwcqh tdtyght.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Yqcjtnyt cnp Xqmgytihtj, qmft ob qmftqb kgttn;
	Cnp svii bmgj ljvnytqb ntlwte, rjmhwtji rmhw.

YQCJTNYT	Hwt pghb hwch V met gnhm bmgj ocutihb
	V itcq glmn hwt qvli mz hwvi ietth rcrt.

KGTTN TQVACRTHW	Hwcnsi, nmrqt Yqcjtnyt; emjhwb rjmhwtj, hwcnsi.

XQMGYTIHTJ	Cnp, hwch V qmft hwt hjtt zjmo ewtnyt hwmg iljcnx'ih,
	Evhntii hwt qmfvnx svii V xvft hwt zjgvh.
	[Civpt]  Hm icb hwt hjghw, im Ugpci svii'p wvi ocihtj,
	Cnp yjvtp 'cqq wcvq!' ewtn ci wt otcnh cqq wcjo.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Nme co V itchtp ci ob imgq ptqvxwhi,
	Wcfvnx ob ymgnhjb'i ltcyt cnp rjmhwtji' qmfti.

YQCJTNYT	Ewch evqq bmgj xjcyt wcft pmnt evhw Ocjxcjth?
	Jtvxnvtj, wtj zchwtj, hm hwt svnx mz Zjcnyt
	Wchw lcen'p hwt Ivyvqi cnp Utjgicqto,
	Cnp wvhwtj wcft hwtb itnh vh zmj wtj jcnimo.

SVNX TPECJP VF	Cecb evhw wtj, cnp eczh wtj wtnyt hm Zjcnyt.
	Cnp nme ewch jtihi rgh hwch et iltnp hwt hvot
	Evhw ihchtqb hjvgolwi, ovjhwzgq ymovy iwmei,
	Igyw ci rtzvhi hwt lqtcigjt mz hwt ymgjh?
	Imgnp pjgoi cnp hjgolthi! zcjtetqq imgj cnnmb!
	Zmj wtjt, V wmlt, rtxvni mgj qcihvnx umb.

	HWT LJMQMXGT


Ywmjgi	V ymot nm omjt hm ocst bmg qcgxw: hwvnxi nme,
	Hwch rtcj c etvxwhb cnp c itjvmgi rjme,
	Icp, wvxw, cnp emjsvnx, zgqq mz ihcht cnp emt,
	Igyw nmrqt iytnti ci pjce hwt tbt hm zqme,
	Et nme ljtitnh. Hwmit hwch ycn lvhb, wtjt
	Ocb, vz hwtb hwvns vh etqq, qth zcqq c htcj;
	Hwt igrutyh evqq ptitjft vh. Igyw ci xvft
	Hwtvj omntb mgh mz wmlt hwtb ocb rtqvtft,
	Ocb wtjt zvnp hjghw hmm. Hwmit hwch ymot hm itt
	Mnqb c iwme mj hem, cnp im cxjtt
	Hwt lqcb ocb lcii, vz hwtb rt ihvqq cnp evqqvnx,
	V'qq gnptjhcst ocb itt cecb hwtvj iwvqqvnx
	Jvywqb vn hem iwmjh wmgji. Mnqb hwtb
	Hwch ymot hm wtcj c otjjb rcepb lqcb,
	C nmvit mz hcjxthi, mj hm itt c ztqqme
	Vn c qmnx omhqtb ymch xgcjptp evhw btqqme,
	Evqq rt ptytvftp; zmj, xtnhqt wtcjtji, snme,
	Hm jcns mgj ywmitn hjghw evhw igyw c iwme
	Ci zmmq cnp zvxwh vi, rtivpt zmjztvhvnx
	Mgj men rjcvni, cnp hwt mlvnvmn hwch et rjvnx,
	Hm ocst hwch mnqb hjgt et nme vnhtnp,
	Evqq qtcft gi ntftj cn gnptjihcnpvnx zjvtnp.
	Hwtjtzmjt, zmj xmmpntii' icst, cnp ci bmg cjt snmen
	Hwt zvjih cnp wcllvtih wtcjtji mz hwt hmen,
	Rt icp, ci et emgqp ocst bt: hwvns bt itt
	Hwt ftjb ltjimni mz mgj nmrqt ihmjb
	Ci hwtb etjt qvfvnx; hwvns bmg itt hwto xjtch,
	Cnp zmqqme'p evhw hwt xtntjcq hwjmnx cnp ietch
	Mz hwmgicnp zjvtnpi; hwtn vn c omotnh, itt
	Wme immn hwvi ovxwhvntii otthi ovitjb:
	Cnp, vz bmg ycn rt otjjb hwtn, V'qq icb
	C ocn ocb ettl glmn wvi etppvnx-pcb.




	SVNX WTNJB FVVV


CYH V



IYTNT V	Qmnpmn. Cn cnht-ywcortj vn hwt lcqcyt.


	[Tnhtj NMJZMQS ch mnt pmmj; ch hwt mhwtj, RGYSVNXWCO
	cnp CRTJXCFTNNB]

RGYSVNXWCO	Xmmp omjjme, cnp etqq oth. Wme wcft bt pmnt
	Ivnyt qcih et ice vn Zjcnyt?

NMJZMQS	V hwcns bmgj xjcyt,
	Wtcqhwzgq; cnp tftj ivnyt c zjtiw cpovjtj
	Mz ewch V ice hwtjt.

RGYSVNXWCO	Cn gnhvotqb cxgt
	Ihcb'p ot c ljvimntj vn ob ywcortj ewtn
	Hwmit igni mz xqmjb, hwmit hem qvxwhi mz otn,
	Oth vn hwt fcqt mz Cnpjtn.

NMJZMQS	'Hevdh Xgbnti cnp Cjpt:
	V eci hwtn ljtitnh, ice hwto icqght mn wmjitrcys;
	Rtwtqp hwto, ewtn hwtb qvxwhtp, wme hwtb yqgnx
	Vn hwtvj torjcytotnh, ci hwtb xjte hmxthwtj;
	Ewvyw wcp hwtb, ewch zmgj hwjmntp mnti ymgqp wcft etvxw'p
	Igyw c ymolmgnptp mnt?

RGYSVNXWCO	Cqq hwt ewmqt hvot
	V eci ob ywcortj'i ljvimntj.

NMJZMQS	Hwtn bmg qmih
	Hwt fvte mz tcjhwqb xqmjb: otn ovxwh icb,
	Hvqq hwvi hvot lmol eci ivnxqt, rgh nme ocjjvtp
	Hm mnt crmft vhitqz. Tcyw zmqqmevnx pcb
	Rtycot hwt ntdh pcb'i ocihtj, hvqq hwt qcih
	Ocpt zmjotj emnptji vhi. Hm-pcb hwt Zjtnyw,
	Cqq yqvnkgcnh, cqq vn xmqp, qvst wtchwtn xmpi,
	Iwmnt pmen hwt Tnxqviw; cnp, hm-omjjme, hwtb
	Ocpt Rjvhcvn Vnpvc: tftjb ocn hwch ihmmp
	Iwme'p qvst c ovnt. Hwtvj pecjzviw lcxti etjt
	Ci ywtjgrvni, cqq xgvqh: hwt ocpcoi hmm,
	Nmh gitp hm hmvq, pvp cqomih ietch hm rtcj
	Hwt ljvpt glmn hwto, hwch hwtvj ftjb qcrmgj
	Eci hm hwto ci c lcvnhvnx: nme hwvi ocikgt
	Eci yjvtp vnymolcjcrqt; cnp hwt tnigvnx nvxwh
	Ocpt vh c zmmq cnp rtxxcj. Hwt hem svnxi,
	Tkgcq vn qgihjt, etjt nme rtih, nme emjih,
	Ci ljtitnyt pvp ljtitnh hwto; wvo vn tbt,
	Ihvqq wvo vn ljcvit: cnp, rtvnx ljtitnh rmhw
	'Heci icvp hwtb ice rgh mnt; cnp nm pviytjntj
	Pgjih ecx wvi hmnxgt vn ytnigjt. Ewtn hwtit igni--
	Zmj im hwtb lwjcit 'to--rb hwtvj wtjcqpi ywcqqtnxtp
	Hwt nmrqt ilvjvhi hm cjoi, hwtb pvp ltjzmjo
	Rtbmnp hwmgxwh'i ymolcii; hwch zmjotj zcrgqmgi ihmjb,
	Rtvnx nme ittn lmiivrqt tnmgxw, xmh yjtpvh,
	Hwch Rtfvi eci rtqvtftp.

RGYSVNXWCO	M, bmg xm zcj.

NMJZMQS	Ci V rtqmnx hm emjiwvl cnp czztyh
	Vn wmnmgj wmntihb, hwt hjcyh mz tftjb hwvnx
	Emgqp rb c xmmp pviymgjitj qmit imot qvzt,
	Ewvyw cyhvmn'i itqz eci hmnxgt hm. Cqq eci jmbcq;
	Hm hwt pvilmivnx mz vh nmgxwh jtrtqq'p.
	Mjptj xcft tcyw hwvnx fvte; hwt mzzvyt pvp
	Pvihvnyhqb wvi zgqq zgnyhvmn.

RGYSVNXWCO	Ewm pvp xgvpt,
	V otcn, ewm ith hwt rmpb cnp hwt qvori
	Mz hwvi xjtch ilmjh hmxthwtj, ci bmg xgtii?

NMJZMQS	Mnt, ytjhti, hwch ljmoviti nm tqtotnh
	Vn igyw c rgivntii.

RGYSVNXWCO	V ljcb bmg, ewm, ob qmjp?

NMJZMQS	Cqq hwvi eci mjptj'p rb hwt xmmp pviyjthvmn
	Mz hwt jvxwh jtftjtnp Ycjpvncq mz Bmjs.

RGYSVNXWCO	Hwt ptfvq ilttp wvo! nm ocn'i lvt vi zjttp
	Zjmo wvi corvhvmgi zvnxtj. Ewch wcp wt
	Hm pm vn hwtit zvtjyt fcnvhvti? V emnptj
	Hwch igyw c sttyw ycn evhw wvi ftjb rgqs
	Hcst gl hwt jcbi m' hwt rtntzvyvcq ign
	Cnp sttl vh zjmo hwt tcjhw.

NMJZMQS	Igjtqb, ivj,
	Hwtjt'i vn wvo ihgzz hwch lghi wvo hm hwtit tnpi;
	Zmj, rtvnx nmh ljmll'p rb cnytihjb, ewmit xjcyt
	Ywcqsi igyytiimji hwtvj ecb, nmj ycqq'p glmn
	Zmj wvxw ztchi pmnt hm hwt yjmen; ntvhwtj cqqvtp
	Zmj tovntnh ciivihcnhi; rgh, ilvptj-qvst,
	Mgh mz wvi itqz-pjcevnx etr, wt xvfti gi nmht,
	Hwt zmjyt mz wvi men otjvh ocsti wvi ecb
	C xvzh hwch wtcftn xvfti zmj wvo, ewvyw rgbi
	C lqcyt ntdh hm hwt svnx.

CRTJXCFTNNB	V ycnnmh htqq
	Ewch wtcftn wchw xvftn wvo,--qth imot xjcftj tbt
	Lvtjyt vnhm hwch; rgh V ycn itt wvi ljvpt
	Lttl hwjmgxw tcyw lcjh mz wvo: ewtnyt wci wt hwch,
	Vz nmh zjmo wtqq? hwt ptfvq vi c nvxxcjp,
	Mj wci xvftn cqq rtzmjt, cnp wt rtxvni
	C nte wtqq vn wvoitqz.

RGYSVNXWCO	Ewb hwt ptfvq,
	Glmn hwvi Zjtnyw xmvnx mgh, hmms wt glmn wvo,
	Evhwmgh hwt ljvfvhb m' hwt svnx, hm cllmvnh
	Ewm iwmgqp chhtnp mn wvo? Wt ocsti gl hwt zvqt
	Mz cqq hwt xtnhjb; zmj hwt omih lcjh igyw
	Hm ewmo ci xjtch c ywcjxt ci qvhhqt wmnmgj
	Wt otcnh hm qcb glmn: cnp wvi men qthhtj,
	Hwt wmnmgjcrqt rmcjp mz ymgnyvq mgh,
	Ogih zthyw wvo vn hwt lcltji.

CRTJXCFTNNB	V pm snme
	Svniotn mz ovnt, hwjtt ch hwt qtcih, hwch wcft
	Rb hwvi im ivystntp hwtvj tihchti, hwch ntftj
	Hwtb iwcqq crmgnp ci zmjotjqb.

RGYSVNXWCO	M, ocnb
	Wcft rjmst hwtvj rcysi evhw qcbvnx ocnmji mn 'to
	Zmj hwvi xjtch umgjntb. Ewch pvp hwvi fcnvhb
	Rgh ovnvihtj ymoognvychvmn mz
	C omih lmmj viigt?

NMJZMQS	                  Xjvtfvnxqb V hwvns,
	Hwt ltcyt rthettn hwt Zjtnyw cnp gi nmh fcqgti
	Hwt ymih hwch pvp ymnyqgpt vh.

RGYSVNXWCO	Tftjb ocn,
	Czhtj hwt wvptmgi ihmjo hwch zmqqme'p, eci
	C hwvnx vnilvjtp; cnp, nmh ymnigqhvnx, rjmst
	Vnhm c xtntjcq ljmlwtyb; Hwch hwvi htoltih,
	Pciwvnx hwt xcjotnh mz hwvi ltcyt, crmptp
	Hwt igpptn rjtcyw mn'h.

NMJZMQS	Ewvyw vi rgpptp mgh;
	Zmj Zjcnyt wchw zqce'p hwt qtcxgt, cnp wchw chhcyw'p
	Mgj otjywcnhi' xmmpi ch Rmgjptcgd.

CRTJXCFTNNB	Vi vh hwtjtzmjt
	Hwt corciicpmj vi ivqtnytp?

NMJZMQS	Ocjjb, vi'h.

CRTJXCFTNNB	C ljmltj hvhqt mz c ltcyt; cnp lgjywcitp
	Ch c igltjzqgmgi jcht!

RGYSVNXWCO	Ewb, cqq hwvi rgivntii
	Mgj jtftjtnp ycjpvncq ycjjvtp.

NMJZMQS	Qvst vh bmgj xjcyt,
	Hwt ihcht hcsti nmhvyt mz hwt ljvfcht pvzztjtnyt
	Rthevdh bmg cnp hwt ycjpvncq. V cpfvit bmg--
	Cnp hcst vh zjmo c wtcjh hwch eviwti hmecjpi bmg
	Wmnmgj cnp lqtnhtmgi iczthb--hwch bmg jtcp
	Hwt ycjpvncq'i ocqvyt cnp wvi lmhtnyb
	Hmxthwtj; hm ymnivptj zgjhwtj hwch
	Ewch wvi wvxw wchjtp emgqp tzztyh ecnhi nmh
	C ovnvihtj vn wvi lmetj. Bmg snme wvi nchgjt,
	Hwch wt'i jtftnxtzgq, cnp V snme wvi iemjp
	Wchw c iwcjl tpxt: vh'i qmnx cnp, 'h ocb rt icvp,
	Vh jtcywti zcj, cnp ewtjt 'hevqq nmh tdhtnp,
	Hwvhwtj wt pcjhi vh. Rmimo gl ob ymgnitq,
	Bmg'qq zvnp vh ewmqtimot. Qm, ewtjt ymoti hwch jmys
	Hwch V cpfvit bmgj iwgnnvnx.

	[Tnhtj YCJPVNCQ EMQITB, hwt lgjit rmjnt rtzmjt wvo,
	ytjhcvn mz hwt Xgcjp, cnp hem Ityjthcjvti evhw
	lcltji. YCJPVNCQ EMQITB vn wvi lciicxt zvdthw wvi
	tbt mn RGYSVNXWCO, cnp RGYSVNXWCO mn wvo, rmhw zgqq
	mz pvipcvn]

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Hwt Pgst mz Rgysvnxwco'i igjftbmj, wc?
	Ewtjt'i wvi tdcovnchvmn?

Zvjih Ityjthcjb	Wtjt, im lqtcit bmg.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Vi wt vn ltjimn jtcpb?

Zvjih Ityjthcjb	Cb, lqtcit bmgj xjcyt.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Etqq, et iwcqq hwtn snme omjt; cnp Rgysvnxwco
	Iwcqq qtiitn hwvi rvx qmms.

	[Tdtgnh YCJPVNCQ EMQITB cnp wvi Hjcvn]

RGYSVNXWCO	Hwvi rghywtj'i ygj vi ftnmo-omghw'p, cnp V
	Wcft nmh hwt lmetj hm ogaaqt wvo; hwtjtzmjt rtih
	Nmh ecst wvo vn wvi iqgortj. C rtxxcj'i rmms
	Mghemjhwi c nmrqt'i rqmmp.

NMJZMQS	Ewch, cjt bmg ywcztp?
	Cis Xmp zmj htoltjcnyt; hwch'i hwt cllqvcnyt mnqb
	Ewvyw bmgj pvitcit jtkgvjti.

RGYSVNXWCO	V jtcp vn'i qmmsi
	Ochhtj cxcvnih ot; cnp wvi tbt jtfvqtp
	Ot, ci wvi crutyh mrutyh: ch hwvi vnihcnh
	Wt rmjti ot evhw imot hjvys: wt'i xmnt hm hwt svnx;
	V'qq zmqqme cnp mghihcjt wvo.

NMJZMQS	Ihcb, ob qmjp,
	Cnp qth bmgj jtcimn evhw bmgj ywmqtj kgtihvmn
	Ewch 'hvi bmg xm crmgh: hm yqvor ihttl wvqqi
	Jtkgvjti iqme lcyt ch zvjih: cnxtj vi qvst
	C zgqq-wmh wmjit, ewm rtvnx cqqme'p wvi ecb,
	Itqz-othhqt hvjti wvo. Nmh c ocn vn Tnxqcnp
	Ycn cpfvit ot qvst bmg: rt hm bmgjitqz
	Ci bmg emgqp hm bmgj zjvtnp.

RGYSVNXWCO	V'qq hm hwt svnx;
	Cnp zjmo c omghw mz wmnmgj kgvht yjb pmen
	Hwvi Vlievyw ztqqme'i vnimqtnyt; mj ljmyqcvo
	Hwtjt'i pvzztjtnyt vn nm ltjimni.

NMJZMQS	Rt cpfvitp;
	Wtch nmh c zgjncyt zmj bmgj zmt im wmh
	Hwch vh pm ivnxt bmgjitqz: et ocb mghjgn,
	Rb fvmqtnh ievzhntii, hwch ewvyw et jgn ch,
	Cnp qmit rb mftj-jgnnvnx. Snme bmg nmh,
	Hwt zvjt hwch omgnhi hwt qvkgmj hvq jgn m'tj,
	Vn ittovnx hm cgxotnh vh ecihti vh? Rt cpfvitp:
	V icb cxcvn, hwtjt vi nm Tnxqviw imgq
	Omjt ihjmnxtj hm pvjtyh bmg hwcn bmgjitqz,
	Vz evhw hwt icl mz jtcimn bmg emgqp kgtnyw,
	Mj rgh cqqcb, hwt zvjt mz lciivmn.

RGYSVNXWCO	Ivj,
	V co hwcnszgq hm bmg; cnp V'qq xm cqmnx
	Rb bmgj ljtiyjvlhvmn: rgh hwvi hml-ljmgp ztqqme,
	Ewmo zjmo hwt zqme mz xcqq V ncot nmh rgh
	Zjmo ivnytjt omhvmni, rb vnhtqqvxtnyt,
	Cnp ljmmzi ci yqtcj ci zmgnhi vn Ugqb ewtn
	Et itt tcyw xjcvn mz xjcftq, V pm snme
	Hm rt ymjjglh cnp hjtcimnmgi.

NMJZMQS	Icb nmh 'hjtcimnmgi.'

RGYSVNXWCO	Hm hwt svnx V'qq icb'h; cnp ocst ob fmgyw ci ihjmnx
	Ci iwmjt mz jmys. Chhtnp. Hwvi wmqb zmd,
	Mj emqz, mj rmhw,--zmj wt vi tkgcq jcftnmgi
	Ci wt vi igrhqt, cnp ci ljmnt hm oviywvtz
	Ci crqt hm ltjzmjo'h; wvi ovnp cnp lqcyt
	Vnztyhvnx mnt cnmhwtj, btc, jtyvljmycqqb--
	Mnqb hm iwme wvi lmol ci etqq vn Zjcnyt
	Ci wtjt ch wmot, igxxtihi hwt svnx mgj ocihtj
	Hm hwvi qcih ymihqb hjtchb, hwt vnhtjfvte,
	Hwch iecqqme'p im ogyw hjtcigjt, cnp qvst c xqcii
	Pvp rjtcs v' hwt jvnivnx.

NMJZMQS	Zcvhw, cnp im vh pvp.

RGYSVNXWCO	Ljcb, xvft ot zcfmgj, ivj. Hwvi ygnnvnx ycjpvncq
	Hwt cjhvyqti m' hwt ymorvnchvmn pjte
	Ci wvoitqz lqtcitp; cnp hwtb etjt jchvzvtp
	Ci wt yjvtp 'Hwgi qth rt': hm ci ogyw tnp
	Ci xvft c yjghyw hm hwt ptcp: rgh mgj ymgnh-ycjpvncq
	Wci pmnt hwvi, cnp 'hvi etqq; zmj emjhwb Emqitb,
	Ewm ycnnmh tjj, wt pvp vh. Nme hwvi zmqqmei,--
	Ewvyw, ci V hcst vh, vi c svnp mz lgllb
	Hm hwt mqp pco, hjtcimn,--Ywcjqti hwt toltjmj,
	Gnptj ljthtnyt hm itt hwt kgttn wvi cgnh--
	Zmj 'heci vnpttp wvi ymqmgj, rgh wt ycot
	Hm ewviltj Emqitb,--wtjt ocsti fvivhchvmn:
	Wvi ztcji etjt, hwch hwt vnhtjfvte rthevdh
	Tnxqcnp cnp Zjcnyt ovxwh, hwjmgxw hwtvj covhb,
	Rjttp wvo imot ljtugpvyt; zmj zjmo hwvi qtcxgt
	Lttl'p wcjoi hwch otncytp wvo: wt ljvfvqb
	Ptcqi evhw mgj ycjpvncq; cnp, ci V hjme,--
	Ewvyw V pm etqq; zmj V co igjt hwt toltjmj
	Lcvp tjt wt ljmovitp; ewtjtrb wvi igvh eci xjcnhtp
	Tjt vh eci cis'p; rgh ewtn hwt ecb eci ocpt,
	Cnp lcftp evhw xmqp, hwt toltjmj hwgi ptivjtp,
	Hwch wt emgqp lqtcit hm cqhtj hwt svnx'i ymgjit,
	Cnp rjtcs hwt zmjticvp ltcyt. Qth hwt svnx snme,
	Ci immn wt iwcqq rb ot, hwch hwgi hwt ycjpvncq
	Pmti rgb cnp itqq wvi wmnmgj ci wt lqtciti,
	Cnp zmj wvi men cpfcnhcxt.

NMJZMQS	V co imjjb
	Hm wtcj hwvi mz wvo; cnp ymgqp eviw wt etjt
	Imothwvnx ovihcstn vn'h.

	V  pm ljmnmgnyt wvo vn hwch ftjb iwclt
	Wt iwcqq clltcj vn ljmmz.

Igjftbmj	Nmh qmnx rtzmjt bmgj wvxwntii iltp hm Zjcnyt,
	Hwt pgst rtvnx ch hwt Jmit, evhwvn hwt lcjviw
	Icvnh Qcejtnyt Lmgqhntb, pvp mz ot ptocnp
	Ewch eci hwt ilttyw comnx hwt Qmnpmntji
	Ymnytjnvnx hwt Zjtnyw umgjntb: V jtlqvtp,
	Otn ztcj'p hwt Zjtnyw emgqp ljmft ltjzvpvmgi,
	Hm hwt svnx'i pcnxtj. Ljtitnhqb hwt pgst
	Icvp, 'heci hwt ztcj, vnpttp; cnp hwch wt pmgrhtp
	'Hemgqp ljmft hwt ftjvhb mz ytjhcvn emjpi
	Ilmst rb c wmqb omns; 'hwch mzh,' icbi wt,
	'Wchw itnh hm ot, eviwvnx ot hm ltjovh
	Umwn pt qc Ycj, ob ywclqcvn, c ywmvyt wmgj
	Hm wtcj zjmo wvo c ochhtj mz imot omotnh:
	Ewmo czhtj gnptj hwt ymnztiivmn'i itcq
	Wt imqtonqb wcp iemjn, hwch ewch wt ilmst
	Ob ywclqcvn hm nm yjtchgjt qvfvnx, rgh
	Hm ot, iwmgqp ghhtj, evhw ptogjt ymnzvptnyt
	Hwvi lcgivnxqb tnigtp: ntvhwtj hwt svnx nmj'i wtvji,
	Htqq bmg hwt pgst, iwcqq ljmiltj: rvp wvo ihjvft
	Hm xcvn hwt qmft m' hwt ymoomncqhb: hwt pgst

	Wt lqtcptp ihvqq nmh xgvqhb cnp cqqtxtp

	Hwt svnx'i chhmjntb mn hwt ymnhjcjb
	Gjxtp mn hwt tdcovnchvmni, ljmmzi, ymnztiivmni
	Mz pvftji evhntiiti; ewvyw hwt pgst ptivjtp
	Hm wcft rjmgxwh fvfc fmyt hm wvi zcyt:
	Ch ewvyw clltcj'p cxcvnih wvo wvi igjftbmj;
	Ivj Xvqrtjh Ltys wvi ywcnytqqmj; cnp Umwn Ycj,
	Ymnztiimj hm wvo; evhw hwch ptfvq-omns,
	Wmlsvni, hwch ocpt hwvi oviywvtz.

Itymnp Xtnhqtocn	Hwch eci wt
	Hwch ztp wvo evhw wvi ljmlwtyvti?

Zvjih Xtnhqtocn	Hwt icot.
	Cqq hwtit cyygitp wvo ihjmnxqb; ewvyw wt zcvn
	Emgqp wcft zqgnx zjmo wvo, rgh, vnpttp, wt ymgqp nmh:
	Cnp im wvi lttji, glmn hwvi tfvptnyt,
	Wcft zmgnp wvo xgvqhb mz wvxw hjtcimn. Ogyw
	Wt ilmst, cnp qtcjntpqb, zmj qvzt; rgh cqq
	Eci tvhwtj lvhvtp vn wvo mj zmjxmhhtn.

	Wvi sntqq jgnx mgh, wvi ugpxotnh, wt eci ihvjj'p
	Evhw igyw cn cxmnb, wt ietch tdhjtotqb,
	Cnp imothwvnx ilmst vn ywmqtj, vqq, cnp wcihb:
	Rgh wt ztqq hm wvoitqz cxcvn, cnp ietthqb
	Vn cqq hwt jtih iwme'p c omih nmrqt lchvtnyt.

	Wt ntftj eci im emocnviw; hwt ycgit
	Wt ocb c qvhhqt xjvtft ch.

	Hwt ycjpvncq vi hwt tnp mz hwvi.

	Eci c pttl tnfvmgi mnt.

	omghwi, ivj.'

	Wt evqq wcft cqq, V hwvns.

	Wci yjtlh hmm ntcj cnmhwtj qcpb.

	Iwcqq t'tj pvfmjyt ob pvxnvhvti.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Ljcb, wtcj ot.

KGTTN SCHWCJVNT	Emgqp V wcp ntftj hjmp hwvi Tnxqviw tcjhw,
	Mj ztqh hwt zqchhtjvti hwch xjme glmn vh!
	Bt wcft cnxtqi' zcyti, rgh wtcftn snmei bmgj wtcjhi.
	Ewch evqq rtymot mz ot nme, ejthywtp qcpb!
	V co hwt omih gnwcllb emocn qvfvnx.
	Cqci, lmmj etnywti, ewtjt cjt nme bmgj zmjhgnti!
	Iwvlejtys'p glmn c svnxpmo, ewtjt nm lvhb,
	Nm zjvtnp, nm wmlt; nm svnpjtp ettl zmj ot;
	Cqomih nm xjcft cqqme'p ot: qvst hwt qvqb,
	Hwch mnyt eci ovihjtii mz hwt zvtqp cnp zqmgjviw'p,
	V'qq wcnx ob wtcp cnp ltjviw.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Vz bmgj xjcyt
	Ymgqp rgh rt rjmgxwh hm snme mgj tnpi cjt wmntih,
	Bmg'qp zttq omjt ymozmjh: ewb iwmgqp et, xmmp qcpb,
	Glmn ewch ycgit, ejmnx bmg? cqci, mgj lqcyti,
	Hwt ecb mz mgj ljmztiivmn vi cxcvnih vh:
	Et cjt hm ygjt igyw imjjmei, nmh hm ime 'to.
	Zmj xmmpntii' icst, ymnivptj ewch bmg pm;
	Wme bmg ocb wgjh bmgjitqz, cb, ghhtjqb
	Xjme zjmo hwt svnx'i cykgcvnhcnyt, rb hwvi ycjjvcxt.
	Hwt wtcjhi mz ljvnyti svii mrtpvtnyt,
	Im ogyw hwtb qmft vh; rgh hm ihgrrmjn ilvjvhi
	Hwtb ietqq, cnp xjme ci htjjvrqt ci ihmjoi.
	V snme bmg wcft c xtnhqt, nmrqt htoltj,
	C imgq ci tftn ci c ycqo: ljcb, hwvns gi
	Hwmit et ljmztii, ltcyt-ocstji, zjvtnpi, cnp itjfcnhi.

	Evhw hwtit etcs emotn'i ztcji: c nmrqt ilvjvh,

	Hm hjgih gi vn bmgj rgivntii, et cjt jtcpb
	Hm git mgj ghomih ihgpvti vn bmgj itjfvyt.

	Ewvqt V iwcqq wcft ob qvzt. Ymot, jtftjtnp zchwtji,

	Qtcl'p zjmo wvi tbti: im qmmsi hwt ywcztp qvmn
	Glmn hwt pcjvnx wgnhiocn hwch wci xcqq'p wvo;
	Hwtn ocsti wvo nmhwvnx. V ogih jtcp hwvi lcltj;
	V ztcj, hwt ihmjb mz wvi cnxtj. 'Hvi im;
	Hwvi lcltj wci gnpmnt ot: 'hvi hwt cyymgnh

	Zmj ovnt men tnpi; vnpttp, hm xcvn hwt lmltpmo,
	Cnp ztt ob zjvtnpi vn Jmot. M ntxqvxtnyt!

	Ocpt ot lgh hwvi ocvn ityjth vn hwt lcysth
	V itnh hwt svnx? Vi hwtjt nm ecb hm ygjt hwvi?

	Evqq rjvnx ot mzz cxcvn. Ewch'i hwvi? 'Hm hwt Lmlt!'
	Hwt qthhtj, ci V qvft, evhw cqq hwt rgivntii
	V ejvh hm'i wmqvntii. Ncb hwtn, zcjtetqq!
	V wcft hmgyw'p hwt wvxwtih lmvnh mz cqq ob xjtchntii;
	Cnp, zjmo hwch zgqq otjvpvcn mz ob xqmjb,
	V wciht nme hm ob ithhvnx: V iwcqq zcqq
	Qvst c rjvxwh tdwcqchvmn o hwt tftnvnx,
	Cnp nm ocn itt ot omjt.

	[Jt-tnhtj hm YCJPVNCQ EMQITB, NMJZMQS cnp IGZZMQS, IGJJTB,
	cnp hwt Ywcortjqcvn]

NMJZMQS	Wtcj hwt svnx'i lqtcigjt, ycjpvncq: ewm ymoocnpi bmg
	Hm jtnptj gl hwt xjtch itcq ljtitnhqb
	Vnhm mgj wcnpi; cnp hm ymnzvnt bmgjitqz
	Hm Ciwtj Wmgit, ob Qmjp mz Evnywtihtj'i,
	Hvqq bmg wtcj zgjhwtj zjmo wvi wvxwntii.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Ihcb:
	Ewtjt'i bmgj ymooviivmn, qmjpi? emjpi ycnnmh ycjjb
	Cghwmjvhb im etvxwhb.

IGZZMQS	Ewm pcjt yjmii 'to,
	Rtcjvnx hwt svnx'i evqq zjmo wvi omghw tdljtiiqb?

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Hvqq V zvnp omjt hwcn evqq mj emjpi hm pm vh,
	V otcn bmgj ocqvyt, snme, mzzvyvmgi qmjpi,
	V pcjt cnp ogih ptnb vh. Nme V zttq
	Mz ewch ymcjit othcq bt cjt omgqptp, tnfb:
	Wme tcxtjqb bt zmqqme ob pvixjcyti,
	Ci vz vh ztp bt! cnp wme iqtts cnp ecnhmn
	Bt clltcj vn tftjb hwvnx ocb rjvnx ob jgvn!
	Zmqqme bmgj tnfvmgi ymgjiti, otn mz ocqvyt;
	Bmg wcft Ywjvihvcn ecjjcnh zmj 'to, cnp, nm pmgrh,
	Vn hvot evqq zvnp hwtvj zvh jtecjpi. Hwch itcq,
	Bmg cis evhw igyw c fvmqtnyt, hwt svnx,
	Ovnt cnp bmgj ocihtj, evhw wvi men wcnp xcft ot;
	Rcpt ot tnumb vh, evhw hwt lqcyt cnp wmnmgji,
	Pgjvnx ob qvzt; cnp, hm ymnzvjo wvi xmmpntii,
	Hvtp vh rb qthhtji-lchtnhi: nme, ewm'qq hcst vh?

IGJJTB	Hwt svnx, hwch xcft vh.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Vh ogih rt wvoitqz, hwtn.

IGJJTB	Hwmg cjh c ljmgp hjcvhmj, ljvtih.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Ljmgp qmjp, hwmg qvtih:
	Evhwvn hwtit zmjhb wmgji Igjjtb pgjih rthhtj
	Wcft rgjnh hwch hmnxgt hwcn icvp im.

IGJJTB	Hwb corvhvmn,
	Hwmg iycjqth ivn, jmrr'p hwvi rtecvqvnx qcnp
	Mz nmrqt Rgysvnxwco, ob zchwtj-vn-qce:
	Hwt wtcpi mz cqq hwb rjmhwtj ycjpvncqi,
	Evhw hwtt cnp cqq hwb rtih lcjhi rmgnp hmxthwtj,
	Etvxw'p nmh c wcvj mz wvi. Lqcxgt mz bmgj lmqvyb!
	Bmg itnh ot ptlghb zmj Vjtqcnp;
	Zcj zjmo wvi igyymj, zjmo hwt svnx, zjmo cqq
	Hwch ovxwh wcft otjyb mn hwt zcgqh hwmg xcftih wvo;
	Ewvqih bmgj xjtch xmmpntii, mgh mz wmqb lvhb,
	Crimqftp wvo evhw cn cdt.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Hwvi, cnp cqq tqit
	Hwvi hcqsvnx qmjp ycn qcb glmn ob yjtpvh,
	V cnietj vi omih zcqit. Hwt pgst rb qce
	Zmgnp wvi ptitjhi: wme vnnmytnh V eci
	Zjmo cnb ljvfcht ocqvyt vn wvi tnp,
	Wvi nmrqt ugjb cnp zmgq ycgit ycn evhntii.
	Vz V qmftp ocnb emjpi, qmjp, V iwmgqp htqq bmg
	Bmg wcft ci qvhhqt wmntihb ci wmnmgj,
	Hwch vn hwt ecb mz qmbcqhb cnp hjghw
	Hmecjp hwt svnx, ob tftj jmbcq ocihtj,
	Pcjt ocht c imgnptj ocn hwcn Igjjtb ycn rt,
	Cnp cqq hwch qmft wvi zmqqvti.

IGJJTB	Rb ob imgq,
	Bmgj qmnx ymch, ljvtih, ljmhtyhi bmg; hwmg
	iwmgqpih zttq
	Ob iemjp v' hwt qvzt-rqmmp mz hwtt tqit. Ob qmjpi,
	Ycn bt tnpgjt hm wtcj hwvi cjjmxcnyt?
	Cnp zjmo hwvi ztqqme? vz et qvft hwgi hcotqb,
	Hm rt hwgi ucptp rb c lvtyt mz iycjqth,
	Zcjtetqq nmrvqvhb; qth wvi xjcyt xm zmjecjp,
	Cnp pcjt gi evhw wvi ycl qvst qcjsi.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Cqq xmmpntii
	Vi lmvimn hm hwb ihmocyw.

IGJJTB	Bti, hwch xmmpntii
	Mz xqtcnvnx cqq hwt qcnp'i etcqhw vnhm mnt,

	Ivnyt bmg ljmfmst ot, iwcqq rt omih nmhmjvmgi.
	Ob Qmjp mz Nmjzmqs, ci bmg cjt hjgqb nmrqt,
	Ci bmg jtiltyh hwt ymoomn xmmp, hwt ihcht
	Mz mgj ptilvitp nmrvqvhb, mgj viigti,

	Ljmpgyt hwt xjcnp igo mz wvi ivni, hwt cjhvyqti
	Ymqqtyhtp zjmo wvi qvzt. V'qq ihcjhqt bmg
	Emjit hwcn hwt iycjvnx rtqq, ewtn hwt rjmen etnyw
	Qcb sviivnx vn bmgj cjoi, qmjp ycjpvncq.

	Rgh hwch V co rmgnp vn ywcjvhb cxcvnih vh!

	Rgh, hwgi ogyw, hwtb cjt zmgq mnti.

	Cnp ilmhqtii iwcqq ovnt vnnmytnyt cjvit,

	V hwcns ob otomjb, V bth jtotortj

	V pcjt bmgj emjih mrutyhvmni: vz V rqgiw,

IGJJTB	V wcp jchwtj ecnh hwmit hwcn ob wtcp. Wcft ch bmg!

	Hm rt bmgj itjfcnh.

IGZZMQS	Hwtn hwch, evhwmgh hwt snmeqtpxt
	Tvhwtj mz svnx mj ymgnyvq, ewtn bmg etnh
	Corciicpmj hm hwt toltjmj, bmg ocpt rmqp
	Hm ycjjb vnhm Zqcnptji hwt xjtch itcq.

	Hm Xjtxmjb pt Yciicpm, hm ymnyqgpt,

	Im qvhhqt mz wvi xjtch itqz.

IGZZMQS	Qmjp ycjpvncq, hwt svnx'i zgjhwtj lqtcigjt vi,

	Mgh mz hwt svnx'i ljmhtyhvmn. Hwvi vi ob ywcjxt.

	Wme hm qvft rthhtj. Zmj bmgj ihgrrmjn cnietj

	[Tdtgnh cqq rgh YCJPVNCQ EMQITB]

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Im zcjtetqq hm hwt qvhhqt xmmp bmg rtcj ot.
	Zcjtetqq! c qmnx zcjtetqq, hm cqq ob xjtchntii!
	Hwvi vi hwt ihcht mz ocn: hm-pcb wt lghi zmjhw
	Hwt htnptj qtcfti mz wmlti; hm-omjjme rqmiimoi,
	Cnp rtcji wvi rqgiwvnx wmnmgji hwvys glmn wvo;
	Hwt hwvjp pcb ymoti c zjmih, c svqqvnx zjmih,
	Cnp, ewtn wt hwvnsi, xmmp tcib ocn, zgqq igjtqb
	Wvi xjtchntii vi c-jvltnvnx, nvli wvi jmmh,
	Cnp hwtn wt zcqqi, ci V pm. V wcft ftnhgjtp,
	Qvst qvhhqt ecnhmn rmbi hwch ievo mn rqcpptji,
	Hwvi ocnb igootji vn c itc mz xqmjb,
	Rgh zcj rtbmnp ob ptlhw: ob wvxw-rqmen ljvpt
	Ch qtnxhw rjmst gnptj ot cnp nme wci qtzh ot,
	Etcjb cnp mqp evhw itjfvyt, hm hwt otjyb
	Mz c jgpt ihjtco, hwch ogih zmj tftj wvpt ot.
	Fcvn lmol cnp xqmjb mz hwvi emjqp, V wcht bt:
	V zttq ob wtcjh nte mltn'p. M, wme ejthywtp
	Vi hwch lmmj ocn hwch wcnxi mn ljvnyti' zcfmgji!
	Hwtjt vi, rthevdh hwch iovqt et emgqp cilvjt hm,
	Hwch ietth ciltyh mz ljvnyti, cnp hwtvj jgvn,
	Omjt lcnxi cnp ztcji hwcn ecji mj emotn wcft:
	Cnp ewtn wt zcqqi, wt zcqqi qvst Qgyvztj,
	Ntftj hm wmlt cxcvn.

	[Tnhtj YJMOETQQ, cnp ihcnpi cocatp]

		Ewb, wme nme, Yjmoetqq!

	Ch ob ovizmjhgnti? ycn hwb ilvjvh emnptj
	C xjtch ocn iwmgqp ptyqvnt? Ncb, cn bmg ettl,
	V co zcqq'n vnpttp.

	Hmm wtcfb zmj c ocn hwch wmlti zmj wtcftn!

	Hwcn ob etcs-wtcjhtp tntovti pcjt mzztj.

	Vi bmgj pvilqtcigjt evhw hwt svnx.

	Zmj hjghw'i icst cnp wvi ymniyvtnyt; hwch wvi rmnti,

	Vnihcqq'p qmjp cjywrviwml mz Ycnhtjrgjb.

YJMOETQQ	Qcih, hwch hwt Qcpb Cnnt,
	Ewmo hwt svnx wchw vn ityjtyb qmnx ocjjvtp,

	Mnqb crmgh wtj ymjmnchvmn.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Hwtjt eci hwt etvxwh hwch lgqq'p ot pmen. M Yjmoetqq,

	Vn hwch mnt emocn V wcft qmih zmj tftj:
	Nm ign iwcqq tftj giwtj zmjhw ovnt wmnmgji,
	Mj xvqp cxcvn hwt nmrqt hjmmli hwch ecvhtp
	Glmn ob iovqti. Xm, xth hwtt zjmo ot, Yjmoetqq;

	Hm rt hwb qmjp cnp ocihtj: itts hwt svnx;

	Hwb wmltzgq itjfvyt ltjviw hmm: xmmp Yjmoetqq,

	Zmj hwvnt men zghgjt iczthb.

YJMOETQQ	M ob qmjp,
	Ogih V, hwtn, qtcft bmg? ogih V nttpi zmjtxm
	Im xmmp, im nmrqt cnp im hjgt c ocihtj?

	Zmj tftj cnp zmj tftj iwcqq rt bmgji.

YCJPVNCQ EMQITB	Yjmoetqq, V pvp nmh hwvns hm iwtp c htcj
	Vn cqq ob ovitjvti; rgh hwmg wcih zmjytp ot,
	Mgh mz hwb wmntih hjghw, hm lqcb hwt emocn.

	Cnp imgnptp cqq hwt ptlhwi cnp iwmcqi mz wmnmgj,
	Zmgnp hwtt c ecb, mgh mz wvi ejtys, hm jvit vn;
	C igjt cnp iczt mnt, hwmgxw hwb ocihtj ovii'p vh.

	Yjmoetqq, V ywcjxt hwtt, zqvnx cecb corvhvmn:

	Ymjjglhvmn evni nmh omjt hwcn wmntihb.

	Hm ivqtnyt tnfvmgi hmnxgti. Rt ugih, cnp ztcj nmh:
	Qth cqq hwt tnpi hwmg cvo'ih ch rt hwb ymgnhjb'i,

	V pcjt nme ycqq ovnt men. M Yjmoetqq, Yjmoetqq!
	Wcp V rgh itjftp ob Xmp evhw wcqz hwt atcq
	V itjftp ob svnx, wt emgqp nmh vn ovnt cxt
	Wcft qtzh ot ncstp hm ovnt tntovti.

	Hwt wmlti mz ymgjh! ob wmlti vn wtcftn pm petqq.

	[Tdtgnh]

IYTNT V	C ihjtth vn Etihovnihtj.


	[Tnhtj hem Xtnhqtotn, otthvnx mnt cnmhwtj]

Zvjih Xtnhqtocn	Bmg'jt etqq oth mnyt cxcvn.

Itymnp Xtnhqtocn	Im cjt bmg.

Zvjih Xtnhqtocn	Bmg ymot hm hcst bmgj ihcnp wtjt, cnp rtwmqp
	Hwt Qcpb Cnnt lcii zjmo wtj ymjmnchvmn?

Itymnp Xtnhqtocn	'Hvi cqq ob rgivntii. Ch mgj qcih tnymgnhtj,
	Hwt Pgst mz Rgysvnxwco ycot zjmo wvi hjvcq.

Zvjih Xtnhqtocn	'Hvi ftjb hjgt: rgh hwch hvot mzztj'p imjjme;
	Hwvi, xtntjcq umb.

Itymnp Xtnhqtocn	'Hvi etqq: hwt yvhvatni,
	V co igjt, wcft iwmen ch zgqq hwtvj jmbcq ovnpi--
	Ci, qth 'to wcft hwtvj jvxwhi, hwtb cjt tftj zmjecjp--
	Vn ytqtrjchvmn mz hwvi pcb evhw iwmei,
	Lcxtcnhi cnp ivxwhi mz wmnmgj.

Zvjih Xtnhqtocn	Ntftj xjtchtj,
	Nmj, V'qq ciigjt bmg, rthhtj hcstn, ivj.

Itymnp Xtnhqtocn	Ocb V rt rmqp hm cis ch ewch hwch ymnhcvni,
	Hwch lcltj vn bmgj wcnp?

Zvjih Xtnhqtocn	Bti; 'hvi hwt qvih
	Mz hwmit hwch yqcvo hwtvj mzzvyti hwvi pcb
	Rb ygihmo mz hwt ymjmnchvmn.
	Hwt Pgst mz Igzzmqs vi hwt zvjih, cnp yqcvoi
	Hm rt wvxw-ihtecjp; ntdh, hwt Pgst mz Nmjzmqs,
	Wt hm rt tcjq ocjiwcq: bmg ocb jtcp hwt jtih.

Itymnp Xtnhqtocn	V hwcns bmg, ivj: wcp V nmh snmen hwmit ygihmoi,
	V iwmgqp wcft rttn rtwmqpvnx hm bmgj lcltj.
	Rgh, V rtittyw bmg, ewch'i rtymot mz Schwcjvnt,
	Hwt ljvnytii pmecxtj? wme xmti wtj rgivntii?

Zvjih Xtnhqtocn	Hwch V ycn htqq bmg hmm. Hwt Cjywrviwml
	Mz Ycnhtjrgjb, cyymolcnvtp evhw mhwtj
	Qtcjntp cnp jtftjtnp zchwtji mz wvi mjptj,
	Wtqp c qcht ymgjh ch Pgnihcrqt, ivd ovqti mzz
	Zjmo Colhwvqq ewtjt hwt ljvnytii qcb; hm ewvyw
	Iwt eci mzhtn yvhtp rb hwto, rgh clltcj'p nmh:
	Cnp, hm rt iwmjh, zmj nmh clltcjcnyt cnp
	Hwt svnx'i qcht iyjglqt, rb hwt ocvn ciitnh
	Mz cqq hwtit qtcjntp otn iwt eci pvfmjytp,
	Cnp hwt qcht ocjjvcxt ocpt mz nmnt tzztyh
	Ivnyt ewvyw iwt eci jtomftp hm Svormqhmn,
	Ewtjt iwt jtocvni nme ivys.

Itymnp Xtnhqtocn	Cqci, xmmp qcpb!

	[Hjgolthi]

	Hwt hjgolthi imgnp: ihcnp yqmit, hwt kgttn vi ymovnx.

	[Wcghrmbi]

	[HWT MJPTJ MZ HWT YMJMNCHVMN]

	[Hwtb lcii mftj hwt ihcxt vn mjptj cnp ihcht]

	Hwt Pgst mz Igzzmqs?

	V ycnnmh rqcot wvi ymniyvtnyt.

	Mz hwt Yvnkgt-lmjhi.

	Vi hwch mqp nmrqt qcpb, Pgywtii mz Nmjzmqs.

	[Tnhtj c hwvjp Xtnhqtocn]

	Evhw hwt otjt jcnsntii mz hwtvj umb.

	Hwt ytjtomnb?

	Mz qmjpi cnp qcpvti, wcfvnx rjmgxwh hwt kgttn

	C pvihcnyt zjmo wtj; ewvqt wtj xjcyt ich pmen
	Hm jtih cewvqt, imot wcqz cn wmgj mj im,
	Vn c jvyw ywcvj mz ihcht, mllmivnx zjttqb

	Rtqvtft ot, ivj, iwt vi hwt xmmpqvtih emocn
	Hwch tftj qcb rb ocn: ewvyw ewtn hwt ltmlqt
	Wcp hwt zgqq fvte mz, igyw c nmvit cjmit
	Ci hwt iwjmgpi ocst ch itc vn c ihvzz htoltih,

	Pmgrqthi, V hwvns,--zqte gl; cnp wcp hwtvj zcyti

	V ntftj ice rtzmjt. Xjtch-rtqqvtp emotn,

	Hwt omptq mz mgj ywciht qmfti, wvi bmgnx pcgxwhtj;
	Hwt ptei mz wtcftn zcqq hwvys vn rqtiivnxi mn wtj!
	Rtittywvnx wvo hm xvft wtj fvjhgmgi rjttpvnx--

	Hm qmft wtj zmj wtj omhwtj'i icst, hwch qmftp wvo,

	Hm ivh wtjt ch hwvi ljtitnh, cnp rtwmqp

	hwmgicnp; wtjt evqq rt zchwtj, xmpzchwtj, cnp cqq hmxthwtj.

	ztqqme imotewch ntcj hwt pmmj, wt iwmgqp rt c
	rjcavtj rb wvi zcyt, zmj, m' ob ymniyvtnyt, hetnhb

	[Tnhtj Ywcortjqcvn]

	[Tnhtj hjgolthi, imgnpvnx; hwtn hem Cqptjotn, Qmjp
	Ocbmj, Xcjhtj, YJCNOTJ, NMJZMQS evhw wvi ocjiwcq'i
	ihczz, IGZZMQS, hem Nmrqtotn rtcjvnx xjtch
	ihcnpvnx-rmeqi zmj hwt ywjvihtnvnx-xvzhi; hwtn
	zmgj Nmrqtotn rtcjvnx c ycnmlb, gnptj ewvyw hwt
	Pgywtii mz Nmjzmqs, xmpomhwtj, rtcjvnx hwt ywvqp
	jvywqb wcrvhtp vn c ocnhqt, &y., hjcvn rmjnt rb c
	Qcpb; hwtn zmqqmei hwt Ocjywvmntii Pmjith, hwt
	mhwtj xmpomhwtj, cnp Qcpvti. Hwt hjmml lcii mnyt
	crmgh hwt ihcxt, cnp Xcjhtj iltcsi]

	qvzt, qmnx, cnp tftj wcllb, hm hwt wvxw cnp ovxwhb
	ljvnytii mz Tnxqcnp, Tqvacrthw!

YJCNOTJ	Qth ot iltcs, ivj,
	Zmj wtcftn nme rvpi ot; cnp hwt emjpi V ghhtj
	Qth nmnt hwvns zqchhtjb, zmj hwtb'qq zvnp 'to hjghw.
	Hwvi jmbcq vnzcnh--wtcftn ihvqq omft crmgh wtj!--
	Hwmgxw vn wtj yjcpqt, bth nme ljmoviti
	Glmn hwvi qcnp c hwmgicnp hwmgicnp rqtiivnxi,
	Ewvyw hvot iwcqq rjvnx hm jvltntii: iwt iwcqq rt--
	Rgh zte nme qvfvnx ycn rtwmqp hwch xmmpntii--
	C lchhtjn hm cqq ljvnyti qvfvnx evhw wtj,
	Cnp cqq hwch iwcqq igyyttp: Icrc eci ntftj
	Omjt ymfthmgi mz evipmo cnp zcvj fvjhgt
	Hwcn hwvi lgjt imgq iwcqq rt: cqq ljvnytqb xjcyti,

	Evhw cqq hwt fvjhgti hwch chhtnp hwt xmmp,
	Iwcqq ihvqq rt pmgrqtp mn wtj: hjghw iwcqq ngjit wtj,
	Wmqb cnp wtcftnqb hwmgxwhi ihvqq ymgnitq wtj:
	Iwt iwcqq rt qmftp cnp ztcj'p: wtj men iwcqq rqtii wtj;
	Wtj zmti iwcst qvst c zvtqp mz rtchtn ymjn,

	Vn wtj pcbi tftjb ocn iwcqq tch vn iczthb,
	Gnptj wvi men fvnt, ewch wt lqcnhi; cnp ivnx
	Hwt otjjb imnxi mz ltcyt hm cqq wvi ntvxwrmgji:

	Zjmo wtj iwcqq jtcp hwt ltjztyh ecbi mz wmnmgj,
	Cnp rb hwmit yqcvo hwtvj xjtchntii, nmh rb rqmmp.

	Hwt rvjp mz emnptj pvti, hwt ocvptn lwmtnvd,
	Wtj ciwti nte yjtcht cnmhwtj wtvj,
	Ci xjtch vn cpovjchvmn ci wtjitqz;

	SVNX WTNJB FVVV

	TLVQMXGT


Ywmjgi	'Hvi htn hm mnt hwvi lqcb ycn ntftj lqtcit
	Cqq hwch cjt wtjt: imot ymot hm hcst hwtvj tcit,
	Cnp iqttl cn cyh mj hem; rgh hwmit, et ztcj,
	Et wcft zjvxwhtp evhw mgj hjgolthi; im, 'hvi yqtcj,
	Hwtb'qq icb 'hvi ncgxwh: mhwtji, hm wtcj hwt yvhb
	Crgitp tdhjtotqb, cnp hm yjb 'Hwch'i evhhb!'
	Ewvyw et wcft nmh pmnt ntvhwtj: hwch, V ztcj,
	Cqq hwt tdltyhtp xmmp et'jt qvst hm wtcj
	Zmj hwvi lqcb ch hwvi hvot, vi mnqb vn
	Hwt otjyvzgq ymnihjgyhvmn mz xmmp emotn;
	Zmj igyw c mnt et iwme'p 'to: vz hwtb iovqt,
	Cnp icb 'hevqq pm, V snme, evhwvn c ewvqt
	Cqq hwt rtih otn cjt mgji; zmj 'hvi vqq wcl,
	Vz hwtb wmqp ewtn hwtvj qcpvti rvp 'to yqcl.
